translation.cy: tenantiaeth neu drwydded sy’n ymwneud â ‘llety mynediad uniongyrchol’ (gweler paragraff 10).
translation.en: a tenancy or licence which relates to ‘direct access accommodation’ (see paragraph 10).

translation.cy: Mae dyletswydd interim yn codi tra bo’r awdurdod lleol yn cynnal asesiad o dan adran 60 o Ddeddf Tai (Cymru) 2014, i ystyried a oes dyletswydd lawn yn ddyledus i’r ceisydd mewn gwirionedd.
translation.en: An interim duty arises whilst the local authority carries out an assessment under section 60 of the Housing (Wales) Act 2014 to consider whether the applicant is actually owed a full duty.

translation.cy: Mae adran 143(2) yn diffinio llety â chymorth.
translation.en: Section 143(2) defines supported accommodation.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn golygu y bydd contract meddiannaeth yn cael ei ffurfio naill ai yn union ar ôl i’r cyfnod chwe mis dechreuol ddod i ben (os na wneir estyniad) neu (os gwneir estyniad) yn union ar ôl y dyddiad a bennir yn yr hysbysiad o estyniad.
translation.en: This means that an occupation contract will arise either immediately after the initial six-month period has ended (where there has been no extension) or (where there has been an extension) immediately after the date specified in the notice of extension.

translation.cy: Er mwyn i unrhyw gontract blaenorol gael ei drin yn y modd hwn, rhaid iddo fod yn ymwneud â llety â chymorth, ac ymwneud naill ai â’r un annedd â’r contract cyfredol, neu annedd o fewn yr un adeilad neu uned.
translation.en: For any previous contract to be treated in this way it must relate to supported accommodation, and either to the same dwelling as the current contract or to a dwelling within the same building or unit.

translation.cy: 59.Pan fo landlord yn dymuno parhau i ddarparu llety â chymorth y tu hwnt i’r cyfnodo chwe mis, ond nad yw’n dymuno i’r llety gael ei ddarparu o dan gontract meddiannaeth, caiff y landlord ymestyn y cyfnod hwnnw.
translation.en: 59.Where a landlord wishes to continue to provide supported accommodation beyond the six month period, but does not wish for the accommodation to be provided under an occupation contract, the landlord may extend that period.

translation.cy: Caiff Gweinidogion Cymru wneud rheoliadau sy’n pennu manylion y weithdrefn ar gyfer cael caniatâd gan awdurdodau tai lleol.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers may make regulations setting out details of the procedure for obtaining consent from local housing authorities.

translation.cy: Mae paragraff 17 yn rhoi pŵer i Weinidogion Cymru ddiwygio Atodlen 2.
translation.en: Paragraph 17 provides a power for the Welsh Ministers to amend Schedule 2.

translation.cy: Mae’r Atodlen yn cynnwys manylion arwyddocaol a llawer o ddiffiniadau y bydd angen eu diweddaru o bryd i’w gilydd.
translation.en: The schedule contains significant detail and many definitions which are likely to require updating over time.

translation.cy: Contractau safonol yw’r math diofyn o gontract a ddyroddir gan landlordiaid preifat, sef yr holl landlordiaid nad ydynt yn landlordiaid cymunedol.
translation.en: Standard contracts are the default contract issued by private landlords, that is, all landlords that are not community landlords.

translation.cy: Anheddau a fwriedir ar gyfer trosglwyddo – Contract meddiannaeth sy’n ymwneud â llety sydd wedi ei gaffael, ei adeiladu neu ei ddatblygu gan landlord cymunedol, landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig (gweler adran 1 o Ddeddf Tai 1996) neu ddarparwr tai cymdeithasol cofrestredig preifat (gweler adran 80(3) o Ddeddf Tai ac Adfywio 2008) gyda’r bwriad o’i drosglwyddo i gymdeithas dai gwbl gydfuddiannol neu gymdeithas dai gydweithredol.
translation.en: Dwellings intended for transfer - An occupation contract relating to accommodation which has been acquired, built or developed by a community landlord, a registered social landlord (see section 1 of the Housing Act 1996) or a private registered provider of social housing (see section 80(3) of the Housing and Regeneration Act 2008) with the intention of transferring it to a fully mutual housing association or a co-operative housing association.

translation.cy: Mae’r contract meddiannaeth o fewn Atodlen 3 (gweler uchod) a’r landlord yn rhoi hysbysiad o dan adran 13 y bydd yn gontract safonol.
translation.en: The occupation contract is within Schedule 3 (see above) and the landlord gives notice under section 13 that it is to be a standard contract.

translation.cy: Roedd y contract yn gontract safonol cyfnod penodol sydd wedi dod i ben a dod yn gontract safonol cyfnodol, neu mae contract newydd wedi ei wneud ar ddiwedd cyfnod penodol (gweler adran 184(6)).
translation.en: The contract was a fixed term standard contract that has ended and become a periodic standard contract, or a new contract has been made at the end of a fixed term (see section 184(6).

translation.cy: Adran 16 – Contractau safonol rhagarweiniol
translation.en: Section 16 – Introductory standard contracts

translation.cy: Ar ddiwedd y cyfnod rhagarweiniol mae’r contract safonol rhagarweiniol yn dod i ben a bydd contract diogel yn cymryd ei le, oni bai bod landlord preifat yn dod yn landlord o dan y contract.
translation.en: At the end of the introductory period the introductory standard contract ends and is replaced by a secure contract unless a private landlord becomes the landlord under the contract.

translation.cy: Atodlen 4 - Contractau safonol rhagarweiniol
translation.en: Schedule 4 - Introductory standard contracts

translation.cy: At hynny, os yw’r landlord, ar ôl i’r landlord gynnal adolygiad mewnol o’r penderfyniad, yn hysbysu deiliad y contract fod y landlord wedi penderfynu cadarnhau’r penderfyniad, neu os yw’n methu â rhoi hysbysiad o gwbl, caiff deiliad y contract wneud cais i’r llys sirol am adolygiad o’r penderfyniad i ymestyn y cyfnod rhagarweiniol.
translation.en: Furthermore if, after an internal review of the decision by the landlord, the landlord gives a notice informing the contract-holder that the landlord has decided to confirm the decision, or fails to give notice at all, the contract-holder can apply to the county court for a review of the decision to extend the introductory period.

translation.cy: Mae’r paragraff hwn yn pennu’r hyn yw’r cyfnod rhagarweiniol, sef y cyfnod pan fo contract meddiannaeth a roddir gan landlord cymunedol yn gontract safonol cyfnodol (oherwydd yr eithriad ym mharagraff 3 o Atodlen 3).
translation.en: This paragraph sets out what constitutes the introductory period during which an occupation contract granted by a community landlord is a periodic standard contract (because of the exception in paragraph 3 of Schedule 3)

translation.cy: Mae’r nodiadau hyn yn cyfeirio at Ddeddf Rhentu Cartrefi (Cymru) 2016 (dccc 1) a gafodd y Cydsyniad Brenhinol ar 18 Ionawr 2016
translation.en: These notes refer to the Renting Homes (Wales) Act 2016 (anaw 1) which received Royal Assent on 18 January 2016

translation.cy: Paragraff 4
translation.en: Paragraph 4

translation.cy: Os yw’r llys yn diddymu’r penderfyniad, a’r landlord yn rhoi hysbysiad pellach o estyniad i ddeiliad y contract o fewn 14 diwrnod ar ôl penderfyniad y llys, rhagdybir bod yr hysbysiad yn cydymffurfio â’r gofyniad hysbysu ym mharagraff 3 (2) (hynny yw, rhagdybir ei fod wedi ei roi o leiaf wyth wythnos cyn y diwrnod y byddai’r cyfnod rhagarweiniol wedi dod i ben).
translation.en: If the court quashes the decision and the landlord gives the contract-holder a further notice of extension within 14 days of the court’s decision, the notice is deemed to comply with the notice requirement in paragraph 3(2) (that is, it is taken to have been given at least eight weeks before the day on which the introductory period would have ended).

translation.cy: Caiff landlord sy’n darparu datganiad o’r fath ei drin fel pe bai wedi cydymffurfio â’r gofyniad yn adran 31 i ddarparu datganiad ysgrifenedig mewn perthynas â’r contract diogel.
translation.en: A landlord providing such a statement is treated as having complied with the requirement in section 31 to provide a written statement in relation to the secure contract.

translation.cy: Paragraff 7
translation.en: Paragraph 7

translation.cy: Bydd contract meddiannaeth a wneir rhwng landlord preifat a deiliad y contract yn gontract safonol, yn ddiofyn.
translation.en: An occupation contract made between a private landlord and a contract-holder will by default be a standard contract.

translation.cy: Mae Atodlen 1 yn rhestru’r darpariaethau sylfaenol sy’n gymwys i bob math o gontract meddiannaeth.
translation.en: Schedule 1 lists the fundamental provisions that apply to each type of occupation contract.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn galluogi Gweinidogion Cymru i wneud rheoliadau sy’n pennu naill ai bod unrhyw ddarpariaeth mewn Deddf Seneddol neu Fesur neu Ddeddf Cynulliad Cenedlaethol Cymru (gan gynnwys unrhyw ddarpariaeth yn y Ddeddf hon), neu mewn is-ddeddfwriaeth, yn ddarpariaeth sylfaenol, neu nad yw’n ddarpariaeth sylfaenol.
translation.en: This enables the Welsh Ministers to make regulations which specify that any provision of an Act of Parliament or of a Measure or Act of the National Assembly for Wales (including any provision of this Act), or of subordinate legislation is, or is not, a fundamental provision.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, pe bai peidio ag ymgorffori darpariaeth atodol neu addasu darpariaeth atodol yn peri bod y teler atodol cysylltiedig yn anghydnaws ag un o delerau sylfaenol y contract, ni fyddai’r cytundeb i beidio ag ymgorffori’r ddarpariaeth atodol wreiddiol neu i’w hymgorffori ynghyd ag addasiadau yn cael unrhyw effaith.
translation.en: However, where not incorporating a supplementary provision or modifying a supplementary provision would render the related supplementary term incompatible with a fundamental term of the contract, the agreement not to incorporate the original supplementary provision or to incorporate it with modification has no effect.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn pennu’r materion allweddol y mae’n rhaid eu cynnwys ym mhob contract meddiannaeth, sef:
translation.en: This section sets out the key matters which must be included in all occupation contracts. These are:

translation.cy: os y’i gwnaed am gyfnod penodol, y cyfnod y’i gwnaed ar ei gyfer (am ba hyd y bydd y contract yn parhau, pa bryd y bydd yn cychwyn a pha bryd y daw i ben);
translation.en: if it is made for a fixed term, the term for which it is made (how long does the contract run, when does it begin and when does it end);

translation.cy: RHAN 3 - DARPARIAETHAU SY’N GYMWYS I BOB CONTRACT MEDDIANNAETH
translation.en: PART 3 - PROVISIONS APPLYING TO ALL OCCUPATION CONTRACTS

translation.cy: PENNOD 2 - DARPARU GWYBODAETH
translation.en: CHAPTER 2 - PROVISION OF INFORMATION

translation.cy: Os ymgorfforir yr adran hon fel un o delerau’r contract heb ei haddasu, mae’n ofynnol i’r landlord ddarparu datganiad ysgrifenedig o’r contract i ddeiliad y contract o fewn 14 diwrnod i’r dyddiad y mae deiliad y contract yn cael yr hawl i feddiannu’r annedd.
translation.en: If this section is incorporated as a term of the contract without modification, the landlord is required to provide a written statement of the occupation contract to the contract-holder within 14 days of the date the contract-holder becomes entitled to occupy the dwelling.

translation.cy: Os yw deiliad y contract, neu un o ddeiliaid y contract o dan gyd-gontract, wedi newid, rhaid i’r landlord roi copi o’r datganiad ysgrifenedig o’r contract i’r deiliad contract newydd o fewn 14 diwrnod i’r diwrnod y newidiodd deiliad y contract.
translation.en: Where the identity of the contract-holder, or one of the contract-holders under a joint contract, has changed, the landlord must provide a copy of the written statement of the contract to the new contract-holder within 14 days of the identity of the contract-holder changing.

translation.cy: Adran 36 – Datganiad anghyflawn
translation.en: Section 36 – Incomplete statement

translation.cy: cais landlord i’r llys am ddatganiad bod contract yn gontract safonol
translation.en: landlord’s application to court for declaration that contract is a standard contract

translation.cy: Dechreuir ychwanegu llog at y swm hwnnw os bydd y landlord yn methu â darparu’r datganiad o fewn y cyfnod o ddau fis.
translation.en: Interest will begin to be added to that amount if the landlord fails to provide the statement within the two month period.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn pennu’r amser pan ddaw contract meddiannaeth yn orfodadwy yn erbyn deiliad y contract.
translation.en: This section sets out the time at which an occupation contract becomes enforceable against the contract-holder.

translation.cy: Adran 43 – Ffurf sicrwydd
translation.en: Section 43 – Form of security

translation.cy: Mae diogelwch y blaendaliadau a wneir gan ddeiliaid contract yn ystyriaeth bwysig iawn yn ymarferol, ac er mwyn sicrhau bod y diogelwch hwnnw’n ymestyn i gynnwys pob deiliad contract, mae’r adran hon yn ddarpariaeth sylfaenol y mae’n rhaid ei hymgorffori heb ei haddasu ym mhob contract meddiannaeth.
translation.en: Protection of deposits paid by contract-holders is of great importance in practice, and in order to ensure that this protection extends to all contract-holders this section is a fundamental provision in relation to all occupation contracts which must be incorporated without modification.

translation.cy: Mae’n tynnu sylw hefyd at y cysylltiad rhwng Pennod 4 ac adrannau 177 a 198.
translation.en: It also highlights the connection between Chapter 4 and sections 177 and 198.

translation.cy: Os nad yw landlord yn trefnu bod blaendal yn cael ei ddal mewn cynllun blaendal awdurdodedig, neu os yw’n methu â chydymffurfio â gofynion penodol (gan gynnwys gofynion adran 45(2)), caiff deiliad y contract, neu berson a dalodd flaendal ar ei ran, wneud cais am rwymedi i’r llys.
translation.en: If a landlord does not arrange for a deposit to be held in accordance with an authorised deposit scheme, or fails to comply with certain requirements (including the requirements of section 45(2)), the contract-holder, or a person who paid a deposit on his or her behalf, may apply to the court for a remedy.

translation.cy: Mae paragraff 3 yn darparu hawl gyffelyb i wneud cais i’r llys am rwymedi mewn sefyllfaoedd pan fo’r contract meddiannaeth wedi dod i ben, ond na wnaeth y landlord gydymffurfio â gofynion penodol mewn perthynas â blaendaliadau.
translation.en: Paragraph 3 provides a similar right to apply to the court for a remedy in situations where the occupation contract has ended, but the landlord did not comply with certain requirements relating to deposits

translation.cy: PENNOD 5 – CYD-DDEILIAID CONTRACT A CHYD-LANDLORDIAID Adran 48 – Cyd-ddeiliaid contract:
translation.en: CHAPTER 5 - JOINT CONTRACT-HOLDERS AND JOINT LANDLORDS Section 48 – Joint contract-holders:

translation.cy: Adran 49 – Ychwanegu cyd-ddeiliad contract
translation.en: Section 49 – Adding a joint contract-holder

translation.cy: Os caiff yr adran hon ei hymgorffori fel un o delerau’r contract heb ei haddasu, pan fo deiliad contract o dan gontract meddiannaeth yn dymuno ychwanegu person arall i fod yn ddeiliad contract o dan y contract, caiff wneud hynny gyda chydsyniad y landlord.
translation.en: If this section is incorporated as a term of the contract without modification, where a contract-holder under an occupation contract wishes to add another person as contract-holder to the contract, the contract-holder can do so with the consent of the landlord.

translation.cy: Mae adran 84 yn nodi sut y caiff ceisiadau am gydsyniad eu gwneud a sut yr ymdrinnir â hwy.
translation.en: Section 84 sets out how requests for consent are to be made and dealt with.

translation.cy: Atodlen 6 – Rhesymoldeb atal cydsyniad etc.
translation.en: Schedule 6 - Reasonableness of withholding consent etc.

translation.cy: Adran 52 - Cyd-ddeiliad contract yn peidio â bod yn barti i’r contract meddiannaeth
translation.en: Section 52 - Joint contract-holder ceasing to be a party to the occupation contract

translation.cy: Mae’n golygu na ddylai landlord weithredu mewn ffordd sy’n effeithio ar hawl deiliad y contract i fyw yn ei gartref o ddydd i ddydd heb ymyrraeth gan y landlord.
translation.en: It means a landlord must not act in a way that affects the contract-holder’s right to live in their home without interference from the landlord on a day-to-day basis.

translation.cy: Mae paragraff 3 yn gwneud darpariaeth ar gyfer cyfrifo’r cyfnod prawf sy’n gymwys i gontractau safonol ymddygiad gwaharddedig.
translation.en: Paragraph 3 makes provision for calculating the probation period applying to prohibited conduct standard contracts.

translation.cy: Mae’r paragraff yn gwneud darpariaeth hefyd i ymdrin â sefyllfaoedd pan ddyroddir hysbysiadau adennill meddiant gan y landlord, ond na chaiff hawliadau meddiant eu gwneud na’u cwblhau cyn diwedd y cyfnod prawf.
translation.en: The paragraph also makes provision dealing with situations where possession notices are given by the landlord but possession claims are neither brought nor concluded prior to the expiry of the probation period.

translation.cy: Gall hyn fod yn berthnasol, er enghraifft, pan fo pryder yn parhau ynghylch ymddygiad deiliad contract.
translation.en: This may be relevant where, for example, there is continuing concern about the conduct of a contract-holder.

translation.cy: Caiff Gweinidogion Cymru, drwy reoliadau, ddiwygio hyd y cyfnod hysbysu.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers may by regulations amend the length of the notice period.

translation.cy: Ar ddiwedd y cyfnod prawf, bydd contract diogel yn cymryd lle contract safonol ymddygiad gwaharddedig.
translation.en: At the end of the probation period, a prohibited conduct standard contract is replaced with a secure contract.

translation.cy: At y dibenion hyn, mae ‘delio’ yn cynnwys creu is-denantiaeth neu is-drwydded, trosglwyddo’r contract i rywun arall, neu gymryd morgais ar yr annedd.
translation.en: For these purposes, ‘dealing’ includes creating a sub-tenancy or sub-licence, transferring the contract to another or taking out a mortgage on the dwelling.

translation.cy: Gelwir landlord deiliad y contract yn ‘brif landlord’, a chontract y prif landlord gyda deiliad y contract yn ‘brif gontract’.
translation.en: The contract-holder’s landlord is known as the ‘head landlord’ and the head landlord’s contract with the contract-holder known as the ‘head contract’.

translation.cy: Pan fo’r prif landlord wedi cydsynio yn amodol i gontract isfeddiannaeth, ond na chydymffurfiwyd â’r amodau, mae’r contract isfeddiannaeth yn parhau’n ddilys.
translation.en: Where the head landlord has given conditional consent to a sub-occupation contract, but the conditions have not been complied with, the sub-occupation contract is still valid.

translation.cy: Adran 65 - Gorchymyn adennill meddiant estynedig yn erbyn isddeiliad
translation.en: Section 65 - Extended possession order against sub-holder

translation.cy: Adran 68 - Y pŵer i amrywio cyfnodau sy’n ymwneud â gwahardd ar ôl achos o gefnu ar gontract
translation.en: Section 68 - Power to vary periods of time relating to exclusion after abandonment of contracts

translation.cy: Pan fo trosglwyddiad yn rhwymo’r landlord yn y modd hwn, bydd yr hawliau a’r cyfrifoldebau yn cael eu trosglwyddo yn union ar ôl diwedd y cyfnod o ddau fis yn y modd a ddisgrifir yn adran 70, yn union fel pe bai trosglwyddiad awdurdodedig wedi digwydd.
translation.en: Where a transfer becomes binding on the landlord in this way, the rights and obligations will be transferred immediately after the end of the two month period in the way described in section 70, just as if there had been an authorised transfer.

translation.cy: Nid yw hyn yn gymwys pan fo’r landlord yn cymryd camau i ddwyn y contract i ben neu’n dwyn achos llys i droi allan y meddiannydd o fewn dau fis ar ôl y dyddiad y dechreuodd y landlord dderbyn y taliadau.
translation.en: This does not apply where the landlord takes steps to end the contract or brings eviction proceedings within two months of the date on which the landlord started accepting payments.

translation.cy: Mae’r Ddeddf hon yn gwneud darpariaeth ar gyfer y materion hynny ar wahân, felly mae Deddf 1995 wedi ei datgymhwyso.
translation.en: This Act makes separate provisions about those matters, so the 1995 Act is disapplied.

translation.cy: Os bydd unig ddeiliad contract yn marw, ac os oes person sy’n goroesi sy’n gymwys i ddod yn ei le, neu i ‘olynu’ deiliad y contract, yna bydd y person hwnnw sy’n goroesi yn ‘olynu i’r contract meddiannaeth’, hynny yw bydd y person yn dod yn ddeiliad y contract o dan y contract yn lle deiliad y contract a fu farw.
translation.en: If a sole contract-holder dies and there is a person who survives the contract-holder who is qualified to replace, or to ‘succeed’ the contract-holder, then that surviving person will ‘succeed to the occupation contract’, that is, the surviving person will become the contract-holder under the contract in place of the contract-holder who has died.

translation.cy: Os oes mwy nag un olynydd â blaenoriaeth ymhlith y rheini sy’n gymwys i olynu, caiff yr olynwyr â blaenoriaeth benderfynu ymysg ei gilydd pa un fydd yn ddeiliad y contract.
translation.en: If there is more than one priority successor amongst those qualified to succeed, the priority successors may decide between themselves who the contract-holder will be.

translation.cy: Os yw’r holl bersonau sy’n gymwys i olynu yn olynwyr wrth gefn, cânt benderfynu ymysg ei gilydd pa un fydd yn ddeiliad y contract.
translation.en: If all the persons qualified to succeed are reserve successors, they may decide between themselves who the contract-holder will be.

translation.cy: Adran 79 – Effaith olyniaeth
translation.en: Section 79 – Effect of succession

translation.cy: Mewn sefyllfa pan fo un person yn unig yn gymwys i olynu, neu pan fo mwy nag un person yn gymwys i olynu, ond mai un yn unig o’r personau hynny sy’n olynydd â blaenoriaeth, bydd yr olynydd yn dod yn ddeiliad y contract naill ai pan hysbysir y landlord o farwolaeth deiliad blaenorol y contract, neu ymhen un mis ar ôl y farwolaeth, pa un bynnag yw’r cynharaf.
translation.en: In a situation where there is only one person qualified to succeed, or where there is more than one person qualified to succeed, but only one of those persons is a priority successor, the successor becomes the contract-holder either when the landlord is notified of the death of the former contract-holder, or one month after the death, whichever is earlier.

translation.cy: Adran 80 – Amnewid olynydd ar ôl terfynu’n gynnar ac Adran 81 – Effaith amnewid olynydd
translation.en: Section 80 - Substitute succession on early termination and Section 81– Effect of substitute succession

translation.cy: Mae adran 81 yn gwneud darpariaeth ar gyfer cyfrifo pryd y mae person yn olynu i gontract meddiannaeth o dan yr amgylchiadau hynny, a hefyd ynghylch statws unrhyw unigolion sy’n gymwys i olynu i’r contract sy’n byw yn yr annedd yn ystod unrhyw gyfnod cyn i olynydd gael ei ddewis.
translation.en: Section 81 makes provision for working out when a person succeeds to an occupation contract in these circumstances, and also about the status of any individuals who are qualified to succeed to the contract that are living in the dwelling during any period before a successor is chosen.

translation.cy: a gafodd y Cydsyniad Brenhinol ar 18 Ionawr 2016
translation.en: which received Royal Assent on 18 January 2016

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hefyd yn gwneud darpariaeth sy’n cynnal statws olynwyr â blaenoriaeth ac olynwyr wrth gefn o dan yr amgylchiadau a ganlyn:
translation.en: The section also makes provision maintaining the status of priority and reserve successors in the following circumstances:

translation.cy: Rhaid i unrhyw gais gan ddeiliad contract am wneud unrhyw beth y mae cydsyniad y landlord yn ofynnol ar ei gyfer, gael ei wneud mewn ysgrifen.
translation.en: Any request from a contract-holder to do something which requires the landlord’s consent must be in writing.

translation.cy: Adran 87 – Digolledu oherwydd methiannau sy’n ymwneud â darparu datganiadau ysgrifenedig etc.
translation.en: Section 87 – Compensation for failures relating to provision of written statements etc.

translation.cy: Os daw landlord yn atebol o dan unrhyw un o’r adrannau hynny, mae adran 87 yn gymwys ar y diben o gyfrifo swm y tâl digolledu sy’n daladwy.
translation.en: If a landlord becomes liable under any of those sections, section 87 applies for the purpose of calculating how much compensation is to be paid.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn rhoi i ddeiliad contract yr hawl i ‘osod yn erbyn’.
translation.en: This section provides a contract-holder with a right of ‘set-off’.

translation.cy: Adran 89 – Cymhwyso’r Rhan
translation.en: Section 89 – Application of Part

translation.cy: Pan fo contract safonol cyfnod penodol yn gontract am gyfnod o fwy na saith mlynedd, ond y caiff y landlord ei derfynu cyn diwedd y cyfnod hwnnw o saith mlynedd, mae is-adran (4) yn darparu y caiff ei drin fel pe bai wedi ei wneud am gyfnod llai na saith mlynedd.
translation.en: Subsection (4) provides that if a fixed term standard contract is for a term of more than seven years, but may be terminated by the landlord before the end of that seven year period, it will be treated as being made for a term of less than seven years.

translation.cy: Mae Pennod 2 yn gwneud darpariaethau ynglŷn â chyflwr anheddau.
translation.en: Chapter 2 makes provisions relating to the condition of dwellings.

translation.cy: atodol
translation.en: supplementary

translation.cy: Os yw adrannau 91 a 92 wedi eu hymgorffori fel telerau’r contract heb eu haddasu, bydd rhwymedigaethau’r landlord i wneud atgyweiriadau yn gymwys tra pery’r contract.
translation.en: If sections 91 and 92 are incorporated as terms of the contract without modification, the landlord’s repairing obligations will apply for the duration of the contract.

translation.cy: Ond os yw adran 97 wedi ei hymgorffori, ni fydd y rhwymedigaethau hynny (ar wahân i’r rhwymedigaeth i sicrhau bod eiddo yn ffit i bobl fyw ynddo ar ddyddiad meddiannu’r contract) yn gymwys oni bai bod y landlord yn dod i wybod bod angen y gwaith neu’r atgyweiriadau.
translation.en: But if section 97 is incorporated, those obligations (apart from the obligation to ensure that a property is fit for human habitation on the occupation date) will only apply once the landlord becomes aware of the need for works or repairs.

translation.cy: Adran 98 – Hawl y landlord i fynd i’r annedd
translation.en: Section 98 – Landlord’s right to access dwelling

translation.cy: ‘Gwast’ yw difrod neu niwed a achosir gan weithredoedd neu esgeulustod ar ran deiliad y contract, tra bo ‘ymddwyn fel tenant’ yn golygu gofalu am yr eiddo o ddydd i ddydd (er enghraifft dadflocio sinc neu newid ffiws).
translation.en: ‘Waste’ is damage or harm caused by actions or neglect on the part of the contract-holder, whilst ‘tenant-like manner’ means taking care of the property on a day to day level (for example unblocking a sink or replacing a fuse).

translation.cy: Pan fo un o delerau contract diogel yn ymgorffori’r adran hon heb ei haddasu bydd yn darparu mai dim ond yn unol â thelerau sy’n ymgorffori adrannau 104 i 108 y caniateir ymgorffori’r contract, neu o ganlyniad i ddeddfwriaeth a wneir gan Gynulliad Cenedlaethol Cymru neu’r Senedd.
translation.en: Where a term of a secure contract incorporates this section without modification it will provide that the contract may only be varied in accordance with terms that incorporate sections 104 to 108 or as a consequence of legislation made by Parliament or the National Assembly for Wales.

translation.cy: Diben hyn yw sicrhau nad yw amrywiadau i gontractau diogel yn tanseilio gweithredu darpariaethau sylfaenol y Ddeddf na darpariaethau atodol a wneir o dan y Ddeddf.
translation.en: This is to ensure that variations of a secure contract do not undermine the operation of the fundamental provisions in the Act, and of supplementary provisions made under the Act.

translation.cy: Adran 106 - Amrywio telerau sylfaenol
translation.en: Section 106 - Variation of fundamental terms

translation.cy: Bydd un o delerau sylfaenol contract sy’n ymgorffori’r adran hon yn cyfyngu ar y modd y gellir amrywio telerau contract diogel.
translation.en: A fundamental term of a contract that incorporates this section will limit how terms of a secure contract can be varied.

translation.cy: Bydd telerau sylfaenol contract sy’n ymgorffori is-adrannau (4) a (5) yn cyfyngu ar y ffordd y gellir amrywio telerau, fel na allant wrthdaro ag unrhyw delerau sylfaenol (oni bai bod yr amrywiad yn deillio o ddeddfwriaeth).
translation.en: Fundamental terms of a contract that incorporate subsections (4) and (5) will limit the way terms can be varied, so that they cannot conflict with any fundamental terms (unless the variation results from legislation).

translation.cy: Mae landlord sy’n methu â darparu datganiad ysgrifenedig yn unol ag un o delerau’r contract sy’n ymgorffori adran 109 yn atebol o dan adran 87 i dalu tâl digolledu i ddeiliad y contract.
translation.en: A landlord who fails to provide a written statement in accordance with a term of the contract that incorporates section 109 is liable to pay the contract-holder compensation under section 87.

translation.cy: Fel diogelwch ychwanegol, rhaid i’r landlord hefyd ddarparu rhybudd ysgrifenedig a chopi o’r hysbysiad i’r cyd-ddeiliaid contract eraill.
translation.en: As additional protection, the landlord must also provide the other contract-holders with a written warning and a copy of the notice.

translation.cy: PENNOD 4 - DELIO
translation.en: CHAPTER 4 - DEALING

translation.cy: Mae’n pennu’r weithdrefn y mae’n rhaid i landlord ei dilyn i wneud cais i’r llys am orchymyn, ac yn egluro sut y penderfynir ar delerau’r contract safonol ymddygiad gwaharddedig.
translation.en: The schedule sets out the procedure a landlord must follow to make an application for an order to the court, and explains how the terms of the prohibited conduct standard contract are determined.

translation.cy: Gall deiliad contract ofyn i’r landlord adolygu’r penderfyniad i ymestyn y cyfnod prawf, a gall wneud cais am adolygiad pellach gan y llys sirol (os yw’r landlord yn penderfynu cadarnhau’r penderfyniad i roi’r estyniad neu’n methu â rhoi hysbysiad o ganlyniad yr adolygiad).
translation.en: A contract-holder can ask the landlord to review the decision to extend the probation period, and can apply for a further review by the county court (if the landlord decides to confirm the decision to give the extension or fails to give a notice of the outcome of the review).

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn ddarpariaeth sylfaenol, ac mae adran 122(1)(b) a (2) yn ddarpariaethau sylfaenol y mae’n rhaid ei hymgorffori heb eu haddasu.
translation.en: This section is a fundamental provision, and section 122(1)(b) and (2) are fundamental provisions which must be incorporated without modification.

translation.cy: Rhaid i ddeiliad y contract o dan gontract safonol cyfnodol gael dau fis o rybudd o unrhyw newid yn swm y rhent neu gydnabyddiaeth arall sy’n daladwy.
translation.en: The contract-holder under a periodic standard contract must be given two months’ notice of any change in the amount of rent or other consideration payable.

translation.cy: 315. Os yw’r adran hon wedi ei hymgorffori heb ei haddasu, bydd y landlord wedi ei atal rhag rhoi’r hysbysiad (yn hysbysu deiliad y contract y bydd y landlord yn gwneud hawliad meddiant oni bai ei fod yn cydsynio i amrywiad) o fewn pedwar mis cyntaf meddiannaeth.
translation.en: 315.If this section is incorporated without modification, the landlord will be prevented from giving the notice (informing the contract-holder that unless they consent to a variation, the landlord will make a possession claim) within the first four months of occupancy.

translation.cy: 321. Bydd telerau sylfaenol contract sy’n ymgorffori is-adrannau (4) a (5) yn cyfyngu ar y ffordd y gellir amrywio telerau fel na allant wrthdaro ag unrhyw delerau sylfaenol (oni bai bod yr amrywiad yn deillio o ddeddfwriaeth).
translation.en: 321.Fundamental terms of a contract that incorporate subsections (4) and (5) will limit the way terms can be varied so that they cannot conflict with any fundamental terms (unless the variation results from legislation).

translation.cy: Pan fo’r adran hon wedi ei hymgorffori heb ei haddasu, os gwnaed amrywiad yn unol â’r contract, neu o ganlyniad i ddeddfwriaeth, rhaid i’r landlord naill ai ddarparu datganiad ysgrifenedig o’r telerau a amrywiwyd neu ddatganiad ysgrifenedig o’r contract meddiannaeth cyfan gyda’r telerau a amrywiwyd wedi eu cynnwys ynddo.
translation.en: Where this section is incorporated without modification, if a variation has been made in accordance with the contract, or as a result of legislation, the landlord must either provide a written statement of the terms varied or a written statement of the whole occupation contract with the varied terms included.

translation.cy: Diben yr adrannau hyn yw sicrhau na all y partïon i gontract safonol cyfnod penodol, ar unrhyw adeg yn ystod oes y contract, amrywio’r contract fel ei fod yn tanseilio darpariaethau’r Ddeddf hon sy’n ymdrin ag ymgorffori ac addasu darpariaethau sylfaenol (gweler adrannau 20 a 21).
translation.en: The purpose of these sections is to ensure that the parties to a fixed term standard contract cannot, at any time during the life of the contract, vary the contract so as to subvert the provisions of this Act that deal with the incorporation and modification of fundamental provisions (see section 20 and 21).

translation.cy: Mae landlord sy’n methu â darparu datganiad ysgrifenedig yn unol ag un o delerau’r contract sy’n ymgorffori adran 136 yn atebol i dalu tâl digolledu i ddeiliad y contract o dan adran 87.
translation.en: A landlord who fails to provide a written statement in accordance with a term of the contract that incorporates section 136 is liable to pay the contract-holder compensation under section 87.

translation.cy: Adran 138 – Cyd-ddeiliad contract yn tynnu’n ôl gan ddefnyddio cymal terfynu deiliad contract
translation.en: Section 138 – Withdrawal of joint contract-holder using contract-holder’s break

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, os gwneir hynny, rhaid i’r contract hefyd gynnwys telerau cyfwerth ag is-adrannau (4) a (5) o adrannau 111 a 130.
translation.en: However, where this is the case, the contract must also include terms equivalent to subsections (4) and (5) of sections 111 and section 130.

translation.cy: Adran 139 – Trosglwyddiad ar farwolaeth unig ddeiliad contract
translation.en: Section 139 – Transfer on death of sole contract-holder

translation.cy: Adran 141 – Buddiant cyd-ddeiliad contract
translation.en: Section 141 – Joint contract-holder’s interest

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn gymwys pan fo contract safonol cyfnod penodol yn cynnwys teler sy’n darparu, ar farwolaeth cyd-ddeiliad contract, y caniateir trosglwyddo ei hawliau a’i rwymedigaethau o dan y contract i berson arall yng nghwrs gweinyddu ei ystad.
translation.en: This section applies where a fixed term standard contract contains a term which provides that, in the event of the death of a joint contract-holder, his or her rights and obligations under the contract may be transferred to another person as part of the administration of his or her estate.

translation.cy: Adran 144 – Symudedd
translation.en: Section 144 – Mobility

translation.cy: gwneud rhywbeth yn yr annedd sy’n creu risg sylweddol o niwed i eraill;
translation.en: doing something in the dwelling which creates a significant risk of harm to others;

translation.cy: Mae adran 149 yn darparu na chaniateir cyflwyno hawliad meddiant (hynny yw, hawliad i’r llys gan y landlord i gael meddiant o’i eiddo) ac eithrio yn yr amgylchiadau a bennir ym Mhenodau 3 i 5 a 7.
translation.en: Section 149 provides that a possession claim (i.e. a claim made to the court by the landlord to obtain possession of their property) may only be made in the circumstances set out in Chapters 3 to 5 and 7.

translation.cy: Rhaid i landlord sy’n dymuno gwneud hawliad meddiant ddyroddi ‘hysbysiad adennill meddiant’ i ddeiliad y contract yn gyntaf, ond nid yw’r gofyniad hwn yn gymwys—
translation.en: A landlord wishing to make a possession claim must first issue the contract-holder with a ‘possession notice’, but this requirement does not apply where-

translation.cy: pan fod landlord yn rhoi hysbysiad o dal y teler o’r contract sy’n ymgorffori adran 173 (hawl y landlord i derfynu contract safonol cyfnodol dim ond drwy roi hysbysiad),
translation.en: a landlord gives notice under the contract term incorporating section 173 (the landlord’s right to end a periodic standard contract simply by giving notice),

translation.cy: pan fo landlord yn rhoi hysbysiad o dan ‘gymal terfynu’r landlord’ mewn contract safonol cyfnod penodol (gweler adran 194), neu
translation.en: a landlord gives notice under a ‘landlord’s break clause’ in a fixed term standard contract (see section 194), or

translation.cy: Adran 155 – Marwolaeth unig ddeiliad contract
translation.en: Section 155 – Death of sole contract-holder

translation.cy: Os bydd deiliad contract yn marw, ac nad oes unrhyw gyd-ddeiliaid contract, daw’r contract i ben un mis ar ôl marwolaeth deiliad y contract, neu pan fydd ‘person awdurdodedig’ (a ddiffinnir yn adran (2)) yn hysbysu’r landlord am y farwolaeth, os yw hynny’n gynharach.
translation.en: Where a contract-holder dies, and there are no joint contract-holders, the contract ends one month after the contract-holder’s death or, if earlier, when the landlord is informed of the death by an ‘authorised person’ (defined in subsection (2)).

translation.cy: pobl y mae’n anodd eu cartrefu)
translation.en: people difficult to house)

translation.cy: Mae Rhan 2 o Atodlen 8 (cymeradwyo cynlluniau ailddatblygu) yn gwneud darpariaeth sy’n ategu sail rheoli ystad B.
translation.en: Part 2 of Schedule 8 (approval of redevelopment schemes) makes provision supplementing estate management Ground B.

translation.cy: Ni ellir gwneud cais i Weinidogion Cymru gymeradwyo cynllun ailddatblygu neu gymeradwyo amrywio cynllun, cyn bod unrhyw sylwadau o’r fath wedi eu hystyried.
translation.en: No application can be made to the Welsh Ministers to approve a redevelopment scheme, or variation of a scheme, before any such representations are considered.

translation.cy: Mae’r adrannau hyn yn darparu y caiff deiliad y contract derfynu’r contract meddiannaeth drwy roi o leiaf bedair wythnos o rybudd i’r landlord.
translation.en: These sections provide that the contract-holder may end the occupation contract by giving at least four weeks’ notice to the landlord.

translation.cy: Adran 165 – Adennill meddiant
translation.en: Section 165 – Recovery of possession

translation.cy: Caiff landlord wneud hawliad i adennill meddiant ar y sail bod deiliad contract, ar ôl rhoi hysbysiad i’r landlord i ddiweddu’r contract o dan y teler o’r contract sy’n ymgorffori adran 163, wedi methu ag ildio meddiant ar y dyddiad a bennwyd yn yr hysbysiad hwnnw.
translation.en: A landlord may make a possession claim on the ground that a contract-holder, having given notice to the landlord to end the contract under the term of the contract incorporating section 163, fails to give up possession on the date specified in that notice.

translation.cy: Adran 166 – Cyfyngiadau ar adran 165
translation.en: Section 166 – Restrictions on section 165

translation.cy: Os yw deiliad y contract, cyn diwedd y cyfnod o rybudd, yn tynnu’r hysbysiad a roddwyd o dan y teler o’r contract sy’n ymgorffori adran 163 yn ôl, ac nad yw’r landlord yn gwrthwynebu hynny mewn ysgrifen, o fewn cyfnod rhesymol, mae’r hysbysiad yn peidio â chael effaith.
translation.en: If the contract-holder, before the end of the notice period, withdraws the notice given under the term of the contract incorporating section 163 and the landlord does not object to this in writing, within a reasonable period, the notice ceases to have effect.

translation.cy: Mae adran 173 yn darparu y caiff y landlord o dan gontract safonol cyfnodol derfynu’r contract hwnnw drwy roi hysbysiad i ddeiliad y contract bod rhaid iddo ildio meddiant o’r annedd ar ddyddiad a bennir yn yr hysbysiad.
translation.en: Section 173 provides that the landlord under a periodic standard contract may end that contract by giving the contract-holder notice that he or she must give up possession of the dwelling on a date specified in the notice.

translation.cy: ni chaniateir rhoi hysbysiad yn ystod pedwar mis cyntaf meddiannaeth
translation.en: notice may not be given in first four months of occupation

translation.cy: Effaith yr adran hon yw rhwystro landlord rhag cael meddiant o annedd gan ddefnyddio hysbysiad landlord yn ystod y chwe mis cyntaf y bydd person yn meddiannu’r annedd.
translation.en: This section has the effect of preventing a landlord from obtaining possession of a dwelling using a landlord’s notice during the first six months of a person’s occupation of the dwelling.

translation.cy: Pan fo landlord wedi rhoi hysbysiad o dan y teler o’r contract sy’n ymgorffori adran 173, caiff y landlord wneud hawliad meddiant i’r llys.
translation.en: Where a landlord has given a notice under the term of the contract incorporating section 173, the landlord may make a claim for possession to the court.

translation.cy: Mewn unrhyw hysbysiad adennill meddiant a roddir mewn cysylltiad â chontract safonol cyfnodol sy’n cael ei ffurfio o dan adran 184(2), caiff y landlord ddibynnu ar ddigwyddiadau a ddigwyddodd yn ystod y cyfnod penodol.
translation.en: In any possession notice given in relation to a periodic standard contract arising under section 184(2) the landlord may rely on events that occurred during the fixed term period.

translation.cy: Mae dyddiad meddiannu’r contract newydd yn dilyn yn union ar ôl diwedd y cyfnod penodol ac mae’r cyfnodau rhentu yn parhau fel yr oeddent.
translation.en: The occupation date for the new contract immediately follows the end of the fixed term and the rental periods remain as they were.

translation.cy: Pan fo contract o’r fath yn cael ei ffurfio a bod y landlord eisoes wedi rhoi datganiad ysgrifenedig i ddeiliad y contract fel a ganiateir gan yr adran hon, caiff ei drin fel pe bai wedi cydymffurfio â’r gofyniad i ddarparu datganiad ysgrifenedig mewn perthynas â chontract newydd o dan adran 31(1).
translation.en: Where such a contract arises and the landlord has previously given the contract-holder a written statement as permitted by this section, he or she is treated as having complied with the requirement to provide a written statement in relation to a new contract under section 31(1).

translation.cy: Os yw deiliad y contract, cyn diwedd y cyfnod hysbysu, yn tynnu’r hysbysiad a roddwyd o dan gymal terfynu deiliad y contract yn ôl, ac nad yw’r landlord yn gwrthwynebu hynny mewn ysgrifen o fewn cyfnod rhesymol, mae’r hysbysiad yn peidio â chael effaith.
translation.en: If the contract-holder, before the end of the notice period, withdraws the notice given under the contract-holder’s break clause, and the landlord does not object to this, in writing, within a reasonable period, the notice ceases to have effect.

translation.cy: PENNOD 8 - ADOLYGIAD GAN LANDLORD O BENDERFYNIAD I ROI HYSBYSIAD YN EI GWNEUD YN OFYNNOL ILDIO MEDDIANT
translation.en: CHAPTER 8 - REVIEW BY LANDLORD OF DECISION TO GIVE NOTICE REQUIRING POSSESSION

translation.cy: Adran 203 - Adolygiad y landlord o benderfyniad i roi hysbysiad
translation.en: Section 203 - Landlord’s review of decision to give a notice

translation.cy: Rhaid i landlord, ar ôl cael cais i gynnal adolygiad a wnaed yn unol ag adran 202, gynnal adolygiad o’r penderfyniad i roi hysbysiad.
translation.en: A landlord, having received a request to carry out a review which was made in compliance with section 202, must carry out a review of the decision to give a notice.

translation.cy: (MAE’R BENNOD HON YN GYMWYS I BOB CONTRACT MEDDIANNAETH) Adran 204 – Hawliadau meddiant
translation.en: (THIS CHAPTER APPLIES TO ALL OCCUPATION CONTRACTS) Section 204 – Possession claims

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (1)(b) y nodi’r gofyniad cyffredinol i hysbysiadau meddiant gydymffurfio ag adran 150, ac adran 151 yn achos contractau safonol rhagarweiniol neu gontractau safonol ymddygiad gwaharddedig.
translation.en: Subsection (1)(b) sets out the general requirement for possession notices to comply with section 150, and section 151 in the case of introductory standard contracts or prohibited conduct standard contracts.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn darparu bod pŵer y llys i wneud gorchymyn adennill meddiant wedi ei gyfyngu i’r seiliau a restrir yn is-adran (1).
translation.en: This section provides that the power of the court to make a possession order is limited to the grounds listed in subsection (1).

translation.cy: Mae Atodlen 10 yn pennu’r amgylchiadau y mae’n rhaid i’r llys eu hystyried (i’r graddau y mae’r llys yn ystyried eu bod yn berthnasol) mewn perthynas â gwneud gorchymyn adennill meddiant ar sail tor contract.
translation.en: Schedule 10 sets out the circumstances that the court must consider (so far as the court thinks they are relevant) in relation to making a possession order on the ground of breach of contract.

translation.cy: Amgylchiadau o ran deiliad y contract;
translation.en: Circumstances as regards the contract-holder;

translation.cy: Dylai’r landlord a deiliad y contract gytuno rhyngddynt ar unrhyw gostau a ddyfernir i ddeiliad y contract ar gyfer ei dreuliau rhesymol o dan adran 160(4), ond gall y llys eu pennu a’u hadennill oddi ar y landlord fel dyled sifil.
translation.en: Any costs awarded for reasonable expenses to the contract-holder under section 160(4) should be agreed between the landlord and the contract-holder, but can be determined by the court and recovered from the landlord as a civil debt.

translation.cy: Adran 217 – Hawliadau meddiant dialgar i osgoi rhwymedigaethau i atgyweirio etc.
translation.en: Section 217 – Retaliatory possession claims to avoid obligations to repair etc.

translation.cy: Adran 221 – Gwaredu eiddo
translation.en: Section 221 – Disposal of property

translation.cy: er enghraifft, y sail bod y landlord wedi methu â gwneud yr ymholiadau angenrheidiol yn ystod y cyfnod o rybudd.
translation.en: for example, the ground that the landlord failed to make the necessary inquiries during the warning period.

translation.cy: Caiff y llys hefyd wneud unrhyw orchymyn pellach yr ystyria’n briodol.
translation.en: The court may also make any further order it thinks fit.

translation.cy: Caiff y llys ddadwneud ei orchymyn ac adfer statws A fel parti i’r contract, a gwneud unrhyw orchymyn arall yr ystyria’n briodol.
translation.en: The court may rescind its order and reinstate J as a party to the contract, and make any other order it thinks fit.

translation.cy: Cyn gwneud y cais, rhaid i’r landlord roi hysbysiad i’r cyd-ddeiliad contract sy’n rhoi manylion y toriad, ac yn datgan bod y landlord yn bwriadu gwneud cais i’r llys am derfynu hawliau a rhwymedigaethau’r cyd-ddeiliad contract o dan y contract.
translation.en: Before making the application, the landlord must give a notice to the joint contract-holder stating the details of the breach, and that the landlord intends to apply to the court to have the joint contract-holder’s rights and obligations under the contract ended.

translation.cy: Gellir rhoi hysbysiad neu ddogfen yn electronig yn ogystal, os yw’r derbynnydd wedi cytuno i gael yr eitem yn y ffurf honno, os yw’n ddarllenadwy, ac os gellir defnyddio’r testun a gynhwysir ynddi ar gyfer cyfeirio ato yn ddiweddarach.
translation.en: A notice or document may also be given electronically if the recipient has agreed to receive it in this manner, it is legible, and the text it contains can be used for subsequent reference.

translation.cy: Mae adran 244 yn rhoi ystyr ‘landlord’, ‘lletywr’ a ‘meddiannydd a ganiateir’.
translation.en: Section 244 sets out the meanings of ‘landlord’, ‘lodger’ and ‘permitted occupier’.

translation.cy: Mae adran 247 yn diffinio ‘amrywio’, mewn perthynas ag amrywio telerau contractau meddiannaeth.
translation.en: Section 247 defines ‘variation’, in relation to the variation of terms of occupation contracts.

translation.cy: Mae’n cynnwys ychwanegu neu dynnu teler o gontract, yn ogystal â newid teler presennol.
translation.en: It includes adding or removing a term of a contract, as well as changing an existing term.

translation.cy: Mae adran 254 yn darparu bod y Ddeddf yn gymwys i’r Goron.
translation.en: Section 254 provides that the Act applies to the Crown.

translation.cy: Mae’r Nodiadau Esboniadol hyn ar gyfer Deddf Rheoleiddio ac Arolygu Gofal Cymdeithasol (Cymru) 2016 a basiwyd gan Gynulliad Cenedlaethol Cymru ar 24 Tachwedd 2015 ac a gafodd y Cydsyniad Brenhinol ar 18 Ionawr 2016.
translation.en: These Explanatory Notes are for the Regulation and Inspection of Social Care (Wales) Act 2016 passed by the National Assembly for Wales on 24 November 2015 and which received Royal Assent on 18 January 2016.

translation.cy: Ni fwriedir iddynt fod yn ddisgrifiad cynhwysfawr o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: They are not meant to be a comprehensive description of the Act.

translation.cy: Deddf Gwasanaethau Cymdeithasol a Llesiant (Cymru) 2014 (“Deddf 2014”) oedd y darn cyntaf o ddeddfwriaeth a wnaed i gyflawni’r nodau hyn.
translation.en: The Social Services and Well-being (Wales) Act 2014 (“the 2014 Act”) was the first piece of legislation taken forward to achieve these aims.

translation.cy: Gwella rhannu gwybodaeth a chydweithredu.
translation.en: To improve information sharing and co-operation.

translation.cy: Yn gryno, mae Deddf 2014 yn nodi’r system ar gyfer darparu gofal cymdeithasol ac mae’r Ddeddf hon yn nodi’r system ar gyfer rheoleiddio ac arolygu’r ddarpariaeth honno.
translation.en: In short, the 2014 Act sets out the system for the provision of social care, this Act sets out the system for regulating and inspecting that provision.

translation.en: Many of the detailed rules in this area were previous contained in rules made by the Care Council for Wales using powers under the 2000 Act.

translation.en: Section 2 - Meaning of “regulated service”

translation.cy: Rhannau 1 a 2 o Ddeddf 2000 at ddiben rheoleiddio gofal cymdeithasol yng Nghymru.
translation.en: Parts 1 and 2 of the 2000 Act for the purpose of social care regulation in Wales.

translation.cy: Mae’n bosibl bod rhai gwasanaethau a fyddant, ar yr wyneb, yn dod o fewn y diffiniad o wasanaeth rheoleidiedig ond efallai fod rheswm da dros beidio â rheoleiddio’r gwasanaeth hwnnw drwy’r Ddeddf hon (er enghraifft, pan fo’r gweithgaredd o dan sylw eisoes yn cael ei reoleiddio drwy ffordd arall).
translation.en: There may be some services that on the face of it would fall within the definition of a regulated service but there may be good reasons not to regulate that service through this Act (for example, the activity concerned is already regulated through another route).

translation.cy: Bydd rheoliadau yn gwneud darpariaeth ynghylch y gwasanaethau sydd i’w rheoleiddio o dan y Ddeddf hon.
translation.en: Regulations will make provision about the services that will fall to be regulated under this Act.

translation.cy: Mae cyfreithwyr sy’n gweithredu felly yn rhinwedd eu swydd wedi eu heithrio rhag cael eu rhagnodi o dan y rheoliadau hynny yn unol â pharagraff (4).
translation.en: Lawyers, acting in their capacity as such, are exempted from being prescribed under those regulations pursuant to sub paragraph (4).

translation.cy: Yn ogystal, mae’n golygu bod unrhyw wasanaethau yn y dyfodol y caniateir iddynt gael eu rhagnodi yn unol â’r p*er yn adran 2(1)(h) yn gyfyngedig i’r rheini sy’n darparu gofal a chymorth fel y’u diffinnir gan yr adran hon.
translation.en: It also means that any future services that may be prescribed pursuant to the power in section 2(1)(h) are limited to those that provide care and support as it is defined by this section.

translation.cy: Mae darparu un o’r gwasanaethau hynny pan nad ydych wedi eich cofrestru yn drosedd ac mae modd ei chosbi â dirwy ddiderfyn neu garchar am hyd at 2 flynedd (neu’r ddau) (gweler adran 51(1)).
translation.en: Providing one of those services when not registered is a criminal offence which is punishable by an unlimited fine or imprisonment for up to 2 years (or both) (see Section 51(1)).

translation.cy: Bwriedir i’r ymadrodd “ynddo, ohono neu mewn perthynas ag ef” gwmpasu’r holl ffyrdd y gall gwasanaeth gael ei ddarparu.
translation.en: The expression “at, from or in relation to which” is intended to cover the whole gamut of ways in which a service may be delivered.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (9) yn bŵer i wneud rheoliadau er mwyn i Weinidogion Cymru amrywio’r dystiolaeth y mae rhaid iddynt roi sylw iddi o dan yr adran hon.
translation.en: Subsection (9) is a regulation making power for Welsh Ministers to vary the evidence to which they must have regard under this section.

translation.cy: Adran 10 – Datganiad blynyddol
translation.en: Section 10 - Annual return

translation.cy: Os yw darparwr gwasanaeth am amrywio unrhyw un neu ragor o ffiniau ei gofrestriad (ee. drwy ychwanegu gwasanaeth rheoleiddiedig newydd neu fan newydd neu newid yr unigolion cyfrifol sydd wedi eu cofrestru) rhaid iddo wneud cais i amrywio ei gofrestriad o dan yr adran hon.
translation.en: If a service provider wants to change any of the parameters of their registration (e.g. by adding a new regulated service or a new location or changing the responsible individuals that are registered) they must apply for a variation of their registration under this section.

translation.cy: O gofio ystod eang yr amodau a allai fod yn ddarostyngedig i gais amrywio, mae gan Weinidogion Cymru felly y p*er i gymryd pa gamau bynnag y maent yn ystyried eu bod fwyaf priodol o dan yr amgylchiadau.
translation.en: Given the wide range of conditions that might be subject to a variation application the Welsh Ministers therefore have the power to take whatever action they consider is most appropriate in the circumstances.

translation.cy: Mae’r gallu i amrywio cofrestriad yn caniatáu i Weinidogion Cymru ganslo gwasanaeth penodol tra bo darparwr yn parhau i allu darparu gwasanaethau eraill, neu i ganslo man y darperir gwasanaeth ynddo, ohono neu mewn perthynas ag ef gan gadw cofrestriad y mannau eraill.
translation.en: The ability to vary a registration allows Welsh Ministers to cancel a particular service whilst a provider is still able to provide other services or to cancel a place at, from or in relation to which a service is provided while maintaining the registration of other places.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, efallai fod darparwr wedi ei gofrestru i ddarparu gwasanaeth cartref gofal mewn dau fan, un yng Nghaerdydd a’r llall yn Abertawe.
translation.en: For example, a provider may be registered to provide a care home service at two places, one in Cardiff and one in Swansea.

translation.cy: Adran 14 - Ceisiadau i ganslo cofrestriad fel darparwr gwasanaeth
translation.en: Section 14 - Applications for cancellation of registration as a service provider

translation.cy: Gallai hyn olygu canslo sawl gwasanaeth a ddarperir mewn sawl man, ohonynt neu mewn perthynas â hwy.
translation.en: This could potentially mean the cancellation of several services provided at, from or in relation to several places.

translation.cy: Nid yw’r darparwr gwasanaeth yn cymryd y camau gofynnol yn unol ag adran 16(4).
translation.en: Service provider does not take the action required in accordance with section 16(4).

translation.en: The responsible individual will also have to be “fit and proper”.

translation.cy: Nodir y dyletswyddau hynny mewn rheoliadau a wneir yn unol ag adran 28.
translation.en: Those duties will be set out in regulations made pursuant to section 28.

translation.cy: Gallai Gweinidogion Cymru, yn unol ag adran 22, ganslo cofrestriad yr unigolyn cyfrifol mewn cysylltiad â gwasanaeth cartref gofal Bangor, gan gadw cofrestriad yr unigolyn hwnnw fel yr unigolyn cyfrifol mewn cysylltiad â gwasanaeth cartref gofal Caerdydd, ond byddai rhaid iddynt roi hysbysiad gwella i’r unigolyn er mwyn rhoi cyfle iddo i gywiro pethau cyn i Weinidogion Cymru barhau â’r canslo.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers could, in accordance with section 22, cancel the registration of the responsible individual in respect of the Bangor care home service, whilst maintaining that individual’s registration as the responsible individual in respect of the Cardiff care home service but they would have to give an improvement notice to the individual to give him or her the chance to rectify things before the Welsh Ministers proceed to cancellation.

translation.cy: Mae adran 23 yn darparu’r p*er i’r Llys i amrywio cofrestriad y darparwr drwy ddileu dau o’r mannau yr oedd y gwasanaeth cartref gofal yn cael ei ddarparu ynddynt gan gynnal cofrestriad y gwasanaeth cartref gofal mewn cysylltiad â’r trydydd man yn hytrach na gwrthod cais Gweinidogion Cymru yn llwyr.
translation.en: Section 23 provides the Court with the power to vary the registration of the provider by removing two of the places at which the care home service was being provided whilst maintaining the registration of the care home service in respect of the remaining place as opposed to refusing the entirety of the Welsh Ministers application.

translation.cy: Nid yw’r weithdrefn hysbysiad gwella yn adrannau 16 a 17 yn gymwys i geisiadau brys (gweler adran 15(4)).
translation.en: The improvement notice procedure in sections 16 and 17 do not apply to urgent applications (see section 15(4)).

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (5) yn caniatáu i Weinidogion Cymru amrywio ymhellach amod a amrywir neu a osodir o dan yr adran hon neu ei dynnu’n ôl.
translation.en: Subsection (5) allows Welsh Ministers to further vary or withdraw a condition varied or imposed under this section.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (2) yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol bod rhaid i reoliadau a wneir o dan is-adran (1) gynnwys gofynion o ran safon y gofal a’r cymorth y mae rhaid eu darparu gan ddarparwr gwasanaethau.
translation.en: Subsection (2) requires that regulations made under subsection (1) must include requirements as to the standard of care and support that must be provided by a service provider.

translation.cy: Gallai’r rheoliadau hefyd ei gwneud yn ofynnol i unigolyn cyfrifol oruchwylio’r gwaith o reoli gwasanaeth.
translation.en: The regulations could also require a responsible individual to supervise the management of a service.

translation.en: Subsection (2) limits the exercise of that regulation making power to certain offences only, namely, false statements in documents, failure to submit an annual return, or a failure to provide information.

translation.cy: Mae adran 55 yn ei gwneud yn glir mai Gweinidogion Cymru neu’r Cwnsler Cyffredinol yw’r awdurdod erlyn at ddiben troseddau Rhan 1 o dan y Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 55 makes it clear that the prosecuting authority for the purpose of Part 1 offences under the Act is the Welsh Ministers or the Counsel General.

translation.cy: Mae adran 56 yn mewnosod adran 144A yn Neddf 2014 gan oosod dyletswydd ar awdurdodau lleol i lunio a chyhoeddi adroddiad blynyddol ar arfer eu swyddogaethau gwasanaethau cymdeithasol.
translation.en: Section 56 inserts section 144A into the 2014 Act placing a duty on local authorities to prepare and publish an annual report on the exercise of their social services functions.

translation.cy: Os yw Gweinidogion Cymru yn penderfynu adolygu awdurdod lleol penodol o ran darparu cymorth cartref, yna rhaid i Weinidogion Cymru roi sylw i’r materion a nodir yn adran 149D – mae hyn yn cynnwys ansawdd ac effeithiolrwydd y gwasanaeth (adran 149D(b)) ac effeithiolrwydd y gwasanaeth o ran sicrhau canlyniadau llesiant (adran 149D(h)).
translation.en: If the Welsh Ministers decide to review a particular local authority with regard to the provision of domiciliary support then Welsh Ministers must have regard to the matters set out in section 149D – this includes the quality and effectiveness of the service (section 149D(b)) and the effectiveness of the service in achieving well being outcomes (section 149D(h)).

translation.cy: Fel gyda throseddau sy’n ymwneud â thorri’r gofynion o dan Ran 1 o’r Ddeddf (gweler adrannau 44, 45 a 51) mae trosedd o dan adran 94B o Ddeddf 2014 yn drosedd neillffordd y mae modd ei chosbi â hyd at 2 flynedd yn y carchar, dirwy ddiderfyn neu’r ddau.
translation.en: As with offences relating to breaches of requirements under Part 1 of the Act (see sections 44, 45 and 51) an offence under section 94B of the 2014 Act is an either way offence punishable by a maximum of 2 years in prison, an unlimited fine or both.

translation.cy: Nid yw’r wybodaeth sy’n cael ei chynnwys mewn adroddiad o’r fath yn gyfyngedig i wybodaeth am ddarparwyr sy’n ddarostyngedig i’r darpariaethau trosolwg o’r farchnad;
translation.en: The information contained in such a report is not limited to information about providers who are subject to the market oversight provisions;

translation.cy: Mae’r rhain yn cynnwys personau fel unigolion cyfrifol a ddynodir gan ddarparwyr gwasanaethau, gweithiwyr cymdeithasol o dan hyfforddiant, arolygwyr gwasanaethau gofal a phersonau sy’n darparu gofal a chymorth mewn cysylltiad â gwasanaethau gofal a chymorth nad ydynt yn “gwasanaethau rheoleiddiedig”.
translation.en: These include persons such as responsible individuals designated by service providers, student social workers, inspectors of care services and persons who provide care and support in connection with care and support services which are not “regulated services”.

translation.cy: Dim ond i’r gweithwyr cymdeithasol hynny y mae’n ofynnol iddynt gofrestru yn rhinwedd rheoliadau a wneir o dan adran 27 neu 111 y bydd darpariaethau’r Ddeddf sy’n ymwneud â chofrestru yn gymwys.
translation.en: The provisions of the Act which relate to registration will only apply to those social workers who are required to register by virtue of regulations made under section 27 or 111.

translation.cy: Ni fyddant yn gymwys i’r disgrifiadau eang o bersonau yn adran 79(3) y caniateir iddynt gael eu trin fel gweithwyr gofal cymdeithasol.
translation.en: They will not apply to the broad descriptions of persons in section 79(3) who may be treated as social care workers.

translation.cy: Mae rhagor o wybodaeth am y meini prawf hyn isod.
translation.en: More about these criteria appears below.

translation.cy: Mae Gwladwriaethau’r AEE yn cynnwys pob Aelod-wladwriaeth yr Undeb Ewropeaidd a Gwlad yr Iâ, Liechtenstein a Norwy.
translation.en: EEA States include all European Union Member States plus Iceland, Liechtenstein and Norway.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, gallai hyn ymwneud â gweithwyr gofal cymdeithasol sydd wedi bod mewn swydd cyn i GCC gael y pŵer i gymeradwyo cyrsiau mewn perthynas â gweithwyr gofal cymdeithasol.
translation.en: For example, this could cover social care workers who have been in post prior to SCW obtaining the power to approve courses in relation to social care workers.

translation.cy: Er mwyn i ymgeisydd fod yn gymwys i gael ei gofrestru, rhaid iddo hefyd fodloni’r cofrestrydd ei fod yn bwriadu ymarfer y gwaith gofal cymdeithasol y mae ei gofnod yn ymwneud ag ef.
translation.en: In order to be eligible to become registered an applicant must also satisfy the registrar that he or she intends to practise the social care work to which his or her entry relates.

translation.cy: Rhaid i geisiadau i gofrestru sy’n bodloni gofynion adran 83 gael eu caniatáu gan y cofrestrydd.
translation.en: Applications for registration which satisfy the requirements in section 83 must be granted by the registrar.

translation.cy: Nid yw’r amodau cofrestru yn adrannau 83 i 84 yn gymwys i weithwyr cymdeithasol sydd ar ymweliad.
translation.en: The registration conditions in sections 83 to 84 do not apply to visiting social workers.

translation.cy: Er mwyn cofrestru yn y rhan o’r gofrestr i weithwyr cymdeithasol, mae’n ofynnol i weithwyr cymdeithasol sydd wedi cymhwyso y tu allan i Gymru fodloni’r amodau cofrestru y cyfeirir atynt uchod.
translation.en: In order to register in the social worker part of the register, social workers who have qualified outside Wales are required to satisfy the registration conditions referred to above.

translation.cy: Bydd cofnodion yn y gofrestr nad ydynt yn cael eu hadnewyddu yn darfod yn awtomatig (adran 87).
translation.en: Entries in the register that are not renewed will automatically lapse (section 87).

translation.cy: Ni fydd hyn yn wir os yw’r person cofrestredig yn destun achos addasrwydd i ymarfer neu fod panel addasrwydd i ymarfer wedi dyfarnu bod amhariad ar ei allu i ymarfer (gweler y nodiadau esboniadol ar Ran 6 am esboniad o’r gweithdrefnau addasrwydd i ymarfer).
translation.en: This will not be the case if the registered person is subject to fitness to practise proceedings or a fitness to practise panel has determined that his or her fitness to practise is impaired (see explanatory notes on Part 6 for explanation of the fitness to practise procedures).

translation.cy: Gwneir hyn er mwyn osgoi sefyllfa pan all person cofrestredig adael i’w gofrestriad ddarfod fel ffordd o osgoi bod ei achos yn cael ei archwilio a bod posibilrwydd bod sancsiwn yn cael ei osod.
translation.en: This is to avoid a situation where a registered person can let his or her registration lapse as a way of avoiding his or her case being subject to examination and possibly a sanction being imposed.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, gallai gweithiwr cymdeithasol sydd wedi ymddeol ac sy’n dymuno dychwelyd i weithio wneud cais adfer.
translation.en: An application for restoration could be made by a retired social worker, for example, who wishes to return to work.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, gall yr ymgeisydd wneud cais am adolygiad pellach ar ôl i gyfnod arall o dair blynedd ddod i ben.
translation.en: The applicant can however request a further review after the expiry of another three year period.

translation.cy: Mae adran 104 yn cyflwyno hawl bellach i apelio i’r Tribiwnlys Haen Gyntaf yn erbyn penderfyniad y panel.
translation.en: Section 104 introduces a further right of appeal against the decision of the panel to the First-Tier Tribunal.

translation.cy: gall methu â chydymffurfio â safon mewn cod fod yn dystiolaeth o anaddasrwydd person i ymarfer.
translation.en: a failure to comply with a standard in a code may be evidence of a person being unfit to practise.

translation.cy: mae adran 112 yn caniatáu i’r safonau hyn gael eu gosod.
translation.en: section 112 allows for these standards to be set.

translation.cy: Os oes mater sy’n gymwys i’w atgyfeirio ymlaen rhaid iddo gael ei atgyfeirio ar gyfer ymchwiliad neu’n uniongyrchol i banel addasrwydd i ymarfer.
translation.en: If a matter is eligible for onward referral it must be referred for investigation or directly to a fitness to practise panel.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, gallai GCC ddarparu bod pob math o ymchwiliad neu fathau penodol o ymchwiliadau i’w cynnal gan aelodau o staff neu gan unigolion eraill sydd wedi eu penodi at y diben hwnnw.
translation.en: SCW could for example provide that all or particular kinds of investigations are to be carried out by staff members or by other individuals appointed for that purpose.

translation.cy: Bydd GCC hefyd yn gallu penodi cynghorwyr megis cynghorwyr iechyd.
translation.en: SCW will also be able to appoint advisors such as health advisors.

translation.cy: Adrannau 131 – 133 - Adolygu
translation.en: Sections 131 – 133 - Review

translation.cy: Gallai hyn fod oherwydd gwall a wnaed gan GCC wrth weinyddu’r achos sy’n tanseilio’r penderfyniad, megis colli tystiolaeth berthnasol, neu gam-farn neu wall ymresymu ar ran gwneuthurwr y penderfyniad.
translation.en: This might be because of an error made by SCW in the administrative handling of the case which undermines the decision, such as the loss of relevant evidence, or an error of judgement or reasoning by the decision-maker.

translation.cy: Gweler y nodyn esboniadol sy’n mynd gyda Phennod 5.
translation.en: See the explanatory note which accompanies Chapter 5.

translation.cy: Mae manylion am y broses adolygu ar gyfer adolygu amodau ac ataliadau dros dro i’w gweld ym Mhennod 5 ac mae’n cael ei hesbonio isod.
translation.en: The review process for reviewing conditions and suspensions is set out in Chapter 5 and is explained below.

translation.cy: Nid yw’r panel sy’n gosod neu’n adolygu gorchymyn interim yn gyfrifol am wneud dyfarniad terfynol ynghylch a yw’r honiadau am anaddasrwydd person i ymarfer yn wir.
translation.en: The panel imposing or reviewing an interim order is not charged with making a final determination about whether allegations concerning a person’s unfitness to practise are true.

translation.cy: Mae’r Bennod hon yn nodi’r system ar gyfer adolygu amodau ymarfer, gorchmynion atal dros dro ac ymgymeriadau.
translation.en: This Chapter sets out the system for reviewing conditions of practise, suspension orders and undertakings.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, efallai y bydd torri’r amodau’n fynych ac yn ddifrifol yn golygu bod angen gorchymyn dileu.
translation.en: For example, a persistent and serious breach of conditions may mean that a removal order is necessary.

translation.cy: Mae adran 158 yn darparu ar gyfer apelau yn erbyn penderfyniadau panel addasrwydd i ymarfer i’r Tribiwnlys Haen Gyntaf.
translation.en: Section 158 provides for appeals against decisions of a fitness to practise panel to the First-Tier Tribunal.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, ni all fod yn ofynnol i bersonau gyflwyno gwybodaeth sydd wedi ei diogelu rhag cael ei datgelu gan ddeddfwriaeth neu reol gyfreithiol arall.
translation.en: Persons cannot, however, be required to produce information that is protected from disclosure by other legislation or rule of law.

translation.cy: Mewn cyferbyniad, dim ond y gweithwyr gofal cymdeithasol hynny y mae’n ofynnol iddynt gofrestru y mae’n ofynnol i GCC gadw cofrestr ohonynt.
translation.en: In contrast SCW are only required to keep a register of those social care workers who are required to register.

translation.cy: Gallai hyn, er enghraifft, gynnwys darparu cymorth eirioli i ddiwallu anghenion gofal a chymorth personau hyglwyf neu ddarparu gofal cartref i bersonau hyglwyf.
translation.en: This could, for example, include providing advocacy support to meet the care and support needs of vulnerable persons, or providing domiciliary care to vulnerable persons.

translation.cy: trafod sut i ddelio â diddordeb y cyfryngau mewn perthynas â materion o bryder i’r ddau sefydliad;
translation.en: liaison on how media interest is to be handled in relation to matters of mutual concern;

translation.cy: Mae adran 179 yn caniatáu i’r ddau reoleiddiwr arfer ar y cyd swyddogaethau sydd gan y naill neu’r llall, h.y. mae gan Weinidogion Cymru swyddogaeth A, mae gan GCC swyddogaeth B, a phan fo Gweinidogion Cymru a GCC yn trefnu arfer swyddogaethau A a B ar y cyd o dan yr adran hon, bydd y ddau gorff yn atebol yn gyfreithiol am arfer swyddogaethau A a B.
translation.en: Section 179 permits both regulators to jointly exercise functions that each has, i.e. the Welsh Ministers have function A, SCW has function B, and when the Welsh Ministers and SCW arrange to exercise functions A and B jointly under this section, both bodies will be legally accountable for the exercise of function A and B.

translation.cy: Mae Rhan 1 o’r Ddeddf yn ymwneud â rheoli cynaliadwy ar adnoddau naturiol.
translation.en: Part 1 of the Act is concerned with the sustainable management of natural resources.

translation.cy: Mae Rhan 1 yn rhoi swyddogaethau i Weinidogion Cymru ac CNC er mwyn cynorthwyo i gyflawni rheoli cynaliadwy ar adnoddau naturiol.
translation.en: Part 1 confers functions on the Welsh Ministers and on NRW to assist in the delivery of sustainable management of natural resources.

translation.cy: Mae’r Rhan hon yn rhoi erthygl 4 newydd yn lle erthygl 4 o Orchymyn Corff Adnoddau Naturiol Cymru (Sefydlu) 2012, sy’n rhoi diben cyffredinol newydd i CNC o ymgyrraedd at reoli cynaliadwy ar adnoddau naturiol.
translation.en: This Part substitutes article 4 of the Natural Resources Body for Wales (Establishment) Order 2012, providing NRW with a new general purpose to pursue sustainable management of natural resources.

translation.cy: Mae’n ei gwneud yn ofynnol i’r awdurdodau cyhoeddus hyn, wrth arfer eu swyddogaethau yn briodol, geisio cynnal a gwella bioamrywiaeth ac, wrth wneud hynny, hyrwyddo cydnerthedd ecosystemau.
translation.en: It requires these public authorities in the proper exercise of their functions to seek to maintain and enhance biodiversity and in so doing promote the resilience of ecosystems.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn diffinio “rheoli cynaliadwy ar adnoddau naturiol” at ddibenion Rhan 1 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: This section defines “sustainable management of natural resources” for the purposes of Part 1 of the Act.

translation.cy: Dyma’r manteision a geir o reoli prosesau ecosystemau;
translation.en: These are the benefits obtained from the regulation of ecosystem processes;

translation.cy: Dyma’r manteision y mae pobl yn eu cael o ecosystemau, nad ydynt yn rhai materol.
translation.en: These are the non-material benefits people obtain from ecosystems.

translation.cy: Gall defnyddio deunyddiau wedi’u hailgylchu, er enghraifft, helpu i leihau’r gyfradd y defnyddir adnoddau naturiol mewn gweithgareddau cynhyrchu, ond gallai’r gweithgaredd hwnnw hefyd gynnwys allyrru llygryddion i’r amgylchedd dyfrol neu i’r aer, a thrwy hynny gael effaith negyddol ar iechyd ein hecosystemau.
translation.en: The use of recycled materials, for example, can help to reduce the rate at which natural resources are used in production activities, but that activity may also involve the emission of pollutants into the aquatic environment or the air, and therefore have a negative impact on the health of our ecosystems.

translation.cy: Adran 5 – Diben cyffredinol Corff Adnoddau Naturiol Cymru
translation.en: Section 5 – General purpose of Natural Resources Body for Wales

translation.cy: Roedd erthygl 4 o’r Gorchymyn Sefydlu yn pennu diben cyffredinol CNC, sef sicrhau bod amgylchedd ac adnoddau naturiol Cymru yn cael eu cynnal, eu gwella a’u defnyddio’n gynaliadwy, a hynny er lles pobl, amgylchedd ac economi Cymru yn awr ac yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: Article 4 of the Establishment Order set out the general purpose of NRW, which was to ensure that the environment and natural resources of Wales were sustainably maintained, enhanced and used for the benefit of the people, environment and economy of Wales today and in the future.

translation.cy: Mae erthygl 4(1)(a), fel y’i disodlir gan adran 5 o’r Ddeddf hon, bellach yn rhoi dyletswydd ar CNC i ymgyrraedd at reoli cynaliadwy ar adnoddau naturiol mewn perthynas â Chymru wrth arfer unrhyw un neu ragor o’i swyddogaethau.
translation.en: Article 4(1)(a), as substituted by section 5 of this Act, now places a duty on NRW to pursue the sustainable management of natural resources in relation to Wales when exercising any of its functions.

translation.cy: Mae erthygl 5B yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i CNC roi sylw i newidiadau ecolegol gwirioneddol neu bosibl wrth gyflawni ei swyddogaethau cadwraeth natur.
translation.en: Article 5B requires that NRW must have regard to actual or possible ecological changes when carrying out their nature conservation functions.

translation.cy: Mae’r tabl isod yn nodi’r awdurdodau cyhoeddus hynny y gosodir gofynion arnynt o dan bob adran o adran 6.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys ei ddiben cyffredinol fel y’i nodir yn erthygl 4 o Orchymyn Corff Adnoddau Naturiol Cymru (Sefydlu) 2012 (fel y’i disodlir gan adran 5(2) o’r Ddeddf hon), sy’n ei gwneud yn ofynnol i CNC ddilyn egwyddorion rheoli cynaliadwy ar adnoddau naturiol wrth arfer ei swyddogaethau.
translation.en: This includes its general purpose as set out in article 4 of the Natural Resources Body for Wales (Establishment) Order 2012 (as replaced by section 5(2) of this Act), which requires NRW to apply the principles of sustainable management of natural resources when exercising its functions.

translation.cy: Yn dilyn cyhoeddi’r adroddiad cyntaf ar gyflwr adnoddau naturiol, bydd yr etholiad cyffredinol arferol nesaf yn cael ei gynnal ym mis Mai 2021.

translation.en: Subsection (2) gives flexibility for the regulations in Part 1 to apply differently in different circumstances and make transitional or saving provision.

translation.cy: Mae Rhan 2 o’r Ddeddf yn gosod dyletswydd ar Weinidogion Cymru i sicrhau bod ‘cyfrif allyriadau net Cymru’ ar gyfer y flwyddyn 2050 o leiaf 80% yn is na’r waelodlin.
translation.en: Part 2 of the Act places a duty on the Welsh Ministers to ensure that the ‘net Welsh emissions account’ for the year 2050 is at least 80% lower than the baseline.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (3) yn rhoi’r p*er i Weinidogion Cymru ddiwygio is-adran (1) drwy osod targed 2050 fel canran sy’n fwy nag 80%.
