translation.cy: Mae'n nodi'r pedwar maes lle gallwn sicrhau'r effaith fwyaf:
translation.en: It sets out the four areas where we can have the greatest impact:

translation.cy: Rydym wedi defnyddio pum ffordd o weithio i'n helpu i gyflawni hyn a chyfrannu at gynlluniau sy'n cefnogi Symud Cymru Ymlaen.
translation.en: We have used the five ways of working to help us achieve this and inform plans which support Taking Wales Forward.

translation.cy: Amcangyfrifir y bydd nifer y bobl ifanc 15 oed ac iau yn cynyddu hyd at 2023 ac yna’n lleihau ychydig. Er gwaethaf hyn, byddan nhw’n dal yn cyfrif am rhwng 17-18% o’r boblogaeth.
translation.en: The number of young people aged 15 and under is projected to increase up to 2023 and then fall slightly, although continuing to account for between 17-18% of the population.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn defnyddio’r Ddeddf i adeiladu ar ein hetifeddiaeth o ddatblygu'n gynaliadwy.
translation.en: We will use the Act to build on our sustainable development legacy.

translation.cy: Mae prentisiaethau yn allweddol i ysgogi'r gwaith o fynd i'r afael â'r agenda tlodi, ac rydym wedi ymrwymo i greu o leiaf 100,000 o brentisiaethau o ansawdd uchel i bobl o bob oed yn ystod tymor y Cynulliad hwn.
translation.en: Apprenticeship places are key drivers to the tackling poverty agenda, and we are committed to creating a minimum of 100,000 high-quality, all-age apprenticeships over this Assembly term.

translation.cy: Gallai newid ein buddsoddiad mewn tai fforddiadwy effeithio mwy ar grwpiau ethnig yng Nghymru.
translation.en: Changing our investment in affordable housing could impact more on ethnic groups in Wales.

translation.cy: Er mwyn dangos ein hymrwymiad i gefnogi busnesau yng Nghymru a'u heffeithiau drwy gefnogi economi Cymru a darparu cyflogaeth hanfodol, byddwn yn torri ardrethi busnes. Bydd hyn yn golygu llai o gostau i 70,000 o fusnesau, a bydd yn dileu'r gost yn gyfan gwbl i hanner o'r cwmnïau cymwys.
translation.en: To demonstrate our commitment to supporting business in Wales and their impacts through supporting the Welsh economy and providing vital employment we will deliver a business rate cut, meaning smaller bills for 70,000 businesses and reducing bills to zero for half of all eligible firms.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn llunio cynllun rhyddhad trosiannol newydd gwerth £10m i helpu busnesau bach. Daw  hwn i rym ym mis Ebrill 2017.
translation.en: We will provide a new £10m transitional relief scheme to help small businesses, which will come into effect in April 2017.

translation.cy: Bydd y Gyllideb ddrafft yn cefnogi'r gwaith o ddatblygu a chynyddu cynhyrchiant bwyd a diogelu'r diwydiannau bwyd a diod yng Nghymru.
translation.en: The draft Budget will support the development and growth of food production while also protecting the food and drink industries in Wales.

translation.cy: Rydym yn trawsnewid y gwasanaeth iechyd er mwyn darparu mwy o ofal mewn cymunedau lleol, yn agosach at gartrefi pobl yn hytrach nag yn yr ysbyty.
translation.en: We are transforming the NHS so more care is provided in local communities, closer to people’s homes rather than in hospital.

translation.cy: Mewn cytundeb â Phlaid Cymru, rydym hefyd yn darparu cyllid ychwanegol ar gyfer gofal diwedd oes.
translation.en: In agreement with Plaid Cymru, we are also providing additional funding towards end-of-life care.

translation.cy: Chwaraeon
translation.en: Sport

translation.cy: Oherwydd ei natur, bydd ariannu addysg yn effeithio'n gadarnhaol ar bobl ifanc yn gyffredinol, ac mae hyn yn bwysig dan Erthygl 28 o Gonfensiwn y Cenhedloedd Unedig ar Hawliau'r Plentyn, sef bod gan blant yr hawl i gael addysg.
translation.en: Funding on education will, by its nature, have a positive impact on young people overall and is important under Article 28 of the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child – children have a right to an education.

translation.cy: Mae prifysgolion yn effeithio'n gadarnhaol ar economïau a chymunedau lleol, ac mae rhai yn chwarae rôl fawr.
translation.en: Universities have a positive impact on local economies and communities – with some playing a major role.

translation.cy: Roedd gwerthusiad cychwynnol o'r rhaglen Cyfuno, sy'n dod â darparwyr celfyddydol a darparwyr gwasanaethau cyhoeddus ynghyd drwy 'Ardaloedd Arloesi', yn dangos cynnydd da wrth ddatblygu ffyrdd newydd o weithio ac yn y potensial ar gyfer defnyddio diwylliant fel ffordd o gael sgiliau a swyddi.
translation.en: An initial evaluation of the Fusion programme which brings together cultural providers with social services providers through the ‘Pioneer Areas’ has demonstrated good progress in  developing new ways of working and in the potential for culture as a way back into skills and employment.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, mae ystod o dystiolaeth wedi'i hystyried wrth wneudpenderfyniadau ynglŷn â’n cynlluniau gwario ac ynglŷn â dyrannu adnoddau.
translation.en: However when making decisions a range of evidence has been considered to inform our spending plans and decisions taken about allocating resources.

translation.cy: Dengys ymchwil diweddar bod nifer yr achosion o faterion materion iechyd meddwl ymysg pobl drawsryweddol yn cynyddu.
translation.en: Recent research has indicated an increased prevalence of mental health issues for transgender people.

translation.cy: Mae maint cyfartalog aelwyd yng Nghymru yn lleihau, ac mae disgwyl i hyn barhau oherwydd bod nifer yr aelwydydd un person yn cynyddu.
translation.en: The average household size in Wales is falling and this is projected to continue, due to increasing numbers of single person households.

translation.cy: Ym Mhrydain yn 2015, cafodd tua un o bob naw menyw feichiog neu famau newydd (11%) eu diswyddo, eu diswyddo'n orfodol neu eu trin mor wael eu bod yn teimlo bod yn rhaid iddynt adael eu swydd.
translation.en: In Britain in 2015, around one in nine pregnant women or new mothers (11%) were dismissed, made compulsorily redundant or treated so poorly they felt they had to leave their job.

translation.cy: Yng Nghyfrifiad 2011, roedd menywod yn darparu cyfran 3.2% yn uwch o ofal di-dâl na dynion.
translation.en: Women provided a higher proportion of unpaid care than men in the 2011 Census; the percentage difference was 3.2%.

translation.cy: Hefyd mae'n rhaid ad-dalu cyfran o'r cyllid i'r Trysorlys.
translation.en: A proportion of the funding must to repaid to the Exchequer.

translation.cy: Derbyniadau
translation.en: Receipts

translation.cy: Mae cyllidebau ar gyfer y gweinyddiaethau datganoledig yn deillio o'r cyllidebau hyn drwy gyfrwng Fformiwla Barnett. Dyma’r dull a ddefnyddir gan Drysorlys Ei Mawrhydi i gyfrifo’r gwariant cyhoeddus a ddyrennir i Gymru i adlewyrchu’r newidiadau yn lefelau’r gwariant a ddyrennir i wasanaethau cyhoeddus yn Lloegr.
translation.en: Budgets for the devolved administrations are derived from these budgets via the Barnett formula, which is the mechanism used by HM Treasury to calculate public expenditure allocated to Wales to reflect changes in spending levels allocated to public services in England.

translation.en: Total Managed Expenditure (TME)

translation.cy: Rhagair gan y Prif Weinidog	2
translation.en: Foreword by the First Minister of Wales	3

translation.cy: Bydd Llywodraeth Cymru'n canolbwyntio'n ddiflino ar wella’n heconomi a'n gwasanaethau cyhoeddus, sydd gyda'i gilydd yn sylfaen i fywydau beunyddiol ein pobl.
translation.en: The Welsh Government’s relentless focus will be on driving improvement in our economy and public services, which are together the bedrock of people’s daily lives.

translation.cy: Rhaid inni gefnogi pobl pan fo angen hynny fwyaf, ac arfogi gwasanaethau i ymateb i heriau, megis poblogaeth sy'n heneiddio, hinsawdd sy'n newid, technolegau newydd a globaleiddio.
translation.en: We need to support people when they need it most, and equip services to respond to challenges, such as an ageing population, a changing climate, new technologies and globalisation.

translation.cy: Er mwyn mynd i'r afael â'r materion sydd o'n blaen, mae angen ffyrdd newydd o weithio gan gynnwys rhaglenni cydgysylltiedig sy'n atgyfnerthu ac yn adeiladu ar yr hyn y mae pobl a chymunedau yn ei wneud eu hunain.
translation.en: The issues we face can only be tackled through new ways of working, including joined up programmes which reinforce and build on what people and communities are doing for themselves.

translation.cy: Mae Symud Cymru Ymlaen yn dangos sut y byddwn yn gweithio ar draws ffiniau traddodiadol i gyflawni ein blaenoriaethau.
translation.en: Taking Wales Forward sets out how we will work across traditional boundaries to deliver our priorities.

translation.cy: Bydd pedair strategaeth drawsbynciol yn ein helpu i gael yr effaith fwyaf posib yn y cyfnod ansicr hwn sydd o'n blaen, a chyflawni addewid Deddf Cenedlaethau'r Dyfodol.
translation.en: Four cross-cutting strategies will help us to maximise our impact in these uncertain times and deliver the promise of the Future Generations Act.

translation.cy: Rhaid i ymddygiad cyfrifol ac ymarferoldeb cyllidol dywys ein gwaith.
translation.en: Our work must be guided by financial responsibility and realism.

translation.cy: Rydw i am weld Cymru ddiogel sy’n ffynnu, Cymru iach ac egnïol, Cymru uchelgeisiol sy’n dysgu, Cymru unedig a chysylltiedig.
translation.en: I want to see a Wales which is prosperous and secure, healthy and active, ambitious and learning, united and connected.

translation.cy: Dyma'r Gymru yr ydym yn benderfynol o'i chreu dros y pum mlynedd nesaf.
translation.en: This is the Wales we are determined to build over the coming five years.

translation.cy: Carwyn Jones
translation.en: Carwyn Jones

translation.cy: Mae ffyniant yn rhoi sicrwydd i unigolion, teuluoedd a chymunedau.
translation.en: Prosperity brings security to individuals, families and communities.

translation.cy: Bydd y Llywodraeth hon yn canolbwyntio ar ymyriadau effeithiol sy'n rhoi mwy o sicrwydd ariannol i fusnesau ac unigolion er mwyn sicrhau twf a ffyniant.
translation.en: This Government will focus on effective interventions which deliver greater financial security for businesses and individuals to build growth and prosperity.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn hyrwyddo gweithgynhyrchu fel sector allweddol ar gyfer twf yn economi Cymru.
translation.en: We will promote manufacturing as a key sector for growth in the Welsh economy.

translation.cy: Darparwn y gefnogaeth sydd ei hangen ar bobl i gael mynediad at y swyddi hyn.
translation.en: We will provide the support that people need to access those jobs.

translation.cy: Hyrwyddo Twf Gwyrdd i greu swyddi cynaliadwy at y dyfodol.
translation.en: Promote Green Growth to create sustainable jobs for the future.

translation.cy: Sefydlu Tasglu Gweinidogol ar gyfer y Cymoedd.
translation.en: Establish a Ministerial Taskforce for the valleys.

translation.cy: Parhau i wrthwynebu ffracio, a hynny ar sail tystiolaeth.
translation.en: Continue our opposition to fracking, based on evidence.

translation.cy: Mae gennym agwedd bositif tuag at gyfraniad hanfodol pobl hyˆ n i gymdeithas, gan gynnwys darparu gofal.
translation.en: We take a positive view of the vital contribution older people make to society, including the provision of care.

translation.cy: Cyflwyno Cronfa Triniaethau Newydd er mwyn i bobl Cymru fedru cael mynediad cyflym at driniaethau newydd ac arloesol, a rhoi terfyn ar y loteri cod post am gyffuriau a thriniaethau nad ydynt ar gael yn gyffredinol drwy'r GIG.
translation.en: Introduce a New Treatment Fund to give people in Wales fast access to new and innovative treatments and work to end the postcode lottery for drugs and treatments not routinely available on the NHS.

translation.cy: Ceisio sefydlu Adolygiad Seneddol i ddyfodol hirdymor Iechyd a Gofal Cymdeithasol yng Nghymru.
translation.en: Seek to establish a Parliamentary Review into the long-term future of Health and Social Care in Wales.

translation.cy: Cynyddu buddsoddiad mewn cyfleusterau i leihau amseroedd aros a manteisio ar dechnoleg ddigidol i helpu i gyflymu diagnosis.
translation.en: Increase investment in facilities to reduce waiting times and exploit digital technologies to help speed up the diagnosis of illness.

translation.cy: Sicrhau mwy o nyrsys, mewn mwy o leoliadau, drwy gyfraith lefelau staffio nyrsys estynedig.
translation.en: Ensure more nurses, in more settings, through an extended nurse staffing levels law.

translation.cy: Cymryd camau pellach i wneud Cymru'n wlad sy’n ystyriol o ddementia drwy ddatblygu a gweithredu cynllun dementia cenedlaethol newydd.
translation.en: Take further action to make Wales a dementia friendly country through developing and implementing a new national dementia plan.

translation.cy: Y Cychwyn Gorau i Blant
translation.en: Best Start for Children

translation.cy: Ymgynghori ymhellach ar argymhellion penodol adolygiad Hazelkorn, gan gynnwys y trefniadau cyllido, rheoleiddio a llywodraethu ym maes addysg bellach ac uwch.
translation.en: Consult further on the specific recommendations of the Hazelkorn review, including the funding, regulation and governance arrangements for further and higher education.

translation.cy: Cynnal Cronfa Ddysgu Undebau Cymru, sydd wedi bod yn llwyddiant.
translation.en: Maintain the successful Wales Union Learning Fund.

translation.cy: Mae’r bleidlais i adael yr Undeb Ewropeaidd yn golygu y bydd rhaid inni weithio’n galetach fyth i gysylltu Cymru â’r byd.
translation.en: The UK withdrawal from the European Union means we must work harder and more actively to give substance to our outward-looking character.

translation.cy: Datblygu cyd-ddealltwriaeth o’r heriau sy’n wynebu llywodraeth leol a’r gwasanaethau cyhoeddus yn gyffredinol, ac o ran yr angen am arloesi, ysgogi sgwrs ehangach am y diwygio sydd angen ei wneud, modelau cyflawni, a pha mor gyflym y cyflawnir ac y newidir pethau.
translation.en: Build a shared understanding of the challenges facing local government and wider public services, and on the need for innovation, to develop a wider conversation about the reform needed, the models and pace of delivery and the pace of change.

translation.cy: Asedau Cymunedol
translation.en: Community Assets

translation.cy: Cefnogi pleidleisio’n 16 oed, cymryd camau i sicrhau bod cymaint o bobl â phosib yn cofrestru i bleidleisio, ac archwilio sut y gall technoleg ddigidol gynyddu’r niferoedd sy’n pleidleisio.
translation.en: Support votes at 16, take action to maximise voter registration and explore how digital technology can enhance voter participation.

translation.cy: Adnewyddu ein perthynas â’r Trydydd Sector er mwyn gwneud y mwyaf o wirfoddoli.
translation.en: Renew our relationship with the Third Sector in order to generate maximum potential for volunteering.

translation.cy: Heriau a Chyfleoedd Cyffredin
translation.en: Shared Challenges and Opportunities

translation.cy: Fe weithiwn ar draws y sector cyhoeddus a chyda chymunedau i gyflawni’r Gymru yr ydym yn dymuno ei gweld.
translation.en: We will work across the public sector and with communities to deliver the Wales we want.

translation.cy: Dim ond drwy fabwysiadu ffordd fwy cynhwysol o weithio y gallwn wireddu ein huchelgeisiau ar gyfer ein gwlad.
translation.en: It is only through embracing a more inclusive way of working that we can hope to deliver our ambitions for Wales.

translation.cy: Mae'r Ddeddf Cenedlaethau’r Dyfodol yn gyfle i weithio mewn ffordd wahanol ac ymwneud ag eraill i ddatblygu atebion arloesol i’r heriau sy’n ein hwynebu.
translation.en: The Future Generations Act presents an opportunity to work differently and engage with others to develop innovative solutions to the challenges that we face.

translation.cy: Mae geometreg yn canolbwyntio ar berthnasau sy’n ymwneud â phriodweddau siâp, gofod a saﬂe, ac mae mesur yn canolbwyntio ar feintioli ffenomena yn y byd fﬁsegol.
translation.en: Geometry focuses on relationships involving properties of shape, space and position, and measurement focuses on quantifying phenomena in the physical world.

translation.cy: Mae ystadegau yn cynrychioli data, mae tebygolrwydd yn modelu siawns, ac mae’r ddau yn cefnogi casgliadau a phenderfyniadau gwybodus.
translation.en: Statistics represent data, probability models chance, and both support informed inferences and decisions.

translation.cy: Mae’n cynnwys dyfeisio neu ddarganfod gwrthrychau haniaethol, ynghyd â sefydlu perthnasau rhyngddynt.
translation.en: It involves inventing or discovering abstract objects and establishing the relationships between them.

translation.cy: Mae’n annog meddwl clir, gan alluogi dysgwyr i ddeall a gwneud penderfyniadau rhesymedig.
translation.en: It encourages clarity of thinking, allowing learners to understand and make reasoned decisions.

translation.cy: Mae gwneud y cysylltiadau rhwng rhifyddeg ac algebra yn fodd i ddatblygu’r adnoddau a sgiliau ar gyfer rhesymu haniaethol o oedran cynnar.
translation.en: Making connections between arithmetic and algebra helps to develop tools and skills for abstract reasoning from an early age.

translation.cy: Mathemateg a Rhifedd 10
translation.en: Mathematics and Numeracy 09

translation.cy: Pwynt allweddol i’w nodi wrth ymgymryd ag unrhyw waith cynllunio ac asesu ar gyfer Mathemateg a Rhifedd yw bod y hyfedreddau yn rhyng-gysylltiedig ac yn rhyngddibynnol;
translation.en: A key point to note in any planning and assessment of Mathematics and Numeracy is that the proﬁciencies are interconnected and interdependent;

translation.cy: Cyfathrebu â symbolau
translation.en: Communicating with symbols

translation.cy: Deall y confensiwn ar gyfer ysgrifennu hanner ac ystyr y symbolau.
translation.en: Understanding the convention of how a half is written and what the symbols mean.

translation.cy: Gallai hyn hefyd gynnwys cysylltu rhannu a ffracsiynau (h.y. ½ = 1 ÷ 2) a defnyddio termau megis rhiﬁadur ac enwadur.
translation.en: This could also involve linking division and fractions (i.e. ½ = 1 ÷ 2) and using terms such as numerator and denominator.

translation.cy: Mathemateg a Rhifedd 11
translation.en: Mathematics and Numeracy 10

translation.cy: Gallu rhesymu bod ½ + ½ = 1, ½ x 2 = 1 ac 1 ÷ 2 = ½.
translation.en: Being able to reason that ½ + ½ = 1, ½ x 2 = 1 and 1 ÷ 2 = ½.

translation.cy: Mathemateg a Rhifedd 12
translation.en: Mathematics and Numeracy 11

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, gellir cymhwyso’r defnydd o ganrannau at gyfraddau canrannol blynyddol (APR) er mwyn dangos bod y defnydd hwnnw yn berthnasol i lythrennedd ariannol.
translation.en: For example, the use of percentages can be applied to annual percentage rates (APRs) to demonstrate their application to ﬁnancial literacy.

translation.cy: Bydd dulliau gweithredu digidol yn gwella sgiliau mathemategol a sgiliau rhifedd dysgwyr mewn amrywiaeth o sefyllfaoedd a fydd yn digwydd yn naturiol yn y maes dysgu a phroﬁad.
translation.en: Digital approaches will enhance learners’ mathematical and numeracy skills across a range of situations that will naturally occur within the area of learning and experience.

translation.cy: Yn naturiol, wrth i ddysgwyr ddatblygu a gwneud cynnydd, byddant yn defnyddio’n gynyddol sgiliau a phrosesau, technegau a systemau digidol mwy cymhleth, i greu datrysiadau er mwyn ymdrin â phroblemau, cyﬂeoedd neu anghenion penodol.
translation.en: Naturally, as learners develop and progress they will increasingly use more complex digital skills and processes, techniques and systems to create solutions to address speciﬁc problems, opportunities or needs.

translation.cy: Yn aml, nid yw dysgwyr, yn enwedig dysgwyr ifanc, yn gallu meddwl mewn ffordd haniaethol ac maent yn ei chael hi’n haws dysgu mathemateg mewn ffordd fwy diriaethol.
translation.en: Learners, especially young learners, are often unable to think abstractly and ﬁnd it easier to learn mathematics in more concrete terms.

translation.cy: Mathemateg a Rhifedd 14
translation.en: Mathematics and Numeracy 13

translation.cy: Mae gweithio’n fathemategol yn gofyn am greadigrwydd a chwilfrydedd ac yn datblygu’r agweddau hynny y gellir hefyd eu trosglwyddo i agweddau eraill ar fywyd.
translation.en: Mathematical working requires and develops creativity and curiosity which also transfer to other aspects of life.

translation.cy: Gyrfaoedd a phroﬁadau sy’n gysylltiedig â gwaith
translation.en: Careers and work‑related experiences

translation.cy: Dengys data’r Sefydliad ar gyfer Cydweithrediad a Datblygiad Economaidd (yr OECD) fod y rheini â sgiliau rhifedd gwael ddwywaith mor debygol o fod yn ddi-waith.
translation.en: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) data indicates that those with poor numeracy skills are more than twice as likely to be unemployed.

translation.cy: • adnabod diddordebau, cryfderau a sgiliau er mwyn gwneud dewisiadau gwybodus ôl-16
translation.en: • identifying interests, strengths and skills to make informed post-16 choices

translation.cy: Mae cynnwys gyrfaoedd a phroﬁadau sy’n gysylltiedig â gwaith o fewn Mathemateg a Rhifedd yn galluogi dysgwyr i ddeall, gwerthuso ac ymwneud â’r byd gwaith ac yn galluogi gwell lefelau diddordeb, dyheadau uwch, a’r gallu i wneud penderfyniadau gwybodus ac effeithiol.
translation.en: Incorporating careers and work-related experiences within Mathematics and Numeracy allows learners to understand, evaluate and engage with the world of work and enables greater engagement, raised aspirations, and informed, effective decision-making.

translation.cy: Rhaid ymgymryd â chyfarwyddyd mathemateg effeithiol mewn amgylchedd sy’n annog cyﬂawniad cyfartal i fechgyn a merched mewn mathemateg.
translation.en: Effective mathematics instruction must be conducted in an environment that encourages equal achievement in mathematics for boys and girls.

translation.cy: Wrth gyﬂwyno mathemategwyr enwog, dylid sicrhau y caiff mathemategwyr benywaidd a gwrywaidd eu cyﬂwyno i ddysgwyr, er mwyn hyrwyddo cydraddoldeb ac agweddau cadarnhaol mewn perthynas â rhywedd.
translation.en: When introducing famous mathematicians, care should be taken to ensure that both female and male mathematicians are presented to learners, in order to promote equality and gender positivity.

translation.cy: Drwy’r proﬁadau a amlinellir yn y disgriﬁad o’r dysgu, awgrymir y dylid sicrhau bod dysgwyr yn ymwneud â gweithgareddau datrys problemau ystyrlon ym mhob maes mathemategol, wedi’u gosod yng nghyd-destunau sefyllfaoedd lleol a byd-eang go iawn.
translation.en: The approach suggested through the experiences outlined in the descriptions of learning is to engage learners in meaningful problem-solving in all areas of mathematics, set in the contexts of real-world local and global situations.

translation.cy: Gall hyn helpu i feithrin a gwella eu dealltwriaeth, a’u proﬁad personol o fathemateg.
translation.en: This can aid the development of their own understanding, and enhance their own experience of mathematics.

translation.cy: Geirfa Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: Glossary Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Mae rhifedd yn golygu cymhwyso a chysylltu’r hyfedreddau hyn mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau go iawn, ym mhob rhan o’r cwricwlwm a’r tu hwnt iddo.
translation.en: Numeracy involves applying and connecting these proﬁciencies in a range of real-life contexts,across and beyond the curriculum.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr ddeall bod y symbolau y maent yn eu defnyddio yn gynrychioliadau haniaethol a dylent ddatblygu mwy o hyblygrwydd wrth iddynt gymhwyso a defnyddio amrywiaeth gynyddol o symbolau, gan ddeall confensiynau’r symbolau y maent yn eu defnyddio.
translation.en: Learners should understand that the symbols they are using are abstract representations and should develop greater ﬂexibility in their application and manipulation of an increasing range of symbols, understanding the conventions of the symbols they are using.

translation.cy: (h.y. gosod problemau allan mewn ffurf fathemategol er mwyn eu datrys) Dylai dysgwyr ddod yn gynyddol annibynnol wrth adnabod a chymhwyso’r strwythurau a’r syniadau mathemategol sydd wrth wraidd problem, er mwyn gallu ei datrys.
translation.en: (i.e. formulating problems mathematically in order to solve them) Learners should become increasingly independent in recognising and applying the underlying mathematical structures and ideas within a problem, in order to be able to solve them.

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Gallaf gyfrif gwrthrychau y gallaf gyffwrdd â nhw a rhai na allaf gyffwrdd â nhw.
translation.en: I can count objects that I can touch, and ones that I cannot.

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi cael proﬁad o rifau is na sero mewn cyd-destunau ymarferol, gan gynnwys mesuriadau tymheredd.
translation.en: I have experienced numbers below zero in practical contexts, including temperature measurements.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi arddangos dealltwriaeth fod ffracsiynau unedol yn cynrychioli rhannau cyfartal o’r cyfan a’u bod yn ffordd o gyﬂeu meintiau a pherthnasau.
translation.en: I have demonstrated an understanding that unit fractions represent equal parts of a whole and are a way of conveying quantities and relationships.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi defnyddio amrywiaeth o offer ymarferol i ddatblygu a chadarnhau fy nealltwriaeth o werth lle ar gyfer cyfanrifau positif a negatif.
translation.en: I have used a range of practical equipment to develop and secure my understanding of place value for positive and negative integers.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi ymestyn fy nealltwriaeth o’r system rifau drwy amrywiaeth o weithgareddau, gan ddefnyddio trinolion digidol ac annigidol, yn cynnwys degolion a meintiau ffracsiynol, a gallaf osod yn hyderus rifau cyfan a meintiau ffracsiynol ar linellau rhif.
translation.en: I have extended my understanding of the number system, through a range of activities using non-digital and digital manipulatives, to include decimals and fractions, and I can conﬁdently place whole numbers and fractional quantities on a number line.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi arddangos dealltwriaeth o gywerthedd ffracsiynau, degolion a chanrannau, a gallaf newid yn hawdd rhwng y gwahanol ffurﬁau, gan ddefnyddio dulliau ysgrifenedig a chyfriﬁannell.
translation.en: I have demonstrated an understanding of the equivalence of fractions, decimals and percentages and I can convert ﬂuently between the different forms, using both written methods and a calculator.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi atgyfnerthu fy nealltwriaeth o gilyddion wrth rannu ffracsiynau.
translation.en: I have consolidated my understanding of reciprocals when dividing fractions.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio’r hyn rwy’n ei wybod am rif i ragweld a gwirio fy atebion.
translation.en: I can use my knowledge of number to predict and check my answers.

translation.cy: Gallaf gyfrifo treth incwm a deall goblygiadau trethu.
translation.en: I can calculate income tax and understand the implications of taxation.

translation.cy: • Mynegir tebygolrwydd drwy rifau mewn sawl ffordd, e.e. drwy ddefnyddio canrannau, ffracsiynau a degolion, ac mae angen y cysylltiadau rhwng y cynrychioliadau er mwyn mynegi tebygolrwydd yn effeithiol.
translation.en: • Probability is expressed through number in various ways, e.g. through the use of percentages, fractions and decimals, and the connections between the representations is necessary for effective expression of probability.

translation.cy: • Graddfa, cyfrannedd a chymhareb.
translation.en: • Scale, proportion and ratio.

translation.cy: • Caneuon a rhigymau.
translation.en: • Songs and rhymes.

translation.cy: Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg
translation.en: Science and Technology

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr broﬁ, deall neu allu:
translation.en: Learners need to experience, to know or be able to:

translation.cy: • ymestyn eu dealltwriaeth a’u defnydd o’r system rifau, drwy amrywiaeth eang o broﬁadau,i gynnwys rhifau negatif, degolion a ffracsiynau
translation.en: • extend their understanding and use of the number system, through a broad range of experiences, to include negative numbers, decimals and fractions

translation.cy: • archwilio priodweddau rhifau gan gynnwys ffactorau, lluosrifau, rhifau cyseﬁn, a’r berthynas wrthdro rhwng ail israddio a sgwario
translation.en: • explore the properties of numbers, including factors, multiples, primes, and the inverse relationship between squares and square roots

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: • defnyddio rhesymu cyfrannol i gymharu dau faint, gan ddefnyddio meddwl lluosol, ac yna’n cymhwyso hynny mewn sefyllfa newydd
translation.en: • use proportional reasoning to compare two quantities using multiplicative thinking, and then apply this to a new situation

translation.cy: ddyfnach o ddefnyddio rhifau cymarebol ac anghymarebol
translation.en: deepen their understanding of how to use rational and irrational numbers

translation.cy: YR HYN SY’N BWYSIG MEWN MATHEMATEG A RHIFEDD

translation.en: The following interdependent proﬁciencies7 have been used to formulate the achievement outcomes and are central to progression at each stage of mathematics learning.

translation.en: • Algebra and geometry are connected principally through the expression of shape, measure and movement through algebraic expressions, equations and formulae.

translation.en: • through a broad range of experiences, appreciate the power of mathematics to express relationships concisely and in forms that are universally understood

translation.cy: Gallaf ddweud yr amser ar gloc analog (mewn cyfnodau o 15 munud, o leiaf) a gallaf gysylltu hyn â’r amser ar ffurf ddigidol.
translation.en: I can tell the time on an analogue clock (in at least 15-minute intervals) and I can connect this to time displayed digitally.

translation.cy: Gallaf enwi gwahanol fathau o drionglau.
translation.en: I can name different types of triangles.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi archwilio fertigau, ymylon a wynebau siapiau tri dimensiwn a gallaf ddefnyddio’r nodweddion hyn i ddisgriﬁo siâp tri dimensiwn.
translation.en: I have explored vertices, edges and faces of three-dimensional shapes and I can use these characteristics to describe a three-dimensional shape.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi defnyddio amrywiaeth o weithgareddau ymarferol i archwilio perimedr ac arwynebedd siapiau.
translation.en: I have used a range of hands-on activities to explore the perimeter and area of shapes.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddangos fy mod yn deall onglau fel ffordd o fesur cylchdro, a gallaf adnabod, enwi a disgriﬁo mathau o onglau.
translation.en: I can demonstrate my understanding of angle as a measure of rotation and I can recognise, name and describe types of angles.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi modelu ac wedi datrys problemausy’n cynnwys cyfeiriannau.
translation.en: I have modelled and solved problems involving bearings.

translation.cy: Gallaf egluro pam mae dau siâp neu fwy yn gyﬂun, yn gyfath, neu heb fod yn un o’r ddau.
translation.en: I can explain why two or more shapes are similar, congruent, or neither.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi defnyddio dulliau rhesymu a dadleuon rhesymegol, ynghyd â’r hyn rwy’n ei wybod am bolygonau, llinellau sy’n croestorri, onglau a’r theoremau cylch, i ddatrys problemau, diddwytho a chyfrifo onglau a hydoedd mewn diagramau sy’n cynnwys cyfuniadau o’r elfennau hyn.
translation.en: I have used reasoning and logical arguments, along with my knowledge of polygons, intersecting lines, angle and the circle theorems, to solve problems, deduce and calculate angles and lengths in diagrams that involve combinations of these.

translation.en: • through exploring situations in their everyday life, develop an understanding of measurement, using non-standard units with developing accuracy

translation.en: • use the mathematical concepts of angle, co-ordinates and distance to describe location, movement and position.

translation.cy: YR HYN SY’N BWYSIG MEWN MATHEMATEG A RHIFEDD
translation.en: WHAT MATTERS IN MATHEMATICS AND NUMERACY

translation.cy: Ystadegau yw’r arfer o gasglu, trin a dadansoddi data er mwyn gallu cynrychioli a chyffredinoli gwybodaeth.
translation.en: Statistics is the practice of collecting, manipulating and analysing data, allowing representation and generalisation of information.

translation.cy: Tebygolrwydd yw’r broses fathemategol o astudio siawns, er mwyn gallu rhagfynegi’r tebygrwydd y bydd rhywbeth yn digwydd.
translation.en: Probability is the mathematical study of chance, enabling predictions of the likelihood of events occurring.

translation.cy: Mae rheoli data a chynrychioli gwybodaeth yn effeithiol yn cynnig ffordd o broﬁ rhagdybiaethau, dod i gasgliadau a gwneud rhagfynegiadau.
translation.en: Managing data and representing information effectively provides the means to test hypotheses, draw conclusions and make predictions.

translation.cy: Cyfathrebu â symbolau:
translation.en: Communication with symbols:

translation.cy: (h.y. gosod problemau allan mewn ffurf fathemategol er mwyn eu datrys) Dylai dysgwyr ddod yn gynyddol annibynnol wrth adnabod a chymhwyso’r strwythurau a’r syniadau mathemategol sydd wrth wraidd problem, er mwyn gallu ei datrys.
translation.en: (i.e. formulating problems mathematically in order to solve them) Learners should become increasingly independent in recognising and applying the underlying mathematical structures and ideas within a problem, in order to be able to solve them.

translation.cy: O ganlyniad, dylai ffeithiau, perthnasau a thechnegau a ddysgwyd ynghynt fod wedi’u hymsefydlu’n gadarn, yn goﬁadwy ac yn ddefnyddiadwy.
translation.en: As a result, facts, relationships and techniques learned previously should become ﬁrmly established, memorable and usable.

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Gallaf drafod y rheol(au) a ddefnyddiwyd gennyf a gallaf ailddosbarthu yn ôl meini prawf newydd.
translation.en: I can talk about the rule(s) I have used and can reclassify according to new criteria.

translation.cy: Gallaf werthuso fy nulliau ac awgrymu gwahanol ffyrdd neu well ffyrdd o gynnal ymchwiliadau yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: I can evaluate my methods and suggest different or better ways to approach investigations in the future.

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod dilysrwydd a thueddiadau, a gallaf drafod sut y gall anomaleddau effeithio ar gasgliadau wrth werthuso canlyniadau.
translation.en: I can recognise validity and trends, and can discuss how anomalies may affect conclusions when evaluating results.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi defnyddio cylch trin data dilyniannol er mwyn gofyn ac ateb cwestiynau priodol.
translation.en: I have used a sequential data-handling cycle to ask and answer appropriate questions.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddethol a chyﬁawnhau ffordd briodol o ddefnyddio fy nata er mwyn ymchwilio i’m rhagdybiaeth.
translation.en: I can select and justify an appropriate way to use my data to investigate my hypothesis.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi archwilio gwahanol ffyrdd o ddeall a chrynhoi fy nata, gan gynnwys defnyddio cyfartaleddau er mwyn cymharu setiau data mawr, gyda dosraniadau amlderwedi’u grwpio ar gyfer data arwahanol a data di-dor.
translation.en: I have explored different ways to understand and summarise my data, including using averages to make comparisons between large data sets, with grouped frequency distributions for discrete and continuous data.

translation.cy: Gallaf drafod fy nulliau a’m canfyddiadau’n feirniadol ac ystyried beth y gallwn fod wedi’i wneud yn wahanol neu’n well yn ystod pob cam o’r cylch trin data dilyniannol.
translation.en: I can critique my own methods and ﬁndings, and consider what I may have done differently or better at each stage of the sequential data-handling cycle.

translation.cy: Gallaf werthuso, dewis a defnyddio gwahanol dechnegau samplu, gan gynnwys samplu ar hap, samplu haenedig a samplu systematig.
translation.en: I can evaluate, choose and use different sampling techniques, including random sampling, stratiﬁed sampling and systematic sampling.

translation.cy: Mae Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu yn ein galluogi i ddadansoddi a deall y byd o’n cwmpas.
translation.en: Languages, Literacy and Communication enable us to analyse and understand the world around us.

translation.cy: Y cynnig yw y bydd gofyn i leoliadau a ariennir nas cynhelir ac ysgolion ddarparu cwricwlwm eang a chytbwys sy’n bodloni pedwar diben y cwricwlwm ac sy’n cynnwys y chwe maes dysgu a phroﬁad.
translation.en: The proposal is that funded non-maintained settings and schools will be required to provide a broad and balanced curriculum that meets the four purposes of the curriculum, and comprises the six areas of learning and experience.

translation.cy: Yn ymarferol, golyga hyn y dylent ddilyn y canllawiau statudol oni bai bod ganddynt reswm da i beidio.
translation.en: In practice, that means they should follow the statutory guidance unless they have good reason not to.

translation.cy: At hyn, mae’n cydnabod bod ieithoedd yn adnoddau pwysig ar gyfer mynegi empathi a chreadigrwydd.
translation.en: It also recognises languages as important tools through which we can express our empathy and creativity.

translation.cy: Maent yn fodd i ddehongli’r hyn a glywn, a ddarllenwn ac a welwn er mwyn datblygu ein dealltwriaeth, ein hempathi a’n gallu i ymateb yn effeithiol.
translation.en: They enable us to make sense of what is heard, read and seen, and thus to develop understanding, empathy and the ability to respond effectively.

translation.cy: Iuerirtihcoueludmd,fLolryWthraelensne2d0d22a:CHhuymfaatnhirteiebsu 09
translation.en: Hmuumniacnaittiioens 08

translation.cy: • Mae dysgu am hunaniaeth a diwylliant drwy ieithoedd yn ein paratoi i fod yn ddinasyddion Cymru a’r byd.
translation.en: • Learning about identity and culture through languages prepares us to be citizens of Wales and the world.

translation.cy: Ym mhob achos, dylid annog gweithwyr proffesiynol i gynllunio ar gyfer datblygiad ieithyddol plant ifanc a’i gefnogi yn unol â datblygiad plentyn, gan gydnabod, er enghraifft, bwysigrwydd datblygu sgiliau siarad yn ddigon da cyn canolbwyntio ar ysgrifennu.
translation.en: In all circumstances professionals should be encouraged to plan for and support young children’s linguistic development in line with child development, recognising, for example, the importance of young learners developing their speaking skills well enough before focusing on writing.

translation.cy: Llythrennedd, rhifedd a chymhwysedd digidol
translation.en: Literacy, numeracy and digital competence

translation.cy: Llythrennedd
translation.en: Literacy

translation.cy: Drwy ddifﬁniad, mae llythrennedd wrth wraidd Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu.
translation.en: The Languages, Literacy and Communication Area of Learning and Experience by deﬁnition has literacy at its heart.

translation.cy: Bydd meysydd dysgu a phroﬁad eraill yn hwyluso’r broses o ddefnyddio a datblygu’r sgiliau hyn mewn cyd-destunau dilys a’i gwneud yn bosibl i’r sgiliau hyn gael eu hatgyfnerthu.
translation.en: Other areas of learning and experience will facilitate the application and development of these skills in authentic contexts and allow these skills to be consolidated.

translation.cy: Rhifedd
translation.en: Numeracy

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr ddefnyddio rhifau mewn ieithoedd eraill bydd hyn yn ei dro yn atgyfnerthu dysgu a sgiliau rhifedd y pen a sgiliau rhifedd ysgrifenedig.
translation.en: As learners use numbers in other languages this in turn will consolidate learning and reinforcelearners’ mental and written numeracy skills.

translation.cy: Cydnabyddir bod sgiliau digidol yn gynyddol bwysig o ran datblygu llythrennedd, ieithoedd a sgiliau cyfathrebu ehangach dysgwyr.
translation.en: Digital skills are recognised as having increasing importance in developing learners’ literacy, languages and wider communication skills.

translation.cy: Mae’r gallu i ddefnyddio technoleg ddigidol yn briodol a gweithredu mewn amrywiaeth o amgylcheddau a chyfryngau digidol, gan weithio’n greadigol, ar y cyd, ac yn feirniadol, yn dod yn fwyfwy pwysig.
translation.en: It is ever more important to be able to use digital technology appropriately and operate across a variety of digital environments and media, working collaboratively, creatively and critically.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr archwilio dulliau cyfathrebu ar gyfer sefyllfa benodol, gallant ddysgu sut i greu negeseuon clir a phriodol wedi’u teilwra ar gyfer cynulleidfaoedd penodol, gan rannu, golygu ac addasu yn ôl y gofyn.
translation.en: As learners explore methods of communication for a given situation, they can learn how to compose clear and appropriate messages tailored for particular audiences, sharing, editing and adapting as required.

translation.cy: • Mae llenyddiaeth yn tanio’r dychymyg ac yn ysbrydoli creadigrwydd.
translation.en: • Literature ﬁres imagination and inspires creativity.

translation.cy: Rydym yn gwrando ac yn darllen er mwyn dadansoddi a deall sefyllfaoedd a llunio ymatebion drwy siarad ac ysgrifennu.
translation.en: We listen and read in order to analyse and understand situations and develop responses and solutions through speaking and writing.

translation.cy: Iuerirtihcoueludmd,fLolryWthraelensne2d0d22a:CHhuymfaatnhirteiebsu 14
translation.en: Hmuumnaicnaittiioens 13

translation.cy: Gyrfaoedd a phroﬁadau sy’n gysylltiedig â gwaith
translation.en: Careers and work-related experiences

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, mae’r sgiliau a ddatblygir, megis y gallu i ddarllen ac ysgrifennu’n glir, cynnal ymchwil, rhoi cyﬂwyniad, cyfathrebu’n glir a rhoi sylw i fanylion, yn cael eu gwerthfawrogi gan amrywiaeth eang o gyﬂogeion, gan gynnig amrywiaeth eang o gyﬂeoedd i ddysgwyr.
translation.en: However, the skills developed, such as the ability to read and write clearly, to undertake research, to give a presentation, to communicate clearly and to have attention to detail, are valued by a wide range of employers, providing a wide range of opportunities for learners.

translation.cy: Mae sgiliau rheoli gyrfa a sgiliau cynllunio, megis cymhelliant, hunanymwybyddiaeth,ymwybyddiaeth o gyﬂeoedd, gwneud penderfyniadau, ymroddiad a gwydnwch, i gyd yn elfennau allweddol o Faes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Ieithoedd, Llythrennedd a Chyfathrebu.
translation.en: The career management and planning skills of motivation, self-awareness, opportunity awareness, decision-making, application and resilience are all key components of the Languages, Literacy and Communication Area of Learning and Experience.

translation.cy: Iuerirtihcoueludmd,fLolryWthraelensne2d0d22a:CHhuymfaatnhirteiebsu 15
translation.en: Hmuumniacnaittiioens 14

translation.cy: Mae’n rhaid i wasanaethau cyhoeddus yng Nghymru beidio â thrin y Gymraeg yn llai ffafriol na’r Saesneg.
translation.en: Public services in Wales must not treat the Welsh language less favourably than English.

translation.cy: Cyﬂwyniad Cwricwlwm Drafft i GymruD2r0a2ft2C:

translation.cy: Dylai’r cyﬂeoedd ymgysylltu gynnwys mynychu ffeiriau gyrfaoedd a sgiliau, sgyrsiau gan ddarparwyr addysg bellach ac uwch ac ymweliadau gan y darparwyr hynny, yn ogystal â chyﬂwyniadau gan fyfyrwyr mewn addysg bellach neu uwch.
translation.en: Opportunities for engagement should include attending careers and skills fairs, talks from and visits to further and higher education providers, as well as presentations from students in further or higher education.

translation.cy: • datblygu sgiliau gwrando sy’n galluogi dysgwyr i ffurﬁo cydberthnasau cadarnhaol.
translation.en: • develop listening skills that enable the creation of positive relationships.

translation.cy: • adnabod rhagfarn ar sail rhyw mewn iaith er mwyn dod i gasgliadau ynglŷn ag ystyr a chyd-destun
translation.en: • identify gender bias in language to make inferences around meaning and context

translation.cy: • dadansoddi a gwerthuso’r ffyrdd y mae annibyniaeth corfforol yn cael ei ddatblygu drwy iaith a llenyddiaeth er mwyn meithrin agweddau parchus tuag at eu hunain ac eraill.
translation.en: • analyse and evaluate the ways in which bodily integrity is developed through language and literature to develop respectful attitudes to self and others.

translation.cy: Dylai pob dysgwr gael cyﬂe i ddarllen llenyddiaeth sy’n ddiddorol ac yn gyffrous iddynt.
translation.en: All learners should have access to literature which interests and excites them.

translation.cy: O ran hynny, mae’r maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn yn mynd i’r afael â’r weledigaeth a fynegir yn un o bedwar diben y cwricwlwm, sef, yng nghyd-destun Cymru ddwyieithog, fod Gymraeg a Saesneg fel ei gilydd yn perthyn i holl bobl Cymru ac y bydd ‘ein holl blant a phobl ifanc yn ddysgwyr uchelgeisiol, galluog sydd yn gallu cyfathrebu’n effeithiol mewn gwahanol ffurﬁau a lleoliadau, drwy Gymraeg a Saesneg’.
translation.en: In this respect, the area of learning and experience addresses the vision expressed in one of the four purposes of the curriculum, namely that in Wales’ bilingual context, both the Welsh language and the English language belong to all the people of Wales and that ‘All our children and young people will be ambitious and capable learners who can communicate effectively in different forms and settings, using both Welsh and English’.

translation.cy: O ganlyniad, mae’r maes dysgu a phroﬁad wedi ei gynllunio er mwyn caniatáu i ddysgwyr adeiladu ar yr hyn y maent yn ei wybod am Gymraeg a Saesneg i ddysgu o leiaf un iaith ryngwladol yn yr ysgol a, lle bo dysgwyr yn dod ag ieithoedd eraill i’r ysgol o’u cartreﬁ neu eu cymunedau, bod modd dathlu’r ieithoedd hynny a datblygu llythrennedd ynddynt i’r graddau y bo hynny’n bosibl.
translation.en: Following from this, the area of learning and experience has been designed to enable learners to build on their knowledge of Welsh and English to learn at least one international language at school and, where learners bring other languages with them to school from home and from their communities, to celebrate these languages and to support literacy development in these languages as far as possible.

translation.cy: Drwy godi ymwybyddiaeth o amrywiaeth ieithoedd o oedran cynnar, bydd dysgwyr yn gallu adnabod nodweddion tebyg rhwng ieithoedd a gwerthfawrogi’r gwahaniaethau rhyngddynt.
translation.en: By raising an awareness of the diversity of languages from a young age, learners will be enabled to recognise similarities between languages and also embrace the differences between them.

translation.en: I can use vocabulary, idiomatic language, phrases, sentences and texts I have read to improve my speaking and writing.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio cyﬂeoedd gwrando er mwyn creu cronfa o eiriau, iaith idiomatig a brawddegau i’w defnyddio wrth gyfathrebu.
translation.en: I can use listening opportunities to build a bank of words, idiomatic language and sentences to use in my own communication.

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod a deall geiriau cyfarwydd, geiriau cytras ac ymadroddion, sgyrsiau a chwestiynau sylfaenol am fy mywyd bob dydd a’m hamgylchedd uniongyrchol.
translation.en: I can recognise and understand familiar words, cognates and basic phrases, conversations and questions concerning my everyday life and immediate surroundings.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio cyﬂeoedd gwrando i wella fy ynganiad, fy ngoslef a’m hacen er mwyn gwella fy sgiliau iaith.
translation.en: I can use listening opportunities to improve my own pronunciation, intonation and accent to enhance my language skills.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio ciwiau i ragfynegi’r ystyr cyffredinol mewn sgyrsiau pob-dydd.
translation.en: I can use cues to predict the general meaning in everyday conversations.

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod a deall ymadroddion, prif bwyntiau, ffeithiau, syniadau, barnau cyferbyniol, patrymau geiriau anghyfarwydd a chwestiynau ar bynciau cyfarwydd mewn gwahanol gyd-destunau.
translation.en: I can recognise and understand phrases, main points, facts, ideas, opposing opinions, unfamiliar word patterns and questions on familiar topics in different contexts.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddarllen ac adnabod geirfa a brawddegau cyfarwydd o fewn testunau sy’n codi o amgylchiadau pob-dydd.
translation.en: I can read and recognise familiar vocabulary and sentences within texts in everyday contexts.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio sgiliau trawsieithu yn annibynnol i’m cefnogi wrth i mi ddysgu a chyfathrebu yn Gymraeg, yn Saesneg ac mewn iaith ryngwladol, a, lle bo hynny’n berthnasol, yn ieithoedd y cartref/gymuned.
translation.en: I can use translanguaging skills independently to support my learning and communication, in Welsh, English and an international language, and, where applicable, home/community languages.

translation.en: I can express what I like and dislike and can express an opinion on familiar subjects.

translation.en: I can present ideas and issues ﬂuently and conﬁdently in a wide range of contexts.

translation.cy: Gallaf fyfyrio’n feirniadol ar fy nefnydd o iaith a siarad mewn ffordd sy’n argyhoeddi o amrywiaeth o safbwyntiau.
translation.en: I can reﬂect critically on my language use and speak convincingly from a range of perspectives.

translation.en: I can pronounce Welsh letter sounds and simple everyday words and phrases.

translation.en: I can organise my words into a logical structure or sequence.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio geirfa, iaith idiomatig a chystrawen briodol, gan gynnwys geirfa pwnc-benodol a geirfa ar gyfer cyd-destunau penodol.
translation.en: I can use appropriate vocabulary, idiomatic language and syntax, including subject-speciﬁc and context-speciﬁc vocabulary.

translation.cy: Gallaf ofyn ac ateb cwestiynau a chyfnewid syniadau a gwybodaeth am bynciau cyfarwydd mewn sefyllfaoedd pob-dydd.
translation.en: I can ask and answer questions and exchange ideas and information on familiar topics in everyday situations.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio sgiliau trawsieithu yn Gymraeg, yn Saesneg ac mewn iaith ryngwladol, a, lle bo hynny’n berthnasol, yn ieithoedd y cartref/gymuned.
translation.en: I can use translanguaging skills in Welsh, English and an international language, and, where applicable, home/community languages.

translation.en: I can use a range of punctuation accurately.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio iaith idiomatig a throsiadau i gyfoethogi’r ffordd rwy’n siarad.
translation.en: I can use idiomatic language and ﬁgures of speech to make me speak more eloquently.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio amrywiaeth o strategaethau i wirio fy ngwaith ysgrifennu ac i wneud gwelliannau gofalus i’m gwaith.
translation.en: I can use a variety of strategies to review my writing and make carefully considered improvements to my work.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio sgiliau trawsieithu yn annibynnol i’m cefnogi wrth i mi ddysgu a chyfathrebu yn Gymraeg, yn Saesneg ac mewn iaith ryngwladol, a, lle bo hynny’n berthnasol, yn ieithoedd y cartref/gymuned.
translation.en: I can use translanguaging skills independently to support my learning and communication in Welsh, English and an international language, and, where applicable, home/community languages.

translation.cy: Siarad
translation.en: Speaking

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod, yn annibynnol, gyﬂeoedd i roi fy sgiliau trawsieithu ar waith er mwyn cyfoethogi’r modd rwy’n dysgu a chyfathrebu.
translation.en: I can independently identify opportunities to apply my translanguaging skills to enhance my learning and communication.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio amrediad llawn o atalnodi i ddangos ystyr, amrywio cyﬂymder a chreu effeithiau bwriadol.
translation.en: I can use a full range of punctuation to clarify meaning, vary pace and create deliberate effects.

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod, yn annibynnol, gyﬂeoedd i roi fy sgiliau trawsieithu ar waith er mwyn cyfoethogi’r modd rwy’n dysgu a chyfathrebu.
translation.en: I can independently identify opportunities to apply my translanguaging skills to enhance my learning and communication.

translation.en: I have developed knowledge and skills in both Welsh and English, and home and community languages where applicable, and these skills are a foundation for my international language(s).

translation.en: I can use a wide range of vocabulary, structures and grammatical patterns, including complex structures, to convey meaning clearly.

translation.en: I can refer to events, moving between a range of tenses with increasing sophistication.

translation.en: They will experience and respond to a variety of literature that gives them insight into the culture, people and history of Wales as well as the wider world.

translation.en: I can make connections between poetry, drama and prose that I hear, view or read.

translation.en: I can adopt, create and perform roles based on my knowledge of characters and experiences of literature.

translation.en: I can respond in Welsh to the wide range of Welsh literature I hear, view and read with empathy, and am ambitious in my use of language, discussing aspects such as plot, characters and themes.

This statutory guidance for the Health and Well-being Area of Learning and Experience, which forms part of the wider Curriculum for Wales 2022 statutory guidance, is intended to provide a
national framework that funded non-maintained settings and schools can build on to develop their own curriculum.

translation.en: By developing the ability to select appropriate goals and plan a course of action to achieve them, anticipating and overcoming challenges, learners will also be able to take responsibility for their own life choices.

translation.en: Curriculum design needs to be ﬂexible enough to respond to a diverse range of changing needs.

translation.cy: Bydd natur y maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn yn golygu y gall ysgolion lunio cwricwlwm sy’n seiliedig ar anghenion lleol ond dylai hefyd ystyried tueddiadau a materion cenedlaethol a byd-eang sy’n effeithio ar iechyd a lles.
translation.en: The nature of this area of learning and experience will allow schools to construct a curriculum based on local needs but it should also have regard to national and global trends and issues that affect health and well-being.

translation.en: The development and design of the Health and Well-being curriculum needs to be reﬂected in the school’s ethos and environment, support services and policies.

translation.cy: Bydd Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Iechyd a Lles yn helpu dysgwyr i ddeall y ffactorau sy’n effeithio ar iechyd a lles y corff, megis deiet cytbwys, gweithgareddau corfforol, gofal a hylendid personol, cwsg, a diogelwch rhag haint.
translation.en: The Health and Well-being Area of Learning and Experience will help learners to understand the factors that affect physical health and well-being, such as a balanced diet, physical activity, personal care and hygiene, sleep, and protection from infection.

translation.cy: 45 Deall natur atomig mater a’r modd y mae’n llywio’r byd.
translation.en: Understanding the atomic nature of matter and how it shapes the world.

translation.cy: 54 Mae grymoedd ac egni yn pennu strwythur a deinamig y bydysawd.
translation.en: 51 Forces and energy determine the structure and dynamics of the universe.

translation.cy: Nid yw’n ddigon i ddysgwyr allu ‘gwneud’ Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg.
translation.en: It is not sufﬁcient that learners can simply ‘do’ Science and Technology.

translation.cy: Bydd hawl gan leoliadau a ariennir nas cynhelir ac ysgolion i ddewis sut i gynllunio’u cwricwlwm ar lefel ysgol er mwyn cyﬂawni eu dyletswyddau cwricwlaidd.
translation.en: Funded non-maintained settings and schools will have discretion as to how they design their school-level curriculum to meet their curriculum duties.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, wrth arfer yr hawl honno, bydd rhaid iddynt roi sylw i ganllawiau statudol a gaiff eu cyhoeddi gan Weinidogion Cymru.
translation.en: However, in considering the exercise of that discretion, they must have regard to statutory guidance issued by Welsh Ministers.

translation.cy: Mae’r byd o’n cwmpas yn llawn pethau byw sy’n dibynnu ar ei gilydd i oroesi.
translation.en: The world around us is full of living things which depend on each other for survival.

translation.cy: Dyma weithgarwch sy’n arbennig o berthnasol yng Nghymru, lle bu cymhwyso diwydiannol sylweddol ar hyn ac lle mae arloesi’n parhau.
translation.en: This activity is particularly relevant in Wales, where it has had signiﬁcant industrial application and where innovation continues.

translation.cy: Gall datblygu dulliau gweithredu algorithmig a chyfriﬁannol creadigol ddatrys problemau heriol yn y byd go iawn.
translation.en: Developing creative algorithmic and computational approaches can solve challenging real-world problems.

translation.cy: Y berthynas rhwng y datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig mewn Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg
translation.en: Relationships between what matters statements in Science and Technology

translation.cy: Mae’r datganiad olaf yn cyﬂwyno agwedd newydd i’r cwricwlwm, un sy’n mynd i’r afael â sut y gellir cymhwyso cyfriﬁant er mwyn datrys problemau ym mhob rhan o Wyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg.
translation.en: The ﬁnal statement introduces a new curriculum focus, one which addresses how computation can be applied to solve problems across Science and Technology.

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr yn symud ymlaen o ddisgriﬁo syniadau i allu eu hegluro, ac mae eu gwaith dadansoddi a disgriﬁo yn datblygu o’r ansoddol i’r meintiol.
translation.en: Learners move from describing ideas to being able to explain them, and their analysis and description move from qualitative to quantitative.

translation.cy: Er bod cynnydd yn y maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn yn debyg ar draws y disgyblaethau, mae yna wahaniaethau allweddol rhwng y ffordd y gallai dysgwr wneud cynnydd yn y gwyddorau o gymharu â dylunio.
translation.en: While progression in this area of learning and experience is similar across the disciplines, there are key differences between how a learner might progress in the sciences as opposed to design.

translation.cy: Gall dysgwyr weithio mewn modd ansoddol, gan gasglu data drwy wneud arsylwadau a chymryd mesuriadau.
translation.en: Learners can work quantitatively, gathering data by making observations and taking measurements.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, wrth iddynt ddod o hyd i wybodaeth a deall sut i storio data yn briodol ar systemau gwahanol, byddant yn dod yn fwy ymwybodol o oblygiadau’r gyfraith o ran data.
translation.en: For example, as they source information and understand how to store data appropriately on different systems, they will become more mindful of the implications of data laws.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr weithio, yn annibynnol ac ar y cyd, dylent gael cyﬂeoedd i gymryd rhan yn y broses iterus o gynllunio, creu, gwerthuso a gwella cynnwys digidol.
translation.en: As learners work, both independently and collaboratively, they should access opportunities to participate in the iterative process of planning, creating, evaluating and improving digital content.

translation.cy: Mae Cymru yn elwa ar brosiectau gwyddoniaeth a thechnoleg rhyngwladol, ac yn cyfrannu atynt, gan ddarparu’r arbenigedd a’r sgiliausy’n ofynnol i helpu i wneud y cydweithrediadau hyn yn llwyddiant.
translation.en: Wales beneﬁts from, and contributes to, international science and technology projects, providing the expertise and skills required to help make these collaborations a success.

translation.cy: Mae ein heffaith amgylcheddol yn mynd y tu hwnt i fﬁniau daearyddol a gwleidyddol.
translation.en: Our environmental impact transcends geographical and political boundaries.

translation.cy: Mae meddwl yn feirniadol a datrys problemau wrth wraidd Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg wrth ddadansoddi problemau i ddatblygu modelau, atebion a datblygiadau arloesol.
translation.en: Critical thinking and problem-solving are at the heart of Science and Technology when analysing problems to develop models, solutions and innovations.

translation.cy: Mae’n helpu dysgwyr i feithrin dealltwriaeth ddyfnach o’r cysyniadau a’r cymwyseddau sy’n ofynnol er mwyn gwneud cynnydd.
translation.en: It helps learners to develop a deeper understanding of the concepts and competencies required to progress.

translation.cy: Byddant yn meithrin eu sgiliau hunanwerthuso drwy brosesau meddwl yn feirniadol.
translation.en: Learners will develop their self-evaluation through the critical-thinking processes.

translation.cy: Cysylltu’r maes dysgu a phroﬁad â gyrfaoedd a phroﬁadau sy’n gysylltiedig â gwaith Dylid annog dysgwyr i ymgymryd â gwaith ymchwil ac i ystyried y cysylltiadau rhwng Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg a’u llwybrau gyrfa cysylltiedig.
translation.en: Linking the area of learning and experience to careers and work-related experiences Learners should be encouraged to undertake research and explore the links between Science and Technology and their related career paths.

translation.cy: • chwarae rôl ar gyfer amrywiaeth o wahanol swyddi
translation.en: • acting a variety of different jobs through role play

translation.cy: Mae Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg yn cynnig cyﬂe i ddysgwyr astudio sylfaen wyddonol addysg cydberthynas a rhywioldeb.
translation.en: Science and Technology offers learners the opportunity to study the scientiﬁc basis of relationships and sexuality education.

translation.cy: Drwy astudio pethau byw, bydd dysgwyr yn dod i ddeall bod pob un ohonom yn unigryw, a hynny o ganlyniad i amrywiad genetig a dylanwadau amgylcheddol.
translation.en: Through the study of living things, learners will come to understand that we are all unique, due to genetic variation and environmental inﬂuence.

translation.cy: Drwy hyn, bydd dysgwyr yn gallu deall efallai na fydd hunaniaeth rywiol unigolyn bob amser yn cyd-fynd â’i ryw ﬁolegol.
translation.en: Through this, learners will be able to understand that a person’s gender identity may not match their biological sex.

translation.cy: Drwy wneud cysylltiadau sylfaenol o fewn Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg bydd dysgwyr yn meithrin dealltwriaeth well o’r byd o’u cwmpas, yn ogystal â’u lle ynddo.
translation.en: Through making fundamental connections within Science and Technology learners will develop a stronger understanding of the world around them and their place within it.

translation.cy: Dylent weithio mewn modd iterus tuag at ganlyniad pwrpasol i ddatblygu gwydnwch a dyfalbarhad, lle y gellir ystyried methiant yn garreg camu tuag at lwyddiant a lle y caiff creadigrwydd ei ddathlu.
translation.en: They should work iteratively towards a purposeful outcome to develop resilience and perseverance, where failure can be seen as a stepping stone to success and creativity is celebrated.

translation.cy: Rhoi’r maes dysgu a phroﬁad ar waith
translation.en: Putting the area of learning and experience into practice

translation.cy: Bydd angen i leoliadau ac ysgolion ddefnyddio Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg gan sicrhau bod pedwar diben y cwricwlwm yn greiddiol i’r broses o gynllunio’r proﬁadau, yr wybodaeth a’r sgiliau y bydd dysgwyr yn dod ar eu traws.
translation.en: The Science and Technology Area of Learning and Experience will need to be used by settings and schools with the four purposes of the curriculum central to the planning of the experiences, knowledge and skills learners will encounter.

translation.cy: Drwy fanteisio i’r eithaf ar ddull gweithredu amlddisgyblaethol mewn perthynas â datblygu’r cwricwlwm, cynigir proﬁad dysgu mwy cydlynol i ddysgwyr.
translation.en: Making the most of a multidisciplinary approach to curriculum development provides learners with a more coherent learning experience.

translation.cy: Er mwyn cyﬂawni hyn, mae prosesau cydlynol a chydlynus ar gyfer cynllunio’r cwricwlwm ar drawsfﬁniau disgyblaethau traddodiadol yn hanfodol.
translation.en: To achieve this, cohesive and coherent curriculum planning across traditional disciplinary boundaries is crucial.

translation.cy: Dylai proﬁadau dysgu ymarferol o natur benodol, thematig neu amlddisgyblaethol atgyfnerthu dysgu blaenorol a dealltwriaeth gysyniadol, yn hytrach na dim ond cynnig tasgau coﬁadwy y mae dysgwyr yn eu mwynhau.
translation.en: Practical learning experiences of a speciﬁc, thematic or multidisciplinary nature should strengthen prior learning and conceptual understanding, not simply engage learners in memorable and enjoyable tasks.

translation.cy: Mae digwyddiadau a phroﬁadau dynol yn gymhleth a chânt eu canfod, eu dehongli a’u cynrychioli mewn gwahanol ffyrdd.
translation.en: Events and human experiences are complex, and are perceived, interpreted and represented in different ways.

translation.cy: Mae’r byd naturiol yn amrywiol a deinamig, ac mae dylanwad prosesau fﬁsegol a gweithredoedd dynol arno.
translation.en: Our natural world is diverse and dynamic, inﬂuenced by physical processes and human actions.

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 03
translation.en: Humanities 03

translation.cy: yn mynd i’r afael â materion, gan gynnwys cynaliadwyedd a newid cymdeithasol;
translation.en: engage with issues including sustainability and social change;

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 04
translation.en: Humanities 04

translation.cy: Y cynnig yw y bydd gofyn i leoliadau a ariennir nas cynhelir ac ysgolion ddarparu cwricwlwm eang a chytbwys sy’n bodloni pedwar diben y cwricwlwm ac sy’n cynnwys y chwe maes dysgu a phroﬁad.
translation.en: The proposal is that funded non-maintained settings and schools will be required to provide a broad and balanced curriculum that meets the four purposes of the curriculum, and comprises the six areas of learning and experience.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgu Cymraeg, Saesneg, addysg grefyddol, addysg cydberthynas a rhywioldeb, a’r tri chyfrifoldeb trawsgwricwlaidd, sef llythrennedd, rhifedd a chymhwysedd digidol, i gyd yn ddyletswyddau statudol.
translation.en: There will be statutory duties to teach Welsh, English, religious education, relationships and sexuality education, and the three cross-curricular responsibilities of literacy, numeracy and digital competence.

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 05
translation.en: Humanities 05

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn cael y cyﬂeoedd i ddod yn gyfranwyr mentrus, creadigol sy’n barod i chwarae eu rhan yn llawn yn eu bywyd a’u gwaith, ynghyd â chyﬂeoedd i ddod yn ddinasyddion cyfrifol, wrth iddynt ymwneud yn feirniadol â heriau a chyﬂeoedd lleol, cenedlaethol a byd-eang o’r gorffennol a’r presennol, a cheisio dychmygu dyfodol posibl.
translation.en: Learners will have the opportunities to become enterprising, creative contributors, ready to play a full part in life and work, as well as opportunities to become responsible citizens, as they engage critically with local, national and global challenges and opportunities past and present, and seek to imagine possible futures.

translation.cy: Drwy hyn oll, fe’u hanogir i ystyried sut y gallant hwy eu hunain gymryd camau gweithredu cadarnhaol i wella bywydau pobl yn eu cyneﬁn, yng Nghymru ac yn y byd ehangach.
translation.en: All the while, they will be encouraged to think about how they themselves can take positive action to improve the lives of people in their cyneﬁn, in Wales and in the wider world.

translation.cy: Cyﬂwyniad Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: Introduction Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Bydd taith y dysgwyr drwy’r Dyniaethau yn daith o ymholi a darganfod, wrth iddynt gael eu hannog i fod yn chwilfrydig ac i gwestiynu, i feddwl yn feirniadol a myfyrio ar dystiolaeth.Drwy’r ymholi hwn, mae dysgwyr yn meithrin dealltwriaeth ddyfnach o’r cysyniadau sy’n saili’r Dyniaethau a’r gallu i’w cymhwyso mewn cyd-destunau lleol, cenedlaethol a byd-eang.
translation.en: Learners’ journey through Humanities will be characterised by enquiry and discovery, as they are encouraged to be curious and to question, to think critically and to reﬂect upon evidence. Through such enquiry, learners gain a deeper understanding of the concepts underpinning Humanities, and their application in local, national and global contexts.

translation.cy: Yn wir, mae’r broses ymholi yn cynnig cyﬂeoedd i hunanfyfyrio sy’n ychwanegu ystyr at eu bywydau eu hunain ac yn cyfrannu at eu hymdeimlad o’u lle yn y byd.
translation.en: Indeed, enquiry enables self-reﬂection which adds meaning to their own lives and contributes to their sense of place in the world.

translation.cy: Yn ei dro, bydd hwn yn helpu dysgwyr i adnabod beth sy’n gwneud lle yn wahanol ac i ddatblygu ymwybyddiaeth o’r rhyng-gysylltiadau sydd rhwng pobl a’u hamgylchedd.
translation.en: This in turn helps learners to identify what makes a place distinct and develop an awareness of the interconnections between humans and their environment.

translation.cy: Mae’r esblygiad hwn yn cael ei sbarduno gan y rhyngweithio sydd rhwng amryw o ffactorau, gan gynnwys gweithredoedd a chredoau pobl, a grymoedd fﬁsegol.
translation.en: This evolution is driven by the interplay between a range of factors, including human actions and beliefs, and physical forces.

translation.cy: Bydd cwestiynu a gwerthuso ymatebion sydd eisoes yn bodoli i heriau a chyﬂeoedd yn helpu dysgwyr i ddatblygu fel dinasyddion byd-eang hunanymwybodol, gwybodus ac egwyddorolsy’n myfyrio’n feirniadol ar eu credoau a’u gwerthoedd eu hunain.
translation.en: Questioning and evaluating existing responses to challenges and opportunities will help learners develop as self-aware, informed, ethical global citizens who critically reﬂect on their own beliefs and values.

translation.cy: mae’r cynnwys, y cysyniadau a’r sgiliau a amlinellir ynddynt yn rhyng-gysylltiedig, gan roi pwyslais ar ddull gweithredu rhyngddisgyblaethol a safbwynt cyfannol o’r dyniaethau.
translation.en: the content, concepts and skills outlined in them are interconnected, placing emphasis on an interdisciplinary approach and a holistic view of the humanities.

translation.cy: • wybodaeth ddyfnach, drwy gysylltu dysgu newydd â gwybodaeth bresennol a datblygu dealltwriaeth fwy sofﬁstigedig a datrys yr anghydfodau a all ddeillio o safbwyntiau gwahanol
translation.en: • increased depth of knowledge, by linking new learning to existing knowledge and developing a more sophisticated understanding and resolving the conﬂicts that can emerge from different points of view

translation.cy: Mae’r Dyniaethau yn cynnig cyd-destunau cyfoethog i ddatblygu pob arddull ysgrifennu.
translation.en: Humanities provides rich contexts for developing all styles of writing.

translation.cy: Mae’r Dyniaethau yn rhoi amrywiaeth eang o gyﬂeoedd i ddysgwyr feithrin eu sgiliau rhifedd mewn cyd-destunau go iawn.
translation.en: Humanities provides learners with a wide range of opportunities to develop their numeracy skills in real-world contexts.

translation.cy: Gall y sgil o ddatblygu holiaduron syml i ddadansoddi setiau data mawr gael ei ategu a’i ddatblygu ym mhob rhan o’r Dyniaethau wrth i ddysgwyr gasglu a chofnodi data.
translation.en: Developing simple questionnaires to analyse large data sets can all be supported and developed across Humanities as learners collect and record data.

translation.cy: Mae’r dimensiwn Cymreig a’r persbectif rhyngwladol yn rhan annatod o bob disgyblaeth ym Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad y Dyniaethau.
translation.en: The Welsh dimension and international perspective are integral to all disciplines within the Humanities Area of Learning and Experience.

translation.cy: • datblygu ymrwymiad i gyﬁawnder cymdeithasol a gweithredu cymdeithasol, yng Nghymru a’r byd ehangach.
translation.en: • develop a commitment to social justice and social action, within Wales and the wider world.

translation.cy: Sgiliau ehangach
translation.en: Wider skills

translation.cy: Caiff dysgwyr eu hannog i fod yn agored i syniadau a ffyrdd o feddwl gwahanol, gan eu galluogi i fynegi barn resymedig ar y gwahaniaethau hyn.
translation.en: Learners are encouraged to be open to different ideas and ways of thinking, enabling them to express reasoned opinions about these differences.

translation.cy: Yn y Dyniaethau, bydd dysgwyr yn gweithio gydag eraill wrth iddynt gynllunio ymchwiliadau sy’n cynnwys casglu a defnyddio amrywiaeth o dystiolaeth.
translation.en: In Humanities, learners will work with others as they plan investigations involving gathering and utilising a range of evidence.

translation.cy: Mae’r Dyniaethau yn rhoi’r sgiliau a’r wybodaeth sydd eu hangen ar ddysgwyr i ddilyn gyrfa sy’n gysylltiedig â’r disgyblaethau hyn.
translation.en: Humanities equips learners with the skills and knowledge necessary to pursue careers related to these disciplines.

translation.cy: Mae amrywiaeth o bartneriaid ynghlwm â’r teithiau cyffrous hyn drwy gyd-ddylunio a chyd-gyﬂwyno a, gyda’i gilydd, maent yn llywio penderfyniadau plant a phobl ifanc am eu dyfodol a’r llwybrau y byddant yn eu dilyn.
translation.en: A range of partners support these exciting journeys through co-design and co-delivery and together shape children and young people’s decisions about their future and the pathways they follow.

translation.cy: Gall dysgwyr ddefnyddio’r wybodaeth a’r sgiliau a feithrinwyd drwy gymryd rhan mewn proﬁadausy’n gysylltiedig â gwaith i ddatblygu gweithgareddau menter llwyddiannus.
translation.en: Learners can use the knowledge and skills gained in taking part in work-related experiences to develop successful enterprise activities.

translation.cy: Deall cyﬂeoedd ôl-16 ac addysg uwch
translation.en: Understanding post-16 and higher education opportunities

translation.cy: Addysg cydberthynas a rhywioldeb
translation.en: Relationships and sexuality education

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys archwilio cydberthnasau personol, hawliau, gwerthoedd cyffredin, rhywedd a rhywioldeb.
translation.en: This includes exploring personal relationships, rights, shared values, gender and sexuality.

translation.cy: Cydberthnasau
translation.en: Relationships

translation.cy: Yn y Dyniaethau mae cyﬂe i ystyried sut mae pob diwylliant yn deall rhyw, rhywedd, lles, gan gynnwys delwedd gorfforol, atgenhedlu, a phryd y mae’n briodol dod yn weithredol yn rhywiol.
translation.en: In Humanities there is an opportunity to explore how all cultures have different ways of understanding sex, gender, well-being, including body image, reproduction, and when it is appropriate to become sexually active.

translation.cy: Mae’r Dyniaethau yn defnyddio teithiau maes ac ymweliadau yn y gymuned leol a thu hwnt fel man cychwyn i addysgu cysyniadau allweddol neu wella dysgu drwy broﬁad uniongyrchol.
translation.en: Humanities uses ﬁeld trips and visits within the local community and further aﬁeld as a starting point to teach key concepts or to enhance learning throughﬁrst-hand experience.

translation.cy: Mae siarad ag ymwelwyr ac arbenigwyr, gan arsylwi a chymryd rhan mewn dysgu drwy broﬁad, megis gweithgareddau diwylliannol, yn helpu pob plentyn a pherson ifanc i ddysgu am broﬁadau dynol.
translation.en: Speaking to visitors and experts, using observation and participation in experiential learning, such as cultural activities, helps all children and young people to learn about human experiences.

translation.cy: Dylid hefyd ddethol cynnwys er mwyn sicrhau y gall dysgwyr greu cysylltiadau o fewn a rhwng y datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig yn y maes dysgu a phroﬁad hwn, ac er mwyn sicrhau cynnydd yn y sgiliau a nodwyd yn y camau cynnydd.
translation.en: Content should also be selected to ensure that learners are able to make connections within and between the what matters statements in this area of learning and experience, and to ensure progression in the skills identiﬁed in the progression steps.

translation.cy: Mae datblygu meddwl ymholgar yn galluogi dysgwyr i archwilio ac ymchwilioi’r byd, i’w orffennol, ei bresennol a’i ddyfodol, drostynt eu hunain.
translation.en: Developing an enquiring mind enables learners to explore and investigate the world, past, present and future, for themselves.

translation.cy: Mae meddwl ymholgar yn ysgogi ffyrdd newydd a chreadigol o feddwl.
translation.en: An enquiring mind stimulates new and creative thinking.

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: What Matters in Humanities Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.en: Principles of progression
