translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Gallaf roi esboniadau syml am fy nghanfyddiadau.
translation.en: I can give simple explanations for my ﬁndings.

translation.cy: Gallaf lunio syniadau, gwneud rhagfynegiadau, a chynllunio sawl gwahanol ffordd o fynd i’r afael â sefyllfa neu dasg benodol, yn ogystal ag arbroﬁ ag amrywiaeth o opsiynau wrth roi’r syniadau hyn ar waith.
translation.en: I can generate ideas, make predictions, and plan several different ways to approach a given situation or task, as well as experiment with a range of options when putting these ideas into action.

translation.cy: Gallaf archwilio’r gwahaniaethau rhwng ffeithiau, barn a chredoau.
translation.en: I can explore the differences between facts, opinions and beliefs.

translation.cy: Gallaf gyﬂwyno fy nghanfyddiadau mewn amrywiaeth o ffyrdd, gan ddefnyddio dulliau priodol.
translation.en: I can present my ﬁndings in a range of ways, using appropriate methods.

translation.cy: neu gasgliad a ategir gan dystiolaeth sy’n seiliedig ar y broses ymholi a gynhaliwyd gennyf.
translation.en: decision or conclusion based on the enquiry process I have undertaken.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi proﬁ ymholiadau sy’n canolbwyntio ar fy nghredoau, gwerthoedd a bydolygon fy hun, ynghyd â rhai pobl eraill.
translation.en: I have experienced enquiries focusing on my own beliefs, values and world views, and those of others.

translation.cy: Gallaf gynnal gwerthusiad effeithiol o’r broses ymholi a ddefnyddiwyd, ac awgrymu rhai gwelliannau.
translation.en: I can effectively evaluate the success of the enquiry process used, and suggest some improvements.

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 24
translation.en: Humanities 24

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi defnyddio amrywiaeth o ffynonellau, gan gynnwys y rhai o’m gwaith ymchwil fy hun, er mwyn ychwanegu dyfnder i’m hymholiadau.
translation.en: I have utilised a range of sources, including those from my own research, to add depth to my enquiries.

translation.cy: Gallaf fynd i’r afael ag ymholiad athronyddol gan ystyried amrywiaeth, cymhlethdod a lluosogrwydd bydolygon crefyddol ac anghrefyddol o’r byd.
translation.en: I can engage in philosophical enquiry considering the diversity, complexity and plurality of religious and non-religious world views.

translation.cy: Gallaf werthfawrogi ffynonellau o ddoethineb ac awdurdod, a bydolygon crefyddol ac anghrefyddol,uniaethu â nhw a’u gwerthuso’n feirniadol er mwyn llunio fy nghasgliadau rhesymegol fy hun.
translation.en: I can appreciate, empathise with and critically evaluate sources of wisdom and authority, and religious and non-religious world views, in order to form my own reasoned conclusions.

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: What Matters in Humanities Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn awgrymu lle gellid cyfoethogi dysgu drwy wneud cysylltiadau rhwng y datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig ar draws Maes Dysgu a Phroﬁad y Dyniaethau.
translation.en: This section suggests where learning can be enriched through drawing links between other what matters statements across the Humanities Area of Learning and Experience.

translation.cy: • amrywiaeth o gyﬂeoedd parhaus i archwilio a darganfod drwy chwarae
translation.en: • a range of ongoing opportunities for exploration and discovery through play

translation.cy: • amrywiaeth o gyﬂeoedd i ymholi a dysgu yn yr awyr agored, yn ogystal â dan do, gan gynnwys dysgu fﬁsegol a digidol
translation.en: • a range of opportunities to enquire and to learn outdoors, as well as indoors, including both physical and digital learning

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr allu a gwybod sut i:
translation.en: Learners need to know how to and be able to:

translation.cy: • archwilio, arsylwi a chwestiynu
translation.en: • explore, observe and question

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr broﬁ:
translation.en: Learners need to experience:

translation.cy: • gwneud a chofnodi arsylwadau a chanfyddiadau, gan ddefnyddio dulliau digidol a dulliau eraill
translation.en: • make and record observations and ﬁndings, using digital and other methods

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr wybod:
translation.en: Learners need to know:

translation.cy: • arsylwi ar wybodaeth ﬂaenorol a’i defnyddio er mwyn creu cwestiynau priodol
translation.en: • observe and use prior knowledge to formulate appropriate questions

translation.cy: • defnyddio amrywiaeth o wahanol ffynonellau gweledol, llafar, ysgrifenedig a fﬁsegol
translation.en: • using a range of different visual, oral, written and physical sources

translation.cy: • y nodweddion tebyg a’r gwahaniaethau rhwng dulliau ymholi ym mhob maes pwnc.
translation.en: • the similarities and differences between enquiry methods in each subject area.

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr broﬁ:
translation.en: Learners need to experience:

translation.cy: • amrywiaeth o gyﬂeoedd i ymholi a dysgu yn yr awyr agored, yn ogystal â dan do,gan gynnwys dysgu fﬁsegol a digidol
translation.en: • a range of opportunities to enquire and to learn outdoors, as well as indoors, including both physical and digital learning

translation.cy: • nodi perthnasedd yr wybodaeth a gasglwyd i gyd-destun penodol yr ymholiad
translation.en: • identify the relevance of the information collected to the speciﬁc context of the enquiry

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi cael cyﬂeoedd i drafod fy marnau am bethau rwyf wedi’u proﬁ gyda phobl eraill.
translation.en: I have had opportunities to discuss my opinions about things I have experienced with other people.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 3
translation.en: Progression step 3

translation.cy: Gallaf gydnabod fod gan bobl wahanol farnau am arwyddocâd pobl, digwyddiadau a phroﬁadau yn y gorffennol a’r presennol.
translation.en: I can recognise that people have different opinions about the signiﬁcance of people, events and experiences in the past and present.

translation.cy: Gallaf ailadrodd y dystiolaeth a ddefnyddir gan bobl i ddehongli digwyddiadau a materion mewn gwahanol ffyrdd.
translation.en: I can recount the evidence people use to interpret events and issues in different ways.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddefnyddio amrywiaeth o ddehongliadau er mwyn llunio persbectif personol rhesymegol.
translation.en: I can draw on a range of interpretations to come to a reasoned personal perspective.

translation.cy: Gallaf egluro’r modd y gall dehongliadau ddylanwadu ar weithredoedd pobl, ar draddodiadau
translation.en: I can explain how interpretations can inﬂuence people’s actions, traditions and forms of

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi cael cyﬂeoedd i lunio, mynegi a thrafod barn personol am amrywiaeth o faterion o bwys ar draws y Dyniaethau.
translation.en: I have had opportunities to form, express and discuss personal opinions about a range of issues across the Humanities.

translation.cy: Gallaf egluro’r modd y gall dehongliadau o le, tirweddau, amgylcheddau a diwylliannau newid dros amser.
translation.en: I can explain how interpretations of place, landscapes, environments and cultures may change over time.

translation.cy: Dyniaethau 39
translation.en: Humanities 38

translation.cy: Mae cymdeithasau dynol yn gymhleth ac yn amrywiol, ac maent yn cael eu llywio gan weithredoedd a chredoau pobl.
translation.en: Human societies are complex and diverse, and are shaped by human actions and beliefs.

translation.cy: • Gwahanol ddehongliadau o’r heriau a’r cyﬂeoedd allweddol sy’n wynebu dynoliaeth.
translation.en: • Differing interpretations of the key challenges and opportunities facing humanity.

translation.cy: Gwyddoniaeth a Thechnoleg
translation.en: Science and Technology

translation.cy: Iechyd a Lles
translation.en: Health and Well-being

translation.cy: • Dehongli data, h.y. tueddiadau economaidd.
translation.en: • Interpreting data, i.e. economic trends.

translation.cy: • amrywiaeth o gyﬂeoedd i lunio a mynegi barnau
translation.en: • a range of opportunities to form and express opinions

translation.cy: • cael gafael ar ddehongliadau a phersbectifau drwy amrywiaeth o gyfryngau fﬁsegol a digidol
translation.en: • accessing interpretations and perspectives through a variety of physical and digital media

translation.cy: • archwilio, darganfod a thrafod materion a digwyddiadau o fewn disgyblaethau’r Dyniaethau ac ar draws y disgyblaethau hynny
translation.en: • explore, ﬁnd out about and discuss issues and events from within and across the Humanities disciplines

translation.cy: • amrywiaeth o gyﬂeoedd i lunio a mynegi barnau
translation.en: • a range of opportunities to form and express opinions

translation.cy: • cael gafael ar ddehongliadau a phersbectifau drwy amrywiaeth o gyfryngau fﬁsegol a digidol
translation.en: • accessing interpretations and perspectives through a variety of physical and digital media

translation.cy: • archwilio materion lleol, cenedlaethol a byd-eang, a mynd i’r afael â phersbectifau lluosog mewn perthynas â’r materion hyn
translation.en: • explore local, national and global issues, and engage with multiple perspectives relating to these issues

translation.cy: • archwilio haenau o ystyr o fewn cynrychioliadau symbolaidd.
translation.en: • explore layers of meaning within symbolic representations.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr broﬁ:
translation.en: Learners need to experience:

translation.cy: • ysgogiadau sy’n tanio eu brwdfrydedd ac yn eu hysbrydoli i fod yn chwilfrydig am faterion cymhleth a dadleuol, i fynd i’r afael â nhw ac i’w harchwilio er mwyn gwneud synnwyr o’r byd
translation.en: • stimuli that inspire and enthuse them to be curious about, engage in, and explore complex and controversial issues in order to make sense of the world

translation.cy: • llunio, mynegi a thrafod barnau personol am amrywiaeth o faterion ar draws y Dyniaethau
translation.en: • form, express and discuss personal opinions about a range of issues across the Humanities

translation.cy: • amrywiaeth o gyﬂeoedd i lunio a mynegi barnau
translation.en: • a range of opportunities to form and express opinions

translation.cy: • ymchwilio i a deall yr hyn sy’n dylanwadu ar eu dehongliadau a’u barnau personol ac yn eu llywio, a manteisio ar amrywiaeth o ddehongliadau a barnau er mwyn llunio persbectif personol rhesymegol
translation.en: • investigate and understand what inﬂuences and shapes their own interpretations and opinions and be able to draw on a range of interpretations and opinions to come to a reasoned personal perspective

translation.cy: • trafod, dadansoddi a gwerthuso’r dehongliadau a gynigir gan eraill
translation.en: • discuss, analyse and evaluate the interpretations offered by others

translation.cy: • archwilio persbectifau lluosog a gweledigaethau amgen ar gyfer y dyfodol
translation.en: • explore multiple perspectives and alternative visions for the future

translation.cy: Wrth gynllunio dysgu disgyblaeth-penodol, dylai’r canlynol gael eu hychwanegu at yr uchod yng Ngham cynnydd 5.
translation.en: When planning discipline-speciﬁc learning, the following should be added to the above at Progression step 5.

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr wybod:
translation.en: Learners need to know:

translation.cy: Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: O ganlyniad, mae dysgwyr mewn sefyllfa well i wneud cysylltiadau rhwng y gorffennol a’r presennol ac i ddychmygu dyfodol posibl.
translation.en: Consequently, learners are in a better position to make connections between the past and present, and to imagine possible futures.

translation.cy: Gallaf gyﬂeu fy nheimladau am y byd naturiol.
translation.en: I can communicate my feelings about the natural world.

translation.cy: Deilliannau cyﬂawniad
translation.en: Achievement outcomes

translation.cy: Gallaf ddisgriﬁo nodweddion fﬁsegol penodol lleoedd, amgylcheddau a thirweddau yng Nghymru a’r byd ehangach.
translation.en: I can describe the distinct physical features of places, environments and landscapes in Wales and the wider world.

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: What Matters in Humanities Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Gallaf ddeall ac egluro canlyniadau byw mewn ffordd anghynaliadwy ac awgrymu enghreifftiau posibl o ddyfodol cynaliadwy.
translation.en: I can understand and explain the consequences of living in an unsustainable way and suggest possible sustainable futures.

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn awgrymu ymhle gellid ystyried gwahanol elfennau o ddysgu gyda’i gilydd er mwyn cefnogi dysgusy’n fwy holistaidd.
translation.en: It also suggests where different elements of learning could be considered together in order to support more holistic learning.

translation.en: • Interpretations of human responsibility towards the natural world.

translation.en: This section suggests where learning can be enriched through drawing links between other what matters statements across all the areas of learning and experience.

translation.en: Learners need to experience:

translation.cy: • adnabod digwyddiadau arwyddocaol yn y gorffennol a disgriﬁo’r modd y maent wedi newid lleoedd, amgylcheddau a thirweddau
translation.en: • identify signiﬁcant past events and describe how they have changed places, environments and landscapes

translation.cy: • creu a defnyddio amrywiaeth o fapiau, a rhoi sgiliau mapio ar waith er mwyn canfod lleoedd, amgylcheddau a thirweddau yn gywir, a hynny drwy ddulliau digidol a dulliau eraill, gan gynnwys systemau gwybodaeth ddaearyddol
translation.en: • create and utilise a variety of maps, using their map skills to accurately locate places, environments and landscapes, and exploiting digital and other methods, including geographical information systems

translation.cy: • disgriﬁo ac egluro datblygiad amrywiaeth o nodweddion fﬁsegol, amgylcheddau a thirweddau yng Nghymru a’r byd ehangach
translation.en: • describe and explain the development of a range of physical features, environments and landscapes in Wales and the wider world

translation.cy: Mae’r Dyniaethau yn annog dealltwriaeth feirniadol o’r modd y caiff amrywiol gymdeithasau yng Nghymru a’r byd ehangach eu trefnu, eu strwythuro a’u harwain.
translation.en: Humanities encourages a critical understanding of how societies in Wales and the wider world are organised, structured and led.

translation.cy: Maent hefyd yn ddeinamig, gan sbarduno newidiadau ac ymateb iddynt, ar raddfa leol, genedlaethol a byd-eang.
translation.en: They are also dynamic, both driving and reacting to changes on a local, national and global scale.

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:

translation.cy: • sofﬁstigeiddrwydd gwell o ran dealltwriaeth gysyniadol, a fydd yn caniatáu i ddysgwyr weld y tu hwnt i restr o ffeithiau a mynd i’r afael â’r syniadau hynny sy’n sail i ddisgyblaethau’r Dyniaethau, a’r modd y mae’r rhain yn cysylltu â’i gilydd mewn gwahanol gyd-destunau
translation.en: • increased sophistication of conceptual understanding, whereby learners see beyond a list of facts and engage with those ideas that underpin the disciplines that make up Humanities, and how these interrelate in different contexts

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod amseroedd, digwyddiadau a thraddodiadau arbennig yn fy nghymuned a’r byd ehangach.
translation.en: I can identify special times, events and traditions in my community and in the wider world.

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod rhai ffactorau sy’n cyfrannu at fy hunaniaeth, a’r ffyrdd rwy’n debyg ac yn wahanol i eraill.
translation.en: I can recognise some factors that contribute to my identity and the ways I am similar and different to others.

translation.cy: Gallaf adnabod trobwyntiau arwyddocaol sy’n dylanwadu ar newid mewn cymdeithas ac egluro sut y gallant gael effeithiau cadarnhaol a negyddol ar fywydau pobl.
translation.en: I can identify signiﬁcant turning points that inﬂuence change in society and explain how these can have positive and negative effects on people’s lives.

translation.cy: Gallaf ddeall fod tensiynau o fewn cymunedau a chymdeithasau, a gallaf ymateb yn sensitif wrth drafod y materion dadleuol hyn.
translation.en: I can understand that there are tensions within communities and societies, and I can respond sensitively when discussing them.

translation.cy: Gallaf werthuso arwyddocâd y perthnasau rhwng amrywiaeth eang o gymdeithasau,eu cysylltiadau a’u cyd-ddibyniaethau.
translation.en: I can evaluate the signiﬁcance of the relationships between a wide range of societies,their connections and interdependencies.

translation.cy: Yr Hyn sy’n Bwysig yn y Dyniaethau Cwricwlwm Drafft i Gymru 2022:
translation.en: What Matters in Humanities Draft Curriculum for Wales 2022:

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn awgrymu ymhle gellid ystyried gwahanol elfennau o ddysgu gyda’i gilydd er mwyn cefnogi dysgusy’n fwy holistaidd.
translation.en: It also suggests where different elements of learning could be considered together in order to support more holistic learning.

translation.cy: Mae datblygu meddwl ymholgar yn galluogi dysgwyr i archwilio ac ymchwilio i’r byd,i’w orffennol, ei bresennol a’i ddyfodol, drostynt eu hunain.
translation.en: Developing an enquiring mind enables learners to explore and investigate the world, past, present and future, for themselves.

translation.cy: Mae’r byd naturiol yn amrywiol a deinamig, ac mae dylanwad prosesau fﬁsegol a gweithredoedd dynol arno.
translation.en: Our natural world is diverse and dynamic, inﬂuenced by physical processes and human actions.

translation.cy: • Effaith gymharol gwahanol gymdeithasau ar wahanol adegau ar y byd naturiol.
translation.en: • The relative impact of different societies at different times on the natural world.

translation.cy: • Sut mae’r byd naturiol wedi effeithio ar esblygiad cymdeithasau dynol ac wedi cyfrannu at newid.
translation.en: • How the natural world has impacted upon the evolution of human societies and contributed towards change.

translation.cy: • Pwysigrwydd y celfyddydau mynegiannol wrth lywio diwylliant a chymdeithasau yn y gorffennol a’r presennol.
translation.en: • The importance of expressive arts in shaping culture and societies in the past and present.

translation.cy: • Gwerthoedd a normau cymdeithasol mewn cymdeithasau.
translation.en: • Social values and norms in societies.

translation.cy: • Sut mae pobl yn canfod ac yn dehongli digwyddiadau a phroﬁadau mewn gwahanol ffyrdd.
translation.en: • How individuals perceive and interpret events and experiences in different ways.

translation.cy: • Dylanwad llenyddiaeth wrth lywio diwylliant mewn cymdeithasau.
translation.en: • The inﬂuence of literature in shaping culture in societies.

translation.cy: • cyﬂeoedd i archwilio a gwerthfawrogi dathliadau, traddodiadau a ffyrdd o fyw allweddol yng Nghymru a’r byd ehangach
translation.en: • opportunities to explore and appreciate key celebrations, traditions and ways of life in Wales and the wider world

translation.cy: • archwilio ac arsylwi ar agweddau ar eu cymuned a’u hardal leol
translation.en: • observe and explore aspects of their community and local area

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr broﬁ:
translation.en: Learners need to experience:

translation.cy: • cyﬂeoedd i archwilio ac arsylwi ar agweddau ar y cymunedau y maent yn rhan ohonynt, megis eu hystafell ddosbarth, ysgol, teulu ac ardal leol, a hynny drwy straeon, dathliadau, gwrthrychau, digwyddiadau a thraddodiadau, ac i gyﬂeu eu teimladau amdanynt
translation.en: • opportunities to explore and observe aspects of the communities they are a part of, such as their classroom, school, family and local area, through stories, celebrations, objects, events and traditions, and to communicate their feelings about them

translation.cy: • dysgu yn yr awyr agored a chyﬂeoedd i ymweld ag amgueddfeydd; saﬂeoedd hanesyddol; mannau o arwyddocâd gwleidyddol, crefyddol neu ysbrydol; nodweddion neu saﬂeoedd daearyddol; a busnesau neu fanwerthwyr.
translation.en: • outdoor learning and opportunities to visit museums; historical sites; places of political,religious or spiritual signiﬁcance; geographical features or sites; and businesses or retailers.

translation.cy: • am hanes ac amrywiaeth y cymunedau a’r cymdeithasau y maent yn rhan ohonynt
translation.en: • about the history and diversity of the communities and societies of which they are part

translation.cy: • sut a pham y mae cymdeithasau a bywydau pobl wedi newid neu wedi aros yr un peth, a gallu esbonio a llunio barn am effaith newid a pharhad
translation.en: • how and why societies and people’s lives have changed or stayed the same, and be able to explain and make judgements about the signiﬁcance of change and continuity

translation.cy: • am yr ystod o ffyrdd y gall amrywiol gymunedau gyd-fyw’n gydweithredol er budd pawb
translation.en: • about a range of ways in which diverse communities can live together cooperatively for the common good

translation.cy: • am ffyrdd y mynegir ymrwymiad a hunaniaeth
translation.en: • about ways in which commitment and identity are expressed

translation.cy: • am natur a hyd a lled newid dros amser, gan gynnwys am newidiadau mewn systemau ac arweinyddiaeth gwleidyddol, ynghyd â democratiaeth a datganoli; newidiadau mewn amaethyddiaeth a diwydiant; arloesi a datblygiadau technolegol; goresgyniad, protest a gwrthryfel; heddwch a gwrthdaro; newidiadau mewn poblogaeth a mudo; masnach.
translation.en: • about the nature and extent of change over time, including about changing political systems and leadership, along with democracy and devolution; industrial and agricultural change; innovation and technological development; invasion, protest and rebellion; peace and conﬂict; population change and migration; trade.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr allu:
translation.en: Learners should be able to:

translation.cy: • disgriﬁo ac egluro nodweddion ystod o wahanol gymdeithasau, gan gynnwys yr hyn sy’n debyg ac yn wahanol rhyngddynt, a hynny yn y gorffennol a’r presennol, yng Nghymru, y Deyrnas Unedig, Ewrop a rhannau eraill o’r byd
translation.en: • describe and explain characteristics of a range of different societies, including their similarities and differences, both in the past and present, in Wales, the United Kingdom, Europe and other parts of the world

translation.cy: • cyﬂeoedd i archwilio ac ymgysylltu â’u cymunedau a thu hwnt, drwy straeon, dathliadau,gwrthrychau, digwyddiadau a thraddodiadau, a chyﬂeu eu teimladau amdanynt
translation.en: • opportunities to explore and engage with their communities and beyond, through stories, celebrations, objects, events and traditions, and to communicate their feelings about them

translation.cy: • yr hyn sy’n debyg ac yn wahanol rhwng cymdeithasau yn y gorffennol a’r presennol yng Nghymru, y Deyrnas Unedig, Ewrop a rhannau eraill o’r byd
translation.en: • the similarities and differences between societies in the past and present in Wales, the United Kingdom, Europe and in other parts of the world

translation.en: They will also come to understand the nature of economic, environmental and social sustainability, justice, interconnectedness and authority, and realise the signiﬁcance of living in and contributing to a fairer and more inclusive society.

translation.en: I can recognise that my actions and those of others have consequences.

translation.en: • Developing relationships to support citizenship.

translation.en: • Understanding rights, respect and equity.

translation.en: From this, learners will appreciate the signiﬁcance of Wales and Welsh culture and strengthen the understanding of Welsh identity in the world.

translation.en: Learner voice is considered and learners are empowered to take ownership of their learning by helping to plan the nature of their experiences.

translation.en: They will explore how the Expressive Arts are used to shape and express their personal, social and cultural identities.

translation.cy: Nid yw’n broses sy’n dilyn trywydd unionsyth, ac nid oes un llwybr sy’n gyffredin i bawb.
translation.en: It is not a linear process and there is not one common pathway.

translation.en: Deep learning can support learning descriptions in the achievement outcomes to be met securely.

translation.en: Current proposals for legislation are that there will be a duty on headteachers to set achievement outcomes for each progression step.

translation.en: These aspects of learning may apply across the continuum of learning, or be sequenced against speciﬁc progression steps, depending on the area of learning and experience.

translation.en: The statements of experiences, knowledge and skills are not exhaustive but are provided in support of the what matters statements, as a common starting point for curriculum design and development in settings and schools, and in support of the learning expressed through the achievement outcomes.

translation.en: The new curriculum should provide learners with the means by which to imagine both Wales’ future and their own roles in its unfolding story.

translation.cy: Mae persbectif rhyngwladol yn cynnig cyﬂeoedd i ddysgwyr ystyried eu rolau a’u cyfrifoldebau fel dinasyddion byd-eang sy’n byw mewn cymdeithas amrywiol o ran diwylliant ac iaith, ac ymatebi’r heriau wrth anelu at ddyfodol cynaliadwy a theg.
translation.en: An international perspective offers opportunities for learners to reﬂect on their roles and responsibilities as global citizens living in a culturally and linguistically diverse society, and to respond to the challenges of working towards a sustainable and equitable future.

translation.en: What is the purpose of assessment?

translation.cy: Rydym yn defnyddio dulliau asesu i nodi a chefnogi cynnydd mewn dysgu ar gyfer pob un o’n dysgwyr, i weld pa mor dda y maent yn dysgu, yr hyn y maent yn ei ddeall ac yn gallu ei wneud, unrhyw gamdybiaethau, a datblygu dealltwriaeth o’u hanghenion unigol er mwyn nodi’r camau nesaf mwyaf priodol i symud eu dysgu yn ei ﬂaen.
translation.en: Assessment is how we recognise and support progress in learning for all of our learners, to know how well they are learning, what they understand and are able to do, any misconceptions, and to develop an understanding of learners’ individual needs in order to identify the most appropriate next steps for them to move their learning forward.

translation.cy: • Dylai asesu ddarparu gwybodaeth berthnasol a chymesur am gynnydd a llwyddiant mewn perthynas â’r dysgu a fwriedir.
translation.en: • Assessment should provide relevant and proportionate information about progress and success in relation to all the intended learning.

translation.cy: Sut y dylem ddefnyddio asesu?

translation.cy: O bryd i’w gilydd, efallai y bydd ymarferwyr hefyd yn dymuno crynhoi cyﬂawniadau’r dysgwyr, gan roi gwybodaeth iddynt am yr hyn y maent wedi ei ddysgu, gan ganolbwyntio ar natur gronnus eu cynnydd ar ddiwedd cyfnod o gyfarwyddiadau, archwilio neu brosiect.
translation.en: From time to time, practitioners may also wish to sum up a learner’s achievements, giving them insights into what they have learned, focusing on the cumulative nature of their progress at the end of a period of instruction, exploration or project.

translation.cy: Cynnydd a Chwricwlwm i Gymru 2022’, ni ddylai’r deilliannau cyﬂawniad a ddifﬁnnir ar bob cam cynnydd gael eu defnyddio i ddod i farn sy’n cyd-fynd orau ar gyfer oedran penodol neu adeg benodol er mwyn llunio asesiad crynodol ffurﬁol o ddysgwr.
translation.en: Progression and Curriculum for Wales 2022’, achievement outcomes articulated at each progression step are not to be used to make a best-ﬁt judgement at a set age or point in time to produce a formal summative assessment of a learner.

translation.en: Moderation provides opportunities for professional dialogue between practitioners to ensure understanding of progression and that the appropriate methods are selected from a range of techniques to assess what is intended to be learned.

translation.en: We will tackle inequalities between communities and deliver more services closer to home, acknowledging the importance of communities and the wider environment for good health and well-being.

translation.cy: Os ymddengys nad oes angen rhoi unrhyw esboniad neu sylw ar ddarpariaeth unigol yn y Ddeddf, nis rhoddir.
translation.en: Where an individual provision of the Act does not seem to require any explanation or comment, none is given.

translation.cy: Mae’r Ddeddf yn gwneud darpariaeth ynghylch dehongli a gweithredu deddfwriaeth Cymru, ac yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i’r Cwnsler Cyffredinol a Gweinidogion Cymru gymryd camau i wella hygyrchedd cyfraith Cymru:
translation.en: The Act makes provision about the interpretation and operation of Welsh legislation, and requires the Counsel General and the Welsh Ministers to take steps to improve the accessibility of Welsh law:

translation.cy: c. Mae Rhan 3 yn rhoi pwerau i Weinidogion Cymru i ddisodli disgrifiadau o ddyddiadau yn neddfwriaeth Cymru ac i wneud is-ddeddfwriaeth ar ffurfiau gwahanol, ac mae’n darparu ar gyfer cyfuno is-ddeddfwriaeth sy’n ddarostyngedig i weithdrefnau gwahanol yng Nghynulliad Cenedlaethol Cymru.
translation.en: c. Part 3 gives the Welsh Ministers powers to replace descriptions of dates in Welsh legislation and to make subordinate legislation in different forms, and provides for the combination of subordinate legislation that is subject to different procedures in the National Assembly for Wales.

translation.cy: Mae’r Ddeddf yn rhan o raglen ehangach Llywodraeth Cymru o wella hygyrchedd cyfraith Cymru ac egluro a symleiddio gweithrediad deddfwriaeth Cymru.
translation.en: The Act forms part of the Welsh Government’s wider programme of improving the accessibility of Welsh law and clarifying and simplifying the operation of Welsh legislation.

translation.cy: Yn ei adroddiad Ffurf a Hygyrchedd y Gyfraith sy’n Gymwys yng Nghymru (Comisiwn y Gyfraith Rhif 336, Mehefin 2016), argymhellodd Comisiwn y Gyfraith y dylai Llywodraeth Cymru ddilyn polisi o gydgrynhoi a chodeiddio’r gyfraith yng Nghymru.
translation.en: In its report Form and Accessibility of the Law Applicable in Wales (Law Com No 336, June 2016), the Law Commission recommended that the Welsh Government should pursue a policy of consolidating and codifying the law in Wales.

translation.cy: Argymhellodd Comisiwn y Gyfraith hefyd fod Llywodraeth Cymru a’r Cynulliad Cenedlaethol yn ystyried, ac yn adolygu’n gyson, y manteision ymarferol o gyflwyno Deddf Dehongli i Gymru, a gwnaeth argymhellion pellach a oedd yn ymwneud ag ansawdd deddfwriaeth, ei chyhoeddi a’i hargaeledd.
translation.en: The Law Commission also recommended that the Welsh Government and the National Assembly consider, and keep under review, the practical benefits of introducing an Interpretation Act for Wales, and made further recommendations relating to the quality, publication and availability of legislation.

translation.cy: RHAN 1:
translation.en: PART 1:

translation.cy: Felly, dylai strwythur deddfwriaeth fod yn glir, yn gyson ac yn gydlynol; a hynny o fewn deddfiadau unigol yn ogystal ag ar draws deddfiadau ar bynciau penodol a’r llyfr statud yn gyfan.
translation.en: So the structure of legislation should be clear, consistent and coherent; both within individual enactments and across enactments on particular subjects and the statute book as a whole.

translation.cy: Yr elfen olaf yw’r graddau y mae’r gyfraith yn hawdd ei deall ac yn sicr ei heffaith.
translation.en: The final element is the extent to which the law is easy to understand and certain in its effect.

translation.cy: Mae hyn hefyd yn cynnwys argaeledd deunydd esboniadol neu sylwebaeth arall sy’n gallu helpu pobl i ddeall y gyfraith.
translation.en: This also includes the availability of other explanatory material or commentary that can help people to understand the law.

translation.cy: Adran 2 – Rhaglen i wella hygyrchedd cyfraith Cymru
translation.en: Section 2 – Programme to improve accessibility of Welsh law

translation.cy: Yng Nghymru, bydd cydgrynhoi’r gyfraith yn golygu gan amlaf ailddeddfu cyfreithiau a wnaed gan Senedd y Deyrnas Unedig yn flaenorol, a gwneud hyn yn ddwyieithog.
translation.en: In Wales consolidation of the law will involve for the most part re-enacting laws previously made by the UK Parliament, and doing so bilingually.

translation.cy: Mae adran 2(8) yn darparu bod y cyfeiriadau at godeiddio cyfraith Cymru yn adran 2(3) yn cynnwys mabwysiadu strwythur ar gyfer cyfraith Cymru sy’n gwella ei hygyrchedd, a threfnu a chyhoeddi cyfraith Cymru sydd wedi ei chydgrynhoi yn ôl y strwythur hwnnw.
translation.en: Section 2(8) provides that the references to codifying Welsh law in section 2(3) include adopting a structure for Welsh law that improves its accessibility, and organising and publishing consolidated Welsh law according to that structure.

translation.cy: Bwriedir i hyn gynnwys hwyluso’r iaith yn y gyfraith, mewn gweinyddiaeth gyhoeddus ac yn fwy cyffredinol.
translation.en: This is intended to include facilitation of the language in the law, in public administration and more generally.

translation.cy: Gellid ychwanegu prosiectau newydd, neu efallai ddileu prosiectau presennol pe gwelid nad oeddent yn addas i’w cydgrynhoi yn sgil diwygio deddfwriaethol cysylltiedig.
translation.en: New projects could be added, or perhaps existing projects removed if they were found not to be suitable for consolidation in light of related legislative reform.

translation.cy: Mae Rhan 2 yn gymwys i’r Ddeddf ei hun, i Ddeddfau’r Cynulliad a gaiff y Cydsyniad Brenhinol ar ôl i Ran 2 ddod i rym yn llawn, ac i is-offerynnau Cymreig a wneir ar ôl i Ran 2 ddod i rym yn llawn.
translation.en: Part 2 applies to the Act itself, to Assembly Acts that receive Royal Assent after Part 2 comes fully into force, and to Welsh subordinate instruments made after Part 2 comes fully into force.

translation.cy: Pan fo is-ddeddfwriaeth yn cael ei gwneud o dan Ddeddf Cynulliad a ddeddfir ar ôl i Ran 2 o’r Ddeddf ddod i rym, bydd Rhan 2 yn gymwys i’r rhiant-Ddeddf ac i’r is- ddeddfwriaeth.
translation.en: Where subordinate legislation is made under an Assembly Act enacted after Part 2 of the Act comes into force, Part 2 will apply to both the parent Act and the subordinate legislation.

translation.cy: Diffinnir y “devolved Welsh authorities” y mae paragraff (b) yn cyfeirio atynt yn adran 157A o Ddeddf Llywodraeth Cymru 2006, ac mae’n cynnwys yr holl gyrff sydd wedi eu rhestru yn Atodlen 9A i’r Ddeddf honno.
translation.en: The “devolved Welsh authorities” to which paragraph (b) refers are defined in section 157A of the Government of Wales Act 2006, and include all of the bodies listed in Schedule 9A to that Act.

translation.cy: Felly, nid yw “is- offerynnau Cymreig” yn cynnwys offerynnau a wneir ar y cyd gan Weinidogion Cymru ac Ysgrifennydd Gwladol, neu offerynnau “cyfansawdd” y mae Gweinidogion Cymru yn deddfu dros Gymru ac y mae Ysgrifennydd Gwladol yn deddfu dros Loegr ynddynt.
translation.en: Therefore “Welsh subordinate instruments” do not include instruments made jointly by the Welsh Ministers and a Secretary of State, or “composite” instruments in which the Welsh Ministers legislate for Wales and a Secretary of State legislates for England.

translation.cy: Yn yr achos hwnnw, mae paragraff (a) yn ei gwneud yn glir na fyddai’r diffiniad yn Atodlen 1 yn gymwys.
translation.en: In that case, paragraph (a) makes clear that the definition in Schedule 1 would not apply.

translation.cy: Adran 6 ac Atodlen 1 – Diffiniadau o eiriau ac ymadroddion
translation.en: Section 6 and Schedule 1 – Definitions of words and expressions

translation.cy: Ar y llaw arall, mae’n cynnwys rhai termau nad ydynt yn ymddangos yn Atodlen 1 i Ddeddf 1978 ond sy’n debygol o fod yn berthnasol i ddeddfwriaeth Cymru, megis “Gweinidogion Cymru”.
translation.en: On the other hand, it includes some terms that do not appear in Schedule 1 to the 1978 Act but which are likely to be relevant to Welsh legislation, such as “Welsh Ministers”.

translation.cy: Adran 7 – Mae geiriau yn y ffurf unigol yn cynnwys y ffurf luosog ac fel arall
translation.en: Section 7 – Words in the singular include the plural and vice versa

translation.cy: Mewn perthynas â thestun Cymraeg deddfwriaeth, bydd yr adran hon yn ei gwneud yn glir bod diffiniad neu ystyr yn gymwys er gwaethaf unrhyw oleddfiadau ar air neu amrywiadau ar ymadrodd sy’n codi oherwydd rheolau ynghylch trefn geiriau a strwythur brawddegau.
translation.en: In relation to the Welsh language text of legislation, this section will make it clear that a definition or meaning applies regardless of any mutations of a word, or variations of an expression arising due to rules about word order and sentence structure.

translation.cy: Mae’n cyfateb i adran 10 o Ddeddf 1978.
translation.en: It corresponds to section 10 of the 1978 Act.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (1) yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i’r anfonwr “cyfeirio’n briodol” y llythyr sy’n cynnwys y ddogfen.
translation.en: Subsection (1) requires the sender to “properly address” the letter containing the document.

translation.cy: Ni fwriedir iddi ganiatáu i ddogfen gael ei hanfon yn electronig drwy anfon dolen i ddogfen a ddelir ar y rhyngrwyd at rywun, y mae rhaid i’r derbynnydd wedyn gymryd camau pellach i gael gafael arni.
translation.en: It is not intended to allow service to be effected electronically by sending someone a link to a document hosted on the internet, which the recipient must then take further steps to access.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn cyfateb i adran 13 o Ddeddf 1978, ond mae’n cynnwys nifer o wahaniaethau y bwriedir iddynt egluro ei chwmpas.
translation.en: This section is equivalent to section 13 of the 1978 Act, but it contains a number of differences intended to clarify its scope.

translation.cy: Bydd adran 13 o Ddeddf 1978 yn parhau i fod yn gymwys i bwerau a roddir ac i ddyletswyddau a osodir gan Ddeddfau’r Cynulliad a gaiff y Cydsyniad Brenhinol cyn i Ran 2 o’r Ddeddf hon ddod i rym, a chan is-ddeddfwriaeth a wneir cyn hynny.

translation.en: It has effect except to the extent that express provision is made to the contrary or the context requires otherwise.

translation.en: It provides general powers to amend, revoke and re-enact subordinate legislation.

translation.cy: Mae adran 20 yn dileu unrhyw amheuaeth ynghylch a ellir amrywio cyfarwyddydau neu eu tynnu’n ôl, ac yn osgoi’r angen i gael darpariaeth ddatganedig am hyn bob tro y crëir pŵer neu ddyletswydd i roi cyfarwyddydau.
translation.en: Section 20 removes any doubt about whether directions can be varied or withdrawn, and avoids the need to state this expressly every time a power or duty to give directions is created.

translation.en: For this purpose, an “enactment” has an extended meaning and includes any of the types of legislation that may apply in the United Kingdom.

Mae’n galluogi darllenwyr deddfwriaeth Cymru i benderfynu, pan fo’r ddeddfwriaeth honno yn cyfeirio at Ddeddf, at ba “argraffiad” o’r Ddeddf honno y cyfeirir.

translation.cy: Yn yr achos hwn, mae’r cyfeiriad yn Neddf 3 yn gyfeiriad at Ddeddf 1 fel y’i diwygiwyd gan Ddeddf 2.
translation.en: In this case, the reference in Act 3 is a reference to Act 1 as amended by Act 2.

translation.cy: Diffinnir “offeryn UE” yn Atodlen 1, a’i ystyr yw unrhyw offeryn a ddyroddir gan unrhyw sefydliad o’r UE, ond o’r diwrnod ymadael ymlaen mae’n eithrio unrhyw ddeddfwriaeth uniongyrchol UE a ddargedwir.
translation.en: “EU instrument” is defined in Schedule 1, and means any instrument issued by any institution of the European Union, but from exit day onwards it excludes any retained direct EU legislation.

translation.cy: (Os yw’n cyfeirio at ddeddfwriaeth uniongyrchol UE a ddargedwir, bydd adran 25 yn gymwys yn lle hynny.)
translation.en: (If it refers to retained direct EU legislation, section 25 will apply instead.)

translation.cy: Mae adran 27 yn gymwys pan fo ymddygiad yn drosedd o dan ddwy neu ragor o wahanol Ddeddfau neu offerynnau y mae Rhan 2 yn gymwys iddynt, neu’n drosedd o dan un neu ragor o Ddeddfau neu offerynnau y mae Rhan 2 yn gymwys iddynt yn ogystal â’r gyfraith gyffredin.
translation.en: Section 27 applies where conduct is an offence under two or more different Acts or instruments to which Part 2 applies, or is an offence under one or more Acts or instruments to which Part 2 applies as well as the common law.

translation.cy: Y rheol felly ar gyfer is-offerynnau Cymreig yw eu bod yn rhwymo’r Goron ble bynnag y mae’n bosibl iddynt wneud hynny.
translation.en: The rule for Welsh subordinate instruments is therefore that they bind the Crown wherever it is possible for them to do so.

translation.cy: Mae adran 28(3) yn gwneud darpariaeth gyffredinol i’r perwyl hwn mewn perthynas â Deddfau’r Cynulliad ac is-offerynnau Cymreig (unwaith eto, yn ddarostyngedig i unrhyw ddarpariaeth ddatganedig i’r gwrthwyneb).
translation.en: Section 28(3) makes general provision to this effect in relation to Assembly Acts and Welsh subordinate instruments (again, subject to any express provision to the contrary).

translation.cy: Y sefyllfa gyffredinol yn ôl y gyfraith gyffredin yw bod effaith diwygiad i’w phenderfynu drwy ddehongli’r ddeddfwriaeth sydd wedi cael ei diwygio, yn hytrach na’r ddeddfwriaeth ddiwygio14.
translation.en: The general position at common law is that the effect of an amendment is to be determined by interpreting the legislation that has been amended, rather than the amending legislation6.

translation.cy: Gan mai anaml y dymunir y canlyniad hwn yn ymarferol, mae adran 33 yn darparu nad yw Deddf 3 yn adfer Deddf 1 o dan yr amgylchiadau uchod.
translation.en: As this is rarely the desired outcome in practice, section 33 provides that in the above circumstances Act 3 does not revive Act 1.

translation.cy: Mae’r nodiadau hyn yn cyfeirio at Ddeddf Deddfwriaeth (Cymru) 2019 (dccc 4) a gafodd y Cydsyniad Brenhinol ar 10 Medi 2019

translation.cy: Unwaith eto, y sefyllfa yn y gyfraith gyffredin fyddai i Ddeddf 2 adfer y rheol a oedd wedi ei dileu.
translation.en: Again, the common law position would be that Act 2 revived the rule that had been abolished.

translation.cy: Mae adran 33 yn ddarostyngedig i adran 4(1)(a) o’r Ddeddf, ond nid yw’n ddarostyngedig i adran 4(1)(b); felly os mai’r bwriad yw na ddylai’r rheol yn adran 33 fod yn gymwys mewn perthynas â diddymiad neu ddirymiad penodol, bydd angen cynnwys geiriau datganedig er mwyn adfer y deddfiad cynharach neu’r rheol gynharach (yn hytrach na dibynnu ar y cyd-destun).
translation.en: Section 33 is subject to section 4(1)(a) of the Act, but not to section 4(1)(b); so if the intention is that the rule in section 33 should not apply in relation to a particular repeal or revocation, express words will be needed to revive the earlier enactment or rule (rather than relying on the context).

translation.cy: Mae adran 34 yn cael effaith ac eithrio i’r graddau y mae darpariaeth ddatganedig yn cael ei gwneud i’r gwrthwyneb neu y mae’r cyd-destun yn mynnu fel arall.
translation.en: Section 34 has effect except to the extent that express provision is made to the contrary or the context requires otherwise.

translation.cy: Mae adran 35 yn cyfateb i adran 17(2) o Ddeddf 1978, ond mae rhai gwahaniaethau rhyngddynt.
translation.en: Section 35 is equivalent to section 17(2) of the 1978 Act, but there are some differences between them.

translation.cy: Bydd adran 35 yn gweithredu pan fo un Ddeddf Cynulliad neu un is-offeryn Cymreig yn darparu ar gyfer y diddymiad, a phan fo Deddf Cynulliad wahanol neu is-offeryn Cymreig gwahanol yn darparu ar gyfer yr ailddeddfiad.
translation.en: Section 35 will operate where the repeal is provided for in one Assembly Act or Welsh subordinate instrument, and the re-enactment is provided for in a different Assembly Act or Welsh subordinate instrument.

translation.cy: Mae adran 37 yn gwneud darpariaeth ynghylch ystyr cyfeiriadau at ddiddymu a dirymu deddfwriaeth yn Rhan 2.
translation.en: Section 37 makes provision about the meaning of references to the repeal and revocation of legislation in Part 2.

translation.cy: Pan fo dyddiad yn cael ei fewnosod, gall fod yn ddefnyddiol i ddarllenwyr wybod arwyddocâd y dyddiad hwnnw.
translation.en: Where a date is inserted, readers may find it helpful to know the significance of that date.

translation.cy: Felly, mae adran 38(2) yn galluogi i reoliadau o dan adran 38(1) ychwanegu esboniad o’r dyddiad y maent yn ei fewnosod.
translation.en: Section 38(2) therefore enables regulations under section 38(1) to add an explanation of the date they insert.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, gallai fod yn ddefnyddiol weithiau roi “1 Ionawr 2018 (y diwrnod y daeth adran 10 i rym)” yn lle “y diwrnod y daw adran 10 i rym”.
translation.en: For example, it might sometimes be helpful to replace “the day on which section 10 comes into force” with “1 January 2018 (the day on which section 10 came into force)”.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (2) hefyd yn rhoi pŵer i wneud diwygiadau, diddymiadau a dirymiadau canlyniadol.
translation.en: Subsection (2) also confers a power to make consequential amendments, repeals and revocations.

translation.cy: Adran 39 – Pŵer i wneud is-ddeddfwriaeth ar ffurfiau gwahanol
translation.en: Section 39 – Power to make subordinate legislation in different forms

translation.cy: Bwriedir i adran 39 unioni’r sefyllfa pan fo’n angenrheidiol gwneud nifer o wahanol reoliadau, rheolau neu orchmynion er mwyn rhoi effaith i un polisi.
translation.en: Section 39 is intended to remedy the situation where it is necessary to make a number of different regulations, rules or orders to give effect to a single policy.

translation.cy: Mae llawer o Ddeddfau eisoes yn ystyried cyfuno, mewn un offeryn, is- ddeddfwriaeth a wneir o dan bwerau gwahanol o fewn yr un Ddeddf, hyd yn oed pan fyddai’r pwerau hynny fel arfer yn ddarostyngedig i weithdrefnau gwahanol.
translation.en: Many Acts already contemplate the combination in a single instrument of subordinate legislation made under different powers within the same Act, even where those powers would normally attract different procedures.

translation.cy: Diben adran 40 yw hwyluso cyfuno mewn un offeryn statudol ddarpariaethau sy’n ddarostyngedig i weithdrefnau gwahanol, pa un a ydynt wedi eu gwneud o dan bwerau yn yr un Ddeddf neu mewn Deddfau gwahanol, ac er mwyn osgoi unrhyw drafferthion gweithdrefnol a fyddai’n cael eu hachosi drwy gyfuno darpariaethau yn y ffordd hon.
translation.en: The purpose of section 40 is to facilitate the combination in a single statutory instrument of provisions that are subject to different procedures, whether they are made under powers in the same Act or different Acts, and to avoid any procedural difficulties that would be caused by combining provisions in this way.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, ni fydd adran 11 o Ddeddf 1978, sy’n darparu bod yr un ystyr i eiriau mewn is-ddeddfwriaeth ag sydd iddynt yn y rhiant-Ddeddf, yn gymwys i offerynnau sy’n ddarostyngedig i Ran 2.
translation.en: However, section 11 of the 1978 Act, which provides that words have the same meaning in subordinate legislation as they have in the parent Act, will not apply to instruments that are subject to Part 2.

translation.cy: Mae’r camau galluogi a amlinellir yn y cynllun gweithredu dros dro yn cyd-fynd â Safonau’r Gymraeg a’r nod yw y byddant gyda’i gilydd yn gwella gwasanaethau Cymraeg ymhellach – gwasanaethau sy’n canolbwyntio ar y claf ac sy’n adeiladu ar yr hyn a gyﬂawnwyd eisoes.
translation.en: The enabling actions outlined in the interim action plan sits alongside the Welsh language standards and together they aim to deliver further improvements in Welsh language services that are patient centred and build on what has already been achieved.

translation.cy: Daeth Safonau’r Gymraeg ar gyfer awdurdodau lleol (ac felly eu swyddogaeth gwasanaethau cymdeithasol) i rym ar 30 Mawrth 2016 a bydd y Safonau ar gyfer y sector iechyd yn dod irym ar 30 Mai 2019.

translation.cy: Gwelwyd llawer o gynnydd ers cyflwyno'r Ddeddf, gydag arweinyddiaeth a gwelliannau mewn diogelu yn cael eu llywio gan y Byrddau Diogelu a'r Bwrdd Diogelu Annibynnol Cenedlaethol.
translation.en: There has been much progress since the introduction of the Act with leadership and improvements in safeguarding driven by the Safeguarding Boards and the National Independent Safeguarding Board.

translation.cy: Camfanteisio'n rhywiol ar blant –
translation.en: Child Sexual Exploitation (CSE) -

translation.cy: Mae hwn yn fath o gamdrin rhywiol sy'n gallu cynnwys rhyw neu unrhyw fath o weithgaredd rhywiol â phlentyn;
translation.en: that can includesex or any form of sexual activity with a child;

translation.cy: Herio agweddau cyhoeddus tuag at gam-drin plant yn rhywiol a chefnogi diwylliant lle nad yw siarad am gam-drin plant yn rhywiol yn cael ei ystyried yn bwnc na siaradir amdano mewn modd y gall cyflawnwyr gamfanteisio arno.
translation.en: Challenge public attitudes towards CSA and support a culture where talking about CSA is not seen as a taboo subject in a way that can be exploited by perpetrators.

translation.cy: Mwy o ymwybyddiaeth ymhlith plant o bwysigrwydd cydberthnasau diogel, cyfartal ac iach a bod ymddygiad camdriniol bob amser yn anghywir.
translation.en: Increased awareness in children of the importance of safe, equal and healthy relationships and that abusive behaviour is always wrong.

translation.cy: Ar yr un pryd, cafodd sesiynau dysgu i rieni/gofalwyr ac ymarferwyr sy'n gweithio gyda phlant a theuluoedd eu cynnal ar draws chwe rhanbarth y Byrddau Diogelu Plant.
translation.en: Simultaneously, learning sessions for parents/carers and practitioners who work with children and families were delivered across each of the six Safeguarding Children Board regions.

translation.cy: Mae Llywodraeth Cymru yn bwriadu comisiynu adnoddau a digwyddiadau dysgu i wella dealltwriaeth ymarferwyr a rhieni/gofalwyr.
translation.en: The Welsh Government intends to commission resources and learning events to improve understanding for practitioners and for parent/carers.

translation.cy: Bydd cefnogi dealltwriaeth well o gam-drin plant yn rhywiol ymhlith plant, rhieni/gofalwyr nad ydynt yn cam-drin ac ymarferwyr o gymorth i adnabod mwy o achosion a chael mwy o ddatgeliadau fel y gall plant gael eu hamddiffyn cyn gynted â phosibl.
translation.en: Supporting a better understanding of CSA for children, non-abusing parent/carers and practitioners will support increased identification and disclosure so that children can be protected at the earliest opportunity.

translation.cy: Am y tro cyntaf, gwnaeth Arolwg Troseddu Cymru a Lloegr 2015 i 2016 redeg modiwl o gwestiynau a oedd yn gofyn i oedolion a oeddent wedi cael eu cam-drin pan oeddent yn blant.4  Holwyd i oroeswyr a nododd eu bod wedi dioddef ymosodiadau rhywiol pan oeddent yn blant drwy dreisiad neu dreiddiad (gan gynnwys ymgeisiau) a wnaethant ddweud wrth unrhyw un am yr hyn a oedd yn digwydd iddynt ar adeg y cam-drin.
translation.en: The 2015 to 2016Crime Survey for England and Wales ran for the first time a module of questions asking adults whether they were abused as a child.4  Survivors who reported childhood sexual assault by rape or penetration (including attempts) were asked whether they told anyone about what was happening to them at the time of the abuse.

translation.cy: Ni wnaeth ychydig o dan dri chwarter o'r goroeswyr (74%) ddweud wrth unrhyw un am y cam-drin ar yr adeg yr oedd y camdrin yn digwydd.
translation.en: Just under three-quarters (74%) of survivors did not tell anyone about the abuse at the time the abuse occurred.

translation.cy: Mae oedolion sydd wedi goroesi wedi dweud wrthym nad oedd unrhyw wybodaeth ar gael i'w helpu i ddeall yr hyn a allai ddigwydd mewn gwirionedd pe bai nhw'n dweud wrth rywun am y cam-drin.
translation.en: Adult survivors have told us that there was no information available to them to help them understand what would really happen if they told someone about the abuse.

translation.cy: Mae tystiolaeth gan PACEyn nodi bod rhieni a gofalwyr plant sydd wedi'u heffeithio gan gamfanteisio'n rhywiol ar blant wedi adrodd 'dioddefwr yn beio'r teulu',  teimlo nad ydynt yn cael eu cefnogi i reoli effaith emosiynol rhianta plentyn sydd wedi'i gam-drin trwy gamfanteisio'n rhywiol ar blant, a theimlo nad oes unrhyw un yn gwrando arnynt nac yn eu cymryd o ddifrif.Bydd Llywodraeth Cymru yn datblygu adnoddau ar gyfer teuluoedd a gofalwyr maeth ynghylch camfanteisio'n rhywiol ar blant, gydag awgrymiadau ymarferol ar beth i'w wneud i reoli camfanteisio'n rhywiol ar blant o fewn y teulu a gwybodaeth am yr hyn sy'n mynd i ddigwydd, pwy allai fod yn gysylltiedig â'r achos, ac o le y gallant gael cymorth.
translation.en: Evidence from  PACEsets out that parents and carers of children affected by CSE have reported ‘victim family blaming’ ;  feeling unsupported in managing the emotional impact of parenting a child abused through CSE and of feeling that they are not listened to or taken seriously.The Welsh Government will develop resources for families and foster carers about CSE, with practical tips on what to do to managing CSE within the family and information on what is going to happen, who may be involved, and where they can access support.

translation.cy: Gwnaeth Llywodraeth Cymru ddarparu cyllid i'r NSPCC yn 2018 i gefnogi'r gwaith o greu adnoddaua chynnal sesiynau codi ymwybyddiaeth i gefnogi ymarferwyr wrth ymateb i ddatgeliad o gam-drin plant yn rhywiol.
translation.en: The Welsh Government provided funding to the NSPCC in 2018 to support the production of resourcesand awareness raising sessions to support practitioners in responding to disclosure of CSA.

translation.cy: Mae ymchwilio i honiadau o gam-drin plant yn gam hollbwysig yn yr ymdrech i amddiffyn plant.
translation.en: The investigation of allegations of child abuse is a crucial stage in protecting children.

translation.cy: Y rheswm am hyn yw oherwydd bod rhai achosion o gam-drin rhywiol yn digwydd y tu allan i’r teulu a'r ffaith fod plant sy'n derbyn gofal yn cael eu cynrychioli gormod o ran cam-drin drwy gamfanteisio'n rhywiol ar blant.
translation.en: This is because of the extra-familial nature of some sexual abuse and the fact that looked after children are over-represented in terms of abuse through CSE.

translation.cy: Pan fydd plentyn yn datgelu digwyddiad o gam-drin plant yn rhywiol neu pan fydd tystiolaeth i awgrymu ei fod wedi cael ei gam-drin yn rhywiol, dylid ei atgyfeirio i Ganolfan Atgyfeirio Ymosodiadau Rhywiol (SARC).Mae'r Ganolfan Atgyfeirio Ymosodiadau Rhywiol yn gyfleuster dynodedig sy'n darparu gofal ar unwaith a gofal parhaus i gleientiaid, gan gynnwys cymorth meddygol, ymarferol ac emosiynol o fewn cyd-destun trefniant partneriaeth rhwng yr heddlu, y sector iechyd a'r trydydd sector.
translation.en: Where a child discloses an incident(s) of child sexual abuse or where there is evidence to suggest that they have been sexually abused they should be referred to a Sexual Assault Referral Centre (SARC).ASARC is a dedicated facility to provide immediate and ongoing client care, including medical, practical and emotional support within the context of a partnership arrangement between police, health and the third sector.

translation.cy: Deall effaith y trawma ar ddatblygiad y plentyn  Sefydlu ymateb perthynol a therapiwtig o amgylch y plentyn sy'n seiliedig ar chwarae
translation.en: Establishing a relational and therapeutic play based response around the child

translation.cy: Mae gwella/cyfoethogi'r gydberthynas rhwng plentyn a'r prif ofalwr / prif ofalwyr yn un o'r prif nodau
translation.en: Enhancing/deepening the relationship between child and primary carer(s) is a prime goal

translation.cy: Rydym wedi ymrwymo i ddefnyddio ein harbenigedd proffesiynol i ffurﬁo partneriaeth ag eraill a’u cynorthwyo i wella’r system gynllunio ar lefel leol a chenedlaethol.
translation.en: We are committed to making use of our professional expertise to partner and support others to improve the planning system at a local and national level.

translation.cy: I ble rydym ni’n mynd?
translation.en: Where we are heading?

translation.cy: Ein blaenoriaeth ar hyn o bryd yw cwblhau’r broses o gyﬂawni’r gweithgareddau newid arwyddocaol sydd eisoes ar waith;
translation.en: Our priority right now is to complete the delivery of thesigniﬁcant change activities already in progress;

translation.cy: Amlygu a threialu dulliau a gwasanaethau newydd
translation.en: Identify and trial new approaches and services

translation.cy: Mae angen i ni gyﬂymu ein gwasanaeth ar draws ein holl waith craidd a galluogi ein cwsmeriaid i olrhain cynnydd apeliadau.
translation.en: We need to improve the speed of our service across all of our core work and enable our customers to track the progress of appeals.

translation.cy: Sefydliad mwy effeithiol ac effeithlon - bydd strwythur uwch reoli newydd ar waith yn 2019/20 gyda chyfrifoldebau ac atebolrwydd eglur.
translation.en: A more effective and efﬁcient organisation - a new senior management structure will be in place in 2019/20 with clear responsibilities and accountabilities.

translation.cy: I ble rydym ni’n mynd?
translation.en: Where we are heading?

translation.cy: Byddwn hefyd yn edrych ar y ffordd orau o ddefnyddio ein sgiliau i weithio gydag eraill wrth i ni broﬁ ffyrdd newydd o weithio, lle y bo’n briodol, i gyﬂawni ein nod o wella’r system gynllunio.
translation.en: We will also look at how we might best use our skills to work with others as we test new ways of working, where appropriate, to achieve our goal of improving the planning system.

translation.cy: Yn ystod blynyddoedd tri a phedwar, byddwn yn cynnal (ac yn parhau i wella) lefelau uchel o berfformiad ac yn dechrau gweithredu rhai o’r dulliau newydd, gan gynnwys systemau gwybodaeth reoli ar gyfer safonau ansawdd ac amgylcheddol a darparu gwasanaethau, ar yr un pryd â pharhau i bennu ffyrdd newydd o ddarparu gwasanaethau.
translation.en: In years three and four, we will maintain (and continue to improve) high levels of performance, start implementing some of the new approaches including management information systems for quality and environmental standards and service delivery, whilst continuing to determine new ways of providing services.

translation.cy: Beth fyddwn ni’n ei wneud bob blwyddyn?
translation.en: What will we do each year?

translation.cy: Annog ein pobl i gyfrannu at ddifﬁnio’r diwylliant a ddymunwn  a chynnwys cynifer o bobl â phosibl wrth amlygu datrysiadau i  wella sut rydym ni’n gweithio.
translation.en: Engage our people in deﬁning our desired culture and include as  many people as possible in identifying solutions to improve how  we work.

translation.cy: Rydym yn anelu at fod mor hunangynhaliol â phosibl o safbwynt ariannol yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: Our future direction is seeking to become as much self-funding as possible.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn parhau i fod yn agored a thryloyw ynglyn â pherfformiad ein sefydliad o ran ein gweithgareddau rheng ﬂaen craidd, gan ystyried cyﬂymder ac ansawdd, ond hefyd o ran ein huchelgeisiau i drawsnewid, a fesurir yn ôl yr arbedion a gyﬂawnir trwy ein hadenillion ar fuddsoddiad.
translation.en: We will continue to be open and transparent about the performance of our organisation both in terms of our core frontline activities, covering speed and quality, but also in terms of our ambitions to transform, measured by the savings achieved through our return on investment.

translation.cy: Nwyeiddio Glo o dan ddaear – datblygiad sy’n gysylltiedig â nwyeiddio glo yn y strata (ond nid yw’n cynnwys drilio tyllau turio yn unswydd i samplu’r craidd).
translation.en: Underground Coal Gasification – development connected to the gasification of coal in the strata (but does not include the drilling of boreholes solely for the purpose of core sampling).

translation.cy: 1.35  	Mewn rhai achosion, caiff Gweinidogion Cymru ‘alw ceisiadau cynllunio i mewn’ er mwyn iddynt benderfynu arnynt eu hunain.
translation.en: 1.35  	In certain instances, the Welsh Ministers may ’call in’ planning applications for their own determination.

translation.cy: Mae’r pwerau hyn yn cael eu defnyddio’n ddetholus ac mae pob cais yn cael ei ystyried yn unigol.
translation.en: These powers are used selectively and each application is looked at individually.

translation.cy: Fel arfer, ni fydd galw i mewn yn cael ei ystyried yn briodol oni bai bod cynnig yn codi materion cynllunio sydd o fwy na phwysigrwydd lleol.
translation.en: ‘Calling in’ applications is generally only considered appropriate where a proposal raises planning issues of more than local importance.

translation.cy: Mae gwerth hanfod lle i bobl neu gymunedau’n neilltuol o bwysig a gall fod rhesymau esthetig, diwylliannol, ysbrydol neu hanesyddol amdano. Awdurdodau cynllunio sydd yn y sefyllfa orau i’w deall.
translation.en: The intrinsic value of a place to people or communities is particularly important, which may be due to aesthetic, cultural, spiritual or historical reasons and planning authorities are best placed to understand these.

translation.cy: Mae “creu lle” yn ystyried y cyd-destun, y swyddogaeth a’r berthynas rhwng safle’r datblygiad a’i gyffiniau, hynny yn achos datblygiadau mawr sy’n creu lleoedd newydd yn ogystal â datblygiadau bach sy’n cael eu creu mewn lle ehangach.
translation.en: Placemaking considers the context, function and relationships between a development site and its wider surroundings. This will be true for major developments creating new places as well as small developments created within a wider place.

translation.cy: Ond rhaid i’r system gynllunio wella yn y meysydd hyn os ydym am gyflawni gofynion y Ddeddf Cynllunio a Deddf Llesiant Cenedlaethau’r Dyfodol.
translation.en: However, the planning system can and must improve in these areas if the requirements of the Planning Act and the Well-being of Future Generations Act are to be achieved.

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r gwelliannau i’r system gynllunio gael eu hymgorffori yn y ffordd yr eir ati greu lleoedd cynaliadwy sy’n hyrwyddo llesiant yn ein hardaloedd trefol a’n hardaloedd gwledig.
translation.en: These improvements in the operation of the planning system must be encompassed in the approach taken to the creation of sustainable places that promote well-being in both our urban and rural areas.

translation.cy: Rhaid felly creu lleoedd da os ydym am weld datblygu cynaliadwy a gwella llesiant cymunedau.
translation.en: Good placemaking is therefore essential to the delivery of sustainable development and achieving improvements in the well-being of communities.

translation.cy: Gyda’i gilydd, trwy ganolbwyntio ar gael pob cynllun datblygu i wireddu’r canlyniadau hyn, sicrheir bod y system gynllunio yn chwarae ei rhan i greu mannau cynaliadwy.
translation.en: Collectively, the focus on achieving these outcomes across all development plans will ensure the planning system plays its role in delivering sustainable places.

translation.cy: sut mae’r cynnig yn cefnogi cyflawni’r nod o sicrhau Cymru mwy ffyniannus, carbon isel, arloesol sy’n defnyddio adnoddau’n effeithlon.
translation.en: how the proposal would support the achievement of a more prosperous, low carbon, innovative and resource efficient Wales.

translation.en: 2.26 	When considering planning applications, planning authorities should seek the views of all relevant local authority departments and external specialist public bodies, particularly those with responsibility for Economic Development, Housing, Transport, Regeneration,

translation.cy: Bydd hyn hefyd yn fodd o ystyried yr holl gostau a buddion amrywiol dros oes datblygiad, yn cynnwys y rhai na ellir rhoi gwerth ariannol arnynt yn hawdd, ac ystyriaethau sy’n ymwneud ag amseriad, risgiau ac ansicrwydd.
translation.en: This will also enable the full range of costs and benefits over the lifetime of development to be taken into account, including those which cannot be easily valued in monetary terms, and considerations relating to timing, risks and uncertainties addressed.

translation.cy: 3.1 	Er mwyn creu lleoedd strategol, rhaid cydystyried y materion yn fuan, wrth ffurfio cynllun datblygu neu wrth ddatblygu cynigion penodol.

translation.en: 3.4 	Design is an inclusive process, which can raise public aspirations, reinforce civic pride and create a sense of place and help shape its future.

translation.cy: Gall y ffordd mae ein lleoedd yn gweithio a gweithredu gael effaith ar y dewisiadau mae pobl yn eu gwneud yn eu bywydau bob dydd, gan gynnwys eu dewisiadau teithio a hamdden a pha mor hawdd y gallai fod i gymdeithasu ag eraill.
translation.en: The way places work and operate can have an impact on the choices people make in their everyday lives, including their travel and recreational choices and how easy it may be to socialise with others.

translation.cy: Gellir ei gwneud yn ofynnol i ddarparu gwybodaeth drwy fecanweithiau amrywiol i asesu effeithiau posibl ar iechyd, fel arfarniad cynaliadwyedd o gynlluniau datblygu ac asesiadau o’r effaith amgylcheddol, a lle’n berthnasol dylid cynnwys effeithiau iechyd perthnasol mewn asesiadau o’r fath.
translation.en: Information to assess potential impacts on health can be required through various mechanisms, such as sustainability appraisal of development plans and environmental impact assessments, and where relevant, health impacts should be incorporated into such assessments.

translation.cy: 3.27  	Dylai cynlluniau datblygu gynnwys datganiad ar sut mae awdurdodau cynllunio wedi ystyried anghenion a buddiannau’r Gymraeg wrth baratoi’r cynllun a sut mae unrhyw bolisïau yn ymwneud â’r Gymraeg yn rhyngweithio â pholisïau eraill.
translation.en: 3.27  	Development plans should include a statement on how planning authorities have taken the needs and interests of the Welsh language into account in plan preparation and how any policies relating to the Welsh language interact with other plan policies.

translation.en: The Welsh Government is required to prepare, publish and implement a statutory Natural Resources Policy setting out its priorities in relation to the SMNR while Natural Resources Wales (NRW) is required to produce a ‘State of Natural Resources Report’ and prepare ‘Area Statements’ to inform place based action.

translation.en: land where the remains of any structure or activity have blended into the landscape over time so that they can reasonably be considered part of the natural surroundings;

translation.en: However this does not mean that the whole area of the curtilage should therefore be  redeveloped.

translation.cy: Dylid cydnabod fodd bynnag na cheid adeiladu datblygiad adeiledig ar safleoedd tirlenwi amheryglus heb fuddsoddiad sylweddol a gwaith monitro tymor hir.
translation.en: It should be recognised, however, that non-hazardous landfills may not be able to accommodate built development without significant investment and long-term monitoring.

translation.en: The Best and Most Versatile

translation.cy: Ni ddylid datblygu tir o raddau 1, 2 a 3a, onid oes angen sy’n drech na dim arall am y datblygiad, ac os nad oes tir a ddefnyddiwyd o’r blaen neu dir o raddau amaethyddol is ar gael, neu os oes gan y tir o radd amaethyddol is werth amgylcheddol a gydnabyddir drwy ddynodiad tirwedd, bywyd gwyllt, hanesyddol neu archeolegol, a bod hynny’n drech na’r ystyriaethau amaethyddol.
translation.en: Land in grades 1, 2 and 3a should only be developed if there is an overriding need for the development, and either previously developed land or land in lower agricultural grades is unavailable, or available lower grade land has an environmental value recognised by a landscape, wildlife, historic or archaeological designation which outweighs the agricultural considerations.

translation.cy: Gall mewnlenwi neu estyniadau bach i aneddiadau cyfredol fod yn dderbyniol, yn enwedig os yw’n diwallu angen lleol am dai fforddiadwy neu y gellir dangos y bydd y cynnig yn cynyddu gweithgarwch economaidd yn yr ardal.
translation.en: Infilling or minor extensions to existing settlements may be acceptable, in particular where they meet a local need for affordable housing or it can be demonstrated that the proposal will increase local economic activity.

translation.en: Green Belts and Green Wedges

translation.cy: anghenion menter gwledig y gellir eu cyfiawnhau;
translation.en: justified rural enterprise needs;

translation.cy: cyfleusterau hanfodol ar gyfer chwaraeon a hamdden awyr agored, mynwentydd, a defnydd arall o dir sy’n cynnal natur agored y Llain Las neu’r lletem las ac nad yw’n gwrthdaro â’r diben o gynnwys tir ynddo;
translation.en: essential facilities for outdoor sport and  outdoor recreation, cemeteries, and other uses of land which maintain the openness of the Green Belt or green wedge and which do not conflict with the purpose of including land within it;

translation.cy: ehangu neu addasu cyfyngedig ar anheddau cyfredol neu ddisodli cyfyngedig;
translation.en: limited extension, alteration or replacement of existing dwellings;

translation.cy: 3.73 	Gallai rhai mathau eraill o ddatblygiad fod yn amhriodol yn y Llain Las neu’r lletem glas oni bai ei fod yn cynnal ei natur agored ac nad yw’n gwrthdaro â’r dibenion o gynnwys tir ynddi.
translation.en: 3.73 	Certain other forms of development may be appropriate in the Green Belt or green wedge provided they preserve its openness and do not conflict with the purposes of including land within it.

translation.cy: Gellir cyflawni Cymru sy’n fwy cyfartal drwy gydnabod cryfderau cymunedau presennol a sicrhau datblygiadau cymdeithasol gynhwysol fel eu bod yn llefydd mwy dymunol i fyw a gweithio ynddynt i holl aelodau cymdeithas.
translation.en: A more Equal Wales can be achieved by recognising the strengths of existing communities and securing socially inclusive development so they become desirable places in which to live and work for all members of society.

translation.cy: Mae diwylliant a’r Gymraeg yn gwneud cyfraniad nodedig at fywiogrwydd cymunedau.
translation.en: Culture and the Welsh language make a distinctive contribution to the vitality of communities.

translation.cy: mynd i’r afael ag anghydraddoldeb rhwng cymunedau a darparu mwy o wasanaethau’n nes adref, gan gydnabod pwysigrwydd cymunedau cynhwysol a’r amgylchedd ehangach ar gyfer iechyd a llesiant da;
translation.en: tackling inequalities between communities, delivering services and jobs closer to where people live and  acknowledging the importance of inclusive communities and the wider environment for good health and well-being;

translation.cy: lleihau’r ddibyniaeth ar y car preifat ac effeithiau andwyol trafnidiaeth fodurol ar yr amgylchedd ac iechyd pobl, trwy roi blaenoriaeth i deithio llesol a thrafnidiaeth gyhoeddus ac annog pobl i’w defnyddio.
translation.en: reducing reliance on travel by private car, and the adverse impacts of motorised transport on the environment and people’s health, by prioritising and increasing active travel and public transport;

translation.cy: sicrhau bod pob cymuned yn gallu cael at amrywiaeth o gartrefi fforddiadwy effeithlon o ran ynni sydd wedi’u lleoli a’u cynllunio’n dda er mwyn diwallu anghenion y gymuned;
translation.en: ensure that all communities have access to a range of well-located and designed energy efficient market and affordable homes to meet their needs;

translation.cy: Hefyd, dylai cynlluniau datblygu ystyried cynlluniau ac adroddiadau eraill sy’n berthnasol i drafnidiaeth.
translation.en: Development plans should also take into account other plans and reports with transport implications.

translation.cy: Yn unol â’r hierarchaeth drafnidiaeth, dylid dechrau dylunio cynigion datblygu drwy nodi’r cysylltiadau cerdded a beicio byrraf a mwyaf atyniadol cyn mynd i’r afael â’r anghenion trafnidiaeth eraill.
translation.en: The design of development proposals should, in accordance with the sustainable transport hierarchy, start with identifying the shortest, most attractive walking and cycling connections and then addressing the other transport needs.

translation.cy: Dylai datblygiadau newydd gael eu hintegreiddio â rhwydweithiau teithio llesol a chyfrannu at eu hehangu a’u gwella trwy ymgorffori llwybrau a chyfleusterau sydd wedi’u dylunio’n dda fel rhan o’r cynlluniau a chynnwys cyfraniadau ariannol i dalu am gysylltiadau oddi ar y safle.
translation.en: New development should be integrated with active travel networks and contribute to their expansion and improvement, through the inclusion of well-designed routes and facilities as part of the schemes and financial contributions to pay for off-site connections.

translation.cy: 4.1.33 Wrth benderfynu ar geisiadau cynllunio, rhaid i awdurdodau cynllunio sicrhau bod cynigion datblygu, trwy eu seilwaith dylunio ac ategol, yn rhoi blaenoriaeth i ddarparu ar gyfer hygyrchedd a symudiad ar droed a beic ac o wneud, cynyddu eu cyfraniad at amcanion y Ddeddf Teithio Llesol.
translation.en: 4.1.33  In determining planning applications, planning authorities must ensure development proposals, through their design and supporting infrastructure, prioritise provision for access and movement by walking and cycling and, in doing so, maximise their contribution to the objectives of the Active Travel Act.

translation.cy: Trafnidiaeth Gyhoeddus
translation.en: Public Transport

translation.cy: Yn yr amgylchiadau hyn, bydd angen ystyried goblygiadau llygredd yn yr aer yn ofalus, gan gynnwys yr angen i daro targedau datgarboneiddio.
translation.en: In these circumstances, the implications of airborne pollution will need careful consideration including the need to meet decarbonisation targets.

translation.cy: 4.1.49  Dylai Datganiadau Dylunio a Mynediad ddangos sut y bydd dyluniad a diwyg y datblygiad yn lleihau lefel a chyflymder y traffig i lefelau priodol ac yn ymateb i’r arweiniad yn Llawlyfr y Stryd a’r Canllawiau Dylunio Teithio Llesol.
translation.en: 4.1.49  Design and Access Statements should demonstrate how the design and layout of the development will reduce the level and speed of traffic to appropriate levels, and responds to the guidance in Manual for Streets and the Active Travel Design Guidance.

translation.cy: Gall yr awdurdod cynllunio ofyn am Asesiadau Trafnidiaeth ar gyfer unrhyw ddatblygiad arfaethedig os yw’n credu bod cyfiawnhad dros hynny neu os oes angen penodol.
translation.en: Transport Assessments can be required for any proposed development if the planning authority considers that there is a justification or specific need.

translation.en: Housing Delivery

translation.cy: Er mwyn cyflawni hyn, mae’n rhaid i gynlluniau datblygu gynnwys cyflenwad o dir sy’n gallu darparu’r nifer a nodir yn y gofyn am dai a rhaid neilltuo lwfans hyblyg ychwanegol priodol lleol rhag ofn na ddaw safleoedd yn rhydd yn ystod cyfnod y cynllun.
translation.en: To achieve this, development plans must include a supply of land which delivers the identified housing requirement figure and makes a locally appropriate additional flexibility allowance for sites not coming forward during the plan period.

translation.cy: ‘Design Quality in Local Development Orders’, Comisiwn Dylunio Cymru 2014 https://dcfw.org/design-quality-in-local-development-orders/

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn golygu bod rhaid i safleoedd fod yn rhydd, neu’n hawdd i’w rhyddhau, oddi wrth gyfyngiadau ar gynllunio, cyfyngiadau ffisegol a chyfyngiadau perchenogaeth, a’i bod yn ymarferol yn economaidd eu datblygu er mwyn cefnogi creu cymunedau cynaliadwy.
translation.en: This means that sites must be free, or readily freed, from planning, physical and ownership constraints and be economically viable, in order to support the creation of sustainable communities.

translation.cy: Mae’n rhaid i broses y cynllun datblygu ystyried dad-ddyrannu safleoedd sy’n cael eu tanddefnyddio neu sy’n tanberfformio, a gallai’r broses hon wneud cyfraniad at y cyflenwad tai os oes modd dangos eu bod yn ymarferol ar gyfer tai.
translation.en: The de-allocation of under-used and underperforming sites must be considered through the development plan process and could make a contribution to the housing supply if it can be demonstrated that they are deliverable for housing.

translation.cy: ac mai’r ymyrraeth arfaethedig yw’r dull gorau o fynd i’r afael â difwyno a chyfyngiadau safle.
translation.en: and that the proposed intervention is the best means of addressing a site’s contamination and constraints.

translation.cy: Mater i’r ymgeisydd neu’r awdurdod cynllunio fydd profi bod amgylchiadau eithriadol penodol yn cyfiawnhau cynnal asesiad hyfywedd yn y cam hwn o’r broses.
translation.en: It is for either the applicant or the planning authority to demonstrate that particular exceptional circumstances justify the need for a viability assessment at the application stage.

translation.cy: Pan fo angen trafodaeth, dylai’r awdurdod cynllunio a’r datblygwr weithredu mewn modd agored a thryloyw a dylai’r holl wybodaeth gael ei darparu ar sail ‘hawdd i’w deall’.
translation.en: Where negotiation is necessary, the planning authority and developer should operate in an open and transparent manner with all information provided on an ‘open book’ basis.

translation.cy: Dylid cefnogi cynigion ar gyfer tai ar safleoedd mewnlenwi neu hap-safle o fewn aneddiadau pan fyddant yn  cyd-fynd â chanlyniadau cenedlaethol creu lleoedd cynaliadwy.
translation.en: Proposals for housing on infill and windfall sites within settlements should be supported where they accord with the national sustainable placemaking outcomes.

translation.cy: Dylai’r targed ystyried darpariaeth a hyfywedd a fydd yn cael eu heffeithio gan y lefelau arfaethedig o gyllid sydd ar gael ar gyfer tai fforddiadwy, gan gynnwys cymhorthdal cyhoeddus, a chyfraniadau budd cymunedol eraill y mae’r awdurdod cynllunio yn ceisio eu sicrhau.
translation.en: The target should take account of deliverability and viability which will be influenced by the anticipated levels of finance available for affordable housing, including public subsidy, and other community benefit contributions being sought by the planning authority.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn berthnasol i safleoedd a neilltuwyd yn benodol yn y cynllun datblygu ac i safleoedd nad ydynt wedi’u neilltuo (hap-safleoedd). Fel arfer, bydd hyn drwy gyfrwng cyfraniadau o dai fforddiadwy ar y safle.
translation.en: This applies both to sites specifically allocated in the development plan and to unallocated (windfall) sites and will normally take the form of on-site affordable housing contributions.

translation.en: 4.3.16  Qualitative assessment should cover both positive and negative aspects and may become an important consideration where it:

translation.cy: cefnogi amcanion a strategaeth fanwerthu cynllun datblygu mabwysiedig neu’r polisïau yn y canllawiau hyn;
