translation.en: These plans could take up to 3 months, following local consultation, to develop and sign-off prior to submission to the Welsh Ministers.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys cyfarfodydd mynych, â phob awdurdod lleol a gwaith arfarnu ac adborth parhaus wrth i bob astudiaeth fynd yn ei blaen.
translation.en: This involves frequent meetings, with each local authority and ongoing appraisal and feedback as each study has progressed.

translation.cy: Caiff y Gronfa Ansawdd Aer ei defnyddio’n bennaf i roi cymorth, arweiniad a chyllid parhaus er mwyn galluogi Cyngor Caerdydd a Chyngor Bwrdeistref Sirol Caerffili i gymryd camau i sicrhau cydymffurfiaeth â’r terfynau cyfreithlon ar gyfer NO2 cyn gynted â phosibl ar ffyrdd y maent yn gyfrifol amdanynt.
translation.en: The Air Quality Fund will primarily be used to provide ongoing support, guidance and finance to enable Cardiff Council and Caerphilly County Borough Council to take action to achieve compliance with legal limits for NO2 in the shortest possible time on roads, for which they are responsible.

translation.cy: Mae rhagor o fesurau wedi cael eu cynnwys yn y cynllun hwn pe bai data Mapio Hinsawdd Llygredd yn is na’r canlyniadau ar y safle.
translation.en: Further measures have been included in this plan should the PCM data transpire to be lower than the on site results.

translation.cy: Dylid cydnabod hefyd y gallai’r mesurau rhagofalus a ddargedwir hyn leihau crynodiadau o NO2, ond y byddent yn methu â sicrhau cydymffurfiaeth cyn gynted â phosibl.
translation.en: It should also be recognised that these PRM have the ability to reduce NO2 concentrations, but would fail to achieve compliance in the shortest possible time.

translation.cy: Mae WelTAG yn cynnig fframwaith cadarnar gyfer nodi ac arfarnu effeithiolrwydd tebygol mesurau a gynigir o ran cyflawni amcanion penodol.
translation.en: WelTAG provides a robust frameworkfor identifying and appraising the likely effectiveness of proposed measures in delivering specific objectives.

translation.cy: Defnyddir Cam 3 WelTAG (Achos Busnes Llawn) i gynnal asesiad llawn a manwl o’r mesurau a ffefrir er mwyn llywio penderfyniad terfynol ar eu rhoi ar waith.
translation.en: WelTAG Stage 3 (Full Business Case) is used to make a full and detailed assessment of preferred measures to inform a final decision on their implementation.

translation.cy: Nodwyd y byddai’r cyfyngiadau hyn yn rhywbeth, heb amheuaeth wyddonol, a fyddai’n lleihau amlygiad a sicrhau cydymffurfiaeth â’r gwerthoedd terfyn ar gyfer NO2 yn gynt (gan dybio cydymffurfiaeth â’r terfynau cyflymder).
translation.en: These restrictions were identified as something which, without scientific doubt, would reduce exposure and speed up compliance with NO2 limit values (assuming compliance with speed limits).

translation.cy: Mae hon yn cyfeirio at y crynodiadau o NO2 ym mhob lleoliad a ragwelir os na roddir unrhyw fesurau ar waith (Er enghraifft, mewn senario “gwneud dim”).
translation.en: This refers to the concentrations of NO2 at each location that are predicted if no measures are implemented (For instance, in a “do nothing” scenario).

translation.cy: Felly, bydd gwaith monitro yn parhau yn ystod y broses o roi’r mesurau y cyfeirir atynt isod ar waith er mwyn asesu eu heffeithiolrwydd a llywio astudiaethau yn y dyfodol.

translation.cy: 7.1.2 Gallai trydaneiddio a'r defnydd helaethach o waith llifanu rheilffyrdd leihau sŵn cerbydau unigol ar y prif linellau yn sylweddol.
translation.en: 7.1.2 Electrification and the increased use of rail grinding have the potential to significantly reduce the noise of individual vehicles on the main lines.

translation.cy: Mae gan newid moddol i ffwrdd o drafnidiaeth ar y ffordd a thrafnidiaeth awyr, tuag at reilffyrdd, rôl bwysig i'w chwarae o ran yr ateb cyfannol i broblem sŵn trafnidiaeth, ond mae'n debygol o olygu mwy o wasanaethau a threnau hirach, cyflymach.
translation.en: Modal shift away from road and air transport, towards rail, has an important role to play in the holistic transport noise solution, but it is likely to mean more services and longer, faster trains.

translation.cy: 7.1.3 Mae'n ofynnol i'r diwydiant rheilffyrdd ymateb i gwynion ynghylch sŵn.
translation.en: 7.1.3 The rail industry is required to respond to noise complaints.

translation.cy: Mae angen ystyried cwynion ynghylch sŵn fesul achos.
translation.en: Noise complaints require consideration on a case-by-case basis.

translation.cy: Mae'n seiliedig ar yr egwyddor y dylai'r rheilffyrdd anelu at sicrhau mai nhw yw'r dull mwyaf cynaliadwy o deithio mewn perthynas â sŵn a'i effeithiau.
translation.en: It is guided by the principle that the railways should aim to be the most sustainable mode of transport in relation to noise and its impacts.

translation.cy: Mae'r ymarfer mapio sŵn cyfredol o dan y Gyfarwyddeb Sŵn Amgylcheddol yn canolbwyntio ar sŵn mynd heibio (sŵn injans/tyniant a rholio) gan mai hwn sy'n gyfrifol am y lefelau uchaf o allyriadau.
translation.en: The current noise mapping under the Environmental Noise Directive focuses on pass-by noise (engine/traction and rolling noise) as this is responsible for the highest emissions.

translation.cy: Yn aml mae'n anodd modelu'r sŵn o'r ffynonellau hyn sydd wedi'u hepgor am ei fod yn gofyn am wybodaeth leol fanwl, megis gweithrediadau depos, neu gall fod yn anodd rhagfynegi sŵn o'r fath gan ei fod ond yn codi'n achlysurol, fel gyda gwichian wrth fynd rownd troadau.
translation.en: The noise from these omitted sources is often difficult to model as it requires detailed local knowledge, such as depot operations, or the occurrence may be intermittent and difficult to predict, as is the case with curve squeal.

translation.cy: 7.3.3 Dangosir niferoedd amcangyfrifedig y bobl y mae eu cartrefi yn agored i ystod o lefelau sŵn o brif reilffyrdd yng Nghymru yn Nhablau 7.1 a 7.2 isod.
translation.en: 7.3.3 The estimated numbers of people whose homes are exposed to a range of noise levels from major railways in Wales are shown Tables 7.1 and 7.2 below.

translation.cy: Gan fod ymarfer mapio 2017 yn rhagflaenu'r rhaglen i drydaneiddio pob rhan o Reilffordd y Great Western, mae mapiau sŵn 2012 wedi'u hailddefnyddio gyda model poblogaeth breswyl wedi'i diweddaru.
translation.en: As the 2017 noise mapping exercise predates full electrification of the Great Western Main Line, the 2012 noise maps have been re-used with an updated residential population model.

translation.en: The 2016 Act sets out the statutory purpose of NRW, and states that in the exercise of its functions, as far as is consistent with their proper exercise, NRW must pursue sustainable management of natural resources in relation to Wales, and apply the principles of sustainable management of natural resources.

translation.cy: 9.1.4 Mae Deddf Diogelu’r Amgylchedd 1990 yn gosod dyletswydd ar bob awdurdod lleol i gymryd camau rhesymol i ymchwilio i gwynion a wneir gan drigolion.
translation.en: 9.1.4 The Environmental Protection Act 1990 places a duty on each local authority to take reasonable practicable steps to investigate complaints made by residents.

translation.cy: 9.1.5 Darperir pwerau gan Deddf Sŵn 1996 hefyd, y bwriedir iddi ymdrin â sŵn gormodol sy’n codi yn ystod y nos o safleoedd trwyddedig neu annedd breswyl rhwng 11 pm a 7 am.
translation.en: 9.1.5 Powers are also provided by the Noise Act 1996, which aims to deal with excessive night noise coming from licensed premises or a residential dwelling between the hours of 11 pm and 7 am.

translation.cy: Cyhoeddwyd canllawiau statudol er mwyn helpu awdurdodau lleol i ddefnyddio'r pwerau newydd hyn.
translation.en: Statutory guidance has been issued to aid local authorities in the use of these new powers.

translation.cy: At hynny, o dan adran 63(3) o Ddeddf 1974, gellir cymryd camau os bydd clychau fan hufen iâ yn seinio ar ôl 7 pm neu cyn hanner dydd, neu os cânt eu seinio ar unrhyw adeg fel eu bod yn peri annifyrrwch.
translation.en: Furthermore, under section 62(3) of the 1974 Act, action may be taken if ice-cream van chimes sound after 7 pm or before midday, or at any time as to cause an annoyance.

translation.cy: 9.1.9 Rheoleiddir sŵn o safleoedd adeiladu drwy adran 60 o Ddeddf Rheoli Llygredd 1974, sy'n caniatáu i awdurdod lleol gyfyngu ar oriau gwaith a'r math o beirianwaith a ddefnyddir a phennu lefelau sŵn y mae'n ystyried eu bod yn dderbyniol.
translation.en: 9.1.9 Construction site noise is regulated through section 60 of the Control of Pollution Act 1974, which allows a local authority to place restrictions on working hours and the type of machinery used and set noise levels that it considers to be acceptable.

translation.cy: Gan weithredu ar yr adolygiad hwn yn 2017, cyflwynodd Llywodraeth Cymru orchymyn i ddiweddaru codau ymarfer statudol Cymru ar larymau tresmaswyr a sŵn o waith adeiladu a bu'n gweithio gyda Defra i lunio canllawiau newydd ar niwsans statudol a thrwyddedu amgylcheddol yng Nghymru a Lloegr.
translation.en: Acting on this review in 2017, the Welsh Government issued an order to bring Wales’ statutory codes of practice on intruder alarms and construction noise up to date and worked with Defra to produce new guidance on statutory nuisance and environmental permitting in England and Wales.

translation.cy: Bydd bron pob busnes yn gallu penderfynu ar gamau gweithredu ymarferol a chosteffeithiol i reoli risgiau sŵn os bydd angen drwy ystyried y cyngor sydd ar gael, er enghraifft ar wefan yr Awdurdod Gweithredol Iechyd a Diogelwch ar sŵn yn y gwaith ac yn ei becyn cymorth ar reoli risgiau sŵn60.
translation.en: Nearly all businesses can decide on practical, cost-effective actions to control noise risks if necessary by looking at the advice available, for example on HSE’s noise at work website and in its toolbox for controlling noise risks.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, gallai rhai gweithgynhyrchwyr cyfarpar gwaith wneud mwy i leihau'r risg sy'n gysylltiedig â sŵn wrth y ffynhonnell a gwella ansawdd gwybodaeth am sŵn a gyflenwir gyda'u cynhyrchion.
translation.en: However, some manufacturers of work equipment could do more to reduce risk from noise at source and improve the quality of noise information supplied with their products.

translation.cy: 9.2.10 Fel rhan o ymgyrch ‘Buy Quiet’, mae'r Awdurdod Gweithredol Iechyd a Diogelwch wedi paratoi cyngor i weithgynhyrchwyr, mewnforwyr a chyflenwyr cyfarpar gwaith ar ddarparu gwybodaeth am sŵn.
translation.en: 9.2.10 As part of the ‘Buy Quiet’ campaign, HSE has prepared advice for manufacturers, importers and suppliers of work equipment on the provision of noise information.

translation.cy: Mae hwn yn benderfyniad a ddylai gael ei wneud gan sefydliadau a gweithredwyr lleoliadau unigol yn seiliedig ar y risgiau penodol, y maent yn y sefyllfa orau i'w hasesu.
translation.en: That is a judgement that has to be made by individual organisers and venue operators based on the particular risks, which they are best placed to assess.

translation.en: As well as the day-time service staffed by SRS, Cardiff Council operates a dedicated night-time noise service that reacts to both ongoing and new noise complaints.

translation.cy: 10.3.2 Yn ogystal â'r gwasanaeth sŵn liw nos y tu allan i oriau penodol, mae system swyddogion ar ddyletswydd yn gweithredu y tu allan i oriau swyddfa saith diwrnod yr wythnos.
translation.en: 10.3.2 Alongside the dedicated out-of-hours night-time noise service, a duty officer system operates outside of office hours seven days a week.

translation.cy: 10.3.8 Gyda phoblogaeth sy'n tyfu'n gyflym, cydnabyddir o fewn y CDLl y gall isrannu adeiladau preswyl yn unedau preswyl llai o faint fod yn ffynhonnell bwysig o dai.
translation.en: 10.3.8 With a rapidly expanding population there is recognition within the LDP that the subdivision of a residential building into smaller residential units can be an important source of housing.

translation.cy: 10.3.9 Cymaint yw'r gydnabyddiaeth o bwysigrwydd sŵn o ran cynllunio fel bod polisi manwl wedi'i gynnwys yn y CDLl.
translation.en: 10.3.9 Such is the recognition of the importance of noise in planning terms that a detailed policy is included within the LDP.

translation.cy: Mae'r CDLl yn nodi bod angen rhoi ystyriaeth arbennig pan gynigir gwaith datblygu a fydd yn creu sŵn mewn ardaloedd arbennig megis mannau tawel trefol neu'n agos atynt.
translation.en: The LDP states that special consideration is required where noise-generating development is proposed in or near special areas such as urban quiet areas.

translation.cy: Bydd Cyngor Caerdydd yn ceisio gwneud yn siwr bod gweithgarwch rheoli ansawdd aer lleol yn sicrhau'r manteision mwyaf posibl o ran sŵn;
translation.en: Cardiff Council will seek to maximise the noise benefits to be gained from local air quality management;

translation.cy: 10.4.10 Mae'r CDLl yn rhoi pwyslais ar ailddefnyddio tir a ddatblygwyd o'r blaen a lleihau'r angen i ddatblygu ar feysydd glas.
translation.en: 10.4.10 The LDP’s emphasis is on re-using previously developed land and minimising the need to develop on green fields.

translation.cy: 10.4.19 Mae swyddogion o fewn y Gwasanaethau Rheoliadol a Rennir a'r adran gynllunio yn cydnabod mai cymryd camau rhagweithiol i liniaru sŵn yw'r dull mwyaf buddiol a chosteffeithiol o ymdrin â sŵn.
translation.en: 10.4.19 Officers in both SRS and the planning department acknowledge that proactive noise mitigation is the most beneficial and cost-effective method of dealing with noise.

translation.cy: Darparwyd y wybodaeth yn yr adran hon gan Gyngor Bwrdeistref Sirol Pen-y-bont ar Ogwr, a leolir rhwng crynodrefi Caerdydd a Phenarth ac Abertawe a Chastell-nedd Port Talbot.
translation.en: The information in this section has been provided by Bridgend County Borough Council (CBC), which lies between the Cardiff and Penarth and the Swansea and Neath Port Talbot agglomerations.

translation.cy: 10.5.3 Yn ogystal ag ymchwilio i gwynion ynghylch sŵn a rhoi cyngor, mae gwaith rhagweithiol i leihau aflonyddwch a achosir gan sŵn a dirgrynu yn cael ei wneud drwy'r cyfundrefnau cynllunio a thrwyddedu.
translation.en: 10.5.3 In addition to undertaking investigations regarding noise complaints and providing advice, proactive work to minimise disturbance from noise and vibration is undertaken through the planning and licensing regimes.

translation.cy:
Bellach mae gorchmynion amgylcheddol, economaidd a chymdeithasol gorfodol yn golygu bod 
angen i ni fynd ymhellach a bod yn fwy heriol ac uchelgeisiol fyth.
translation.en: Environmental, economic and social imperatives now require us to go further and to be even more challenging and ambitious.

translation.cy: •  Yr angen i leihau gwastraff fel mater o ﬂaenoriaeth, a’r
translation.en: •  The need for waste reduction as a priority action, and

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn golygu mai dim ond ar lefelau ‘Un Blaned’ y bydd cynhyrchu a rheoli gwastraff.
translation.en: This means that waste production and management will only be at ‘One Planet’ levels.

translation.cy: Mae angen i ni ystyried beth rydym yn ei brynu, ei ddefnyddio a’i daﬂu.
translation.en: We need to consider what we buy, use and throwaway.

translation.cy:
Mae angen i ni feddwl am gadw’r cynhyrchion a brynwn am fwy o amser a’u hailddefnyddio neu eu pasio 
ymlaen pan na fyddwn eu heisiau neu eu hangen mwyach.
translation.en: We need to think about keeping the products we buy for longer and reusing them or passing them on when we no longer want or need them.

translation.cy: Dylai hyn helpu i greu awch cystadleuol mewn marchnad lle mae’r galwadau’n cynyddu o hyd, a lle mae prynu gwyrdd a gwelliannau i’r gadwyn gyﬂenwi bellach yn un o hanfodion pwysig busnes.
translation.en: This should help to create the competitive edge in an ever demanding market place where green purchasing and supply chain improvements are now an important business imperative.

translation.cy:
Ac i mi, nid mater o leihau ein hôl troed carbon yn unig yw bod datblygu cynaliadwy yn 
brif egwyddor drefniadol - er mor bwysig yw hynny.
translation.en: And for me, having sustainable development as a central organising principle is not just about reducing our carbon footprint - important as that is.

translation.en: This Waste Prevention Programme supports Towards Zero Waste by describing the outcomes, policies, targets and outline work programme to address waste prevention from businesses and households.

translation.cy: Bydd gweithredu'r rhaglen hon yn helpu Llywodraeth Cymru i gyflawni dwy flaenoriaeth allweddol – trechu tlodi, a thwf a swyddi cynaliadwy – yn ogystalâ diogelu'r amgylchedd a chyfrannu tuag at Gymru gynaliadwy.
translation.en: Implementing this programme will help the Welsh Government to meet two key priorities – tackling poverty, and growth and sustainable jobs – as well as protecting the environment and contributing towards a sustainable Wales.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn helpu i drechu tlodi drwy ddarparu nwyddau cost isel o ansawdd uchel i bobl mewn angen yn ein cymunedau, drwy gamau ar ailddefnyddio, adnewyddu ac ailweithgynhyrchu.
translation.en: We will help tackle poverty by providing low cost, high quality goods to people in need in our communities, through actions on reuse, refurbishment and remanufacture.

translation.cy: Mae'n creu swyddi newydd, cyfleoedd masnachol ac yn arbed arian i fusnesau.
translation.en: It creates new jobs, commercial opportunities and saves businesses money.

translation.en: This is needed because reducing the impact of waste in Wales to ‘One Planet’ levels will require big changes in the way that products and services are designed, and the actions that consumers and businesses take.

translation.en: By 2050, we will have reduced the impact of waste in Wales to within our environmental limits and will generate approximately 65 per cent less waste than in 2007.

translation.en: 2 Environmental Limits – ‘Our Vision of a Sustainable Wales is one where Wales: lives within its environmental limits, using only its fair share of the earth’s resources so that our ecological footprint is reduced to the global average availability of resources, and we are resilient to the impacts of climate change’ (Source: One Wales: One Planet: A new sustainable development scheme for Wales).

translation.cy: i roi’r p*er i Weinidogion Cymru ddyroddi canllawiau i gynorthwyo cyrff cyhoeddus penodol wrth iddynt gyfrannu at gyflawni diben y Ddeddf;
translation.en: provide the Welsh Ministers with the power to issue guidance to assist certain public bodies in contributing to the pursuit of the purpose of the Act;

translation.cy: Mae’r asesiadau hyn yn llywio cynnwys y strategaethau a baratoir ar gyfer ardal awdurdod lleol gan nifer o gyrff cyhoeddus (gan gynnwys awdurdodau lleol a Byrddau Iechyd Lleol ac y cyfeirir atynt ar y cyd fel partneriaethau diogelwch cymunedol) o dan adran 6(1) o’r Ddeddf honno er mwyn lleihau trosedd ac anhrefn, aildroseddu a chamddefnyddio sylweddau yn ardal yr awdurdod lleol.
translation.en: These assessments inform the content of strategies prepared for a local authority area by a number of public bodies (including local authorities and Local Health Boards and collectively referred to as community safety partnerships) under section 6(1) of that Act for the purpose of reducing crime and disorder, reoffending and substance abuse in the local authority area.

translation.cy: Mae’r gr*p strategaeth yn cynnwys cynrychiolwyr o awdurdodau lleol a Byrddau Iechyd Lleol yn ogystal â chyrff cyhoeddus eraill sy’n ffurfio’r bartneriaeth diogelwch cymunedol y mae gofynion adran 6 o Ddeddf 1998 yn gymwys iddynt.
translation.en: The strategy group includes representatives from local authorities and Local Health Boards as well as other public bodies that make up the community safety partnership to which the requirements of section 6 of the 1998 Act apply.

translation.cy: Mae’r dadansoddiad hwn yn debygol o fod o gymorth wrth baratoi ac adolygu strategaethau lleol o dan adran 6 o Ddeddf Trais yn erbyn Menywod, Cam-drin Domestig a Thrais Rhywiol (Cymru).
translation.en: This analysis is likely to assist in the preparation and review of local strategies under section 6 of the Violence against Women, Domestic Abuse and Sexual Violence (Wales) Act.

translation.cy: Mae’r p*er yn galluogi Gweinidogion Cymru i ragnodi’r wybodaeth sydd i’w chyhoeddi, pryd y’i cyhoeddir ac ar ba ffurf y’i cyhoeddir.
translation.en: The power enables the Welsh Ministers to prescribe the information to be published, when it will be published and how it will be published.

translation.cy: Mae adran 408 yn rhoi’r p*er i Weinidogion Cymru wneud rheoliadau ynghylch cyhoeddi gwybodaeth gan awdurdodau lleol a chyrff llywodraethu a phenaethiaid ysgolion a gynhelir gan awdurdod lleol.
translation.en: Section 408 provides the Welsh Ministers with power to make regulations regarding the publication of information by local authorities and the governing body and head teacher of local authority maintained schools.

translation.cy: Mae sefydliad “yng Nghymru” os yw ei weithgareddau’n cael eu cynnal yn gyfan gwbl neu’n bennaf yng Nghymru.
translation.en: An institution is “in Wales” if its activities are carried on wholly or principally in Wales.

translation.cy: Mae’n ei gwneud yn ofynnol i Weinidogion Cymru ymgynghori ag unrhyw un y maent yn ei ystyried yn berthnasol cyn cyhoeddi’r dangosyddion.
translation.en: It requires the Welsh Ministers to consult with whoever they consider relevant before publishing the indicators.

translation.cy: Nod y ddyletswydd hon yw sicrhau dull cyson ac effeithiol o fynd i’r afael â materion yn ymwneud â thrais ar sail rhywedd, cam-drin domestig a thrais rhywiol ledled Cymru.
translation.en: The aim of such a duty is to ensure a consistent and effective approach is taken to tackling the issues of gender-based violence, domestic abuse and sexual violence across Wales.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal, caniateir i’r Gweinidogion roi i’r Cynghorydd y cymorth sydd ei angen arno i arfer ei swyddogaethau (er enghraifft, drwy ddyrannu staff Llywodraeth Cymru i’w gynorthwyo a darparu swyddfa ac offer ar ei gyfer).
translation.en: Ministers will also be able to provide the Adviser with the support necessary for the Adviser to exercise his or her functions (by for example, allocating Welsh Government staff to assist the Adviser and providing office space and equipment).

translation.cy: Bydd gan y Cynghorydd rôl allweddol hefyd yn y gwaith o adolygu’r camau a gymerir gan awdurdodau lleol, Byrddau Iechyd Lleol, awdurdodau tân ac achub ac Ymddiriedolaethau’r GIG o dan y dyletswyddau a osodir gan y Ddeddf, gan roi gwybod i Weinidogion Cymru am y canlyniadau.
translation.en: The Adviser will also have a key role in reviewing the actions being taken by local authorities, Local Health Boards, fire and rescue authorities and NHS Trusts under the duties imposed by the Act, and advising the Welsh Ministers of the findings.

translation.cy: I’r perwyl hwnnw, mae adran 21 yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i awdurdodau lleol, Byrddau Iechyd Lleol, awdurdodau tân ac achub ac Ymddiriedolaethau’r GIG gydymffurfio â cheisiadau rhesymol am wybodaeth gan y Cynghorydd.
translation.en: To that end, section 21 requires local authorities, Local Health Boards, fire and rescue authorities and NHS Trusts to comply with reasonable requests for information made by the Adviser.

translation.cy: Hefyd, rhaid i adroddiadau blynyddol y Cynghorydd gael eu cyflwyno i Weinidogion Cymru.
translation.en: The Adviser’s annual reports must also be submitted to the Welsh Ministers.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (3) yn caniatáu i Weinidogion Cymru dynnu gwybodaeth o adroddiadau neu gynlluniau y mae’r Cynghorydd yn eu hanfon atynt cyn cyhoeddi’r dogfennau hynny.
translation.en: Subsection (3) allows the Welsh Ministers to remove information in the reports or plans sent to them by the Adviser prior to publishing those documents.

translation.cy: Mae’r adran hon yn diffinio’r termau “cam-drin”, “cam-drin domestig”, “trais ar sail rhywedd” a “trais rhywiol”, ac mae’n gwneud hynny drwy ddisgrifio’r ymddygiadau sydd i gael eu hystyried yn gamdriniaeth neu’n drais at ddibenion y Ddeddf.
translation.en: This section defines the terms “abuse” “domestic abuse”, “gender-based violence” and “sexual violence”, and does so by describing the behaviours which are to be considered abusive or violent for the purpose of the Act.

translation.cy: Diffinnir person sy’n “gysylltiedig” yn is-adrannau (2) i (4).
translation.en: An “associated person” is defined in subsections (2) to (4).

translation.cy: Ni fyddai cam-drin ariannol felly yn cwmpasu rhiant sy’n rheoli materion ariannol ei blentyn mewn modd rhesymol.
translation.en: Therefore, “financial abuse” would not extend to a parent who reasonably manages the financial affairs of their child.

translation.cy: Un enghraifft o drais ar sail rhywedd sy’n dod o fewn paragraff (a) o’r diffiniad yw’r hyn a elwir yn “drais ar sail anrhydedd”, pan fo pobl yn dioddef trais, bygythiadau o drais neu aflonyddu yn sgil y canfyddiad eu bod wedi peri gwarth neu gywilydd i’r teulu neu’r gymuned pan fo’r gwarth neu’r cywilydd canfyddedig yn codi o werthoedd, credoau neu arferion sy’n ymwneud â rhywedd neu gyfeiriadedd rhywiol (megis credoau ynghylch cael perthynas â pherson o’r rhyw arall oddi allan i briodas neu gredoau ynghylch cyfunrhywiaeth).
translation.en: An example of gender-based violence falling within paragraph (a) of the definition is a type of so-called “honour-based violence”, where people suffer violence, threats of violence or harassment as a result of the perception that they have caused disgrace or dishonour to the family or community where the perceived disgrace or dishonour arises from values, beliefs or customs relating to gender or sexual orientation (such as beliefs about relationships outside marriage with persons of the opposite sex or beliefs about homosexuality).

translation.cy: Diffinnir “aflonyddu” yn is-adran (5) hefyd, ac mae’r diffiniad yn cynnwys aflonyddu ar ffurf siarad.
translation.en: “Harassment” is also defined in subsection (5) and includes speech amounting to harassment.

translation.en: The requirement does not apply to a landlord who is a registered social landlord (registered social landlords are subject to separate registration by the Welsh Ministers under Part 1 of the Housing Act 1996) or a fully mutual housing association (whose membership is comprised entirely of tenants or prospective tenants of the properties provided by it).

translation.cy: Mae gan Weinidogion Cymru bŵer drwy orchymyn i bennu personau eraill nad yw’r gofyniad i gofrestru yn adran 4(1) yn gymwys iddynt.

translation.en: Exceptions also apply where a landlord has applied to be licensed and the application is being considered, and during the period of 28 days after a landlord has had the interest of the dwelling assigned to him or her, for example where the landlord has bought the property, and the sale has completed and transfer registered.

translation.en: The licensing authority is required to decide whether or not an applicant for a licence is a fit and proper person to be licensed.

translation.cy: Mae’r dystiolaeth yn syrthio i mewn i nifer o gategorïau.
translation.en: The evidence falls into a number of categories.

translation.cy: Yn ail, tystiolaeth sy’n dangos bod y ceisydd wedi gwahaniaethu’n anghyfreithlon neu wedi aflonyddu rhywun ar sail unrhyw nodwedd warchodedig o dan adran 4 o Ddeddf Cydraddoldeb 2010, neu wedi erlid person yn groes i’r Ddeddf honno.
translation.en: Second, evidence which shows that the applicant has practiced unlawful discrimination or harassment on the grounds of any protected characteristic under section 4 of the Equality Act 2010, or has victimised a person contrary to that Act.

translation.cy: Yn drydydd, tystiolaeth sy’n dangos bod y ceisydd wedi torri unrhyw ddarpariaeth yn y gyfraith sy’n ymwneud â thai, landlord neu denant.
translation.en: Third, evidence which shows that the applicant has contravened any provision of law relating to housing, landlord or tenant.

translation.cy: Yn ychwanegol, bydd methiant â chydymffurfio ag unrhyw un neu ragor o amodau’r drwydded, gan gynnwys yr amod sy’n ei gwneud yn ofynnol i ddeiliad trwydded gydymffurfio â’r cod ymarfer a ddyroddir o dan adran 40, yn dystiolaeth berthnasol ar gyfer penderfynu a yw person yn addas a phriodol i ddal trwydded.
translation.en: In addition, failure to comply with any licence condition, including the condition requiring a licence holder to comply with the code of practice issued under section 40, will be relevant evidence for determining whether a person is fit and proper to hold a licence.

translation.cy: Bydd pob trwydded a roddir yn cynnwys amod sy’n ei gwneud yn ofynnol i ddeiliad y drwydded gydymffurfio ag unrhyw god ymarfer a ddyroddir gan Weinidogion Cymru (gweler adran 40) ac unrhyw amodau pellach eraill y mae awdurdod trwyddedu yn eu hystyried yn briodol.
translation.en: Each licence granted will include a condition requiring the licence holder to comply with any code of practice issued by the Welsh Ministers (see section 40) and any other further conditions a licensing authority considers appropriate.

translation.cy: Y cyfnod a ganiateir i ddeiliad y drwydded gyflwyno sylwadau yw 21 o ddiwrnodau gan ddechrau ar y diwrnod yr hysbyswyd deiliad y drwydded am fwriad yr awdurdod i ddirymu’r drwydded.
translation.en: The period allowed for the licence holder to make representations is 21 days beginning the day the licence holder was notified of the authority’s intention to revoke the licence.

translation.cy: Os nad yw deiliad trwydded wedi cydsynio â’r dirymiad, rhaid i’r awdurdod ddarparu gwybodaeth am hawliau deiliad y drwydded i apelio yn erbyn y penderfyniad.
translation.en: If a licence holder hasn’t consented to the revocation, the authority must provide information on the licence holder’s rights of appeal against the decision.

translation.cy: Caiff ceiswyr am drwydded (gan gynnwys ceiswyr am adnewyddu trwydded) neu ddeiliaid trwydded apelio yn erbyn penderfyniadau canlynol awdurdod trwyddedu:
translation.en: Applicants for a licence (including applicants for renewal of a licence) or holders of a licence can appeal the following decisions of a licensing authority:

translation.cy: Fel arall, gall wneud y canlynol:
translation.en: Alternatively, it may:

translation.cy: Adran 29 – Hysbysiadau cosbau penodedig
translation.en: Section 29 – Fixed penalty notices

translation.cy: Rhaid iddo ddarparu gwybodaeth resymol am yr amgylchiadau yr honnir eu bod yn ffurfio’r drosedd.
translation.en: It must provide reasonable information on the circumstances alleged to constitute the offence.

translation.cy: Caniateir i’r taliad gael ei wneud drwy ragdalu a phostio llythyr sy’n cynnwys swm y gosb mewn arian parod neu fel arall, neu drwy ddull arall, y bydd yn rhaid iddo fod yn dderbyniol i’r awdurdod trwyddedu.
translation.en: Payment can be made by pre-paying and posting a letter containing the amount of the penalty in cash or otherwise, or by another method, which will need to be acceptable to the licensing authority.

translation.cy: Os yw’n cael ei bostio, caiff y taliad ei drin fel petai wedi ei wneud pan fyddai’r llythyr wedi ei ddosbarthu yn y post yn ôl y drefn arferol.
translation.en: If posted, the payment is treated as having been made when the letter would ordinarily have been delivered in the post.

translation.cy: Caiff awdurdod tai lleol nad yw’n awdurdod trwyddedu ar gyfer ei ardal arfer y swyddogaethau o dan yr adran hon yn ei ardal mewn perthynas â throsedd o dan adran 10(a);
translation.en: A local housing authority that is not the licensing authority for its area can exercise the functions under this section in its area in relation to an offence under section 10(a);

translation.cy: Caiff tribiwnlys eiddo preswyl ddirymu gorchymyn atal rhent.
translation.en: A residential property tribunal can revoke a rent stopping order.

translation.cy: Nid yw’r olaf yn gymwys os y landlord oedd yr un a wnaeth y cais yn y lle cyntaf;
translation.en: The latter does not apply if it was the landlord that made the application in the first place;

translation.cy: Mewn perthynas â chais a wneir gan awdurdod trwyddedu neu awdurdod lleol, rhaid i’r tribiwnlys fod wedi ei fodloni bod trosedd o dan 7(5) (gofyniad i landlord fod yn drwyddedig i ymgymryd a gweithgareddau rheoli eiddo) neu 13(3) (y drosedd o benodi asiant heb drwydded) wedi ei gyflawni gan landlord yr annedd yn y 12 mis cyn dyddiad yr hysbysiad gofynnol am achos arfaethedig o dan y rhan hon (p’un a yw’r person wedi ei gollfarnu neu ei gyhuddo o’r drosedd ai peidio).
translation.en: In relation to an application made by a licensing authority or local authority, the tribunal must be satisfied that an offence under 7(5) (requirement for landlords to be licensed to carry out property management activities) or 13(3) (offence of appointing an unlicensed agent) has been committed by the landlord of the dwelling in the 12 months prior to the date of the required notice of intended proceedings under this part, (whether or not the person has been convicted or charged for the offence).

translation.cy: Pan gaiff cais ei wneud gan denant, rhaid i dribiwnlys, er mwyn gallu rhoi gorchymyn, fod wedi ei fodloni bod person wedi ei gollfarnu o drosedd berthnasol;
translation.en: Where an application is made by a tenant, a tribunal in granting an order, must be satisfied that a person has been convicted of a relevant offence;

translation.cy: caiff hefyd roi gorchymyn pan fydd eisoes wedi gwneud gorchymyn o ganlyniad i gais gan awdurdod trwyddedu neu awdurdod tai lleol sy’n cwmpasu dyfarniad neu ddyfarniadau perthnasol o gredyd cynhwysol neu fudd-dal tai a dalwyd mewn perthynas â’r un denantiaeth.
translation.en: it may also make grant an order where it has it has already made an order as a result of an application by a licensing authority or local housing authority covering a relevant award or awards of universal credit or housing benefit paid in relation to the same tenancy.

translation.cy: darpariaeth bellach
translation.en: further provision

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (7) yn darparu bod cyfeiriad at ddogfen yn cynnwys gwybodaeth nad yw ar ffurf ddarllenadwy (er enghraifft am ei bod wedi ei storio ar weinydd cyfrifiadur).
translation.en: Subsection (7) provides that a reference to a document includes information which is not in legible form (for example because it is stored on a computer server).

translation.cy: Rhaid rhoi hysbysiad i berson perthnasol am y cais.
translation.en: A relevant person must be given notice about the request.

translation.cy: Adran 38 – Gorfodi pwerau cael gafael ar wybodaeth
translation.en: Section 38 – Enforcement of powers to obtain information

translation.cy: Caiff y cod gynnwys safonau sy’n ymwneud â hyfforddiant.
translation.en: The code may include standards relating to training.

translation.cy: Caniateir i god gael ei dynnu’n ôl mewn cod diwygiedig neu drwy gyfarwyddyd a roddir gan Weinidogion Cymru.
translation.en: A code may be withdrawn in an amended code or by direction given by the Welsh Ministers.

translation.cy: Caiff Gweinidogion Cymru roi cyfarwyddiadau i awdurdod trwyddedu neu i awdurdod tai lleol sy’n arfer swyddogaethau o dan y Rhan hon ac eithrio fel awdurdod trwyddedu;
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers may give directions to a licensing authority or to a local housing authority exercising functions under this Part other than as licensing authority;

translation.cy: Mae’r nodiadau hyn yn cyfeirio at Ddeddf Tai (Cymru) 2014 (dccc 7)
translation.en: These notes refer to the Housing (Wales) Act 2014 (anaw 7)

translation.cy: a gafodd y Cydsyniad Brenhinol ar 17 Medi 2014
translation.en: which received Royal Assent on 17 September 2014

translation.cy: Caniateir ei draddodi neu ei thraddodi i’r person, ei anfon neu ei hanfon drwy’r post i gyfeiriad cywir y person, neu ei adael neu ei gadael yng nghyfeiriad cywir y person.
translation.en: It may be delivered to the person, delivered by post to the person’s proper address, or left at the person’s proper address.

translation.cy: Mae gan Weinidogion Cymru bŵer i amrywio’r amserlen hon.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers have the power to vary this timetable.

translation.cy: Adran 51 – Adolygiadau digartrefedd
translation.en: Section 51 – Homelessness reviews

translation.cy: atal digartrefedd;
translation.en: to prevent homelessness;

translation.cy: bod cymorth boddhaol ar gael hefyd i bobl sy’n ddigartref neu y gallent ddod yn ddigartref.
translation.en: that satisfactory support is also available for people who are or who may become homeless.

translation.cy: Maent yn cynnwys pobl sy’n gadael carchar neu lety cadw ieuenctid, pobl ifanc sy’n gadael gofal, pobl sy’n gadael y lluoedd arfog, pobl sy’n gadael yr ysbyty ar ôl cael triniaeth fel cleifion yno am anhwylder meddwl a phobl sy’n cael gwasanaethau iechyd meddwl yn y gymuned.
translation.en: They include people leaving prison or youth detention, young people leaving care, people leaving the armed forces, people leaving hospital after inpatient treatment for a mental disorder and people receiving mental health services in the community.

translation.cy: Ni fernir bod rhywun yn berson sydd â llety ond os yw’n rhesymol iddo barhau i’w feddiannu (mae adran 57 yn cyfeirio at hyn).
translation.en: Someone is considered to have accommodation only if it is reasonable for them to continue to occupy it (section 57 refers).

translation.cy: Mae’r nodiadau hyn yn cyfeirio at Ddeddf Tai (Cymru) 2014 (dccc 7)
translation.en: These notes refer to the Housing (Wales) Act 2014 (anaw 7)

translation.cy: Caiff y person arall hwnnw fod yn aelod o’r teulu neu berson arall y gellid disgwyl yn rhesymol iddo fyw gydag ef.
translation.en: This may be a family member or another person who may reasonably be expected to live with them.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (2) yn esbonio bod “aelod o aelwyd y person” yn golygu rhywun sy’n preswylio fel arfer gyda’r person hwnnw fel aelod o deulu’r person neu berson arall y gellid disgwyl yn rhesymol iddo fyw gyda’r person hwnnw.
translation.en: Subsection (2) explains that “member of a person’s household” means someone who normally resides with that person as a member of the person’s family or another person who might reasonable be expected to live with them.

translation.cy: Mae “camdriniaeth” yn golygu trais corfforol, ymddygiad bygythiol neu fygylus ac unrhyw ffurf o gamdriniaeth arall a all, yn uniongyrchol neu’n anuniongyrchol, arwain at berygl o niwed.
translation.en: By “abuse” is meant physical violence, threatening or intimidating behaviour and any other form of abuse which may give rise, directly or indirectly, to the risk of harm.

translation.cy: Diffinnir ystyr “cysylltiedig â” yn is-adran (2).
translation.en: The meaning of “associated with” is defined in subsection (2).

translation.cy: Caiff Gweinidogion Cymru bennu amgylchiadau pan na fo llety i’w ystyried yn addas a materion eraill y mae’n rhaid eu hystyried neu eu diystyru.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers may specify circumstances in which accommodation is not to be regarded as suitable and other matters that must be taken into account or disregarded.

translation.cy: Wrth drefnu’r gwasanaeth, caiff awdurdod weithio gydag awdurdodau tai lleol eraill.
translation.en: In arranging the service, an authority may work with other local housing authorities.

translation.cy: Nid yw’r darpariaethau hyn wedi eu hatgynhyrchu yma, gan fod pwerau cyffredinol awdurdodau lleol ar gael ar gyfer hyn.
translation.en: These provisions have not been replicated here, since general local authority powers are now available for this.

translation.cy: Nid oes rhaid i’r cais fod yn gais am gynhorthwy o dan y Bennod hon.
translation.en: The application does not have to be for assistance under this Chapter.

translation.cy: Nodir y rhain yn is-adrannau (5)(a)-(d) a (6)(a)-(b).
translation.en: These are set out in subsections (5)(a)-(d) and (6)(a)-(b).

translation.cy: Mae achos 2 yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i adolygu asesiad os yw’n ymddangos i’r awdurdod fod y ddyletswydd i helpu i sicrhau llety o dan adran 73 wedi dod i ben neu y bydd yn dod i ben ac y gall dyletswydd fod yn ddyledus i’r ceisydd o dan adran 75.
translation.en: Case 2 requires a review of an assessment if it appears to the authority that the duty to help secure accommodation under section 73 has or will come to an end and a duty may be owed to the applicant under section 75.

translation.cy: Fel enghraifft bellach, o ran angen blaenoriaethol, bydd awdurdod yn dal yn gorfod ystyried a yw’n ymddangos bod ceisydd mewn angen blaenoriaethol at ddibenion ystyried ei ddyletswyddau mewn cysylltiad â llety interim o dan adran 68.
translation.en: As a further example, with regard to priority need, an authority will still have to consider if an applicant appears to be in priority need for the purposes of considering its duties in respect of interim accommodation under section 68.

translation.cy: Caiff awdurdod tai lleol gynorthwyo i sicrhau llety addas i’w feddiannu gan geisydd mewn nifer o ffyrdd:
translation.en: A local housing authority may help to secure suitable accommodation for occupation by an applicant in a number of ways:

translation.cy: Mae’r nodiadau hyn yn cyfeirio at Ddeddf Tai (Cymru) 2014 (dccc 7)
translation.en: These notes refer to the Housing (Wales) Act 2014 (anaw 7)

translation.cy: Adran 66 – Dyletswydd i gynorthwyo i atal ceisydd rhag dod yn ddigartref
translation.en: Section 66 – Duty to help to prevent an applicant from becoming homeless

translation.cy: Os yw awdurdod tai lleol yn fodlon bod ceisydd o dan fygythiad o ddigartrefedd (mae adran 55(4) yn cyfeirio at hyn) ac yn gymwys i gael cymorth (Atodlen 2), rhaid iddo gynorthwyo’r ceisydd i sicrhau na fydd llety addas yn peidio â bod ar gael i’r ceisydd ei feddiannu.
translation.en: If a local housing authority is satisfied that an applicant is threatened with homelessness (section 55(4) refers) and eligible for help (Schedule 2), it must help the applicant to ensure that suitable accommodation does not cease to be available for the applicant’s occupation.

translation.cy: Nodir yr amgylchiadau pan fo’r ddyletswydd yn adran 66 yn dod i ben yn is-adrannau (2), (3), neu (4).
translation.en: The circumstances in which the duty in section 66 ends are set out in subsections (2), (3), or (4).

translation.cy: neu
translation.en: or

translation.cy: Mae gan rai pobl angen blaenoriaethol am lety at ddibenion Pennod 2 o’r Rhan hon.
translation.en: Some people have a priority need for accommodation for the purposes of Chapter 2 of this Part.

translation.cy: Diffinnir termau megis “cartref gofal”, “grŵp comisiynu clinigol”, “swyddogaethau addysg”, “ysbyty annibynnol”, “awdurdod lleol yn Lloegr”, a “Bwrdd Iechyd Lleol” yn is-adran (3).
translation.en: Terms such as “care home”, “clinical commissioning group”, “education functions”, “independent hospital”, “local authority in England”, and “Local Health Board” are defined in subsection (3).

translation.cy: Adran 72 – Pŵer i ddiwygio neu ddiddymu darpariaethau ynglŷn ag angen blaenoriaethol am lety
translation.en: Section 72 – Power to amend or repeal provisions about priority need for accommodation

translation.cy: Mae’r nodiadau hyn yn cyfeirio at Ddeddf Tai (Cymru) 2014 (dccc 7)
translation.en: These notes refer to the Housing (Wales) Act 2014 (anaw 7)

translation.cy: Mewn achosion pan fo’r awdurdod sy’n cael ei hysbysu yn Lloegr, dylid trin yr achos yn unol ag adran 201A o Ddeddf Tai 1996.
translation.en: In cases where the notified authority is in England, the case should be dealt with in accordance with section 201A of the Housing Act 1996.

translation.cy: Mae is-adran (5) yn rhoi p*er i’r awdurdod i ddarparu llety dros dro wrth aros am apêl os oedd dyletswydd yn ddyledus i’r ceisydd o dan adran 68, 75 neu 82.
translation.en: Subsection (5) gives the authority a power to provide temporary accommodation pending appeal if the applicant was owed a duty under sections 68, 75 or 82.

translation.cy: Gall y rhestr o bersonau yn is-adran (5) gael ei diwygio gan Weinidogion Cymru drwy orchymyn;
translation.en: The list of persons in subsection (5) can be amended by the Welsh Ministers by order;

translation.cy: Adran 96 - Cydweithredu mewn achosion penodol yn ymwneud â phlant
translation.en: Section 96 - Co-operation in certain cases involving children

translation.cy: Wrth arfer unrhyw un neu rai o’i swyddogaethau sy’n ymwneud â digartrefedd, rhaid i awdurdod lleol yng Nghymru roi sylw i unrhyw ganllawiau a ddyroddir gan Weinidogion Cymru.
translation.en: In exercising any of its functions relating to homelessness, a local authority in Wales must have regard to any guidance issued by the Welsh Ministers.

translation.cy: Yn ddarostyngedig i’r gofyniad hwn, mater i bob awdurdod tai lleol fydd penderfynu pryd y bydd yr asesiadau hyn yn digwydd.
translation.en: Subject to this requirement it will be for each local housing authority to decide when these assessments occur.

translation.cy: Ar ôl cynnal asesiad, rhaid i awdurdod tai lleol baratoi adroddiad.
translation.en: After carrying out an assessment, a local housing authority must prepare a report.

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r adroddiad roi manylion ynghylch y modd y cynhaliwyd yr asesiad a chrynhoi’r ymgynghoriad ac unrhyw ymatebion a gafwyd.
translation.en: The report must detail how the assessment was carried out and summarise the consultation and any responses received.

translation.cy: Caiff Gweinidogion Cymru gymeradwyo asesiad awdurdod, gydag addasiadau neu hebddynt, neu ei wrthod.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers may approve an authority’s assessment, with or without modifications, or reject it.

translation.cy: Rhaid i’r cyfarwyddyd gael ei roi ar ffurf ysgrifenedig a chaniateir iddo gael ei amrywio neu ei ddirymu gan gyfarwyddyd dilynol.
translation.en: The direction must be given in writing and may be varied or revoked by a subsequent direction.

translation.cy: Adran 107 – Dyletswyddau mewn perthynas â strategaethau tai
translation.en: Section 107 – Duties in relation to housing strategies

translation.cy: Mae “swyddogaethau” at y diben hwn yn cynnwys unrhyw swyddogaethau a roddir iddo heblaw yn rhinwedd ei swyddogaeth fel awdurdod tai lleol (mae awdurdodau tai lleol yng Nghymru yn gynghorau sir neu’n gynghorau bwrdeistref sirol sy’n arfer ystod o swyddogaethau sy’n ymdrin ag amryw o faterion).
translation.en: “Functions” for this purpose includes any functions conferred upon it other than in its capacity as a local housing authority (local housing authorities in Wales are county or county borough councils which exercise a range of functions dealing with a variety of matters).

translation.cy: Caiff Gweinidogion Cymru, drwy orchymyn, newid y diffiniad o Sipsiwn a Theithwyr drwy ychwanegu, dileu, neu addasu disgrifiad o unrhyw bersonau.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers may, by order, change the definition of Gypsies and Travellers by adding, removing, or modifying a description of any persons.

translation.cy: Rhaid i Weinidogion Cymru gyhoeddi’r holl safonau a hysbysiadau a roddir o dan yr adran hon.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers must publish all standards and notices given under this section.

translation.cy: Caniateir i ganllawiau gael eu tynnu’n ôl hefyd drwy hysbysiad.
translation.en: Guidance may also be withdrawn by way of notice.

translation.cy: Adran 116 – Arfer pwerau ymyrryd
translation.en: Section 116 – Exercise of intervention powers

translation.cy: Adran 117 – Sail ar gyfer ymyrryd
translation.en: Section 117 – Grounds for intervention

translation.cy: Mae’r nodiadau hyn yn cyfeirio at Ddeddf Tai (Cymru) 2014 (dccc 7)
translation.en: These notes refer to the Housing (Wales) Act 2014 (anaw 7)

translation.cy: Rhaid i awdurdod tai lleol y rhoddir iddo, neu i unrhyw un o’i swyddogion, gyfarwyddyd neu arweiniad gydymffurfio ag ef.
translation.en: A local housing authority to which, or any of its officers to whom, a direction or instruction is given must comply with it.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, ni chaiff p*er a roddir i awdurdod fod yn arferadwy ond os yw’r awdurdod wedi ei fodloni y byddai ei arfer yn debyg o sicrhau canlyniad penodol.
translation.en: For example, a power conferred on an authority may be exercisable only if the authority is satisfied that its exercise is likely to achieve a particular outcome.

translation.cy: Adran 129 – Cymhwyso dyletswyddau sy’n ymwneud â ffioedd gwasanaeth i denantiaethau awdurdod lleol
translation.en: Section 129 – Application of duties relating to service charges to local authority tenancies

translation.cy: Bydd adran 131 yn cael ei dwyn i rym ar ôl arfer (fel y bo’n angenrheidiol) pwerau a gynhwysir yn narpariaethau eraill y Rhan hon.
translation.en: Section 131 will be brought into force after the exercise (as necessary) of powers contained in the other provisions of this Part.

translation.cy: Daw adrannau 132 i 136 i rym yn awtomatig ar ôl i’r cyfnod o 2 fis o’r dyddiad y caiff y Ddeddf y Cydsyniad Brenhinol.
translation.en: Sections 132 to 136 automatically come into force after the expiry of the 2 month period from the date on which the Act receives Royal Assent.

translation.cy: Gan fod Gweinidogion Cymru ar hyn o bryd yn cael Cymhorthdal Cyfrif Refeniw Tai negyddol oddi wrth bob awdurdod tai lleol, bydd yn ofynnol wedyn i awdurdod tai lleol wneud taliad setlo i Weinidogion Cymru.
translation.en: As the Welsh Ministers currently receive negative Housing Revenue Account Subsidy from each local housing authority then a local housing authority will be required to make a settlement payment to the Welsh Ministers.

translation.cy: Adran 133 – Taliadau pellach
translation.en: Section 133 – Further payments

translation.cy: Caiff Gweinidogion Cymru wneud dyfarniad pellach i gywiro taliad setlo a wnaed o dan Adran 132.
translation.en: The Welsh Ministers may make a further determination to correct a settlement payment made under Section 132.

translation.cy: Cyn gwneud dyfarniad o dan y Rhan hon, rhaid i Weinidogion Cymru ymgynghori â chynrychiolwyr llywodraeth leol ac unrhyw bersonau eraill sy’n briodol yn eu barn hwy.
translation.en: Before making a determination under this Part, the Welsh Ministers must consult with representatives of local government and such other persons they consider to be appropriate.

translation.cy: TENANTIAETHAU SICR
translation.en: ASSURED TENANCIES

translation.cy: Mae lle i fabwysiadu dull fesul cam o weithredu’r premiwm gyda chodiadau cynyddrannol yn gymwys dros gyfnod amser.
translation.en: There is scope to adopt a stepped approach to the premium with incremental increases applying over time.

translation.cy: Wrth ddyfarnu a yw annedd yn annedd wag hirdymor, rhaid peidio ag ystyried unrhyw gyfnod sy’n dod cyn y dyddiad y daw’r adran i rym.
translation.en: In determining whether a dwelling is a long-term empty dwelling, no account is to be taken of any period which pre-dates the coming into force of the section.

translation.cy: Nodir y trefniadau ar gyfer gwneud, amrywio neu ddirymu dyfarniad i godi premiwm mewn cysylltiad ag anheddau gwag hirdymor yn is-adrannau (7) i (9) o’r adran 12A newydd;
translation.en: The arrangements for making, varying or revoking a determination to charge a premium in respect of long-term empty dwellings are set out in subsections (7) to (9) of new section 12A;

translation.cy: Bydd y diwygiad i adran 99(5) a wneir gan yr adran hon yn caniatáu i denantiaid yng Nghymru ddewis p’un a fyddant yn llofnodi hysbysiadau eu hunain neu drefnu bod hysbysiadau’n cael eu llofnodi ar eu rhan.

translation.cy: Ni allai mwy fod yn y fantol.
translation.en: The  stakes could not be higher.

translation.cy: O ystyried hynny, byddwn yn parhau i herio unrhyw ddull o ymdrin â’r negodiadau sy’n rhoi blaenoriaeth i allu’r DU i symud oddi wrth safonau rheoleiddiol yr UE.
translation.en: Given this, we will continue to challenge any approach to the negotiations which prioritises the ability of the UK to diverge from EU regulatory standards.

translation.cy: Byddwn felly yn gwrthwynebu unrhyw agenda ddadreoleiddio, a fydd yn peri niwed i fuddiannau pobl.
translation.en: We will therefore oppose any agenda of deregulation, which will damage consumers’ interests.

translation.cy: Mae angen cytundeb arnom sy’n adlewyrchu buddiannau Cymru a’r DU gyfan.
translation.en: We need an agreement which reflects the interests of Wales and the United Kingdom.

translation.cy: Ac mae angen i’r DU barhau’n undeb economaidd sydd wedi’i seilio ar barch o bob ochr tuag at gyfrifoldebau pob un o lywodraethau’r Undeb.
translation.en: And the UK needs to continue as an economic union underpinned by mutual respect for the responsibilities of all governments of the Union.

translation.cy: rhaid i lais y llywodraethau datganoledig gael ei glywed hefyd.
translation.en: the voice of the devolved governments must be  heard.

translation.cy: Rhaid inni osgoi’r posibil rwydd o syrthio dros ddibyn arall ym mis Rhagfyr 2020 os na cheir cytundeb cynhwysfawr dros y flwyddyn nesaf.
translation.en: We must rule out the possibility of a cliff edge in December 2020 should a comprehensive agreement not be reached over the coming year.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn golygu:
translation.en: This means:

translation.cy: Dogfen yw’r “Datganiad Gwleidyddol” sy’n gysylltiedig â Chytundeb yr UE a’r DU ar Ymadawiad y DU â’r UE
translation.en: The "Political Declaration" is a document attached to the EU-UK Agreement on UK Withdrawal from the EU.

translation.cy: Dogfen wleidyddol ei natur yw hi ac nid yw’n ffurfio rhan gyfreithiol rwymol o’r cytundeb;
translation.en: The document is political in nature and does not form a legally binding part of the agreement;

translation.cy: Wrth wneud hynny, rydym yn cydnabod bod gan Lywodraeth y DU fandad i seilio’r negodiadau ar y Datganiad Gwleidyddol fel y mae ond credwn hefyd fod rhaid i gytundeb â’r UE yn y dyfodol adlewyrchu a diogelu buddiannau Cymru a’r DU gyfan.
translation.en: In doing so we recognise that the UK Government has a mandate to base the negotiations on the Political Declaration as set out but we also believe that a future agreement with the European Union must reflect and protect the interests of Wales and the United Kingdom as a whole.

translation.cy: Mae Llywodraeth Cymru yn cytuno â’r gwerthoedd a’r hawliau craidd a nodir ym mharagraffau 6 a 7 o’r Datganiad Gwleidyddol.
translation.en: The Welsh Government concurs with the core values and rights set out in paragraphs 6 and 7 of the Political Declaration.

translation.cy: Mae’r cyllid o raglenni’r UE o bwys enfawr i Gymru, gan ysgogi twf economaidd a swyddi.
translation.en: The funding from EU programmes is hugely important to Wales, driving economic growth and jobs.

translation.cy: Croesawn y testun sy’n dynodi bwriad y DU i ymchwilio i opsiynau ar gyfer perthynas â Banc Buddsoddi Ewrop (EIB) yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: We welcome the text indicating the UK intention ‘to explore options for a future relationship with the European Investment Bank (EIB)’.

translation.cy: Er eu bod y tu hwnt i gwmpas y 	 negodiadau â’r UE, mae Cymru hefyd yn elwa ar fuddsoddiad sylweddol gan yr UE ar ffurf Cronfeydd Strwythurol yr UE a thaliadau’r Polisi Amaethyddol Cyffredin (PAC).
translation.en: While outside the scope of the negotiations with the EU, Wales also benefits from significant EU investment in the form of EU Structural Funds and Common Agricultural Policy (CAP) payments.

translation.cy: Nid yw Llywodraeth y DU wedi cyhoeddi asesiad economaidd wedi’i ddiweddaru ar gyfer y cytundeb presennol.
translation.en: The UK Government has not published an updated economic assessment of the current deal.

translation.cy: Os cytundeb masnach rydd fydd sail perthynas y DU â’r UE yn y dyfodol, rhaid i’r DU geisio’r cydweddiad agosaf posibl â’r UE.
translation.en: If a FTA is to be the basis of the UK’s future relationship with the EU, the UK must seek the closest possible alignment with the EU.

translation.cy: Yr unig beth a fyddai’n golygu NAD yw hyn yn bosibl yw pe bai’r DU yn creu gwahaniaeth.
translation.en: The only extent to which this is NOT possible is where the UK imposes difference.

translation.cy: Po fwyaf o rwystrau a geir i fasnachu rhwng y DU a’r UE (yn enwedig Gweriniaeth Iwerddon), a pho leiaf yw’r gwiriadau ar y ffin rhwng Prydain a Gogledd Iwerddon, po fwyaf o ysgogiad fydd i newid y llwybrau masnachu o Weriniaeth Iwerddon a Phrydain, i Ogledd Iwerddon a Phrydain.
translation.en: The more extensive are the trade barriers between the UK and the EU (notably RoI), and the less extensive are the border checks are between GB and NI, the more incentive there will be to divert trade from RoI-GB to NI-GB routes.

translation.cy: Mae’n bosibl y bydd yr effaith fwyaf ar lwythi ar gyfer Gogledd Iwerddon, sy’n cael eu hanfon o Gymru drwy Weriniaeth Iwerddon ar hyn o bryd.
translation.en: The impact might be felt particularly for consignments which are destined for NI but which are currently sent from Wales via RoI.

translation.cy: Mae Llywodraeth Cymru wedi ymrwymo’n llwyr i amddiffyn dyfodol y GIG yng Nghymru.
translation.en: The Welsh Government is wholly committed to defending the integrity of NHS Wales.

translation.cy: Gan gydnabod y gwerth y mae Dangosyddion Daearyddol wedi’i roi i sectorau pwysig yng Nghymru, gan gynnwys Cig Oen a Chig Eidion o Gymru, rydym yn cytuno â’r darpariaethau (paragraff 43) ynghylch yr angen i amddiffyn eu dangosyddion daearyddol mewn modd priodol.
translation.en: Recognising the value that Geographic Indicators have provided to important sectors in Wales, including Welsh Lamb and Welsh Beef, we agree with the provisions (para 43) on the need ‘to provide appropriate protection for their geographical indications’.

translation.cy: Gyda’r polisi domestig cywir yn ei le ar gyfer mewnfudo, mae llawer llai o angen cymryd rhan mewn trafodaethau manwl ar symudedd.
translation.en: With the right domestic policy in place for immigration there is a much reduced need to engage in detailed negotiations on mobility.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal, ers 2016, mae pŵer gwario defnyddwyr wedi cael ei erydu gan effeithiau dibrisio sterling ar brisiau.
translation.en: In addition, since 2016, consumers have seen their spending power eroded by the effects of the depreciation of sterling on prices.

translation.cy: Mewn termau economaidd, byddai’r cyfuniad hwn (a fyddai’n cyfuno’r rhes gyntaf ag elfennau’r ail res yn y tabl) yn arwain at effeithiau economaidd negyddol bach iawn o’i gymharu ag aros yn yr UE.
translation.en: In economic terms, this combination (which in the table would combine the first row with elements of the second row) would result in minimal negative economic effects when compared with remaining in the EU.

translation.cy: Gyda FTA cyfyngedig â’r UE byddai Llywodraeth y DU’n rhydd i fynd ar drywydd ei chytundebau masnach rydd eu hunain â gwledydd eraill.
translation.en: With a limited FTA with the EU the UK Government would be free to pursue its own free trade deals with other countries.

translation.cy: Yn yr un modd, dengys y dadansoddiad y byddai manteision unrhyw newidiadau i reoliadau’r DU yn fach iawn (os ydynt yn bodoli o gwbl).
translation.en: Similarly, analysis shows that the benefits of any changes to UK regulations would be very small (if they exist at all).

translation.cy: Ymhellach, dros y tymor hir, mae effaith y sefyllfaoedd Brexit mwy andwyol yn debygol o fod ar ffurf gostyngiadau mewn buddsoddiad a thwf is mewn cynhyrchiant, yn hytrach na cholli swyddi a chau gweithfeydd y gellir eu nodi’n haws.
translation.en: Furthermore, over the long run, the impact of the more adverse Brexit scenarios is likely to take the form of reductions in investment and lower productivity growth, rather than easily identifiable job losses and plant closures.

translation.cy: Hyd yn oed os yw swyddi’n cael eu colli a gweithfeydd yn cael eu cau, bydd yn anos eu priodoli yn ddiamwys i Brexit.
translation.en: Even where such losses and closures occur, it will often be difficult to attribute them unambiguously to Brexit.

translation.cy: Mae’r Mudiad hefyd wedi rhoi’r cyfle i weithwyr y blynyddoedd cynnar ennill Diploma Lefel 3 Gofal Plant drwy gyfrwng y Gymraeg.
translation.en: Mudiad Meithrin has also provided early years workers with the opportunity to gain a Level 3 Childcare Diploma through the medium of Welsh.

translation.cy: I’r perwyl hwnnw, gwnaeth Aled Roberts argymhelliad yn ei Adolygiad Brys o Gynlluniau Strategol y Gymraeg mewn Addysg (CSGA) i edrych ar hyfforddiant a recriwtio (Argymhelliad 13 - Cynllunio a gweithredu brys er mwyn cynyddu’r nifer  o athrawon sydd yn cael eu hyfforddi i addysgu yn y Gymraeg).
translation.en: To this end, Aled Roberts recommended in his Rapid Review of Welsh in Education Strategic Plans that training and recruitment should be looked at (Recommendation 13 - Urgent planning and action to increase the number of teachers trained to teach through the medium of Welsh).

translation.cy: Yn ogystal, mae nifer o ddiwygiadau yn digwydd ym maes hyfforddiant cychwynnol athrawon ac mae gwaith ar y gweill gyda swyddogion o’r meysydd polisi priodol ym maes Addysg (e.e. o ran datblygiadau gyda’r Consortia, a phrosesau hyfforddi a recriwtio athrawon) i sicrhau’r cynnydd sydd ei angen erbyn 2021.
translation.en: In addition, a number of reforms are being made in the initial teacher training area, and work is ongoing among officers in the appropriate education policy areas (e.g. in terms of developments with the Consortia, and teacher training and recruitment processes) to ensure the necessary progress by 2021.

translation.cy: Mae Cymraeg 2050 yn nodi y byddwn yn cynyddu nifer yr athrawon yng Nghymru sy’n gallu addysgu trwy gyfrwng y Gymraeg i 3,100 o athrawon cynradd a 2,800 o athrawon uwchradd erbyn 2021.
translation.en: Cymraeg 2050 states that we will increase the number of teachers in Wales who can teach through the medium of Welsh to 3,100 primary teachers and 2,800 secondary teachers by 2021.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn amlinellu rhagor o ymyriadau yn hyn o beth yn adroddiad blynyddol 2018-19, a gyhoeddir maes o law.

translation.en: In its third year, Welsh Language Music Day continued to grow and it gave the Welsh Government an opportunity to work in partnership with Learn Welsh, the BBC’s Horizons Project, EE, Rhys Ifans, S4C, Radio Cymru, the Forte project for emerging artists, the Mentrau Iaith and many more.

translation.en: We will continue to work with S4C to fulfil our aspirations for the language.

translation.en: When we operate abroad, we always strive to promote the language as one of Wales’s most valuable assets, and ensure that Wales is promoted as a bilingual country.

translation.en: All events which receive grant support from the Major Events Division are encouraged to introduce a Welsh language policy to promote the language, and to help them use it effectively when holding and marketing the event.

translation.en: The Welsh Government gives an annual grant of £90,000 to the London Welsh School, which promotes Welsh in London and provides Welsh-medium primary education for children, a number of whom return in due course to the Welsh-medium education system in Wales.

translation.cy: Fe’i rheolir gan y Cyngor Prydeinig ar ran Llywodraeth Cymru mewn cydweithrediad â Chymdeithas Cymru-Ariannin, Ysgol y Gymraeg, Prifysgol Caerdydd, yr Urdd a’r Ganolfan Dysgu Cymraeg Genedlaethol.
translation.en: It is managed by the British Council on behalf of the Welsh Government, in conjunction with Cymdeithas Cymru-Ariannin, Cardiff University’s School of Welsh, the Urdd, and the National Centre for Learning Welsh.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn hanfodol er mwyn sicrhau y bydd yn bosibl defnyddio’r Gymraeg ar ddyfeisiau electronig.

translation.en: During the reporting year, the task of assessing the different elements of that infrastructure was begun. This includes dictionaries, terminology, corpora, and the translation profession, to see what already exists and what is needed to move forward.

translation.en: In order to learn more about the Welsh language skills of the education workforce, preparatory work was done during 2018-19 for an annual census of the school workforce.

translation.cy: Heddiw, rwy'n cyhoeddi cynigion ein Cyllideb ar gyfer 2020-21, sef blwyddyn olaf tymor y Cynulliad hwn.
translation.en: I am today publishing our budget proposals for 2020-21, the final year of this Assembly term.

translation.cy: Rydym yn darparu pecyn o fuddsoddiadau gwerth mwy na £120m i gefnogi Cymru ffyniannus.
translation.en: We are providing a package of investments worth more than £120m to support a more prosperous Wales.

translation.cy: 1.09 Roedd y Cylch Gwario hefyd yn cynnwys cynnydd o £18m i'n cyllideb gyfalaf a oedd eisoes wedi'i phennu ar gyfer 2020-21.
translation.en: 1.09 The Spending Round also included an increase of £18m to our capital budget which had already been set for 2020-21.

translation.cy: Mae'n debygol y bydd Cyllideb nesaf y DU yn cael effaith sylweddol ar yr arian a fydd gan Lywodraeth Cymru ar gyfer 2020-21.
translation.en: It is likely that the next UK Budget will have a considerable bearing on the Welsh Government’s finances for 2020-21.

translation.cy: 1.24 Oherwydd y ffactorau allanol sydd wedi dylanwadu ar amseriad y gyllideb eleni, mae Llywodraeth Cymru wedi rhoi trefniadau eithriadol ar waith o ran proses y gyllideb, a hynny gyda chytundeb Pwyllgor Busnes a Pwyllgor Cyllid y Cynulliad Cenedlaethol.
translation.en: 1.24 In light of the external factors that have influenced the timing of this year’s budget, the Welsh Government has, with the agreement of the National Assembly’s Business Committee and Finance Committee, triggered exceptional arrangements in relation to this year’s budget process.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys cyhoeddi gyda'i gilydd y cynlluniau gwario strategol ar gyfer refeniw a chyfalaf, a chynigion ar drethiant a benthyca, yn ogystal â chynigion portffolio manwl y gyllideb.
translation.en: This includes publishing together the strategic spending plans for revenue and capital, and taxation and borrowing proposals, as well as the detailed portfolio budget proposals.

translation.cy: Mae pennod pump yn nodi sut y mae'r Ddeddf wedi llywio ein cyllideb.

translation.en: 2.02 Figure two on the following page shows that if spending on public services had kept pace with growth in GDP since 2010-11, the Welsh Government would have nearly £4bn extra to spend on public services in 2020-21.

translation.cy: Yn dilyn y Cylch Gwario un flwyddyn ym mis Medi eleni, bydd angen i Lywodraeth newydd y DU gynnal Cylch Gwario pellach neu Adolygiad o Wariant amlflwyddyn y flwyddyn nesaf.
translation.en: Following the one-year Spending Round in September this year, the incoming UK Government will need to carry out a further Spending Round or multi-year Spending Review next year.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, heb wybod manylion y cynlluniau gwario ar gyfer gwasanaethau cyhoeddus eraill sydd wedi'u datganoli i Gymru, nid yw'n bosibl dweud gydag unrhyw sicrwydd beth fydd y rhagolygon ar gyfer cyllideb gyfan Llywodraeth Cymru.
translation.en: However, without knowing the expenditure plans for other public services which are devolved in Wales, it is not possible to say with any certainty what the outlook for the overall Welsh Government budget will look like.

translation.cy: Byddai hyn yn golygu twf sydd rywfaint yn arafach na'r hyn a welwyd yn 2019-20 a 202021, ond sy'n gyflymach na'r hyn a welwyd yn y blynyddoedd diwethaf.
translation.en: This would represent somewhat slower growth than seen in 2019-20 and 2020-21, but faster than in recent years.

translation.en: 2.19 This has already enabled many businesses and organisations to prepare for the impact Brexit will have on them, and to cope with the uncertainty involved.

translation.en: That is why the Welsh Government has called for a second referendum.

translation.en: It should not limit our ability to continue to invest in our economy and the people of Wales.

translation.cy: Wrth lunio'r Gyllideb hon, ac er mwyn ymateb i'r ansicrwydd parhaus o ran Brexit, rydym wedi cynllunio ar y sail y byddwn yn derbyn yr un lefel o gyllid yn 2020-21, naill ai oddi wrth Lywodraeth y DU neu'r UE, ag a gafwyd yn hanesyddol o'r UE.
translation.en: In preparing this Budget, and in response to the ongoing uncertainty linked to Brexit, we have planned on the basis that in 2020-21 we will receive either from the UK Government, or from the EU, the same level of funds which have historically come to Wales from the EU.

translation.cy: 2.26 Pe baem yn ymadael â'r UE heb gytundeb, mae Llywodraeth flaenorol y DU wedi rhoi gwarant o ran parhad rhaglenni cyllido'r UE a gymeradwywyd cyn inni ymadael â'r UE.
translation.en: 2.26 The previous UK Government has provided a guarantee, should we leave the EU without a deal, for EU funding programmes which were approved prior to our exit from the EU.

translation.cy: Mae datganoli wedi bod yn rhan sefydledig o gyfansoddiad y DU ers dros 20 mlynedd, ac rydym yn falch bod llywodraethau'r DU, un ar ôl y llall, wedi cadarnhau y byddant yn parchu'r setliad cyfansoddiadol hir-sefydledig hwn.
translation.en: Devolution has been an established part of the UK constitution for over 20 years and we are pleased that successive UK governments have confirmed they will respect this well-established constitutional settlement.

translation.cy: Ni all Llywodraeth y DU osgoi'r setliad datganoli na chymryd yn ôl benderfyniadau a chyllid a fu o dan reolaeth Cymru ers bron 20 mlynedd.
translation.en: The UK Government cannot bypass the devolution settlement or take back decisions and funding that have been under Wales’ control for nearly 20 years.

translation.en: £2bn as a result of our innovative finance initiatives - which provide a much-needed boost to capital budgets enabling investment to be delivered sooner than would have otherwise been achievable.

translation.en: The investment we have made during this term provides a solid foundation on which to build to support us in delivering the Wales we want.

translation.en: Income tax is partially devolved to Wales, which means that while the Welsh Government is able to vary the three income tax rates (basic, higher and additional) for Welsh taxpayers, all other aspects of the tax remain the responsibility of the UK Government, and HMRC continues to administer income tax in Wales.
