translation.cy: mae’n gymorth i wneud i bobl a chymunedau deimlo’n fwy cysylltiedig ac yn hybu busnesau lleol;
translation.en: it helps make people and communities feel more connected and boost local businesses;

translation.cy: awdurdodau lleol, gweithwyr iechyd proffesiynol, y sector addysg, busnesau, y trydydd sector ac, nid lleiaf, pobl Cymru.
translation.en: local authorities, health professionals, the education sector, businesses, the third sector and not least the people of Wales.

translation.cy: Derbyniodd Deddf Teithio Llesol (Cymru) 2013 (y Ddeddf Teithio Llesol) Gydsyniad Brenhinol ym mis Tachwedd 2013, a daeth i rym ym mis Medi 2014.
translation.en: The Active Travel (Wales) Act 2013 (Active Travel Act) received Royal Assent in November 2013 and came into force in September 2014.

translation.cy: Ond rhan o'r darlun yn unig yw'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: But the Act is only a part of the picture.

translation.cy: Roedd atebion yr ymgynghoriad yn ei gwneud yn eglur, er bod cryn gefnogaeth i nodau'r Cynllun Gweithredu a llawer o'i gynnwys manwl, bod dymuniad ymhlith llawer am Gynllun Gweithredu oedd yn mynegi ei uchelgais a'i gyfeiriad strategol a'i gysylltiadau yn fwy eglur ac a oedd yn llai cyfyngedig i amser.
translation.en: The consultation responses made clear that, while there was much support for the aims of the Action Plan and much of its detailed content, there was a widespread desire for an Action Plan that expressed its ambition and strategic direction and links more clearly and was less time-limited.

translation.cy: Datblygwyd y ddogfen hon mewn ymateb i'r pryderon a'r awgrymiadau hynny.
translation.en: This document has been developed in response to those concerns and suggestions.

translation.cy: Ffigur 1 - Strwythur Cynllun Gweithredu Teithio Llesol
translation.en: Figure 1 - Structure of Active Travel Action Plan

translation.cy: Yr hyn nad yw'r cynllun hwn yn ei wneud:
translation.en: What this plan does not do:

translation.cy: Ar hyn o bryd, mae llawer gormod o bobl yng Nghymru, nad ydynt byth yn mynd ar deithiau llesol, ac yn rhy aml nid yw teithio llesol yn ystyriaeth prif lif pan fydd gwasanaethau neu gyfleusterau newydd yn cael eu cyflwyno.
translation.en: At present, too many people in Wales rarely or never make active travel journeys, and too often active travel is not a mainstream consideration when new services or facilities are delivered.

translation.cy: Rydym yn cydnabod bod gwahanol rannau o Gymru yn cyflwyno amgylchiadau gwahanol iawn;
translation.en: We recognise that different areas of Wales present very different circumstances;

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn golygu bod cefnogi teithio llesol yn ffordd uniongyrchol iawn y gall awdurdodau lleol a Llywodraeth Cymru gyfrannu at gyflawni eu dyletswyddau nid yn unig dan y Ddeddf Teithio Llesol ond hefyd dan Ddeddf Llesiant Cenedlaethau'r Dyfodol.
translation.en: This means that supporting active travel is a very straightforward way in which local authorities and the Welsh Government can contribute to meeting their duties not only under the Active Travel Act, but also under the Future Generations Act.

translation.cy: Ffigur 2:
translation.en: Figure 2:

translation.cy: Integreiddio:
translation.en: Integration:

translation.cy: ar draws gwahanol ffyrdd o deithio ac o ddefnyddio tir a gweithgareddau ategol;
translation.en: across transport modes, land uses, complementary activities;

translation.cy: Mae Cadeirydd y Bwrdd yn annibynnol.
translation.en: The Board has an independent Chair.

translation.cy: Mae dyletswyddau'r Ddeddf Teithio Llesol yn ymwneud ag awdurdodau lleol a Gweinidogion Cymru ond mae gan Fyrddau Gwasanaethau Cyhoeddus gyda’u cylch gwaith traws-wasanaethau strategol, y potensial i gyflawni swyddogaeth bwysig ar lefel leol, yn hyrwyddo ac yn goruchwylio cyflawni teithio llesol ar draws gweithgareddau partneriaid.
translation.en: The duties of the Active Travel Act relate to local authorities and Welsh Ministers, but Public Services Boards with their strategic, cross-service remit, have the potential to fulfil a an important role at the local level in championing and overseeing active travel delivery across partners’ activities.

translation.cy: Adroddir am enghreifftiau o weithgarwch traws-adrannol y Gweinidog drwy’r adroddiad blynyddol. Mae'r Bwrdd Teithio Llesol yn darparu goruchwyliaeth strategol genedlaethol ar y modd y mae'r Ddeddf Teithio Llesol a'r Cynllun Gweithredu yn cael eu cyflawni ac mae’n defnyddio galluoedd sefydliadol aelodau i hyrwyddo teithio llesol.
translation.en: The Active Travel Board provides national strategic oversight of delivery of the Active Travel Act and the Action Plan and use members’ organisational capacities to champion active travel.

translation.cy: Bydd Llywodraeth Cymru yn gweithio’n agos gydag Awdurdodau Lleol er mwyn cyfleu sut mae teithio llesol yn cefnogi nodau llesiant yn uniongyrchol ac yn gymorth i gyflawni ar draws gwasanaethau.
translation.en: The Welsh Government will work closely with local authorities to communicate how active travel directly supports the well-being goals and benefits cross service delivery.

translation.cy: Beirniadwyd dulliau blaenorol o arfarnu trafnidiaeth am beidio ag adlewyrchu buddion cynlluniau teithio llesol yn ddigonol, yn enwedig y manteision o ran iechyd.
translation.en: Previous methods of transport appraisal have been criticised for inadequately reflecting wider benefits of active travel schemes, in particular health benefits.

translation.cy: Bydd y fersiwn ddiwygiedig yn ystyried sut y gellir ymgorffori'r manteision hyn yn gywir yn y gwerthusiad.
translation.en: The revision will consider how capturing these benefits can be accurately incorporated into appraisal.

translation.cy: Mae ymgorffori teithio llesol i mewn i drefn ddyddiol plant a phobl ifanc yn flaenoriaeth i gefnogi datblygiad diwylliant o deithio llesol yng Nghymru.
translation.en: Incorporating active travel into the daily routine for children and young people is a priority to support development of a culture of active travel in Wales.

translation.cy: Mae angen i ysgolion fod wedi bod yn ymwneud â'r WNHSS am naw mlynedd o leiaf cyn y gallant wneud cais am y Wobr Ansawdd.
translation.en: Schools need to have been involved with the WNHSS for a minimum of nine years before they can apply for the NQA.

translation.cy: Byddwn felly yn sicrhau y bydd yr holl waith adeiladu priffyrdd a chynlluniau gwella yn y dyfodol yn ystyried darpariaeth ar gyfer cerdded a beicio o'r cychwyn.
translation.en: We will therefore ensure that all future highway construction and improvement schemes consider walking and cycling provision from the outset.

translation.cy: Bydd creu a gwella seilwaith teithio llesol, sy'n cydymffurfio â'r Canllawiau Dylunio, yn ganolbwynt allweddol i grantiau Llwybrau Diogel mewn Cymunedau a’r Gronfa Trafnidiaeth Leol a bydd hefyd yn rhan amlwg o gynlluniau a gaiff eu cefnogi gan Grant Diogelwch y Ffyrdd.
translation.en: Creation and improvement of active travel infrastructure that complies with the Design Guidance will be a key focus of the Safe Routes in Communities and Local Transport Fund grants and will also feature strongly in schemes supported by Road Safety Grant.

translation.cy: 6 	Hybu a Newid Ymddygiad
translation.en: Promotion & Behaviour Change

translation.cy: O dan y Ddeddf Teithio Llesol, mae dyletswydd ar awdurdodau lleol hefyd i hybu teithio llesol.
translation.en: Under the Active Travel Act, local authorities also have a duty to promote active travel.

translation.cy: Er mwyn cefnogi eu gwaith, bydd Llywodraeth Cymru yn datblygu pecyn offer hybu ac ymgysylltu, gan ddwyn ynghyd arferion gorau a'r adnoddau sydd ar gael.
translation.en: To support their work, the Welsh Government will progress the development of a promotion and engagement toolkit, collating best practice and available resources.

translation.cy: Gall ymyriadau newid ymddygiad fod yn amrywiol iawn.
translation.en: Behaviour change interventions can span a wide range.

translation.cy: Materion parcio - mae Swyddogion Diogelwch ar y Ffyrdd Iau hyd yn oed wedi rhoi 'tocynnau parcio' ffug i rieni sy'n parcio'n beryglus y tu allan i'r ysgol.
translation.en: Parking issues – JRSOs have even issued mock “parking tickets” to parents who park dangerously outside schools

translation.cy: Mae Sustrans Cymru yn derbyn cyllid drwy Gynllun Grant y Sector Gwirfoddol Her Iechyd Cymru i gyflwyno cyfres o heriau teithio llesol ar-lein i weithleoedd ar draws Cymru, gan gynnwys ysbytai a phrifysgolion.
translation.en: Sustrans Cymru is receiving funding support through the Health Challenge Wales Voluntary Sector Grant Scheme to deliver a series of online active travel challenges to  workplaces across Wales, including hospitals and universities.

translation.cy: Y rhyngweithio rhwng gwahanol fathau o ddefnyddwyr cludiant
translation.en: Interaction between different types of transport users

translation.cy: Mae graddau bychan o densiwn yn debyg o fod yn anochel;
translation.en: A small degree of tension is likely to be inevitable;

translation.cy: Byddwn yn cyllido rhaglen fydd yn hybu teithio llesol mewn ysgolion ac yn adolygu'r hyfforddiant i gerddwyr a beicwyr gyda’r bwriad o alinio’r rhaglenni hyn yn agos gyda nodau’r Ddeddf Teithio Llesol.
translation.en: We will fund a programme of active travel promotion in schools and review pedestrian and cycle training with a view to align these programmes closely with the aims of Active Travel Act.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cael ei wneud yn waeth gan gyfyngiadau gallu ehangach, ar lefel leol a lefel genedlaethol.
translation.en: This is worsened by wider capacity constraints, both at local and national level.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn chwilio am gyfleoedd i godi ymwybyddiaeth o nodau a gofynion y Ddeddf, a'r Canllawiau sy'n cyd-fynd â hi, y tu hwnt i'r gynulleidfa wybodus, mewn digwyddiadau amrywiol a thrwy sianelau addas eraill.
translation.en: We will seek out opportunities to raise awareness of the aims and requirements of the Act and the accompanying Guidance beyond the informed audience at diverse events and through other appropriate channels.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn datblygu mecanweithiau i alluogi ymarferwyr i rannu profiad a rhoi adborth.
translation.en: We will develop mechanisms to enable practitioners to share experience and provide feedback.

translation.cy: Mae llawer o ffyrdd gwahanol o fesur lefelau teithio llesol, o gyfran y teithiau neu bellter hyd at gyfraddau defnyddio.
translation.en: There many different ways of measuring levels of active travel, from a proportion of trips or distance to uptake rates.

translation.cy: Beth bynnag fo'r dull, mae'n eglur ein bod yn cychwyn o waelodlin gymharol isel ac mai yn raddol y bydd newid yn digwydd.
translation.en: Regardless of the method, it is clear that we start from a relatively low base and that change will take place gradually.

translation.cy: Bydd dadansoddiad o awdurdodau lleol ar gyfer y dangosyddion lefel uchel yn ategu unrhyw waith monitro ar lefel llwybrau y mae'r awdurdodau lleol yn ei wneud.
translation.en: A local authority breakdown for the high level indicators will supplement any route level monitoring that local authorities undertake.

translation.cy: Ar gyfer cynlluniau cyfalaf, mae'r Canllawiau Dylunio yn disgrifio amryw o ddulliau fydd yn gymorth i benderfynu ar fframwaith monitro priodol, yn dibynnu ar raddfa a natur y prosiect.
translation.en: For capital schemes, the Design Guidance sets out a variety of approaches that will help identify an appropriate monitoring framework depending on the scale and nature of the project.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn edrych i mewn i gyfleoedd i beri bod canlyniadau gwerthuso a monitro, cynlluniau canolog a lleol, ar gael i bobl eraill sy'n cymryd rhan mewn prosiectau cyffelyb.
translation.en: We will explore opportunities to make evaluation and monitoring results from central and local schemes available to others involved in similar projects.

translation.cy: Byddwn yn edrych i mewn i gyfleoedd i alluogi ac annog rhannu canlyniadau monitro a gwerthuso.
translation.en: We will explore opportunities to enable and encourage sharing of monitoring and evaluation results

translation.en: Wales’ natural resources – our land, sea and air - are at the heart of our wellbeing.

translation.en: Increasing resource efficiency and renewable energy  

translation.cy: Mae'r NBU yn hyrwyddo'r safonau gorau o ran gofalu am wenyn i gadw'r risg o blâu a chlefydau mor fach â phosib, hynny trwy archwilio, addysgu ac ymchwilio.  Mae'n diweddaru'r cynlluniau argyfwng yn rheolaidd ac yn cynnal ymarferiadau bob blwyddyn i brofi'r ymatebion i ymddangosiad plâu egsotig yng Nghymru a Lloegr.
translation.en: The NBU promotes good standards of husbandry to minimise pest and disease risks through inspection, education, research, and regularly updates contingency plans together with holding annual contingency exercises to test responses to the introduction of exotic pests into Wales and England.

translation.cy: Cafodd Grŵp Gorchwyl a Gorffen o randdeiliaid ei sefydlu ac mae wedi casglu tystiolaeth am y gweithgareddau y mae Llywodraeth Cymru a'i rhanddeiliaid wedi'u cynnal sy'n llesol i bryfed peillio fel rhan o'r CPP.
translation.en: A Task and Finish Group of stakeholders was established and has gathered evidence of positive activities for pollinators which have been undertaken by Welsh Government and its stakeholders in support of the APP.

translation.cy: Y nhw oedd y grym y tu ôl i'r trefniadau ar gyfer rhoi'r Cynllun Gweithredu ar waith.
translation.en: It has been the driving force in co-ordinating the delivery of the Action Plan.

translation.cy: Prosiect cydweithredol i'r hen a'r ifanc ar raddfa tirlun fydd yn cael ei gynnal o 2018-21 gan grŵp cydweithredol (Partneriaeth Pennal) o fwy na 40 o berchenogion tir, grwpiau cymunedol, mudiadau amgylcheddol, undebau ffermwyr a busnesau lleol gan gynnwys y sectorau twristiaeth, hamdden, iechyd a ffermio.
translation.en: An inter-generational, collaborative, landscape scale project to be delivered by a cooperative group (The Pennal Partnership) from 2018 – 2021 of more than 40 partner landowners, community groups, environmental organisations, farming unions and local businesses including tourism, leisure, health, farming and recreation sectors.

translation.cy: Er mai Buglife oedd yn ei drefnu, mae B-Lines yn erfyn y gall unrhyw fudiad, grŵp, busnes neu unigolyn ei ddefnyddio i adfer neu greu cynefin ar gyfer pryfed peillio ac anifeiliaid eraill - gall pawb gymryd rhan.
translation.en: Whilst co-ordinated by Buglife, B-Lines is a tool that can be used by any organisation, group, business or individual that wishes to restore or create habitat for pollinators and other wildlife – everyone can take part.

translation.cy: Mae B-Lines yn gwarchod pryfed peillio a chynefinoedd ar lefel y dirwedd, gan ddarparu:
translation.en: B-Lines is a landscape-scale approach to pollinator and habitat conservation that provides;

translation.cy: Dyma fframwaith i fudiadau ac unigolion ei ddefnyddio i gynnal gwelliannau er lles anifeiliaid gwyllt a chofnodi'r gwaith. Trwy weithio gyda'i gilydd, maen nhw'n gallu gwneud mwy nag y bydden nhw ar eu pen eu hunain.
translation.en: A framework for organisations and individuals carrying out enhancements for wildlife to work together to collectively achieve much more than they could on their own and record their progress.

translation.cy: Mae'r llawlyfr yn nodi'r prif ffactorau y dylech eu hystyried wrth baratoi cynllun neu strategaeth er lles pryfed peillio, ac yn ei r(h)oi yng nghyd-destun polisi a deddfwriaeth Cymru.
translation.en: The guide outlines key considerations when producing a pollinator plan or strategy, framing it within the context of Welsh Policy and legislation.

translation.cy: Helpu Gwenynwyr.
translation.en: Supporting Beekeepers.

translation.cy: Mae Llywodraeth Cymru yn parhau i weithio mewn partneriaeth â gweinyddiaethau datganoledig eraill y DU i gefnogi'r Uned Wenyn Genedlaethol i ddarparu'r Rhaglen Iechyd Gwenyn yng Nghymru i sicrhau poblogaeth gynaliadwy ac iach o wenyn mêl ar gyfer peillio a chynhyrchu mêl yn y DU.

translation.en: The role of the formative engagement team (now Working Group) is to engage with the wider community and following a consideration of local issues, including technical, geographical, political and cultural aspects,  help define a Search Area and form a Community Partnership.

translation.cy: Roedd llawer o’r ymatebion yn anghytuno â’r dull arfaethedig ac roeddent yn credu y dylid ystyried y ‘ddaeareg orau’ yn gyntaf a chwilio am gymunedau fyddai’n gwirfoddoli yn yr ardaloedd hynny sydd â’r cyfyngiant daearegol mwyaf addas.
translation.en: Several responses did not agree with the proposed approach and considered that ‘best geology’ should be considered first and volunteer communities sought within those areas with the most suitable geological containment.

translation.cy: Byddai’r ymchwiliadau hyn yn edrych ar addasrwydd y safle o safbwynt daearegol, a hefyd ar ei allu i gynnal y cyfleusterau CGD fyddai’n cael eu lleoli ar yr wyneb, a bod yn hygyrch i’r holl drafnidiaeth y byddai ei hangen ar gyfer y gwaith adeiladu a gweithredu.
translation.en: These investigations would cover not only the site’s geological suitability, but also its ability to host the surface facilities of a GDF, and to be accessible to the level of transport needed for both construction and operation.

translation.en: Strong opposition was presented with regards the potential for a GDF being constructed in a National Park or an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty (AONB).

translation.en: RWM can help facilitate access to information and expertise on geological disposal and put the Community Partnership in contact with experts from RWM or other organisations.

translation.en: If a local authority on the Community Partnership decides to leave the partnership then the siting process will end in the community council areas covered by that local authority.

translation.cy: Byddai’n amhriodol i awdurdod lleol wneud y penderfyniadau hyn heb ymgysylltu’n llawn â’r broses.
translation.en: It would be inappropriate for a local authority to take these decisions without being fully engaged in the process.

translation.en: There was strong support for allowing communities to access independent expertise from within the UK or abroad.

translation.en: Concern was raised that it was insufficiently clear who had the commissioning power to secure independent expertise and it was suggested that proponents, opponents and neutrals should all have the capacity to do such.

translation.cy: Awgrymwyd bod angen mwy o eglurder ynglŷn â’r rhyngweithiad rhwng “hawl i dynnu’n ôl” a “Phrawf o Gefnogaeth y Cyhoedd”, a bod angen diffiniad cliriach o’r termau.
translation.en: There was a suggestion that there needs to be greater clarity on the interaction between Right of Withdrawal and Test of Public Support, with clearer definition of the terms.

translation.cy: Byddai angen caniatâd cynllunio ar gyfer CGD o hyd, a byddai angen iddo fodloni safonau diogelwch a safonau amgylcheddol trylwyr er mwyn cael y trwyddedau angenrheidiol.
translation.en: A GDF would still require planning permission and to meet rigorous safety, security and environmental standards in order to secure the necessary permits.

translation.cy: Yn yr un modd, mae gofynion a osodir gan y Cod ar ysgol a gynhelir neu sefydliad addysg bellach, a chyfeiriadau eraill ynddynt at swyddogaeth ysgol a gynhelir neu sefydliad addysg bellach, yn cyfeirio at ysgol a gynhelir neu sefydliad addysg bellach yn unig yn hytrach na chyfeirio at gorff llywodraethu'r ysgol neu'r sefydliad addysg bellach.
translation.en: Similarly, requirements imposed by the Code on a maintained school or FEI, and other references within them to a function of a maintained school or FEI, refer only to a maintained school or FEI rather than referring to the governing body of the school or FEI.

translation.cy: Yn unol â hynny, rhaid dehongli darpariaethau'r Cod sy'n gosod gofynion ar ysgol a gynhelir neu sefydliad addysg bellach, neu sy'n cyfeirio at swyddogaeth ysgol a gynhelir neu sefydliad addysg bellach, fel gofynion a osodir ar y corff llywodraethu perthnasol, neu sy'n cyfeirio at swyddogaeth y corff llywodraethu perthnasol.
translation.en: Accordingly, provisions of the Code which impose requirements on, or refer to a function of, a maintained school or an FEI must be interpreted as requirements placed on the respective governing body, or referring to a function of the respective governing body.

translation.cy: Yn yr un modd, mae canllawiau yn y Cod hwn ar gyfer ysgol a gynhelir neu sefydliad addysg bellach (gan gynnwys yn y ddau achos, unrhyw un yn Lloegr) wedi’u cyfeirio at y corff llywodraethu perthnasol ac maent i'w dehongli felly.
translation.en: Similarly, guidance in this Code addressed to a maintained school or FEI (including in both cases, any in England) is addressed to the respective governing body and is to be interpreted in that way.

translation.cy: Mae'r Cod yn nodi gofynion amserlen amrywiol – mae'r rhain yn ofynion i gamau gael eu cymryd yn unol ag amserlen benodol, fel eu bod yn cael eu gwneud yn brydlon neu o fewn neu cyn diwedd cyfnod penodol.
translation.en: The Code sets out various timescale requirements – these are requirements that an action be taken according to a particular timescale, such as that it be done promptly or within or before the end of a particular period.

translation.cy: Rhoddir ffynhonnell y gofyniad.  Ar gyfer gofynion amserlen fel hyn a osodir gan y Cod hwn neu yn Rheoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021, ni chaiff y diwrnod y mae'r digwyddiad sbarduno yn digwydd gyfrif tuag at y cyfnod penodol.
translation.en: For timescale requirements like this which are imposed by this Code or in the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021, the day on which the trigger event takes place must not be counted towards the specific period.

translation.cy: Mewn geiriau eraill, pan fo'r cyfnod penodedig yn dechrau o ddigwyddiad penodol (y digwyddiad sbarduno), nid yw diwrnod y digwyddiad hwnnw'n cyfrif ac mae'r cyfnod yn dechrau ar y diwrnod ar ôl y diwrnod y digwyddodd y digwyddiad hwnnw (nodir y digwyddiadau sbarduno ar gyfer pob gofyniad amserlen ym mhob gofyniad).
translation.en: In other words, where the specified period starts “from” a particular event (the trigger event), the day of that event does not count and the period starts on the day after the day when that event occurred (the trigger events for each timescale requirement are identified within each requirement).

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, os nad diwrnod gwaith yw diwrnod olaf cyfnod penodedig, rhaid ymestyn y cyfnod penodedig i gynnwys y diwrnod gwaith nesaf.
translation.en: However, where the last day of a specified period is not a working day, the specified period must be extended to include the next working day.

translation.cy: Bydd yr hyn y mae 'yn brydlon' yn ei olygu mewn unrhyw achos penodol yn dibynnu ar yr amgylchiadau unigol (yn enwedig y rhai sy'n effeithio ar y plentyn, ei riant neu'r person ifanc dan sylw), yr hyn y mae angen ei wneud i gwblhau'r camau a pha mor fuan y gellir gwneud hynny'n rhesymol yng ngoleuni'r amgylchiadau unigol.
translation.en: What  ‘promptly’ requires in any particular case, will depend upon the individual circumstances (particularly those affecting the child, their parent or the young person concerned), what needs to be done to complete the action and how soon it can reasonably be done in light of the individual circumstances.

translation.en: Accordingly references to a young person in this chapter, except so far as a contrary intention appears, are to a young person who is neither a registered pupil at a maintained school nor enrolled as a student at an FEI, but do not include a young person who is or becomes subject to a detention order.

translation.en: reviews by a local authority of a child’s IDP where the child is in their final year of compulsory schooling (see paragraph 17.28 – 17.29), and they could also be relevant in other similar situations (see paragraph 17.30).

translation.cy: dynodi person ("y cydlynydd dynodedig") i fod yn gyfrifol am gydlynu’r camau gofynnol er mwyn gwneud y penderfyniad hwnnw ac, os bydd
translation.en: designate a person (“the designated co-ordinator”) to be responsible for coordinating the actions required to make that decision and, if an

translation.cy: Bwriad sylfaenol y system ADY yw sicrhau bod gan bob person ifanc ag ADY gyfle cyfartal i gael gafael ar addysg neu hyfforddiant o’i gymharu â phobl ifanc nad oes ganddynt ADY.
translation.en: The intention underlying the ALN system is to give all young people with ALN equitable access to education or training, compared to young people who do not have ALN.

translation.cy: Mae’r paragraffau isod yn ymdrin â’r cwestiwn hwn hefyd.
translation.en: The paragraphs below also cover this question.

translation.cy: Rhaidi’r awdurdodlleolnodi’n gyntaf a oes gan y person ifanc ddeilliannau dymunol a beth ydynt.
translation.en: The local authoritymust first identify if the young person has desired outcomes and what they are.

translation.cy: Mae deilliannau dymunol posibl yn cynnwys cwblhau cymhwyster galwedigaethol penodol neu ddatblygu sgiliau penodol ar gyfer byw’n annibynnol.
translation.en: Examples of desired outcomes could be to complete a particular vocational qualification or to develop particular independent living skills.

translation.cy: Mae rhaglen astudio yn22 un neu fwy o gyrsiau addysg bellach neu hyfforddiant, p’un a yw’n arwain at gymhwyster ai peidio.
translation.en: A programme of study is one or more courses of further education or training, whether or not leading to a qualification.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, gallai rhaglen astudio olygu bod person ifanc yn astudio tuag at un neu fwy o gymwysterau, gallai fod yn gwrs a ddarperir gan sefydliad addysg bellach sydd wedi’i gynllunio’n benodol ar gyfer dysgwyr ag ADY neu gallai fod yn gwrs mewn sefydliad ôl-16 arbenigol annibynnol sydd wedi’i gynllunio’n benodol ar gyfer y person ifanc unigol, efallai i alluogi’r person ifanc i fanteisio ar gyrsiau prif ffrwd sy’n arwain at gymwysterau neu i alluogi’r person ifanc i ddatblygu sgiliau byw’n annibynnol yn unig.
translation.en: For example, a programme of study could involve a young person studying towards one or more qualifications, it could be a course provided by FEI which is specifically designed for learners with ALN or it could be a course at an ISPI which is designed specifically for the individual young person, perhaps to enable the young person to access mainstream courses leading to qualifications or solely to enable the young person to develop independent living skills.

translation.cy: Rheoliad 7(5) o Reoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021.
translation.en: Regulation 7(5) of the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021.

translation.cy: Fel arall, rhaid i’r awdurdod lleol ystyried rhaglenni astudio mewn ysgolion prif ffrwd a gynhelir neu sefydliadau addysg bellach yn gyntaf (gallai hyn gynnwys ysgolion o’r fath a sefydliadau addysg bellach yn Lloegr).
translation.en: Otherwise, the local authority must25 first consider programmes of study at mainstream maintained schools or FEIs (this could include such schools and FEIs in England).

translation.cy: Os oes gan berson ifanc anghenion sylweddol gymhleth a chyfannol, gallai’r sefydliad addysg bellach benderfynu, yn seiliedig ar ddisgrifiad manwl o anghenion yr unigolyn, a yw’n amlwg na allai ddarparu’r ddarpariaeth angenrheidiol.
translation.en: Where a young person has significantly complex and holistic needs the FEI could determine, based on a detailed description of the individual’s needs, whether it clearly could not provide the necessary provision.

translation.cy: Os felly (a dim ond os felly), caiff yr awdurdod lleol ystyried rhaglenni astudio mewn sefydliadau eraill (yng ngweddill y Bennod hon, defnyddir "sefydliad arbenigol" i gyfeirio at y sefydliadau eraill hyn).
translation.en: If this is the case (and only if this is the case), the local authority may  consider programmes of study at other institutions (in the rest of this Chapter, “specialist institution” is used to refer to these other institutions).

translation.cy: Os felly, gall yr awdurdod lleol ystyried a chymharu rhaglenni astudio mewn sefydliadau arbenigol er mwyn canfod beth fyddai’n diwallu anghenion rhesymol y person ifanc am DDdY.
translation.en: Where that is the case, the local authority can consider and compare programmes of study at specialist institutions to ascertain what would meet the young person’s reasonable needs for ALP.

translation.cy: Wrth wneud hynny, dylai gadw mewn cof y cyfyngiadau arno wrth sicrhau lleoliad mewn sefydliad arbenigol (trafodir y rhain ym Mhennod 23).
translation.en: In doing so, it should bear in mind the restrictions on it in securing a placement at a specialist institution (these are dealt with in Chapter 23).

translation.cy: Penderfynu a oes angen CDU:
translation.en: Determining whether an IDP is necessary:

translation.cy: Mewn achosion pan fyddai’n ofynnol i awdurdod lleol ddisgrifio darpariaeth arall (h.y. lle mewn ysgol benodol neu sefydliad penodol arall neu fwyd a llety) mewn unrhyw CDU, mae’n angenrheidiol i’r awdurdod lleol lunio a chynnal CDU, neu barhau i gynnal CDU, ar gyfer y person ifanc.
translation.en: In cases where a local authority would be required to describe other provision (i.e. a place at a particular school or other institution or board and lodging) in any IDP, it is necessary for the local authority to prepare and maintain, or continue to maintain, an IDP for the young person.

translation.cy: Os yw’n fwy priodol i’r ysgol neu’r sefydliad addysg bellach gynnal y CDU, ar ôl i’r person ifanc gofrestru, caiff yr awdurdod lleol gyfarwyddo’r ysgol i’w gynnal neu ofyn i’r sefydliad addysg bellach wneud hynny.
translation.en: If it is more appropriate for the school or FEI to maintain the IDP, once the young person is registered or enrolled, the local authority maydirect the school to maintain it or request the FEI to do so.

translation.cy: Rhaid37 i’r awdurdod lleol ymgynghori â’r ysgol neu’r sefydliad addysg bellach ynghylch hyn.
translation.en: The local authority must37 consult the school or FEI about this.

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr yn gwneud cynnydd ar gyfraddau gwahanol ac nid yw cynnydd araf ar ddechrau rhaglen, yn enwedig os yw’r dysgwr yn addasu i leoliad newydd, staff addysgu newydd neu ffordd newydd o ddysgu, o reidrwydd yn golygu nad oes gan y dysgwr obaith realistig o gyflawni ei ddeilliannau dymunol erbyn diwedd y rhaglen.
translation.en: Learners’ progress at different rates and slow progress at the start of a programme, particularly if the learner is adapting to a new setting, new teaching staff or a new way of learning, may not necessarily mean the learner does not have a realistic prospect of meeting their desired outcomes by the end of the programme.

translation.cy: Felly, os yw person ifanc eisoes yn ymgymryd â rhaglen astudio, ni chaiff yr awdurdod lleol ddod i’r casgliad nad oes gobaith realistig mwyach y byddai parhau i ymgymryd â’r rhaglen astudio, fel y bwriadwyd o’r cychwyn cyntaf, yn galluogi’r person ifanc i gyflawni ei ddeilliannau dymunol oni bai ei fod wedi ystyried y ffactorau canlynol:
translation.en: Therefore, where a young person is already undertaking a programme of study, the local authority must not conclude that there is no longer a realistic prospect that continuing to undertake the programme of study, as intended from the outset, would enable the young person to meet their desired outcomes unless it has taken into account the following factors:

translation.cy: Dim ond pan fo gan y person ifanc anghenion rhesymol am addysg neu hyfforddiant, ac anghenion rhesymol am y DDdY yn y CDU, y gall fod yn angenrheidiol sicrhau lleoliad arbenigol drwy CDU.
translation.en: A specialist placement secured for a young person through an IDP can only be necessary where the young person has reasonable needs for education or training, and reasonable needs to the ALP comprised in it.

translation.cy: Y man cychwyn yw bod gan berson ifanc hawl i hyd at ddwy flynedd o addysg bellach neu hyfforddiant.
translation.en: The starting point is that a young person is entitled to up to two years of further education or training.

translation.cy: Yn benodol, mae gan berson ifanc anghenion rhesymol am addysg neu hyfforddiant os nad yw hyd y rhaglen astudio addas y cynigir bod y person ifanc yn ymgymryd â hi, neu’n parhau i ymgymryd â hi, ynghyd ag unrhyw addysg bellach neu hyfforddiant arall a gyflawnir gan y person ifanc, yn fwy na dwy flynedd.
translation.en: Specifically, a young person has reasonable needs for education or training where the duration of the suitable programme of study that it is proposed the young person undertake, or continue to undertake, together with any other further education or training undertaken by the young person, is not more than two years.

translation.cy: Os yw deilliant dymunol y person ifanc yn eithaf cyffredinol (er enghraifft, caffael sgiliau byw’n annibynnol) ni fyddai cyfnod rhesymol o amser ar gyfer rhaglen astudio fel arfer yn fwy na dwy flynedd academaidd a disgwylir i raglenni astudio pwrpasol gael eu cynllunio i’w cyflwyno dros y cyfnod hwn fel rheol.
translation.en: Where the young person’s desired outcome is quite general (such as acquiring independent living skills) a reasonable period of time for a programme of study would not normally exceed two academic years and bespoke programmes of study are usually expected to be designed to be delivered over this period.

translation.cy: O dan y rheoliadau, caiff awdurdod lleol benderfynu bod gan berson ifanc anghenion rhesymol am addysg neu hyfforddiant dan y pedair set o amgylchiadau canlynol, ar yr amod ei fod wedi ystyried y ffactorau sy’n berthnasol i’r amgylchiadau penodol (nodir y rhain isod).
translation.en: Under the regulations, a local authority may determine that a young person has reasonable needs for education or training in the following four circumstances, provided it has taken into account the factors relevant to the particular circumstance (these are set out below).

translation.cy: Rheoliad 9 o Reoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021 a pharagraff 3 o Atodlen 1
translation.en: Regulation 9 of and paragraph 3 of Schedule 1 to the Additional Learning Needs (Wales)

translation.cy: Cynllun angenrheidiol yn achos lleoliad arbenigol
translation.en: Necessity of plan where specialist placement

translation.cy: Neu efallai y gallai anghenion rhesymol y person ifanc am DDdY gael eu diwallu wedi’r cyfan gan ysgol a gynhelir, Academi neu sefydliad addysg bellach (gan gynnwys unrhyw un yn Lloegr) ac os yw’r person ifanc i fynychu sefydliad o’r fath, efallai y bydd angen i’r awdurdod lleol lunio a chynnal neu barhau i gynnal CDU (mae paragraffau 17.49 – 17.57 yn ymdrin â hyn).
translation.en: Or it may be the case that the young person’s reasonable needs for ALP could be met after all by a maintained school, Academy or FEI (including any in England) and if the young person is to attend such an institution, it may be necessary for the local authority to prepare and maintain or continue to maintain an IDP (paragraphs 17.49 – 17.57 deal with this).

translation.cy: Yn achos penderfyniad gan awdurdod lleol bod gan berson ifanc anghenion rhesymol am addysg neu hyfforddiant, pan fo’r person ifanc wedyn yn ymgymryd â rhaglen astudio addas yn unol â’r penderfyniad hwnnw a CDU, mae’r person ifanc yn parhau i fod ag anghenion rhesymol am yr addysg neu’r hyfforddiant hwnnw:
translation.en: In the case of a local authority determination that a young person has reasonable needs for education or training, where the young person is then undertaking a suitable programme of study in accordance that determination and an IDP, the young person continues to have reasonable needs for that education or training:

translation.cy: 65 Yn adran 14(6) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: 65 In section 14(6) of the Act.

translation.cy: Efallai y bydd angen cyngor o’r fath hefyd i lywio’r materion y mae’n rhaid i awdurdod lleol eu hystyried yn rhan o’i benderfyniad ynghylch a oes angen CDU i ddiwallu anghenion rhesymol y person ifanc am addysg neu hyfforddiant.
translation.en: Such advice might also be necessary to inform the matters a local authority must consider as part of its decision on whether an IDP is necessary to meet the young person’s reasonable needs for education or training.

translation.cy: Gofyniad (sy’n ddarostyngedig i’r eithriad penodedig) a osodir gan y Cod.
translation.en: Requirement (which is subject to the specified exception) imposed by the Code.

translation.cy: Os yw awdurdod lleol yn penderfynu nad yw’n angenrheidiol iddo lunio a chynnal cynllun datblygu unigol er mwyn diwallu anghenion rhesymol person ifanc am addysg a hyfforddiant, rhaididdo hysbysu’r person ifanc am y penderfyniad a’r rhesymau dros y penderfyniad.
translation.en: Where the local authority decides that it is not necessary for it to prepare and maintain an IDP to meet a young person’s reasonable needs for education or training, it must notify the young person of the decision and the reasons for that decision.

translation.cy: Os bydd awdurdod lleol wedi llunio CDU ar gyfer person ifanc, rhaid87 iddo gynnal y CDU hwnnw oni bai nad yw’r person ifanc yn cydsynio i’r CDU gael ei gynnal.
translation.en: Where a local authority has prepared an IDP for a young person, it must87 maintain that IDP unless the young person does not consent to the IDP being maintained.

translation.cy: Adrannau 20(5) a 21(5) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Sections 20(5) and 21(5) of the Act.

translation.cy: Gall hefyd drosglwyddo i gorff arall.
translation.en: It may also transfer to another body.

translation.cy: Plant a phobl ifanc mewn amgylchiadau penodol
translation.en: Children and young people in specific circumstances

translation.cy: plant a phobl ifanc sydd mewn ardal awdurdod lleol yn Lloegr ac yn ddisgyblion mewn ysgol a gynhelir neu'n fyfyrwyr mewn sefydliad addysg bellach;
translation.en: children and young people who are in the area of a local authority in England and registered as pupils at a maintained school or enrolled as students at an FEI;

translation.cy: plant sy’n cael addysg heblaw yn yr ysgol (gan gynnwys mewn Uned Cyfeirio Disgyblion) gan awdurdod lleol;
translation.en: children receiving from a local authority education otherwise than at school (EOTAS) (including at a PRU);

translation.cy: plant gweithwyr o’r lluoedd arfog.
translation.en: children of Service personnel.

translation.cy: Gan nad yw awdurdod lleol yn gyfrifol am blentyn neu berson ifanc o'r fath, nid yw dyletswyddau awdurdodau lleol mewn perthynas â phlant a phobl ifanc sydd wedi cofrestru fel disgyblion mewn ysgol a gynhelir neu wedi ymrestru fel myfyrwyr mewn sefydliad addysg bellach (fel y’u disgrifir ym Mhenodau 12, 15 ac 16) yn berthnasol mewn cysylltiad â disgyblion a myfyrwyr o'r fath.
translation.en: As a local authority is not responsible for such a child or young person, the duties of local authorities in relation to children and young people registered as pupils at a maintained school or enrolled as students at an FEI (as described in Chapters 12, 15 and 16) do not generally apply in relation to such pupils and students.

translation.cy: Disgrifir y dyletswyddau hyn a'r eithriadau iddynt ym Mhenodau 11, 13, 14 a 17.
translation.en: These duties and the exceptions to them are described in Chapters 11, 13, 14 and 17.

translation.cy: Mae ganddynt bŵer i wneud yr un peth ar gyfer pobl ifanc hefyd.
translation.en: They also have a power to do the same in relation to young people.

translation.cy: Adran 11 o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: 13 Section 11 of the Act.

translation.cy: Os oes gan y plentyn neu’r person ifanc eisoes CDU a gynhelir gan awdurdod lleol pan fydd y ddarpariaeth addysg heblaw yn yr ysgol yn cael ei threfnu, rhaid i'r awdurdod lleol barhau i gynnal y CDU (oni bai a hyd nes bod unrhyw un o'r amgylchiadau'n codi a fyddai'n golygu bod y ddyletswydd i'w gynnal yn peidio - gweler Pennod 29).
translation.en: If the child or young person already has an IDP maintained by a local authority when the EOTAS is arranged, the local authority must continue to maintain the IDP (unless and until any of the circumstances occur which result in the duty to maintain it ceasing – see Chapter 29).

translation.cy: Adran 14(2)(a), neu yn achos plentyn sy'n derbyn gofal, adran 19(2), o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 14(2)(a), or in the case of a looked after child, section 19(2), of the Act.

translation.cy: Mae canllawiau statudol Llywodraeth Cymru, Cefnogi Dysgwyr ag Anghenion Gofal Iechyd, yn mynd i'r afael â'r trefniadau i'w gwneud gan ysgolion a gynhelir ac awdurdodau lleol i gefnogi dysgwyr o dan 18 oed sydd ag anghenion gofal iechyd.
translation.en: The Welsh Government’s statutory guidance on Supporting Learners with Healthcare Needs addresses the arrangements to be made by maintained schools and local authorities to support learners under the age of 18 with healthcare needs.

translation.cy: os yw ysgol yn cynnal CDU ar gyfer plentyn neu berson ifanc sydd angen derbyn addysg heblaw yn yr ysgol am fwy na chyfnod byr iawn, fel yr esboniwyd uchod, gall fod yn briodol i'r awdurdod lleol gymryd y cyfrifoldeb am gynnal y cynllun (gweler Pennod 26 ar awdurdodau lleol yn cymryd y cyfrifoldeb am CDU).
translation.en: if a school is maintaining an IDP for a child or young person who needs to receive EOTAS for more than a minimal period, as explained above, it may be appropriate for the local authority to take over responsibility for maintaining the plan (see Chapter 26 on local authorities taking over responsibility for IDPs).

translation.cy: O dan amgylchiadau eraill lle mae plentyn yn derbyn addysg heblaw mewn ysgol a gynhelir, yr awdurdod lleol sy'n gyfrifol am y plentyn, neu os yw'r plentyn yn derbyn gofal, yr awdurdod lleol sy'n gofalu am y plentyn, sydd â dyletswyddau i benderfynu  a oes gan y plentyn ADY ac i lunio a chynnal CDU.(Mae’r sefyllfa ychydig yn wahanol os yw’r plentyn yn destun gorchymyn cadw – gweler Pennod 19.)
translation.en: In other circumstances where a child is receiving education other than at a maintained school, the local authority responsible for the child, or if the child is looked after, the local authority that looks after the child, has duties to determine whether the child has ALN and to prepare and maintain an IDP.24  (The position is slightly different if the child is subject to a detention order – see Chapter 19.)

translation.cy: Plant sy'n mynychu ysgol annibynnol
translation.en: Children attending an independent school

translation.cy: Pan gaiff ei ddwyn i sylw awdurdod lleol neu pan fo'n ymddangos fel arall i awdurdod lleol y gallai plentyn y mae'n gyfrifol amdano ac sy'n mynychu ysgol annibynnol (ac eithrio plentyn sy'n derbyn gofal), fod ag ADY, rhaid i'r awdurdod lleol benderfynu a oes gan y plentyn ADY ai peidio ac, os yw'n penderfynu bod gan y plentyn ADY, rhaid iddo llunio a chynnal CDU a sicrhau'r DDdY a ddisgrifir yn y cynllun hwnnw (gweler Pennod 13 am ragor o fanylion  am y dyletswyddau hyn a'r eithriadau iddynt).
translation.en: Where it is brought to its attention or otherwise appears to a local authority that a child attending an independent school (other than a looked after child) for whom it is responsible, may have ALN, the local authority must decide whether or not the child has ALN and, if it decides that the child has ALN, prepare and maintain an IDP and secure the ALP described in that plan (see Chapter 13 for more details about these duties and the exceptions to them).

translation.cy: Gan fod yr adnoddau sydd ar gael dramor yn wahanol i’r rhai yn y DU, mae gwasanaethau’r Weinyddiaeth yn cwblhau Asesiad o Gynaliadwyedd Dramor ar gyfer holl blant a phobl ifanc y lluoedd arfog sydd ag anghenion cymhleth cyn cytuno ar leoliad tramor.
translation.en: As the resources available overseas are different from those in the UK, MoD services complete an MoD Assessment of Supportability Overseas for all Service children and young people with complex needs before an overseas posting is agreed.

translation.cy: Gall plant a phobl ifanc y lluoedd wynebu anawsterau sy'n unigryw i natur cyflogaeth eu rhieni.
translation.en: Service children and young people may face difficulties that are unique to the nature of their parent’s employment.

translation.cy: gall plentyn neu berson ifanc brofi gorbryder, gostyngiadau mewn perfformiad addysgol a/neu anawsterau emosiynol wrth i’wrhieni sy'n gwasanaethu gael eu lleoli mewn arenâu ymgyrchol, a gallai hynny gyfrannu at ADY neu eu gwaethygu.
translation.en: the deploymentof serving parents to operational arenas may result in a Service child or young person experiencing anxiety, dips in educational performance and/or emotional difficulties, which could contribute towards or exacerbate ALN.

translation.cy: Pennod 19:  Plant a phobl ifanc sy’n destun gorchmynion cadw
translation.en: Chapter 19:  Children and young people subject to detention orders

translation.cy: Mae’r bennod hon yn ymdrin â’r sefyllfa ar gyfer plant a phobl ifanc sydd:
translation.en: This chapter deals with the position for children and young people who are:

translation.cy: Mae’n berthnasol i blant sy’n derbyn gofal yn union cyn cael eu cadw’n gaeth.
translation.en: It applies to children who are looked after immediately prior to being detained.

translation.cy: Mae person yn ddarostyngedig i orchymyn cadw os caiff ei remandio neu ei ddedfrydu gan y llysoedd i gael ei gadw’n gaeth neu ei alw’n ôl i’w gadw’n gaeth gan yr Ysgrifennydd Gwladol.
translation.en: A person is subject to a detention order if remanded or sentenced by the courts to detention or recalled to detention by the Secretary of State.

translation.cy: yn cael eu remandio ar fechnïaeth neu’n bwrw dedfryd yn y gymuned – mae ganddynt yr un hawliau o dan y system ADY ag unrhyw blentyn neu berson ifanc arall nad yw’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth;
translation.en: remanded on bail or serving a sentence in the community – they have the same rights under the ALN system as any other child or young person who is not detained;

translation.cy: Nid oes ots sut y daw’r posibilrwydd y gallai fod ADY gan berson sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth i sylw’r awdurdod lleol neu sut y mae’n ymddangos iddo fel arall mai dyma’r achos; os yw’r awdurdod yn ymwybodol o’rposibilrwydd hwnnw, mae’r ddyletswydd i benderfynu yn gymwys.
translation.en: It does not matter how the possibility that a detained person may have ALN comes to the home authority’s attention or how it otherwise appears to it that this is the case; if the authority is aware of thatpossibility, then the duty to decide applies.

translation.cy: Nid yw’n ofynnol i awdurdod cartref wneud y penderfyniad hwn:
translation.en: But a home authority is not required to make this decision where:10

translation.cy: os yw’r person sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth yn berson ifanc nad yw’n cydsynio i’r penderfyniad gael ei wneud neu i gynllun gael ei lunio (gweler Pennod 4 am ragor o fanylion am gydsyniad person ifanc); neu
translation.en: the detained person is a young person who does not consent to the decision being made or to a plan being prepared (see Chapter 4 for more detail on a young person’s consent); or

translation.cy: Gofyniad a osodir gan y Cod.
translation.en: Requirement imposed by the Code.

translation.cy: Os yw’n ofynnol i awdurdod cartref wneud y penderfyniad, cyn gwneud hynny, rhaid17 iddo wahodd y person â chyfrifoldeb dros y llety ieuenctid perthnasol i gymryd rhan yn y penderfyniad ac, os bydd angen, i helpu i lunio CDU.
translation.en: Where a home authority is required to make the decision it must, before doing so,invite the person in charge of the relevant youth accommodation to participate in the decision, and, if needed, in the preparation of an IDP.

translation.cy: (Mae canllawiau ar gynnal y cyfarfodydd hyn ym Mhennod 22).
translation.en: (Guidance on these meetings is provided in Chapter 22).

translation.cy: I ganfod a yw’r person sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth yn debygol o fod wedi troi’n 25 oed cyn ei ryddhau, bydd angen i’r awdurdod cartref ystyried amgylchiadau’r cyfnod cadw megis hyd unrhyw ddedfryd a’i gymhwystra i gael ei ryddhau’n gynharach.
translation.en: To ascertain whether the detained person is likely to have attained the age of 25 before release, the home authority will need to take into account the circumstances of the detention such as the length of any sentence and eligibility for earlier release.

translation.cy: Gofyniad a osodir gan y Cod mewn perthynas â phenderfyniad nad oes gan y person ifanc ADY a rheoliad 18(4) o Reoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021 mewn perthynas â phenderfyniad nad yw CDU yn angenrheidiol.
translation.en: Requirement imposed by the Code in respect of a decision that the young person does not have ALN and regulation 18(4) of the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021 in respect of a decision that an IDP is not necessary.

translation.cy: 28 O dan adran 9 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Under section 9 of the Act.

translation.cy: O dan adran 68 o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Under section 68 of the Act.

translation.cy: Os bydd awdurdod cartref yng Nghymru yn penderfynu bod ADY gan berson sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth ac y bydd angen cynnal CDU ar ei gyfer ar ôl iddo gael ei ryddhau, rhaid iddo lunio CDU ar gyfer y person hwnnw (ac eithrio yn achos person ifanc os nad yw’n cydsynio i’r cynllun gael ei lunio).
translation.en: If a home authority in Wales decides that a detained person has ALN and that it will be necessary for an IDP to be maintained on their release, it must32 prepare an IDP for that person (unless in the case of a young person, they do not consent to the plan being prepared).

translation.cy: Bydd angen i’r awdurdod ystyried ei swyddogaethau perthnasol eraill hefyd mewn perthynas â llunio a chynnal CDUau, megis y ddyletswydd i ffafrio addysg i blant mewn ysgolion prif ffrwd a gynhelir ac enwi ysgol a gynhelir at ddiben sicrhau y caiff plentyn ei dderbyn iddi.
translation.en: The authority will also need to consider its other relevant functions in relation to preparing and maintaining IDPs, such as the duty to favour education for children at mainstream maintained schools and naming a maintained school for the purpose of securing a child’s admission.

translation.cy: Caiffyr awdurdod cartref, wrth lunio’r CDU, wneud atgyfeiriad at un o gyrff y GIG er mwyn iddo ystyried a oes unrhyw driniaeth neu wasanaeth perthnasol sy’n debygol o fod o fudd wrth fynd i’r afael ag ADY y person sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth (ymdrinnir â’r atgyfeiriadau hyn yn fanylach ym Mhennod 21).
translation.en: The home authority, in preparing the an IDP, may make a referral to an NHS body for it to consider whether there is any relevant treatment or service that is likely to be of benefit in addressing the ALN of the detained person (these referrals are dealt with in more detail in Chapter 21).

translation.cy: Wrth wneud hynny, bydd angen i’r awdurdod gydymffurfio â chyfraith diogelu data.
translation.en: In doing so, the authority will need to comply with data protection law.

translation.cy: Os yw’n ymwybodol o’r amgylchiadau sy’n arwain at ddyletswydd yr awdurdod cartref i gadw’r CDU, rhaid i’r ysgol, y sefydliad addysg bellach neu’r awdurdod lleol arall roi copi o’r CDU i’r awdurdod cartref oni bai bod gan yr awdurdod cartref gopi ohono eisoes.
translation.en: The school, FEI or other local authority, if aware of the circumstances giving rise to the home authority’s duty to keep it, must give a copy of the IDP to the home authority unless the home authority already has a copy of it.

translation.cy: Adran 42(5) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 42(5) of the Act.

translation.cy: Dyma pam mai’r ddyletswydd yw trefnu DDdY briodol yn hytrach na sicrhau DDdY.
translation.en: This is why the duty is to arrange appropriate ALP rather than secure ALP.

translation.cy: Felly, efallai y daw amser pan na fydd yr ADY a’r DDdY a amlinellir ynddynt yn briodol mwyach.
translation.en: Therefore, the ALN and ALP set out in them may become out of date.

translation.cy: Adran 42(8) a (9) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 42(8) and (9) of the Act.

translation.cy: 65 Adran 43(3) a (4) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: 65 Section 43(3) and (4) of the Act.

translation.cy: Mae Penodau 12 – 17 yn berthnasol i achosion o’r fath, gan ddibynnu a yw’r dysgwr yn blentyn neu’n berson ifanc, yn ddisgybl cofrestredig mewn ysgol a gynhelir, yn blentyn sy’n derbyn gofal, yn fyfyriwr sydd wedi cofrestru mewn sefydliad addysg bellach, neu ddim yn ddisgybl na’n fyfyriwr o’r fath.
translation.en: Chapters 12 – 17 are relevant to such cases, according to whether the learner is a child or young person, a pupil registered at a maintained school, a looked after child, a student enrolled at an FEI, or neither such a pupil nor such a student.

translation.cy: Yn achos y derbyniadau hyn i’r ysbyty, nid yw’r claf yn destun gorchymyn cadw fel y’i diffinnir at ddibenion y Ddeddf.
translation.en: These admissions do not involve the patient being subject to a detention order as defined for the purposes of the Act.

translation.cy: Yn yr achosion hyn, byddai’r person yn ddarostyngedig i orchymyn cadw.
translation.en: In these instances, the person would be subject to a detention order.

translation.cy: Mae’r sefyllfa’n amrywio yn dibynnu a oedd CDU yn cael ei gynnal neu ei gadw cyn i’r person gael ei gadw’n gaeth mewn ysbyty.
translation.en: The position varies depending upon whether or not there was an IDP being maintained or kept prior to the detention in hospital.

translation.cy: Gally posibilrwydd y gall y plentyn neu’r person ifanc fod ag ADY gael ei “ddwyn i sylw” awdurdod lleol mewn sawl ffordd.
translation.en: The possibility that the child or young person may have ALN might be brought to the attention of a relevant local authority in a number of ways.

translation.cy: cofnodi’r dyddiad y cafodd ei ddwyn i’w sylw neu yr ymddangosodd iddo fel arall y gall fod gan y plentyn neu’r person ifanc ADY;
translation.en: record the date on which it is brought to its attention, or otherwise appears to it, that the child or young person may have ALN;

translation.cy: hysbysu’r plentyn a rhiant y plentyn ei fod yn penderfynu a oes gan y plentyn ADY;
translation.en: notify the child and the child’s parent that it is deciding whether the child has ALN;

translation.cy: Efallai y bydd yn gallu darparu gwybodaeth a chyngor sy’n berthnasol i’r penderfyniad ac unrhyw CDU (gan gynnwys gwybodaeth gan ddarparwr addysg y sefydliad).
translation.en: They may be able to provide information and advice relevant to the decision and any IDP (including information from the institution’s education provider).”

translation.cy: O dan adran 14 o Fesur Iechyd Meddwl (Cymru) 2010, mae dyletswydd ar ddarparwyr gwasanaethau iechyd meddwl i benodi unigolyn yn gydgysylltydd gofal ar gyfer claf perthnasol.
translation.en: Under section 14 of the Mental Health (Wales) Measure 2010, there is a duty on mental health service providers to appoint an individual as care coordinator for a relevant patient.

translation.cy: Rhaid87 i’r awdurdod lleol wneud y penderfyniad a rhoi’r hysbysiad yn brydlon, ac yn sicr cyn diwedd y cyfnod perthnasol o 12 wythnos:
translation.en: The relevant local authority must87 make the decision and give the notification promptly and in any event before the end of the period of 12 weeks from:

translation.cy: Penderfyniad awdurdod lleol bod ADY gan blentyn neu berson ifanc sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth mewn ysbyty
translation.en: A relevant local authority’s decision that a child or young person detained in hospital has ALN

translation.cy: Pan fo awdurdod lleol perthnasol yn penderfynu bod ADY gan berson ifanc sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth mewn ysbyty, os yw’r person ifanc yn ddisgybl cofrestredig mewn ysgol a gynhelir neu wedi cofrestru fel myfyriwr mewn sefydliad addysg bellach, rhaid iddo baratoi CDU ar gyfer y person ifanc.
translation.en: Where the relevant local authority decides that a young person detained in hospital has ALN, if the young person is a registered pupil at a maintained school or enrolled as a student at an FEI, it must prepare an IDP for the young person.

translation.cy: Rheoliad 10 a 23 o Reoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021 ac Atodlen 2 iddynt.
translation.en: Regulation 10 and 23 of, and Schedule 2 to, the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021.

translation.cy: Dyletswydd awdurdod lleol perthnasol i lunio CDU ar gyfer plentyn neu berson ifanc sy’n cael ei gadw’n gaeth mewn ysbyty
translation.en: A relevant local authority’s duty to prepare an IDP for a child or young person detained in hospital

translation.cy: Cyn i’r awdurdod lleol perthnasol gwblhau’r gwaith o lunio’r CDU, dylai roi cyfle i’r plentyn neu’r person ifanc ac, yn achos plentyn, ei riant roi sylwadau ar gopi drafft ohono a dylaieu hannog i godi unrhyw bryderon cyn gynted â phosibl.
translation.en: Before the IDP is completed by the relevant local authority, it shouldgive the child or young person and, in the case of a child, their parent an opportunity to comment on a draft of it and shouldencourage them to raise any concerns as soon as possible.

translation.cy: O dan adran 70 o’r Ddeddf (sy’n gymwys yn rhinwedd Rheoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021).
translation.en: Under section 70 of the Act (applicable by virtue of the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021).

translation.cy: Rheoliad 22 o Reoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021.
translation.en: Regulation 22 of the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021.

translation.cy: Adran 22(2) o’r Ddeddf fel y’i cymhwysir gan Reoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021.
translation.en: Section 22(2) of the Act as applied by the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021.

translation.cy: Adran 14 o’r Ddeddf fel y’i cymhwysir gan Reoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021.
translation.en: Section 14 of the Act as applied by the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021.

translation.cy: Rheoliad 22 o Reoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021.
translation.en: Regulation 22 of the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021.

translation.cy: Os bydd awdurdod lleol perthnasol yn cynnal CDU, rhaid iddo sicrhau’r DDdY ac unrhyw ddarpariaeth arall (h.y. lle mewn ysgol benodol neu sefydliad penodol arall neu ddarpariaeth bwyd a llety) a ddisgrifir ynddo.
translation.en: Where a relevant local authority maintains an IDP, it must secure the ALP and any other provision (i.e. a place at a particular school or other institution or board and lodging) described in it.

translation.cy: Adrannau 14(10)(c), 20(5)(c) a 21(5)(b) o’r Ddeddf fel y’u cymhwysir gan Reoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021.
translation.en: Sections 14(10)(c), 20(5)(c) and 21(5)(b) of the Act as applied by the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021.

translation.cy: Os bydd yr awdurdod lleol yn penderfynu nad yw’n angenrheidiol cynnal y CDU, caiff roi’r gorau i’w gynnal.
translation.en: If the local authority decides that it is not necessary to maintain the IDP it may cease to maintain it.

translation.cy: Mae Pennod 29 yn ymdrin â hyn ac amgylchiadau eraill lle mae dyletswydd i gynnal CDU yn peidio.
translation.en: Chapter 29 deals with this and other circumstances in which a duty to maintain an IDP ceases.

translation.cy: Adran 23 o’r Ddeddf fel y’i cymhwysir gan Reoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021.
translation.en: Section 23 of the Act as applied by the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021.

translation.cy: Pennod 20:
translation.en: Chapter 20:

translation.cy: Gallai hefyd ddod gan y plentyn, ei rieni neu'r person ifanc ei hun.
translation.en: It might also come from the child, their parents or the young person themselves.

translation.cy: Gellir defnyddio nifer o wahanol ffynonellau tystiolaeth i fesur cynnydd plant a phobl ifanc (o ran cyrhaeddiad a meysydd eraill, er enghraifft lle mae angen i ddysgwr ddatblygu ymddygiadau cymdeithasol neu emosiynol ehangach).
translation.en: A number of different sources of evidence may be used to measure children and young people’s progress (in terms of attainment, and other areas, for instance where a learner needs to develop wider social or emotional behaviours).

translation.cy: Mae'r rhain yn cynnwys, ond heb fod yn gyfyngedig i:
translation.en: These include, but are not limited to:

translation.cy: mathau eraill o asesu personol, yn enwedig pan fo namau ar y synhwyrau yn golygu bod adnoddau a fframweithiau sgrinio ac asesu safonedig yn amhriodol.
translation.en: other forms of personalised assessment, especially where sensory impairments render standardised screening and assessment tools and frameworks inappropriate.

translation.cy: Bydd angen cymorth arnynt i fanteisio ar gwricwlwm gwahaniaethol er mwyn datblygu'n briodol, ond efallai na fydd y cymorth hwnnw yn gyfystyr â DDdY o reidrwydd.
translation.en: They will require support to access a differentiated curriculum to make suitable progress, but that support may not necessarily amount to ALP.

translation.cy: Os nad yw'r cynnydd yn ddigonol, bydd angen cymryd camau ychwanegol neu wahanol er mwyn i'r dysgwr allu dysgu mewn ffordd fwy effeithiol.
translation.en: Where progress is not adequate, it will be necessary to take some additional or different action to enable the learner to learn more effectively.

translation.cy: Yn wir, bydd angen dull gwahaniaethol ar y rhan fwyaf o blant a phobl ifanc mewn rhyw agwedd ar eu haddysg ar ryw adeg.
translation.en: Indeed, most children and young people will require a differentiated approach in some aspect of their education at some point.

translation.cy: Pan mae'n ymddangos y gallai fod gan blentyn neu berson ifanc ADY
translation.en: When it appears that a child or young person may have ALN

translation.cy: Yn yr amgylchiadau hyn, dylaistaff addysgu mewn ysgol a gynhelir neu sefydliad addysg bellach gynnwys Cydlynydd ADY yr ysgol neu'r sefydliad addysg bellach (os nad yw eisoes yn ymwneud â'r mater).
translation.en: In these circumstances, teaching staff at a maintained school or FEI shouldinvolve the school or FEI’s ALNCo (if not already involved).

translation.cy: Nid yw’r ffaith fod gofynion yn bodoli mewn rhai achosion yn golygu na fyddai cyngor gan Seicolegydd Addysg yn berthnasol mewn achosion eraill, er enghraifft pan fo ysgol yn penderfynu a oes gan ddisgybl ADY neu pan fo awdurdod lleol yn adolygu CDU.
translation.en: The mere fact of there being such requirements in some cases does not mean that advice from an Educational Psychologist would not be relevant in other cases, such as where a school is deciding whether a pupil has ALN or a local authority is reviewing an IDP.

translation.cy: Mae canllawiau ar gwrdd â phlant, eu rhieni a phobl ifanc i drafod penderfyniadau ynghylch ADY a CDUau i'w gweld ym Mhennod 22.
translation.en: Guidance on meeting children, their parents and young people to discuss decisions about ALN and IDPs can be found at Chapter 22.

translation.cy: Pennod 21:
translation.en: Chapter 21:

translation.cy: Nid oes angen i’r person perthnasol gydymffurfio â’r cais o fewn y cyfnod chwe wythnos hwnnw os yw’n anymarferol gwneud hynny oherwydd amgylchiadau sydd y tu hwnt i’w reolaeth.
translation.en: The relevant person need not comply with the request by the end of that 6 week period if it is impractical to do so due to circumstances beyond its control.

translation.cy: Adran 64(4) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 64(4) of the Act.

translation.cy: At y dibenion hyn, yr awdurdod lleol y mae hi’n ofynnol i’r corff iechyd ddwyn y mater i’w sylw yw’r awdurdod lleol sy’n gyfrifol am y plentyn neu, os yw’r plentyn yn derbyn gofal,16 yr awdurdod lleol sy’n gofalu am y plentyn.
translation.en: For these purposes, the local authority to whose attention the health body is required to bring the matter, is the local authority responsible for the child or, if the child is looked after,16 the local authority that looks after the child.

translation.cy: Y drafodaeth gyda’r rhieni yw’r cyfle i archwilio a oes unrhyw ystyriaethau gwrthbwysol, yn ogystal â chanfod barn y rhieni.
translation.en: The discussion with the parents is the opportunity to explore whether there are any countervailing considerations, as well as to ascertain the parents’ views.

translation.cy: ddarparu cyngor ar y DDdY i’w chyflwyno;
translation.en: provide advice on the ALP to be secured;

translation.cy:  cefnogi’r gwaith o fonitro cynnydd y plentyn a darparu adroddiadau yn ôl y gofyn.
translation.en: support the monitoring of the child’s progress and provide reports as required.

translation.cy: Caiff awdurdod lleol neu sefydliad addysg bellach atgyfeirio mater at un o gyrff y GIG, gan ofyn iddo a oes unrhyw driniaeth neu wasanaeth perthnasol sy’n debygol o helpu i fynd i’r afael ag ADY plentyn neu berson ifanc (ond gweler y manylion isod ynghylch y rhai a gaiff wneud atgyfeiriad a’r hyn y mae’n rhaid ei wneud yn gyntaf).
translation.en: A local authority or FEI may refer a matter to an NHS body, asking it to consider whether there is any relevant treatment or service that is likely to be of benefit in addressing the ALN of a child or young person (but see below for the details of who may make a referral and what it must do first).

translation.cy: 19 Adran 20(6) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 20(6) of the Act.

translation.cy: Rheoliadau’r Byrddau Iechyd Lleol (Swyddogaethau a Gyfarwyddir) (Cymru) 2009.
translation.en: The Local Health Boards (Directed Functions) (Wales) Regulations 2009.

translation.cy: Y corff sy’n gallu atgyfeirio21
translation.en: The body that can refer

translation.cy: Adran 21(4) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 21(4) of the Act.

translation.cy: Ar ôl ei lenwi, dylai corff y GIG anfon y templed yn ôl at y corff sy’n cynnal y CDU i sicrhau bod y disgrifiad yn y CDU yn gywir.
translation.en: The NHS body shouldsend the completed template back to the body maintaining the IDP to ensure the description in the IDP is accurate.

translation.cy: Darperir templed yn Atodiad C.
translation.en: A template is provided in Annex C.

translation.cy: Os bydd corff y GIG, yn ei adolygiad, yn gofyn i’r corff sy’n cynnal CDU ddileu neu newid y disgrifiad o’r DDdY y mae’n rhaid i gorff y GIG eu sicrhau; rhaid i’r ysgol, y sefydliad addysg bellach neu’r awdurdod lleol sy’n cynnal y CDU gydymffurfio â’r cais.
translation.en: If, on review, the NHS body requests the body maintaining an IDP to remove or change the description of the ALP that the NHS body must secure; the school, FEI or local authority that maintains the IDP must comply with the request.

translation.cy: Adran 21(6) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 21(6) of the Act.

translation.cy: Dim ond i’r graddau y mae’n rhesymol ymarferol ac yn gydnaws â’r canlynol y mae hyn yn gymwys:
translation.en: This only applies so far as is reasonably practicable and compatible with:

translation.cy: Os bydd y Tribiwnlys yn gorchymyn diwygio CDU mewn perthynas â DDdY y nodwyd ei bod yn DDdY y mae’n rhaid i un o gyrff y GIG ei sicrhau, nid yw’n ofynnol i gorff y GIG sicrhau’r DDdY ddiwygiedig oni bai ei fod yn cytuno i wneud hynny.
translation.en: If the Tribunal orders the revision of an IDP in relation to ALP specified as ALP an NHS body must secure, an NHS body is not required to secure the revised ALP unless it agrees to do so.

translation.cy: Cyfarfodydd am ADY a CDUau
translation.en: Meetings about ALN and IDPs

translation.cy: Pennod 22:
translation.en: Chapter 22:

translation.cy: Pennod 22:
translation.en: Chapter 22:

translation.cy: Mae'r canllawiau yn y bennod hon yn cymryd y bydd y plentyn yn bresennol yn y cyfarfod.
translation.en: The guidance in this chapter assumes that the child will be present at the meeting.

translation.cy: cyfarfod neu gyfarfodydd ar wahân gyda phlentyn, ei riant neu berson ifanc a dim ond un neu ddau o weithwyr proffesiynol.
translation.en: a separate meeting or meetings with a child, their parent or young person and just one or two professionals.

translation.cy: cynnal y cyfarfod mewn ystafell y mae'r plentyn, ei riant neu berson ifanc yn gyfarwydd â hi neu'n gyfforddus ynddi;
translation.en: holding the meeting in a room with which the child, their parent or young person is familiar or in which they are comfortable;

translation.cy: paratoi plentyn, ei riant neu berson ifanc ar gyfer y cyfarfod drwy egluro beth fydd yn digwydd, faint o bobl fydd yno, pwy fydd yn eistedd ble, y cwestiynau sy'n debygol o gael eu gofyn iddynt a'r materion sy'n debygol o gael eu trafod;
translation.en: preparing a child, their parent or a young person for the meeting by explaining what will happen, how many people will be there, who will sit where, the questions they are likely to be asked and the issues likely to be discussed;

translation.cy: Gallai hyn ei helpu i ystyried pa dystiolaeth ychwanegol i'w cheisio ar gyfer y cyfarfod ac, yn y pen draw, roi dealltwriaeth fwy cyflawn a chynhwysfawr o'r plentyn neu'r person ifanc a'i anghenion.
translation.en: This may help them consider what further evidence to seek for the meeting and ultimately give them a more rounded and comprehensive understanding of the child or young person and their needs.

translation.cy: Lle nad yw'n bosibl i'r person fynychu cyfarfodydd eraill sy'n gysylltiedig ag anghenion ehangach plentyn neu berson ifanc, dylaiysgol, sefydliad addysg bellach neu awdurdod lleol, lle y bo modd, geisio canfod canlyniad unrhyw benderfyniadau mewn cyfarfodydd o'r fath neu gael unrhyw wybodaeth berthnasol arall sy'n deillio ohonynt.
translation.en: Where it is not possible for the person to attend other meetings connected to a child or young person’s wider needs, a school, FEI or local authority should, where possible, seek to ascertain the outcome of any decisions at such meetings or obtain any other relevant information arising out of them.

translation.cy: Beth rydych chi'n ei hoffi, yn ei edmygu neu'n ei werthfawrogi fwyaf am y dysgwr?
translation.en: What do you like most, admire or appreciate about the learner?

translation.cy: Mae’r dull o wneud hyn yn debygol o ddibynnu ar yr hyn sy'n briodol o dan yr amgylchiadau.
translation.en: How this is done, is likely to depend upon what is appropriate in the circumstances.

translation.cy: Mewn achosion eraill, efallai y bydd yr ysgol, y sefydliad addysg bellach neu'r awdurdod lleol yn gofyn am gyngor neu wybodaeth allanol a gallant wahodd gweithwyr proffesiynol eraill i ddod i’r cyfarfod neu i roi mewnbwn.
translation.en: In other cases, the school, FEI or local authority might seek external advice or information and may invite other professionals to attend the meeting or to provide input.

translation.cy: Os yw asiantaethau neu weithwyr proffesiynol wedi darparu cyngor/adroddiadau cyn y cyfarfod, dylid eu rhannu gyda'r plentyn neu'r person ifanc ac, yn achos plentyn, ei riant mewn da bryd hefyd iddynt allu eu hystyried a'u galluogi i gymryd rhan mor llawn â phosibl mewn trafodaethau a phenderfyniadau.
translation.en: Where agencies or professionals have supplied advice/reports in advance of the meeting, this shouldalso be shared with the child or young person and, in the case of a child, their parent in sufficient time for them to consider it and enable them to participate as fully as possible in discussion and decisions.

translation.cy: O dan Fesur y Gymraeg (Cymru) 2011, a Safonau'r Gymraeg a hysbysiadau cydymffurfio cysylltiedig.
translation.en: Under the Welsh Language (Wales) Measure 2011, and associated Welsh Language Standards and compliance notices.

translation.cy: Ceir cyfarwyddyd mewn rhannau eraill o'r Cod y dylid cynnal cyfarfodydd fel rhan o'r broses ar gyfer gwneud penderfyniadau, er enghraifft, ynghylch a oes gan blentyn neu berson ifanc ADY neu fel rhan o lunio neu adolygu CDU.
translation.en: There is guidance elsewhere in the Code that meetings should be held as part of the process for making decisions, for example on whether a child or young person has ALN or as part of preparing or reviewing an IDP.

translation.cy: Gallai cyfarfod ei gwneud yn haws i’r plentyn, rhiant y plentyn neu'r person ifanc ddeall y broses, ac felly gyfranogi ynddi.
translation.en: A meeting may better facilitate the child, child’s parent or young person’s understanding of, and therefore involvement in, the process.
