translation.en: the continued suitability of the outcomes and, if appropriate, decide new or revised outcomes;

translation.cy: a yw’n bosibl y bydd angen i’r plentyn neu’r person ifanc gael y DDdY mewn ysgol benodol neu sefydliad arall ac a allai fod angen bwyd a llety;
translation.en: whether the child or young person might need to receive the ALP at a particular school or other institution and whether board and lodging may be needed;

translation.cy: Mae’r ysgol a gynhelir, yr awdurdod lleol neu’r sefydliad addysg bellach sy’n cynnal adolygiad ac unrhyw berson perthnasol arall sy’n arfer swyddogaeth o dan y Ddeddf sy’n ymwneud â’r adolygiad (er enghraifft, un o gyrff y GIG sy’n gofyn am newid i’r disgrifiad o’r DDdY) yn ddarostyngedig i’r ddyletswydd i gynnwys a chefnogi plant, eu rhieni a phobl ifanc (gweler Pennod 4).
translation.en: The maintained school, local authority or FEI conducting a review and any other relevant person exercising a function under the Act which relates to the review (for example, an NHS body requesting a change to the description of the ALP) is subject to the duty to involve and support children, their parents and young people (see Chapter 4).

translation.cy: Gall cynnwys CDU (megis y cyfnod ar gyfer cyflawni canlyniadau, neu’r cyfnod ar gyfer darparu unrhyw DDdY benodol) ddylanwadu ar amseriad adolygiad dilynol.
translation.en: The contents of an IDP (such as the period for achieving outcomes, or the period over which a particular ALP is to be provided) can influence the timing of a subsequent review.

translation.cy: Caiff yr ysgol, y sefydliad addysg bellach neu’r awdurdod lleol gynnwys y ddogfen arall honno yn y CDU, a chaniateir31cynnwysy CDU yn y ddogfen arall honno.
translation.en: The school, FEI or local authority may include that other document in the IDP, and the IDP may31 be included in that other document.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal ag adolygu CDU, caiff yr ysgol, y sefydliad addysg bellach, neu’r awdurdod lleol hefyd lunio neu ddiwygio’r CDU yr un pryd ag y bydd ef neu gorff arall yn gwneud pethau o’r fath mewn perthynas â dogfen arall.
translation.en: As well as review an IDP, the school, FEI, or local authority may also prepare or revise the IDP at the same time as it or another body does such things in relation to another document.

translation.cy: Gallai hyn fod yn briodol hefyd pan fo gan blentyn neu berson ifanc nad yw’n derbyn gofal gynllun gofal a chymorth, neu gynllun cymorth, o dan Ran 4 o’r Ddeddf honno.
translation.en: This may also be appropriate where a child or young person who is not looked after has either a care and support plan, or a support plan, under Part 4 of that Act.

translation.cy: Os mai casgliad yr adolygiad yw y dylid diwygio’r CDU, rhaid i’r corff sy’n cynnal y cynllun roi copi o’r CDU diwygiedig i’r plentyn, rhiant y plentyn neu’r person ifanc ac os yw’r awdurdod lleol yn gofalu am y plentyn, y swyddog adolygu annibynnol.
translation.en: If the conclusion of the review is that the IDP should be revised, the body maintaining the plan must give a copy of the revised IDP to the child, child’s parent or young person, and if the local authority looks after the child, the independent reviewing officer.

translation.cy: 34 Adrannau 23(10) a 24(9) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Sections 23(10) and 24(9) of the Act.

translation.cy: Mae’r rhain yn cynnwys hysbysu’r plentyn, ei riant neu’r person ifanc, ac yn achos plentyn sy’n derbyn gofal, ei swyddog adolygu annibynnol, am y penderfyniad hwn.
translation.en: These include notifying the child, their parent or the young person, and in the case of a looked after child, their independent reviewing officer of this decision.

translation.cy: Er nad oes hawl i apelio i’r Tribiwnlys mewn perthynas â phenderfyniadau am ADY a wneir gan ysgol, gellir apelio yn erbyn penderfyniad awdurdod lleol wrth ailystyried penderfyniad ysgol ar ADY neu CDU y mae’r ysgol yn ei gynnal.
translation.en: While there are no rights of appeal to the Tribunal in respect of decisions about ALN made by a school, a local authority’s decision in reconsidering a school’s decision on ALN or an IDP the school maintains can be appealed.

translation.cy: Mae’r darpariaethau hyn yn berthnasol gydag ychydig o addasiadau lle mae’r disgybl o fewn ardal awdurdod lleol yn Lloegr.
translation.en: These provisions apply with a few modifications where the pupil concerned is in the area of a local authority in England.

translation.cy: Gellir apelio i’r Tribiwnlys yn erbyn penderfyniad i beidio â chymryd drosodd y cyfrifoldeb.
translation.en: A decision not to take over responsibility is appealable to the Tribunal.

translation.cy: Gweler Pennod 19 am wybodaeth am blant a phobl ifanc sy’n destun gorchymyn cadw.
translation.en: See Chapter 19 for information about children and young people subject to a detention order.

translation.cy: 13 Os yw plentyn â CDU yn dod yn blentyn sy’n derbyn gofal gan awdurdod lleol, mae gan yr awdurdod lleol hwnnw ddyletswydd i gynnal y CDU:
translation.en: Where a child with an IDP becomes looked after by a local authority, that local authority has a duty to maintain the IDP:

translation.cy: Pan wneir cais o’r fath, rhaid i’r awdurdod lleol roi gwybod i’r ysgol a gwahodd yr ysgol i roi ei sylwadau cyn i’r awdurdod lleol benderfynu a ddylid diwygio’r CDU.
translation.en: Where such a request is made, the local authority must inform the school and invite representations from it before the local authority decides whether to revise the IDP.

translation.cy: Adran 14(5) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 14(5) of the Act.

translation.cy: Awdurdod lleol yn cymryd drosodd y cyfrifoldeb dros CDU sy’n cael ei gynnal gan ysgol a gynhelir neu sefydliad addysg bellach
translation.en: A local authority taking over responsibility for an IDP maintained by a maintained school or FEI

translation.cy: Caiff28 ysgol a gynhelir, sefydliad addysg bellach, plentyn, rhiant y plentyn neu berson ifanc wneud cais i’r awdurdod lleol sy’n gyfrifol am y plentyn neu’r person ifanc gymryd drosodd y cyfrifoldeb am CDU sydd eisoes yn cael ei gynnal ar ei gyfer gan yr ysgol neu’r sefydliad addysg bellach.
translation.en: A maintained school, an FEI, a child, the child’s parent or a young person may request that the local authority responsible for the child or young person take over responsibility for an IDP that is currently being maintained for the child or young person by the school or FEI.

translation.cy: Yn dilyn cais o’r fath, rhaid i’r awdurdod lleol benderfynu a ddylai gymryd drosodd y cyfrifoldeb dros CDU plentyn neu berson ifanc, oni bai bod unrhyw un o’r amgylchiadau canlynol yn berthnasol:
translation.en: Following such a request, the responsible local authority must decide whether it should take over responsibility for a child or young person’s IDP unless any of the following circumstances apply:

translation.cy: bod y cais yn ymwneud â phlentyn sydd wedi dod yn blentyn sy’n derbyn gofal gan awdurdod lleol;
translation.en: the request relates to a child who has become looked after by a local authority;

translation.cy: Gweler uchod am y gofyniad i roi gwybodaeth debyg lle mae’r penderfyniad i gymryd drosodd cyfrifoldeb yn deillio o ailystyriaeth o’r CDU.
translation.en: See above for the requirement to give similar information where the decision to take over responsibility arises out of a reconsideration of the IDP.

translation.cy: Nid yw’r diwrnod y daw’r cais i law yn cyfrif tuag at y cyfnod o 7 wythnos ac os nad yw diwrnod olaf y cyfnod hwnnw’n ddiwrnod Gwaith, dylid ei ymestyn i’r diwrnod gwaith nesaf.
translation.en: The day on which the request is received does not count towards the 7 week period and if the last day of that period is not a working day, then it should be extended to the next working day.

translation.cy: Pennod 27:
translation.en: Chapter 27:

translation.cy: Cyflwyniad
translation.en: Introduction

translation.cy: Dylid darllen y bennod ar y cyd â'r canllawiau yn y penodau canlynol:
translation.en: The chapter ought to be read in conjunction with the guidance in:

translation.cy: full version.
translation.en: full version.

translation.cy: gall prosesau pontio llai llwyddiannus rhwng y cartref a'r ysgol arwain at lefelau presenoldeb gwael ac ymddieithrio; ac mae prosesau pontio llai llwyddiannus rhwng yr ysgol gynradd a'r ysgol uwchradd yn gysylltiedig â  lleihad mewn hunan-barch a dirywiad mewn cynnydd academaidd, yn ogystal â lefelau uwch o orbryder ac iselder.
translation.en: less successful transitions from home to school may lead to subsequent poor attendance and disengagement; and less successful transitions between primary and secondary school are associated with lowered selfesteem and decline in academic progress, combined with increased anxiety and depression.

translation.cy: Gall prosesau pontio fod yn fwy heriol i blant a phobl ifanc ag ADY na'u cyfoedion, ac o ganlyniad, efallai y bydd angen cymorth ychwanegol arnynt i sicrhau nad yw'r broses bontio'n cael effaith andwyol ar eu haddysg neu eu hyfforddiant, gan gynnwys eu DDdY.
translation.en: Children and young people with ALN may find transitions more challenging than their peers do and consequently, may need additional support to ensure their education or training, including their ALP, is not adversely effected by the transition.

translation.cy: Er bod y bennod hon yn trafod rhai pwyntiau pontio allweddol ar lwybr addysg plentyn neu berson ifanc, mae'n bwysig ystyried cynlluniau pontio mewn ffordd gyfannol fel rhan o ddatblygiad naturiol plentyn a pherson ifanc.
translation.en: Whilst this chapter discusses some key transition points in a child or young person’s education pathway, it is important to consider transition planning in a holistic way as part of a child and young person’s natural development.

translation.cy: Mae'r dull hwn yn helpu i sicrhau bod cynlluniau pontio yn dod yn broses reolaidd y mae plant a phobl ifanc yn dod yn gyfarwydd â hi ac yn teimlo'n gyfforddus yn trafod sut y gallai pontio effeithio arnynt.
translation.en: This approach helps ensure that transition planning becomes a regular process in which children and young people become familiar with and feel comfortable discussing how transition may affect them.

translation.cy: Gallai hyn fod yn arbennig o berthnasol wrth gynllunio ar gyfer pontio i leoliad newydd.
translation.en: This may be particularly relevant when planning for a transition into a new setting.

translation.cy: Yn arbennig, trwy gynnwys gweithwyr proffesiynol o'r lleoliad newydd (os yw'n hysbys), gellir cynnig cyngor arbenigol ar y lleoliad newydd, yn cynnwys y DDdY y gallai'r plentyn neu'r person ifanc fod ei hangen yn y lleoliad newydd a threfniadau i helpu i sicrhau proses bontio esmwyth.
translation.en: In particular, the involvement of professionals from the new setting (where known), can provide expert advice on the new setting, including the ALP that the child or young person might need at the new setting and arrangements to help ensure a smooth transition.

translation.cy: Hefyd, mewn rhai achosion, gall y dysgwr fod yn blentyn hŷn neu'n berson ifanc.
translation.en: Also, in some cases, the learner may be an older child or a young person.

translation.cy: dod yn gyfarwydd â meysydd pwnc newydd;
translation.en: becoming familiar with new subject areas;

translation.cy: trefnu gwaith yn annibynnol a rheoli eu hamserlen eu hunain;
translation.en: independently organising work and managing own timetable;

translation.cy: deall rheolau'r ysgol;
translation.en: understanding school rules;

translation.cy: Gallai hyn gynnwys:
translation.en: This might include:

translation.cy: Gallai hyn gynnwys lluniau o'r staff addysgu ac adeiladau'r ysgol, map o gynllun yr ysgol a'r amserlen;    trefnu cyfnod graddol o ddechrau yn yr ysgol newydd;
translation.en: This could include photographs of teaching staff and school buildings, a map of the school and the timetable;     arranging a phased entry into the new school;

translation.cy: sefydlu system gyfeillio.
translation.en: putting in place a buddy system.

translation.cy: Mae gweithdai pontio hefyd yn gyfle i'r lleoliad asesu sut mae trefniadau i blant ag ADY yn gweithio'n ymarferol.
translation.en: Transitions workshops also provide the opportunity for the setting to assess how arrangements put in place for children with ALN work in practice.

translation.cy: Pontio i addysg bellach
translation.en: Transition to further education

translation.cy: Os nad oes gan y person ifanc CDU, gall fod dyletswydd ar y sefydliad addysg bellach i benderfynu ar ADY.
translation.en: If the young person does not have an IDP, the FEI may be under a duty to decide upon ALN.

translation.cy: O dan adran 11 o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Under section 11 of the Act.

translation.cy: Trosglwyddo’r cyfrifoldeb am gynnal CDU
translation.en: Transfer of responsibility for maintaining an IDP

translation.cy: Trosglwyddo’r cyfrifoldeb am gynnal CDU
translation.en: Transfer of responsibility for maintaining an IDP

translation.cy: sefyllfaoedd lle mae gan gorff ddyletswydd i baratoi CDU ar gyfer plentyn neu berson ifanc a oedd ag un yn ddiweddar ond bod y cyfrifoldeb amdano heb ei drosglwyddo.
translation.en: situations where a body has a duty to prepare an IDP for a child or young person who recently had one but responsibility for it did not transfer.

translation.cy: Mae'r CDU yn ddogfen sy'n datblygu dros amser a bwriedir iddo aros gyda'r plentyn neu'r person ifanc yn ystod y cyfnodau amrywiol o'i addysg os yw'n dal i fod ag ADY ac, yn achos person ifanc, os yw'n cydsynio bod y CDU yn parhau i gael ei gynnal a bod angen cynnal CDU ar ei gyfer o hyd.
translation.en: The IDP is a document that is designed to evolve over time and is intended to remain with a child or young person across the various stages of their education, provided they continue to have ALN and, in the case of a young person, they consent to it continuing to be maintained and it remains necessary to maintain it for them.

translation.cy: symud i ysgol a gynhelir ar ddechrau blwyddyn academaidd, ar ôl bod mewn un arall yn y flwyddyn flaenorol;
translation.en: a move into a maintained school at the start of an academic year, having been in another one in the previous year;

translation.cy: Mae'r paragraffau canlynol yn nodi'r union amgylchiadau ar gyfer pob un o'r achosion hyn sy'n arwain at drosglwyddo cyfrifoldeb dros gynnal CDU.
translation.en: The following paragraphs set out the exact circumstances for each of these cases which give rise to responsibility for maintaining an IDP transferring.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, pan fydd plentyn yn dechrau derbyn gofal neu'n peidio â derbyn gofal, yn dibynnu ar yr amgylchiadau, gall yr un awdurdod lleol barhau i fod yn gyfrifol am gynnal y CDU.
translation.en: However, where a child becomes or ceases to be looked after, depending upon the circumstances, the same local authority may continue to be responsible for maintaining the IDP.

translation.cy: Bwriedir i hyn gwmpasu achos plentyn neu berson ifanc sy'n symud rhwng ysgolion a gynhelir yn ystod blwyddyn academaiddpan nad oes bwlch yng nghofrestriad y plentyn neu'r person ifanc.
translation.en: This is intended to capture a child or young person moving between maintained schools during the course of an academic year where there is no gap in the child or young person’s registration.

translation.cy: Adran 30(5) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 30(5) of the Act.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cwmpasu sefyllfa plentyn (nad yw'n derbyn gofal) neu berson ifanc â CDU a gynhelir gan ei awdurdod lleol, sy'n symud ei breswylfa o ardal yr awdurdod lleol hwnnw i ardal awdurdod lleol arall (gweler Pennod 1 am ystyr cyfrifoldebawdurdod lleol dros blentyn neu berson ifanc).
translation.en: This captures the situation of a child (who is not looked after) or young person with an IDP maintained by their local authority, moving their residence from that local authority’s area into the area of another local authority (see Chapter 1 for the meaning of local authority responsibility for a child or young person).

translation.cy: Os oedd y CDU yn cael ei gynnal gan yr awdurdod lleol sy'n gofalu am y plentyn cyn i'r plentyn ddechrau derbyn gofal, nid oes unrhyw newid yn y corff sy'n gyfrifol am gynnal y CDU.
translation.en: If, before becoming looked after, the IDP was being maintained by the local authority that is looking after the child, then there is no change in the body responsible for maintaining the IDP.

translation.cy: Os:
translation.en: Where:

translation.cy: Os mai'r awdurdod lleol sy'n gyfrifol am y plentyn neu'r person ifanc pan fydd yn peidio â derbyn gofal yw'r awdurdod lleol a oedd hefyd yn gofalu am y plentyn, nid yw’r cyfrifoldeb yn trosglwyddo rhwng awdurdodau lleol.
translation.en: Where the local authority responsible for the child or young person when they cease to be looked after is also the local authority that was looking after the child, then there is no transfer of responsibility between local authorities.

translation.cy: Fodd bynnag, mewn rhai o'r achosion hyn, gallai fod yn fwy priodol i'r sefydliad addysg bellach lle mae'r person ifanc wedi'i gofrestru gynnal y CDU.
translation.en: However, in some of these cases it might be more appropriate for the FEI at which the young person is enrolled to maintain the IDP instead.

translation.cy: (Gweler Pennod 16 am ragor o wybodaeth am ddyletswyddau ar sefydliadau addysg bellach ac awdurdodau lleol mewn perthynas â phobl ifanc mewn sefydliad addysg bellach.)
translation.en: (See Chapter 16 for more information about duties on FEIs and local authorities in relation to young people at an FEI.)

translation.cy: Felly, efallai y bydd y sefydliad addysg bellach yn gallu ymateb yn gyflym iawn i'r cais.
translation.en: Therefore, the FEI might be able to respond very quickly to the request.

translation.cy: Os bydd awdurdod lleol wedi atgyfeirio cais atynt, rhaid i Weinidogion Cymru benderfynu a ddylai'r sefydliad addysg bellach gynnal y CDU.
translation.en: Where a referral has been made to them by a local authority, the Welsh Ministers must determine whether the FEI should maintain the IDP.

translation.cy: Rheoliad 14 o Reoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021.
translation.en: Regulation 14 of the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021.

translation.cy: Rheoliad 15 o Reoliadau Anghenion Dysgu Ychwanegol (Cymru) 2021.
translation.en: Regulation 15 of the Additional Learning Needs (Wales) Regulations 2021.

translation.cy: Cyn gynted ag y bydd y corff newydd yn gyfrifol am gynnal y CDU, mae'n ofynnol iddo ei gynnal yn union fel pe bai'n ei gynnal ar ôl ei lunio ei hun.
translation.en: Once the new body is responsible for maintaining the IDP, it is required to maintain it just as if it were maintaining it having prepared it itself.

translation.cy: Achosion lle nad yw’r ddyletswydd i gynnal CDU yn cael ei throsglwyddo, ond bod gan blentyn neu berson ifanc CDU blaenorol
translation.en: Instances where there is not a transfer of a duty to maintain an IDP, but a child or young person recently had one

translation.cy: Yn yr un modd, os bydd plentyn neu berson ifanc yn symud o Loegr i Gymru ar ôl bod â Chynllun Addysg, Iechyd a Gofal tra'n byw yn Lloegr, gall darpariaethau'r Cynllun Addysg, Iechyd a Gofal helpu i lywio'r gwaith o lunio unrhyw CDU ar gyfer y plentyn neu'r person ifanc.
translation.en: Similarly, if a child or young person moves from England to Wales having had an EHC plan whilst living in England, the provisions of the EHC plan can help inform the preparation of any IDP for the child or young person.

translation.cy: Mae'r bennod hon hefyd yn nodi'r camau i'w cymryd cyn ac ar ôl penderfynu nad oes gan blentyn neu berson ifanc ADY bellach, neu nad oes angen bellach cynnal CDU ar gyfer person ifanc, a'r ffyrdd y gellir herio penderfyniadau o'r fath.
translation.en: This chapter also sets out the steps to be taken before and after it is decided that a child or young person no longer has ALN or that it is no longer necessary to maintain an IDP for a young person and the ways in which such decisions may be challenged.

translation.cy: 2 Adrannau 31(5), 32 a 33 o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Sections 31(5), 32 and 33 of the Act.

translation.cy: Adran 28(8) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 28(8) of the Act.

translation.cy: Adran 35(9) a (10) o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 35(9) and (10) of the Act.

translation.cy: Adran 12(2)(d) o’r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 12(2)(d) of the Act.

translation.cy: (gweler Pennod 4 i gael rhagor o fanylion am gydsyniad person ifanc);
translation.en: (see Chapter 4 for more detail on a young person’s consent);

translation.cy: Mewn achosion felly, mae'r ddyletswydd i gynnal y CDU yn trosglwyddo i'r awdurdod lleol (gweler Pennod 28 am drosglwyddo’r cyfrifoldeb am gynnal CDU);
translation.en: In such cases the duty to maintain the IDP transfers to the local authority (see Chapter 28 on transfer of responsibility for maintaining an IDP);

translation.cy: os yw awdurdod lleol yn Lloegr yn dechrau cynnal cynllun Addysg, Iechyd a Gofal ar gyfer y person ifanc.
translation.en: a local authority in England starts to maintain an EHC plan for the young person.

translation.cy: Dim ond os yw'r person ifanc o fewn ardal awdurdod lleol yn Lloegr y byddai hyn yn digwydd;
translation.en: This would only be in cases where the young person is in the area of a local authority in England;

translation.cy: os daw'r person ifanc yn destun gorchymyn cadw18 (gweler Pennod 19 am blant a phobl ifanc sy’n ddarostyngedig i orchmynion cadw).
translation.en: the young person becomes subject to a detention order (see Chapter 19 on children and young people subject to detention orders);

translation.cy: Yn achos CDU a gynhelir gan awdurdod lleol ar gyfer plentyn neu berson ifanc, bydd dyletswydd yr awdurdod lleol i gynnal y CDU yn peidio yn yr amgylchiadau canlynol:
translation.en: In the case of an IDP maintained by a local authority for a child or young person, the local authority’s duty to maintain the IDP ceases to apply in the following circumstances:

translation.cy: yn achos plentyn sy'n derbyn gofal gan yr awdurdod lleol, os yw'r person yn peidio â bod yn blentyn sy'n derbyn gofal (am ba reswm bynnag, gan gynnwys am fod y plentyn yn berson ifanc bellach) ac os nad yw'r awdurdod lleol yn gyfrifol am y person (h.y. nid yw'r plentyn o fewn ei ardal).
translation.en: in the case of a child who is looked after by the local authority, the person ceases to be a looked after child (for whatever reason, including because the child has become a young person) and the local authority is not responsible for the person (i.e. the person is not in its area).

translation.cy: yn achos plentyn sy'n derbyn gofal gan yr awdurdod lleol, os yw’r plentyn yn peidio â bod o fewn ardal awdurdod lleol yng Nghymru28, er enghraifft, pe bai'r plentyn yn cael ei osod gyda rhieni maeth yn Lloegr;
translation.en: in the case of a child who is looked after by the local authority, the child ceases to be in the area of a local authority in Wales, for example, this could be the case if the child were to be placed with foster parents in England;

translation.cy: Mae adran 34(2) yn diffinio blwyddyn academaidd at y dibenion hyn fel:
translation.en: Section 34(2) defines an academic year for these purposes as:

translation.cy: Mewn achosion eraill sy'n ymwneud â phlant sy'n derbyn gofal, gallai dyletswydd awdurdod lleol i gynnal CDU ar sail benodol beidio, ond gallai fod dyletswydd arno i'w gynnal ar sail arall.
translation.en: In other cases involving looked after children, a local authority’s duty to maintain an IDP on a particular basis may cease, but it may have a duty to maintain it on another basis.

translation.cy: Mae adran 35(9) a (10) o'r Ddeddf a'r ddyletswydd i'w gynnal ar gyfer plentyn sy'n derbyn gofal o dan adran 19.
translation.en: Section 35(9) and (10) of the Act and the duty to maintain it for a looked after child is under section 19.

translation.cy: Adran 35(11) i (13) o'r Ddeddf.
translation.en: Section 35(11) to (13) of the Act.

translation.cy: Penderfynu nad oes gan blentyn neu berson ifanc ADY bellach
translation.en: Deciding that a child or young person no longer has ALN

translation.en: At this stage, the purpose of this summary and the rest of the guidance is to help schools to start thinking about designing their curriculum and the assessment arrangements to support it.

translation.cy: Bydd y fframwaith cyfreithiol a sefydlir gan y Ddeddf hon yn chwarae rhan hanfodol wrth alluogi'r cwricwlwm i ddarparu ysgolion cryf a chynhwysol sydd wedi ymrwymo i ragoriaeth, tegwch a lles.
translation.en: The legal framework established by this Act will play a crucial role in enabling the curriculum to deliver strong and inclusive schools committed to excellence, equity and well-being.

translation.en: Both the ALN system and the Framework are designed to deliver an inclusive and equitable education system in Wales.

translation.cy: cynnig addysg eang a chytbwys, sy'n galluogi eich dysgwyr i greu cysylltiadau rhwng y gwahanol feysydd dysgu a phrofiad (Meysydd), a chymhwyso'u dysgu mewn sefyllfaoedd newydd ac mewn perthynas â materion mwy cymhleth?

translation.en: support your learners’ health and well-being, including their mental health and well-being?

translation.en: enable your learners to develop an understanding of their rights and the rights of others?

translation.en: Ultimately, the aim of a school’s curriculum is to support its learners to become:

translation.cy: datblygu corff o wybodaeth ac sydd â’r sgiliau sydd eu hangen i gysylltu’r wybodaeth honno a’i chymhwyso mewn gwahanol gyd-destunau
translation.en: are building up a body of knowledge and have the skills to connect and apply that knowledge in different contexts

translation.cy: gallu cyfathrebu’n effeithiol mewn gwahanol ffurfiau a lleoliadau, drwy’r Gymraeg a’r Saesneg
translation.en: can communicate effectively in different forms and settings, using both Welsh and English

translation.cy: yn meithrin eu lles meddyliol ac emosiynol drwy ddatblygu hyder, cadernid ac empathi
translation.en: are building their mental and emotional well-being by developing confidence, resilience and empathy

translation.cy: Wrth i ysgolion ddatblygu eu gweledigaeth i gefnogi eu dysgwyr i gyflawni'r pedwar diben, dylai llais y dysgwr fod yn ganolog i'r gwaith hwn.
translation.en: As schools develop their vision to support their learners to realise the four purposes, learner voice should be central to this.

translation.cy: Sgiliau sy'n hanfodol i'r pedwar diben
translation.en: Skills integral to the four purposes

translation.cy: cael eu cefnogi a'u herio er mwyn iddyn nhw fod yn barod i fodloni'r galwadau sy'n gysylltiedig â gweithio mewn sefyllfaoedd ansicr yn hyderus, wrth i gyd-destunau lleol, cenedlaethol a byd-eang arwain at heriau newydd a chyfleoedd i lwyddo
translation.en: be supported and challenged so that they are prepared to confidently meet the demands of working in uncertain situations, as changing local, national and global contexts result in new challenges and opportunities for success

translation.cy: Maen nhw’n galluogi dysgwyr i fanteisio ar ehangder cwricwlwm ysgol a'r cyfoeth o gyfleoedd a gynigir ganddo, gan roi iddyn nhw y sgiliau gydol oes i gyflawni’r pedwar diben.
translation.en: They enable learners to access the breadth of a school’s curriculum and the wealth of opportunities it offers, equipping them with the lifelong skills to realise the four purposes.

translation.cy: Rhaid rhoi cyfleoedd ar draws y cwricwlwm i ddysgwyr:
translation.en: Learners must be given opportunities across the curriculum to:

translation.cy: Mae fersiynau wedi’u mireinio o'r Fframwaith Llythrennedd a Rhifedda'r Fframwaith Cymhwysedd Digidolyn cyd-fynd â'r canllawiau hyn ac yn gyson â nhw.
translation.en: Refined versions of the National Literacy and Numeracy Frameworkand the Digital Competence Frameworksit alongside and align with this guidance.

translation.cy: Maen nhw’n darparu canllawiau ategol i bob ymarferydd, ym mhob Maes, er mwyn sicrhau y cynigir cyfleoedd i feithrin y sgiliau gorfodol hyn.
translation.en: Theyprovide supporting guidance for all practitioners, across all Areas, to ensure opportunities for the development of these mandatory skills.

translation.cy: Caiff yr egwyddorion hyn eu datblygu ymhellach i roi cymorth i ymarferwyr a byddan nhw’n rhan o'r cod cynnydd a fydd yn rhan statudol o’r Fframwaith.
translation.en: These principles will be further developed to support practitioners and will form part of the progression code which will be a statutory part of the Framework.

translation.cy: Maen nhw’n:
translation.en: They:

translation.cy: Ehangder a dyfnder gwybodaeth cynyddol
translation.en: Increasing breadth and depth of knowledge

translation.cy: Dyfnhau'r ddealltwriaeth o'r syniadau a'r disgyblaethau yn y Meysydd
translation.en: Deepening understanding of the ideas and disciplines within the Areas

translation.cy: Mae dulliau holistaidd yn arbennig o bwysig i ddysgu yn y cyfnodau cynnar wrth i ddysgwyr ymgysylltu â’r byd o’u cwmpas.
translation.en: Holistic approaches are particularly important to learning in early steps as learners engage with the world around them.

translation.cy: Mae angen i ddysgwyr ddatblygu ystod o sgiliau gan gynnwys sgiliau corfforol, sgiliau cyfathrebu, sgiliau gwybyddol a sgiliau sy'n benodol i Faes arbennig.
translation.en: Learners need to develop a range of skills including: physical, communication, cognitive and Area specific skills.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr wneud cynnydd, dylen nhw ddod yn gynyddol effeithiol.
translation.en: As learners progress, they should become increasingly effective.

translation.cy: Mae annog dysgwyr i feithrin ymdeimlad o angerdd a balchder yn eu hunain, eu cymunedau a'u gwlad yn ganolog i'r pedwar diben.
translation.en: Instilling learners with passion and pride in themselves, their communities and their country is central to the four purposes.

translation.cy: Mae meddu ar wybodaeth, profiad a dealltwriaeth o'r rhain yn cefnogi dysgwyr i fod yn ddinasyddion gweithredol a llwyddiannus yn y Gymru gyfoes.
translation.en: To have knowledge, experience and an understanding of these supports learners to be active and successful citizens in contemporary Wales.

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwr yn gwneud cynnydd ar hyd yr un continwwm dysgu o fewn pob Maes, o 3 i 16 oed.
translation.en: Learners will progress along the same continuum of learning within each Area from ages 3 to 16.

translation.cy: Mae rhoi ystyriaeth i ddysgwyr ag ADY yn hollbwysig yn hyn o beth a datblygwyd y canllawiau hyn gydag ymarferwyr ADY a gweithwyr proffesiynol arbenigol.
translation.en: Key to this is consideration of learners with ALN and this guidance has been developed with ALN practitioners and specialist professionals.

translation.cy: Lle mae'r canllawiau hyn yn cyfeirio at ferfau penodol fel 'siarad', 'symud' neu 'greu', dylid eu dehongli yn unol ag anghenion y dysgwyr.
translation.en: Where this guidance makes reference to specific verbs such as ‘talk’, ‘move’ or ‘create’, these should be interpreted according to the needs of the learners.

translation.cy: Dylai'r weledigaeth a ddatblygwyd gan ysgolion lywio’r gwaith o gynllunio cwricwlwm.
translation.en: The vision for curriculum that schools have developed should then guide curriculum design.

translation.cy: Mae'n rhaid i gwricwlwm ysgol gwmpasu'r holl ddatganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig o 3 i 16, gan ymgysylltu â'u cysyniadau allweddol mewn modd datblygiadol briodol.
translation.en: A school’s curriculum must cover all of the statements of what matters from age 3 to 16, providing engagement with their key concepts in a developmentally appropriate way.

translation.cy: Mae'n rhaid i ysgolion ac ymarferwyr ddefnyddio'r datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig i lywio'r broses o ddatblygu cynnwys cwricwlwm, gan eu defnyddio i:
translation.en: Schools and practitioners must use the statements of what matters to guide the development of curriculum content, using them to:

translation.cy: Caiff y disgwyliadau hyn eu mynegi o safbwynt y dysgwr ac maen nhw’n eu fframio'n eang fel bod modd iddyn nhw gynnal y dysgu dros gyfres o flynyddoedd.
translation.en: These expectations are expressed from the learner’s perspective and are framed broadly so that they can sustain learning over a series of years.

translation.cy: Er mai'r un yw'r continwwm dysgu i bob dysgwr, mae'n bosibl y byddan nhw’n gwneud cynnydd ar gyflymder gwahanol.
translation.en: While the learning continuum is the same for each learner, the pace of progress through it may differ.

translation.cy: Themâu trawsbynciol ar gyfer gynllunio eich cwricwlwm
translation.en: Cross-cutting themes for designing your curriculum

translation.cy: Dylai fod gan ysgolion ac ymarferwyr fethodoleg ar gyfer gynllunio cwricwlwm sy'n ymgorffori cyfleoedd ar gyfer dysgu ac ystyriaeth o elfennau trawsbynciol, lle y bo'n briodol.
translation.en: Schools and practitioners should have a methodology for designing a curriculum which incorporates, where appropriate, opportunities for learning and consideration of cross-cutting elements.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys y gallu i gydnabod, deall a chodi'u llais yn erbyn gwahaniaethu a thrais, ac i wybod sut a ble i geisio cymorth, cyngor a gwybodaeth ffeithiol ynghylch ystod o faterion sy'n ymwneud ag addysg cydberthynas a rhywioldeb.
translation.en: This includes the ability to recognise, understand and speak out about discrimination and violence and know how and where to seek support, advice and factual information on a range of RSE issues.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr feithrin dealltwriaeth o ryw, rhywedd a rhywioldeb.
translation.en: Learners should develop an understanding of sex, gender and sexuality.

translation.cy: yn rhywbeth sy’n grymuso pobler mwyn galluogi ymarferwyr i greu cwricwlwm addysg cydberthynas a rhywioldeb cadarnhaol a thrawsnewidiol sy'n cyfoethogi llais ac annibyniaeth y dysgwr.
translation.en: empowering to enable practitioners to create an affirmative and transformative RSE curriculum that enhances learner voice and agency.

translation.cy: Amrywiaeth
translation.en: Diversity

translation.cy: Mae bodau dynol yn fodau cymdeithasol wrth eu natur.
translation.en: Humans, by their very nature are social beings.

translation.cy: datblygu eu gwerthoedd eu hunain ac ymdeimlad o'u hunaniaeth
translation.en: develop their own values and sense of identity

translation.cy: herio stereoteipiau.
translation.en: challenge stereotypes.

translation.cy: dysgu am y sgiliau sydd eu hangen er mwyn gweithio tuag at lwybrau gyrfa a gwaith, a meithrin y sgiliau hynny. Dylai hyn gynnwys ymwybyddiaeth o sgiliau, rhinweddau a diddordebau unigol, a'u heffaith ar ddewisiadau gyrfa, ynghyd â dealltwriaeth o ganlyniadau'r dewisiadau hynny
translation.en: learning about and development of the skills to work towards careers and work pathways – this should include an awareness of individual skills, attributes and interests, and how they impact on career choices, along with an understanding of the consequences of those choices

translation.cy: cyfleoedd i elwa ar gysylltiadau â busnesau a/neu gyflogwyr.
translation.en: opportunities to benefit from links with business and/or employers.

translation.cy: yn cynnwys ystod o gyfleoedd gwaith mewn meysydd traddodiadol a meysydd sy'n dod i'r amlwg, gan gynnwys dechrau busnes newydd ac entrepreneuriaeth
translation.en: include a range of traditional and emerging work opportunities, including start-ups and entrepreneurship

translation.cy: Gall cynnwys cwricwlwm yn aml gael ei ystyried drwy bob cyd-destun, a dylai ymarferwyr geisio manteisio ar bob un o'r cyd-destunau hyn a chefnogi dysgwyr i ddeall y cysylltiadau clir, annatod rhyngddyn nhw.
translation.en: Curriculum content can often be considered through each context and practitioners should seek to draw across these contexts and support learners to understand the clear, intrinsic links between them.

translation.cy: Wrth ymwreiddio cyd-destunau lleol, cenedlaethol a rhyngwladol, dylai ymarferwyr chwilio am gyfleoedd i gefnogi dysgwyr i:
translation.en: When embedding local, national and international contexts, practitioners should look for opportunities to support learners to:

translation.cy: creu cysylltiadau â chymunedau a sefydliadau lleol
translation.en: make links with local communities and organisations

translation.cy: deall eu rôl fel dinasyddion a strwythurau'r llywodraeth sy'n effeithio arnyn nhw ym mhob cyd-destun
translation.en: understand their role as citizens and the structures of government which affect them in each context

translation.cy: deall datblygu cynaladwy, yr heriau a wynebir gan yr amgylchedd a chymdeithas a sut y gallan nhw ymgysylltu â'r materion hyn a gwneud gwahaniaeth gan gefnogi dinasyddiaeth gynaladwy
translation.en: understand sustainable development, the challenges the environment and society face and how they can engage with and make a difference on these issues supporting sustainable citizenship

translation.cy: adnabod etifeddiaeth ieithyddol a diwylliannol amrywiol Cymru a’i chysylltiadau y tu hwnt i Gymru
translation.en: recognise Wales’ diverse linguistic heritage and culture, and its connections with the rest of the world

translation.cy: adnabod sut y mae ein hieithoedd yn datgloi gwybodaeth am ein llenyddiaeth, ein daearyddiaeth a'n hanes a'u cysylltiadau y tu hwnt i Gymru
translation.en: recognise how our languages unlock knowledge about our literature, geography, history and their links beyond Wales

translation.cy: Pontio
translation.en: Transition

translation.cy: Proses yw cyfranogiad, sy'n cefnogi deialog rhwng dysgwyr a gweithwyr proffesiynol.
translation.en: It is also a process that supports a dialogue between learners and professionals.

translation.cy: Mae angen iddi fod yn broses ddiogel, galluogol a chynhwysol ac mae ynddi'i hun yn brofiad dysgu gwerthfawr, sy'n cefnogi ymholi a meddwl yn feirniadol.
translation.en: It needs to be safe, enabling and inclusive, and it is of itself a valuable learning experience, supporting inquiry and critical thinking.

translation.cy: Mae cyfathrebu'n effeithiol â rhieni a gofalwyr yn barhaus yn ffordd bwysig o feithrin cydberthnasau cadarnhaol er mwyn ymgysylltu â nhw mewn ffordd bwrpasol ac ystyrlon.
translation.en: Communicating effectively with parents and carers on an ongoing basis is an important way to foster positive relationships in order to engage them in purposeful and meaningful dialogue.

translation.cy: Yr egwyddorion addysgegol
translation.en: The pedagogical principles

translation.cy: golygu gosod tasgau a dewis adnoddau sy'n adeiladu ar wybodaeth a phrofiad blaenorol ac yn ennyn diddordeb
translation.en: sets tasks and selects resources that build on previous knowledge and experience and engage interest

translation.cy: annog dysgwyr i gymryd cyfrifoldeb cynyddol am eu dysgu eu hunain
translation.en: encourages learners to take increasing responsibility for their own learning

translation.cy: Dylai:
translation.en: It should:

translation.cy: ymateb i bob dysgwr
translation.en: respond to all learners

translation.cy: Yna, bydd disgwyl i ysgolion uwchradd gyflwyno eu cwricwla fesul blwyddyn, gan wneud hynny ar gyfer Blwyddyn 8 ym mis Medi 2023 ac ar gyfer Blwyddyn 11 ym mis Medi 2026.
translation.en: Secondary schools will then be expected to roll out their curricula on a year-by-year basis, with Year 8 in September 2023 through to Year 11 in September 2026.

translation.cy: Mae’n bwysig fod y Maes yn anelu at sicrhau bod y celfyddydau mynegiannol yn agored i bob dysgwr, a thrwy’r dull cynhwysol hwn, ehangu gorwelion pob un ohonyn nhw.
translation.en: Importantly, this Area wants to make the expressive arts accessible to all learners and, through this inclusive approach, expand the horizons of every learner.

translation.cy: Mae’r celfyddydau mynegiannol hefyd yn gyfrwng grymus y gall dysgwyr ei ddefnyddio i archwilio Cymru, ei thraddodiadau unigryw a’i diwylliannau amrywiol.
translation.en: The expressive arts are also a powerful medium through which learners can explore Wales and its unique traditions and diverse cultures.

translation.cy: Trwy ymwneud â’r Maes hwn, bydd cyfleoedd yn cael eu rhoi i ddysgwyr fod yn arloesol a beiddgar, i greu gwaith unigol ac i ddatblygu eu hunaniaeth eu hunain fel artistiaid yng Nghymru.
translation.en: By engaging with this Area, learners will be given opportunities to be innovative and bold, to create individual work and to develop their own identity as artists in Wales.

translation.cy: Egwyddorion cynnydd
translation.en: Principles of Progression

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr yn dangos cynnydd ym Maes Dysgu a Phrofiad y Celfyddydau Mynegiannol (Maes) drwy archwilio, profi a chreu ystyr cynyddol gymhleth.
translation.en: Learners demonstrate progression in the Expressive Arts Area of Learning and Experience (Area) by exploring, experiencing and creating increasingly complex meaning.

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr yn nodi cysylltiadau yn y broses greadigolar draws y disgyblaethau er mwyn archwilio, creu, dehongli ac ymateb.
translation.en: Learners make links in the creative processacross the disciplines to explore, create, interpret and respond.

translation.cy: Yn ystod cam mwy ymestynnol o gynnydd, gallai dysgwyr greu a gwerthuso llwyddiant rhyngweithio ymysg gwahanol agweddau ar symud mewn dawns gymhleth wedi'i choreograffu.
translation.en: At a more advanced stage of progress, learners might create and evaluate the success of interaction among various aspects of movement in a complex choreographed dance.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 3
translation.en: Progression step 3

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu archwilio a disgrifio sut mae artistiaid a gwaith creadigol yn cyfleu gwahanol naws a syniadau, a’r effaith maen nhw’n ei chael ar gynulleidfa.
translation.en: I can explore and describe how artists and creative work communicate mood, feelings and ideas and the impact they have on an audience.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cymhwyso gwybodaeth a dealltwriaeth o gyd-destun, a gwneud cysylltiadau rhwng fy ngwaith creadigol fy hun a gwaith creadigol pobl eraill, ac o leoedd a chyfnodau gwahanol.
translation.en: I can apply knowledge and understanding of context, and make connections between my own creative work and creative work by other people and from other places and times.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwerthuso effeithiolrwydd ystod eang o dechnegau artistig wrth gynhyrchu ystyr.
translation.en: I can evaluate the effectiveness of a wide range of artistic techniques in producing meaning.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu creu fy nyluniadau fy hun, ac rwy’n gallu gweithio ar y cyd gydag eraill i ddatblygu syniadau creadigol.
translation.en: I can create my own designs and work collaboratively with others to develop creative ideas.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu perfformio, cynhyrchu, dylunio, arddangos a rhannu fy ngwaith creadigolmewn cyd-destunau ffurfiol ac anffurfiol, gan ystyried effaith fy ngwaith creadigol ar y gynulleidfa.
translation.en: I can perform, produce, design, exhibit and share my creative workin formal and non-formal contexts, considering the impact of my creative work on the audience.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod ac ymateb yn greadigol i heriau, a gwneud hyn gyda gwydnwch a hyblygrwydd.
translation.en: I can identify and respond creatively to challenges with resilience and flexibility.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio deunyddiau creadigol yn ddiogel gyda pheth rheolaeth o dan oruchwyliaeth.
translation.en: I can use creative materials safely and with some control under supervision.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu, yn hyderus, ystyried fy hun, pobl eraill, y gynulleidfa, cyfranogwyr a materion eiddo deallusol wrth greu gwaith.
translation.en: I can confidently consider myself, others, audience, participants and matters of intellectual property when creating work.

translation.cy: Llythrennedd
translation.en: Literacy

translation.cy: Mae dysgwyr yn cyfathrebu gyda symbolau ac yn defnyddio ystod o iaith fathemategol.
translation.en: Learners communicate with symbols and use a range of mathematical language.

translation.cy: Mae’r datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig yn galluogi dysgwyr i ddatblygu gwybodaeth, a sgiliau creadigol ac arloesol.
translation.en: The statements of what matters enable learners to develop knowledge, and creative and innovative skills.

translation.cy: Disgwylir i ddysgwyr ystyried dylanwadau a llywio eu creadigrwydd eu hunain.
translation.en: Learners are expected to consider influences and shape their own creativity.

translation.cy: cyfleoedd i weithio’n annibynnol ac yn gydweithredol
translation.en: opportunities to work independently and collaboratively

translation.cy: arddulliau, genres a thestunau creadigolar draws yr holl ddisgyblaethau a chan gwmpasu pobl, lleoedd, diwylliannau a chyfnodau
translation.en: styles, genres and creative textsacross all disciplines and spanning people, places, cultures and time

translation.cy: mynediad at gyd-destunau lleol, cenedlaethol a rhyngwladol
translation.en: access to local, national and international contexts

translation.cy: cyfleoedd i ddysgwyr gymryd ystod o rolau a chyfrifoldebau o fewn y broses greadigol.
translation.en: opportunities for learners to take on a range of roles and responsibilities within the creative process.

translation.cy: Enghreifftiau yn unig yw'r rhain.
translation.en: These are illustrations only.

translation.cy: Mae gan gelf Ceri Richards, Martin Parr a Mary Lloyd Jones ei berthynas arbennig ei hun â Chymru – gallai hyn fod yn ysbrydoliaeth i ddysgwyr wrth ddatblygu eu dealltwriaeth a'u sgiliau creadigol eu hunain.
translation.en: The art of Ceri Richards, Martin Parr and Mary Lloyd Jones has a distinct relationship to Wales, this could be an inspiration for learners developing their own understanding and creative skills.

translation.cy: Cerddoriaeth
translation.en: Dance

translation.cy: traw, alaw, dynameg, gwead, tempo, ansawdd, rhythm, mydr, ffurf a strwythur, cyweiredd, dyfeisiau cerddorol (e.e. ailadrodd, ostinato, dilyniant), harmoni, tonyddiaethdwyran, teiran, rondo, tôn gron, miniwét a thrio, stroffig, thema ac amrywiadau, cyfansoddi di-dor, sonataperfformio (gan gynnwys lleisiol, offerynnol, technoleg e.e. DJ-io), byrfyfyrio a chyfansoddi (gan gynnwys lleisiol, offerynnol, acwstig, trydanol a digidol, golygu/cynhyrchu), gwrando (gan gynnwys dadansoddi, gwerthuso a gwerthfawrogi ystod o ffurfiau ac arddulliau cerddorol ar draws genres a chyfnodau o amser).Dawns Mae dawns yn cynnwys perfformio, coreograffi a gwerthfawrogiad ar draws ystod o arddulliau.Dylech ystyried:fframwaith symudiad (symudiadau corff, gofod, dynameg, cydberthnasau), amser (rhythm a rhanddawns), creu byrfyfyr, cymeriad, motifau/rhanddawns
translation.en: movement framework (body actions, space, dynamics, relationships), time (rhythm and phrasing), improvisation, character, motifs/phraseschoreographic devices (unison and canon, repetition, variation and development, complementary and contrasting, climax, highlights)compositional structures (beginning, middle and end, binary, ternary, rondo, theme and variation, narrative, unity, logical sequence, transitions)dance compositions (pure, abstract, lyrical, dramatic, comic, dance-drama)performance/refinement including physical elements (actions, posture, alignment, balance, coordination, control, flexibility, mobility, strength, stamina, extension, isolation)expression (projection, spatial awareness, musicality, phrasing, facial expression, interpretation, communication)technical considerations (timing, reproduction of movement in a stylistically accurate way).

translation.cy: Iechyd a Lles
translation.en: Health and Well-being

translation.cy: Mae celf, cerddoriaeth, dawns, theatr, ffurfiau cyfryngol a llenyddol yn ddarnau gwerthfawr o dystiolaeth ar gyfer ymchwiliadau yn y Dyniaethau ac yn gyfryngau ar gyfer mynegi dehongliadau a safbwyntiau pobl.
translation.en: Art, music, dance, theatre, forms of media and literature are valuable pieces of evidence for enquiries in the humanities and are mediums for expression of people’s interpretations and viewpoints.

translation.cy: Mae’r defnydd o rifedd a chysyniadau o’r Maes hwn wedi ymwreiddio ym Maes Dysgu a Phrofiad y Celfyddydau Mynegiannol, gan gefnogi pob disgyblaeth.
translation.en: The use of numeracy and concepts from this Area are embedded in the Expressive Arts Area of Learning and Experience, supporting all disciplines.

translation.cy: archwilio gwaith creadigol o ardal leol y dysgwyr, o Gymru yn ogystal ag o’r byd ehangach er mwyn dylanwadu ar eu gwaith eu hunain ac i werthfawrogi ac ymateb i amrywiaeth ddiwylliannol
translation.en: exploration of creative work from learners’ own locality and in Wales, as well as in the wider world to influence their own work and to appreciate and respond to cultural diversity

translation.cy: Yn y Maes hwn, gall yr wybodaeth a’r sgiliau a enillwyd drwy brofiadau sy’n ymwneud â gwaith gynnig dysgu dilys sy’n arwain at ddealltwriaeth ddyfnach o’r cyfleoedd sy’n bodoli mewn byd gwaith.
translation.en: In this Area, the knowledge and skills gained in work-related experiences can provide authentic learning which leads to a deeper understanding of the opportunities that exist in the world of work.

translation.cy: Yn y Maes hwn, mae dysgwyr yn archwilio a dathlu gwaith creadigol o amrywiol ddiwylliannau a chymdeithasau.
translation.en: In this Area, learners explore and celebrate creative work from diverse cultures and societies.

translation.cy: Elfennau sylfaenol y Maes hwn yw iechyd a datblygiad y corff, iechyd meddwl, a lles emosiynol a chymdeithasol.
translation.en: The fundamental components of this Area are physical health and development, mental health, and emotional and social well-being.

translation.cy: Bydd ymwneud â’r Maes hwn yn gymorth i feithrin dull gweithredu ysgol gyfan sy’n galluogi i iechyd a lles dreiddio i bob agwedd o fywyd ysgol.
translation.en: Engagement with this Area will help to foster a whole-school approach that enables health and well-being to permeate all aspects of school life.

translation.cy: Datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig
translation.en: Statements of what matters

translation.cy: Bydd dysgwyr yn cael eu hannog i ddatblygu’r  hyder, cymhelliant, gallu corfforol, gwybodaeth a dealltwriaeth a fydd o gymorth iddyn nhw fyw bywyd iach a gweithredol sy’n hyrwyddo iechyd a lles y corff cadarnhaol.
translation.en: Learners will be encouraged to develop the confidence, motivation, physical competence, knowledge and understanding that can help them lead healthy and active lifestyles which promote good physical health and well-being.

translation.cy: Mae cydberthnasau iach yn hanfodol ar gyfer ein lles.
translation.en: Healthy relationships are fundamental to our well-being.

translation.cy: Ehangder a dyfnder gwybodaeth cynyddol
translation.en: Increasing breadth and depth of knowledge

translation.cy: Caiff y broses o drosglwyddo sgiliau a gwybodaeth yn y Maes ei hystyried yn gynnydd o ran dod yn fwy cyfrifol yn gymdeithasol.
translation.en: The transfer of skills and knowledge within the Area is considered as progression within the domain of becoming more socially responsible.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu trosglwyddo ystod o sgiliau symud o sefyllfaoedd ac amgylcheddau cyfarwydd i rai anghyfarwydd a chyfnewidiol, gan ddefnyddio gofod yn greadigol mewn ymateb i amrywiaeth o symbyliadau.
translation.en: I can transfer a range of movement skills from familiar to unfamiliar and changing situations and environments, using space creatively in response to a variety of stimuli.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau adnabod rhai mathau o ymddygiad, cyflyrau a sefyllfaoedd sy’n effeithio ar fy iechyd a lles corfforol, ac rwy’n dechrau gwybod sut i ymateb a chael cymorth.
translation.en: I am beginning to recognise some of the behaviours, conditions and situations that affect my physical health and well-being and I am beginning to know how to respond and get help.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu canolbwyntio fy sylw ac yn ymwybodol fy mod yn gallu gwneud hyn.
translation.en: I can focus my attention and am aware of being able to do this.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu sylwi ar fy nheimladau, a’u cyfathrebu.
translation.en: I can notice and communicate my feelings.

translation.cy: Mae’r ffordd rydym yn gwneud penderfyniadau yn effeithio ar ansawdd ein bywydau ni a bywydau eraill.
translation.en: Our decision-making impacts on the quality of our lives and the lives of others.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod y gall fy mhenderfyniadau effeithio arnaf i ac ar eraill, nawr ac yn y dyfodol.
translation.en: I can recognise that my decisions can impact on me and others, both now and in the future.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dangos gofal a pharch tuag at eraill.
translation.en: I can show care and respect for others.

translation.cy: Mae cydberthnasau iach yn hanfodol ar gyfer ein lles.
translation.en: Healthy relationships are fundamental to our well-being.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dangos dealltwriaeth o natur gymhleth cydberthnasau mewn ystod o gyd-destunau, a dealltwriaeth o sut y mae ystod o ffactorauyn dylanwadu arnyn nhw.
translation.en: I can show an understanding of the complex nature of relationships in a range of contexts and an understanding of how they are influenced by a range of factors.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau adnabod ymddygiad diogel a pheryglus mewn cydberthnasau.
translation.en: I am beginning to recognise safe and unsafe behaviour in relationships.

translation.cy: Cynllunio eich cwricwlwm
translation.en: Designing your curriculum

translation.cy: Mae llythrennedd yn sylfaenol i hwyluso lles.
translation.en: Literacy is a fundamental enabler of well-being.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgu yn y Maes hwn gynnig cyfle i ddatblygu sgiliau rhifedd yng nghyd-destun y byd go iawn.
translation.en: Learning in this Area should provide opportunity to develop numeracy skills in the real-world context.

translation.cy: Mae rhifedd yn allweddol wrth hwyluso gwneud nifer o benderfyniadau gwybodus, yn arbennig rheoli arian a chefnogi gwneud penderfyniadau ariannol doeth ac ymwneud yn feirniadol gyda normau cymdeithasol ynghylch arian.
translation.en: Numeracy is a key enabler in making a number of informed decisions, in particular managing money and supporting good financial decision-making and critically engaging with social norms around money.

translation.cy: Meddwl yn feirniadol a datrys problemau
translation.en: Critical thinking and problem-solving

translation.cy: Dylai dysgu yn y Maes hwn gynnig cyfleoedd i ddysgwyr ddatblygu ymwybyddiaeth o’r sgiliau i fynegi eu emosiynau, ynghyd â’r sgiliau i fynegi’r syniadau hyn a rheolaeth drostyn nhw.
translation.en: Learning in this Area should provide learners with opportunities to develop an awareness of, control over, and the ability to express their emotions:

translation.cy: Dylai dysgu alluogi a chefnogi dysgwyr i ddatblygu sgiliau rhyngbersonol da trwy gynnig dealltwriaeth o normau ac agwedd pobl, a’r gallu i wrthod a herio’r rhain; a dealltwriaeth am y gwahaniaethau a sut dylai rhain cael eu parchu.
translation.en: Learning should enable and support learners to develop good interpersonal skills, by providing an understanding of norms and attitudes; an ability to reject and challenge these and an understanding of differences and how these should be respected.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr ddatblygu dealltwriaeth o’r ffactorau sy’n effeithio ar wneud penderfyniad, gan fod o gymorth iddyn nhw wneud penderfyniadau ystyriol, gwybodus, rhai y maen nhw’n gallu eu cyfiawnhau a’u hesbonio tra hefyd yn deall risgiau a goblygiadau posib eu penderfyniadau iddyn nhw eu hunain ac eraill.
translation.en: Learners should develop an understanding of the factors that influence decision-making, helping them to make considered, informed decisions that they are able to justify and explain while also understanding the risks and possible consequences of their decisions for themselves and others.

translation.cy: Gall wybodaeth a dealltwriaeth o’r ddysgu yn y datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig gefnogi dysgwyr i ddatblygu hyder ac annibyniaeth.
translation.en: Knowledge and understanding drawn from across learning in the statements of what matters can support learners to develop confidence and independence.

translation.cy: Mae defnyddio dysgu yn y Maes hwn yn darparu cyfleoedd i ddysgwyr ddeall ac archwilio sut mae gwneud penderfyniad yn effeithio arnyn nhw ac eraill, deall a datblygu’r sgiliau i wneud penderfyniadau ar y cyd, ac i werthuso’n feirniadol ffactorau a goblygiadau gwneud penderfyniad.
translation.en: Drawing on learning in this Area provides opportunities for learners to understand and explore how decision-making affects them and others, to understand and develop the skills to make collective decisions, and to critically evaluate factors and implications of decision-making.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgu hefyd gefnogi dysgwyr i gynllunio a gwireddu ymddygiadau cynaliadwy, cytbwys a chadarnhaol i gefnogi iechyd a lles corfforol.
translation.en: Learning should also support learners to plan and implement sustainable, balanced and positive behaviours to support physical health and well-being.

translation.cy: Dyma’r ystyriaethau allweddol y dylai lleoliadau, ysgolion ac ymarferwyr eu hystyried wrth ddatblygu eu cwricwlwm.
translation.en: These are the key considerations which settings, schools and practitioners should consider when developing their curriculum:

translation.cy: Pa gyfleoedd ar gyfer gweithgaredd corfforol y bydd eich dysgwyr yn eu mwynhau a’u gweld yn ystyrlon?
translation.en: What opportunities for physical activity will your learners find enjoyable and meaningful?

translation.cy: Beth sy’n eu hysgogi i ymwneud â gwahanol rolau, cyfrifoldebau ac amgylcheddau (e.e. dan do, y tu allan, mewn ac o amgylch dŵr)?
translation.en: What motivates them to engage in a variety of roles, responsibilities and environments (e.g. indoor, outdoor, in and around water)?

translation.cy: Pa gyfleoedd ddylai eich dysgwyr eu cael i ddatblygu defnydd iach, diogel a chyfrifol o dechnoleg ddigidol a’r byd ar-lein?
translation.en: What opportunities should your learners have to develop healthy, safe and responsible use of digital technology and the online world?

translation.cy: Beth yw’r gwahanol grwpiau a dylanwadau cymdeithasol sy’n effeithio ar eich dysgwyr unigol, eich lleoliad/ysgol a’r gymuned ehangach?
translation.en: What are the different social influences and groups that impact on your learners, your setting or school and your wider community?

translation.cy: Pa sgiliau sydd eu hangen ar eich dysgwyr i ddatblygu cydberthnasau iach?
translation.en: What skills do your learners need to develop healthy relationships?

translation.cy: Dylai lleoliadau ac ysgolion gynnig cyfleoedd i ddysgwyr archwilio’r ffactorau sy’n effeithio ar eu hiechyd meddwl a lles.
translation.en: Settings and schools should provide opportunities for learners to explore the factors that impact on their mental health and well-being.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal, dylid rhoi cyfle i ddysgwyr wneud penderfyniadau mewn meysydd megis gyrfaoedd, rheolaeth ariannol, cydberthnasau a rhyngweithio gyda a thrwy dechnoleg ddigidol.
translation.en: Provision should also be made for learners to make decisions in areas such as careers, financial management, relationships and interactions with and through digital technology.

translation.cy: Anogir lleoliadau ac ysgolion i gynnig cyfleoedd i ddysgwyr fyfyrio ar oblygiadau tymor byr, tymor canolig a hirdymor y penderfyniadau maen nhw’n eu gwneud.
translation.en: Settings and schools are encouraged to provide learners with opportunities to reflect on the short-term, medium-term and long-term implications of the decisions they make.

translation.cy: Mae’n bwysig myfyrio ar effaith penderfyniadau nid yn unig ar yr hunan ond ar bobl eraill a’r gymdeithas ehangach, yn arbennig mewn perthynas â phenderfyniadau sydd wedi cael eu gwneud gan bobl eraill/grwpiau eraill.
translation.en: Reflecting on the impact of decisions not only on oneself, but on other people and wider society is important, particularly with regard to decisions that have been made by others or other groups.

translation.cy: Dylai lleoliadau ac ysgolion ystyried y cydberthnasau sy’n gyfarwydd i’r dysgwyr megis teulu a chyfeillion, anifeiliaid yn cynnwys rhai anwes, cyfoedion, pobl broffesiynol, rhithiol, rhamantus, rhywiol, crefyddol ac ysbrydol, ac unrhyw cydberthynas nad sydd eto’n gyfarwydd iddyn nhw ond eu bod yn debygol iawn o ddod ar eu traws yn ystod eu bywydau.
translation.en: Settings and schools should consider the relationships that are familiar to learners such as family and friends, pets, animals, peers, professional, virtual, romantic, sexual, religious andspiritual,and those relationships which they may not yet be familiar with but are highly likely to encounter in their lives.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr ddeall pwysigrwydd preifatrwydd a chydsynio.
translation.en: Learners should understand the importance of privacy and consent.

translation.cy: Gall ymddygiadau sydd heb fod yn ddiogel gynnwys camdriniaeth corfforol, emosiynol, rhywiol ac ar-lein.
translation.en: Unsafe behaviours may include physical, emotional, verbal, sexual and online abuse.

translation.cy: Dylai cynllunio ddechrau trwy feddwl am bynciau sy’n berthnasol i anghenion dysgwyr ac yna archwilio sut y gellir defnyddio’r pwnc neu’r thema i wireddu dysgu ymhob un o’r datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig.
translation.en: Planning should begin by thinking about topics relevant to learners’ needs and then exploring how the topic or theme can be used to deliver learning in each of the statements of what matters.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, pe bai sylweddau niweidiol yn cael eu nodi fel maes i ganolbwyntio arno, er mwyn cynllunio byddai angen archwilio sut mae’r disgrifiadau dysgu ar gyfer pob un o’r datganiadau o’r hyn sy’n bwysig yn gallu cynnig ffordd benodol o weithredu’r dysgu.
translation.en: For example, if harmful substances were identified as a focus area, then curriculum design would require an exploration of how the descriptions of learning for each of the statements of what matters can offer a particular way of approaching it.

translation.cy: Gallai dysgu am ymddygiadau, sefyllfaoedd a chyflyrau sy’n effeithio ar iechyd corfforol a lles gynnwys dysgu am gamddefnyddio sylweddau, datblygu sgiliau cymorth cyntaf a deall cyflyrau iechyd.
translation.en: Learning about behaviours, situations and conditions that affect physical health and well-being could include learning about substance misuse, the development of first aid skills and an understanding of health conditions.

translation.cy: Mae Maes Dysgu a Phrofiad Iechyd a Lles yn cynnig cyfleoedd ar gyfer symud a dawns creadigol fel gweithgaredd corfforol ac yn ffordd o alluogi dysgwyr i ddatblygu symudiadauechddygol brasasymudiadau echddygol manwl er mwyn cefnogi cyfranogiad mewn gwahanol ddisgyblaethau celfyddydol.
translation.en: The Health and Well-being Area of Learning and Experience provides opportunities for creative movement and dance as a physical activity and can enable learners to develop gross motor and fine motor movements to support participation in the arts’ disciplines.

translation.cy: Un o’r cysylltiadau pwysicaf yw’r cysylltiad â Maes Dysgu a Phrofiad Iechyd a Lles ac mae’r enghreifftiau yn cynnwys ymdrin â llythrennedd ariannol a risg.
translation.en: One of the most important links is with the Health and Well-being Area of Learning and Experience and an example would be around financial literacy and risk.

translation.cy: Gall dysgu sut mae’r ymennydd yn gweithio fod o gymorth i ddysgwyr ddeall eu meddyliau, teimladau ac emosiynau.
translation.en: Learning how the brain works can help learners understand their thoughts, feelings and emotions.

translation.cy: Mae technoleg yn bwysig i iechyd a lles dysgwyr.
translation.en: Technology is important to the health and well-being of learners, including supporting the preparation of healthy diets.

translation.cy: Dylai dysgu gael ei lywio gan dueddiadau lleol, cenedlaethol a byd-eang, materion a ffactorau sy’n effeithio ar wahanol agweddau o iechyd a lles dysgwyr.
translation.en: Learning should be informed by local, national and global trends, issues and factors which affect different aspects of learners’ health and well-being.

translation.cy: Trwy ddatblygu a modelu empathi, dylid cefnogi dysgwyr i ddod yn ddinasyddion gweithredol sy’n ymwneud â phob un o’r cyd-destunau hyn, a hynny mewn ffordd sydd er lles y gymdeithas.
translation.en: Through developing and modelling empathy,learners should be supported to become active citizens who engage pro-socially with each of these different contexts.

translation.cy: Mae’r Maes hwn yn cwmpasu daearyddiaeth; hanes; crefydd, gwerthoedd a moeseg; astudiaethau busnes ac astudiaethau cymdeithasol.
translation.en: The Area encompasses geography; history; religion, values and ethics; business studies and social studies.

translation.cy: Mae’n bwysig fod dysgwyr yn myfyrio ar effaith eu gweithredoedd a gweithredoedd pobl eraill, a sut y dylanwadir ar y gweithredoedd hyn gan ddehongliadau o hawliau dynol, gwerthoedd, moeseg, athroniaethau, a safbwyntiau crefyddol ac anghrefyddol.
translation.en: It is important that learners reflect upon the impact of their actions and those of others, and how such actions are influenced by interpretations of human rights, values, ethics, philosophies, religious and non-religious views.

translation.cy: Gall yr archwilio hwn ysgogi dysgwyr i gymryd rhan mewn gwahanol ddulliau ymholi, gwerthuso’r dystiolaeth y byddan nhw’n ei chanfod, a chymhwyso a mynegi eu canfyddiadau yn effeithiol.
translation.en: This exploration will encourage learners to participate in different methods of enquiry, evaluate the evidence that they find, and apply and communicate their findings effectively.

translation.cy: Bydd y profiadau hyn o gymorth i ddatblygu gwydnwch yn y dysgwyr, magu annibyniaeth a chynyddu hunan-hyder a hunan-werth.
translation.en: These experiences will help develop learners’ resilience, build independence, and increase self-confidence and self-esteem.

translation.cy: Mae’r agwedd hon o’r Maes hwn yn ysgogi archwilio cysyniadau gan gynnwys cwestiynu, tystiolaeth, gwerthuso, moeseg a barn.
translation.en: This aspect of the Area will encourage the exploration of concepts, including questioning, evidence, evaluation, ethics and judgements.

translation.cy: Gall dysgu sut y gall gwahanol fydolygon a ffactorau ddylanwadu ar eu canfyddiadau a’u dehongliadau eu hunain, yn ogystal â rhai pobl eraill, annog dysgwyr i ddatblygu gwerthfawrogiad o sut mae cyd-destun yn dylanwadu ar greu naratif a ffyrdd o gyfleu.
translation.en: Learning how various worldviews and factors can influence their own and others’ perceptions and interpretations will encourage learners to develop an appreciation of how contexts influence the constructions of narratives and representations.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal, gall archwilio amrywiaeth o gredoau, athroniaethau a bydolygon am y byd naturiol fod o gymorth i ddysgwyr sylweddoli sut mae’r rhain yn dylanwadu ar y modd y mae pobl yn rhyngweithio â’r byd.
translation.en: In addition, an exploration of a range of beliefs, philosophies and worldviews about the natural world can help learners realise how these influence people’s interactions with the world.

translation.cy: Gall gwerthfawrogi hunaniaeth, treftadaeth a chynefin ddylanwadu’n emosiynol ac yn ysbrydol ar ddysgwyr, a bod o gymorth i greu ymdeimlad o hunan ac o berthyn.
translation.en: An appreciation of identity, heritage and cynefincan influence learners emotionally and spiritually, and help build their sense of self and of belonging.

translation.cy: Bydd y profiadau hyn hefyd yn tanlinellu’r angen i’r dysgwyr allu cyfiawnhau eu penderfyniadau wrth weithredu mewn ffordd gymdeithasol, gwleidyddol, economaidd ac entrepreneuraidd.
translation.en: These experiences will also underline the need for learners to be able to justify their decisions when acting socially, politically, economically and entrepreneurially.

translation.cy: Wrth iddyn nhw symud drwy’r continwwm dysgu, mae dysgwyr yn meithrin dealltwriaeth gynyddol o’r nodweddion sy’n diffinio’r disgyblaethau sylfaenol (gan gynnwys hanes; daearyddiaeth; crefydd, gwerthoedd a moeseg; astudiaethau busnes ac astudiaethau cymdeithasol) a’r ffordd y gellir dod â’r rhain at ei gilydd i ddarparu ffyrdd gwahanol o ystyried materion a mynd i’r afael â chwestiynau neu broblemau.
translation.en: As they move through the continuum of learning, learners have an increased understanding of the defining features of the constituent disciplines (including history; geography; religion, values and ethics; business studies and social studies) and how these can be brought together to provide different lenses through which to view issues and address questions or problems.

translation.cy: Byddan nhw’n dangos mwy o annibyniaeth wrth ddod o hyd i wybodaeth addas, gan wneud rhagfynegiadau a damcaniaethau gwybodus, a gwneud penderfyniadau ynghylch dibynadwyedd a chyfleustod, ymysg pethau eraill.
translation.en: They will show a greater independence in finding suitable information, making informed predictions and hypotheses, and making judgments including about reliability and utility. They will also become more able to effectively work with others, especially, but not limited to, taking part in social action.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cyflawni ymchwiliadau llawn a manwl yn annibynnol, gan ddewis y dulliau mwyaf effeithiol a chyfiawnhau fy methodoleg.
translation.en: I can independently undertake a range of full and thorough enquiries, selecting the most effective approach and justifying my methodologies.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cydnabod ac esbonio bod fy marn i, a barn pobl eraill, yn werthfawr.
translation.en: I can recognise and explain that my opinions and the opinions of others have value.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau adnabod yr effeithiau rwy’n eu cael ar y byd naturiol.
translation.en: I am beginning to recognise the effects that I have on the natural world.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod nodweddion arbennig lleoedd, amgylcheddau a thirffurfiau, a sut y gall rhain newid.
translation.en: I can recognise the distinctive features of places, environments and landforms,and how these may change.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu rhoi esboniadau a dadansoddiad cyflawn o sut a pham mae lleoedd, gofodau, amgylcheddau a thirffurfiau wedi newid dros gyfnod o amser.
translation.en: I can give comprehensive explanations and analysis of how and why places, spaces, environments and landforms have changed over time.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ddefnyddio fy nealltwriaeth fanwl o natur a graddau newid a pharhad i esbonio a dadansoddi’r modd y mae cymunedau a chymdeithasau wedi addasu a newid, a hynny yn fy ardal i, yng Nghymru yn ogystal ag yn y byd ehangach.
translation.en: I can use my detailed understanding of the nature and extent of change and continuity to explain and analyse how communities and societies have adapted and changed in my locality and in Wales, as well as in the wider world.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwerthuso’n feirniadol  ganlyniadau ac arwyddocâd digwyddiadau a newidiadau mewn ystod o gymdeithasau yn y gorffennol a’r presennol.
translation.en: I can critically evaluate the consequences and significance of events and changes in a range of societies in the past and present.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu archwilio ystod o ffyrdd mae hunaniaeth yn cael ei ffurfio, a rhai o’r dylanwadau sy’n effeithio ar amrywiaeth o fewn cymdeithas.
translation.en: I can explore a range of ways in which identity is formed and some of the influences that impact upon diversity in society.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwerthuso natur amlochrog hunaniaeth, a gallu esbonio sut y gall hyn ddylanwadu ar ymwneud pobl â’i gilydd, ac effeithio o fewn ac ar draws cymdeithasau amrywiol yn fy ardal leol ac yng Nghymru, yn ogystal â’r byd ehangach.
translation.en: I can evaluate the multifaceted nature of identity and explain how it influences people’s interaction and impact within and across diverse societies in my locality and in Wales, as well as in the wider world.

translation.cy: Mae gen i ddealltwriaeth o ystod o systemau llywodraethu, a sut mae pobl wedi cael, ac yn cael, eu cynrychioli ar lefelau lleol, cenedlaethol a byd-eang, gan gynnwys sut mae systemau Llywodraeth yng Nghymru yn gweithredu yn y presennol ac yn y gorffennol, ac rwy’n gallu cymharu ac esbonio gwahaniaethau rhwng y systemau hyn.
translation.en: I have an understanding of a range of governance systems and how people have been represented at local, national and global levels, including how systems of government in Wales operate both now and in the past, and I can compare and explain differences between these systems.

translation.cy: Rwyf hefyd yn deall beth yw hawliau dynol, a pham maen nhw’n bwysig i mi a phobl eraill.
translation.en: I also have an understanding of what human rights are and why they are important to me and other people.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu esbonio’r gwahaniaeth rhwng dymuniadau, anghenion a hawliau, a pham mae eu hawliau yn cael eu gwrthod i rai pobl.
translation.en: I can explain the difference between wants, needs and rights, and why some people are denied their rights.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cymryd gofal o adnoddau a pheidio â’u gwastraffu, ac rwy’n ymwybodol o bwysigrwydd greu dyfodol cynaladwy.
translation.en: I can take care of resources and not waste them, and I am conscious of the importance of creating a sustainable future.

translation.cy: Mae gen i ddealltwriaeth o’m cyfrifoldebau amgylcheddol, economaidd a chymdeithasol fy hun wrth greu dyfodol cynaladwy.
translation.en: I have an understanding of my own and others’ environmental, economic and social responsibilities in creating a sustainable future.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall bod ystod o ffactorau sy’n dylanwadu ar fy ymddygiad, gweithredoedd a phenderfyniadau i a phobl eraill, a bod y rhain yn cynnwys barn a safbwyntiau moesol ac egwyddorol.
translation.en: I can understand that there are a range of factors that influence my and other people’s behaviours, actions and decisions, and that these include ethical and moral judgements and viewpoints.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu esbonio pwysigrwydd rôl grwpiau, llywodraethau, busnesau a sefydliadau anllywodraethol wrth greu dyfodol cynaladwy, a sut maen nhw’n effeithio ar bobl, eu hawliau ac ar yr amgylchedd.
translation.en: I can explain the importance of the role played by groups, governments, businesses and non-governmental organisations in the creation of a sustainable future, and how they impact on people and their rights and on the environment.

translation.cy: Yn y cyd-destun hwn, rwy’n archwilio’n feirniadol  fy agweddau, tybiaethau ac ymddygiad.
translation.en: Within that context, I critically examine my attitudes, assumptions and behaviours.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn rhoi arweiniad penodol i’w ddefnyddio wrth ymgorffori dysgu o fewn y dyniaethau yn eich cwricwlwm.
translation.en: This section provides specific guidance when incorporating learning in humanities in your curriculum.

translation.cy: Sgiliau trawsgwricwlaidd a sgiliau cyfannol
translation.en: Cross-curricular skills and integral skills

translation.cy: Sgiliau cyfannol
translation.en: Integral skills

translation.cy: Gwerthuso, cyfiawnhau a mynegi ymatebion ystyriol mewn amrywiol ffyrdd.
translation.en: Evaluating, justifying and expressing considered responses in a variety of ways.

translation.cy: Dewis nifer gyfyngedig o bynciau ymhob blwyddyn i sicrhau dyfnder ac ansawdd i’r dysgu, lle y gall pynciau orgyffwrdd er mwyn atgyfnerthu cysyniadau allweddol.
translation.en: Select a limited number of topics in each year to ensure the depth and quality of learning, where topics may overlap in order to reinforce key concepts.

translation.cy: datblygu gwerthfawrogiad o’r gorffennol ar wahanol raddfeydd, sy’n galluogi dysgwyr i adnabod eu ffordd trwy amser
translation.en: develop an appreciation of the past on different scales, which allows learners to orientate themselves in time

translation.cy: darparu sgiliau i’r dysgwyr ffurfio cwestiynau ymchwil, ac i gasglu, trin a chyflwyno data fel eu bod yn gallu gwerthuso a meddwl yn feirniadol am broblemau a materion.
translation.en: equip learners with the skills to formulate research questions, and to collect, manipulate and present data so they can evaluative and think critically about problems and issues.

translation.cy: Crefydd, gwerthoedd a moeseg
translation.en: Religion, values and ethics

translation.cy: ddatblygu dealltwriaeth o’r disgyblaeth a’i gwerth
translation.en: develop an understanding of the discipline and its value

translation.cy: datblygu cyd-destunau cyfoethog ar gyfer archwilio cysyniadau hunaniaeth, perthyn, perthynas ag eraill, cymuned, cynefin, amrywiaeth, plwraliaeth a chydgysylltiad sy’n galluogi dysgwyr i feithrin synnwyr o’r hunan a datblygu’n ysbrydol
translation.en: develop rich contexts for exploring the concepts of identity, belonging, relationships, community, cynefin, diversity, pluralismand interconnectedness which can enable learners to gain a sense of self and develop spirituality

translation.cy: cynnig cyd-destunau cyfoethog i archwilio materion cymdeithasol, hunaniaeth, hawliau a chyfrifoldebau a chyfundrefn cymdeithasol
translation.en: provide rich contexts to explore social issues, identity, rights and responsibilities, and social organisation

translation.cy: Ystod o gyfleoedd i ddysgu y tu allan er mwyn:
translation.en: A range of opportunities to learn outdoors to:

translation.cy: Ystod o gyfleoedd i ymweld ac archwilio gan gynnwys:
translation.en: A range of opportunities to visit and explore including:

translation.cy: Ystod o gyfleoedd i arsylwi neu gymryd rhan mewn:
translation.en: A range of opportunities to observe or participate in:

translation.cy: Mae hanes lleol, Cymreig a’r byd wedi eu cysylltu, eu siapio ac yn cael eu gwerthfawrogi drwy ddigwyddiadau megis Gwrthryfel Glyndŵr, Rhyfel Cartref Sbaen a Rhyfeloedd Byd yr unfed ganrif ar hugain.
translation.en: Local, Welsh and world history are connected, shaped and appreciated through events such as Glyndŵr’s Rising, the Spanish Civil War and the World Wars of the twentieth century.

translation.cy: Mae llenyddiaeth yn darparu tystiolaeth werthfawr ar gyfer ymchwiliadau mewn dyniaethau, ac yn gallu bod yn destun yr ymchwiliadau hyn.
translation.en: Literature provides valuable evidence for, and can be a focus of, enquiries in humanities.

translation.cy: Mae dysgu a phrofiad yn y Maes hwn yn anelu at alluogi dysgwyr i gyfathrebu’n effeithiol gan ddefnyddio Cymraeg, Saesneg ac ieithoedd rhyngwladol.
