translation.en: It aims to encourage learners to transfer what they have learned about how languages work in one language to the learning and using of other languages.

translation.cy: Caiff y parodrwydd hwn i ddysgu ei gefnogi ymhellach gan fod medru trin iaith yn effeithiol o gymorth i ddysgwyr ddeall cysyniadau ar draws y cwricwlwm, er enghraifft drwy eu galluogi i fynegi eu rhesymu wrth ddatrys problemau a dadansoddi gwybodaeth.
translation.en: This readiness to learn is further supported since effective language skills help learners to make sense of concepts across the curriculum, for example by enabling them to articulate their reasoning when solving problems and analysing information.

translation.cy: Bydd ymwneud â’r Maes hwn hefyd o gymorth i ddysgwyr ddod yn unigolion iach, hyderus sy’n barod i fyw bywyd gan wireddu eu dyheadau fel aelodau gwerthfawr o gymdeithas gan fod y sgiliau a hyrwyddir trwy ieithoedd, llythrennedd a chyfathrebu yn allweddol i alluogi dysgwyr i fynegi eu hunain yn effeithiol, bod yn agored i safbwyntiau pobl eraill a datblygu perthynas gadarnhaol ag eraill.
translation.en: Engaging with this Area also helps learners to become healthy, confident individuals, ready to lead fulfilling lives as valued members of society as the skills promoted through languages, literacy and communication are key to enabling learners to express themselves effectively, to be open to other people’s points of view and to develop positive relationships.

translation.cy: Mae’r Maes hwn wedi’i gynllunio i sicrhau bod dysgwyr, fel dinasyddion Cymru ddwyieithog mewn byd amlieithog, yn gallu defnyddio Cymraeg, Saesneg ac ieithoedd rhyngwladol.
translation.en: This Area is designed to equip learners, as citizens of a bilingualWales in a multilingual world, with the ability to use Welsh, English and international languages.

translation.cy: Mae mynegi ein hunain drwy ieithoedd yn allweddol i gyfathrebu.
translation.en: Expressing ourselves through languages is key to communication.

translation.cy: Bydd y Maes hwn yn cynnig proﬁadau llenyddol i ddysgwyr fydd yn ennyn eu diddordeb a’u dychymyg fel gwrandawyr, gwylwyr, darllenwyr, storïwyr a llenorion.
translation.en: This Area provides learners with literary experiences that can engage them as listeners, viewers, readers, narrators and creators.

translation.cy: Byddan nhw’n cael eu hannog i broﬁ ac ymateb i amrywiaeth o lenyddiaeth sy’n cynnig mewnwelediad i ddiwylliant, pobl a hanes Cymru yn ogystal â’r byd ehangach.
translation.en: They should be encouraged to experience and respond to a variety of literature that gives them insight into the culture, people and history of Wales as well as the wider world.

translation.cy: Yn ei dro, gall hyn gyfrannu at eu lles emosiynol a meddyliol.
translation.en: This in turn can contribute to their emotional and mental well-being.

translation.cy: Felly, yn raddol, mae dysgwyr yn meithrin dealltwriaeth fwy cynnil o wahanol safbwyntiau a meistrolaeth gynyddol o'r sgiliau sydd eu hangen i ddehongli, gwerthuso a mynegi safbwyntiau gwahanol ac ymateb iddyn nhw.
translation.en: Learners thus acquire a gradually more nuanced understanding of different viewpoints and increasing command of the skills needed to interpret, evaluate, articulate and respond to differing perspectives.

translation.cy: ymateb i ddulliau cyfathrebu wrth wrando, darllen neu dderbyn iaith mewn ffyrdd eraill
translation.en: responding to communications when listening, reading, or receiving language in other ways

translation.cy: Gwelir cynnydd yn y Maes hwn hefyd drwy ddefnyddio iaith.
translation.en: Progression in this Area is also seen in the production of language.

translation.cy: dod o hyd i wybodaeth yn annibynnol
translation.en: finding information independently

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall bod pobl yn defnyddio gwahanol ieithoedd.
translation.en: I can understand thatpeople use different languages.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwrando ar, deall ac  adalw’n ddiweddarach yr hyn rwyf wedi’i glywed.
translation.en: I can listen to, understand and later recall what I have heard.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu mwynhau rhannu llyfrau a deunyddiau darllen a’u trin fel darllenydd.
translation.en: I can enjoy sharing books and reading materials and handle them like a reader.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau datblygu fy ngwybodaeth o gyfatebiaeth graffem-ffonem.
translation.en: I am beginning to develop my knowledge of grapheme-phoneme correspondence.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu darganfod a defnyddio gwybodaeth o wahanol ddeunyddiau rwyf yn eu darllen.
translation.en: I can find and use information from different materials that I read.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu darllen ystod o destunau gan ddewis strategaethau i’w deall nhw ac i wella fy mynegiant a chyfathrebu.
translation.en: I can read a range of texts, choosing strategies to understand them, and to improve my own expression and communication.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio sgiliau dehongli adod i gasgliadi fagu dealltwriaeth fanwl o destunau cymhleth ac rwy’n gallu gwerthuso dibynadwyedd, dilysrwydd ac effaith yr hyn yr wyf yn ei ddarllen.
translation.en: I can use inference and deductionto gain in-depth understanding of complex texts, and can evaluate the reliability, validity and impact of what I read.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 4
translation.en: Progression step 4

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio ciwiau amrywiol i ragfynegi’r ystyr gyffredinol mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau llafar.
translation.en: I can use a variety of cuesto predict the general meaning in a variety of spoken contexts.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio ystod o strategaethau i grynhoi, syntheseiddio a dadansoddi gwybodaeth i fagu dealltwriaeth ehangach o destunau a chyfoethogi fy mynegiant a chyfathrebu.
translation.en: I can employ a range of strategies to summarise, synthesiseand analyse information to gain greater understanding of texts and to enhance my own expression and communication.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cyfathrebu gan wneud marciau, darlunio symbolau neu ysgrifennu llythrennau a geiriau mewn amrywiaeth o gyd-destunau.
translation.en: I can communicate by making marks, drawing symbols or writing letters and words in a range of contexts.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ysgrifennu’n ddarllenadwy a rhugl.
translation.en: I can write legibly and fluently.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwneud dewisiadau gwybodus am eirfa, iaith idiomatiga chystrawen er mwyn mynegi fy hun.
translation.en: I can make informed choices about vocabulary, idiomatic language and syntax in order to express myself.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio iaith lafar at wahanol ddibenion.
translation.en: I can use spoken language for different purposes.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu rhoi ymgais ar sillafu geiriau anoddach mewn ffordd resymol gan ddefnyddio ystod o strategaethau.
translation.en: I can attempt to spell more difficult words plausibly using a range of strategies.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu trefnu fy ngwaith ysgrifennu i ddilyn yn rhesymegol.
translation.en: I can organise my writing into a logical sequence.

translation.cy: Rwy’n dechrau mynegi fy nheimladau.
translation.en: I am beginning to express my feelings.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu myfyrio’n feirniadol ar fy nefnydd o iaith, ac yn gallu gwneud dewisiadau gwybodus ynghylch geirfa, iaith idiomatiga chystrawen er mwyn mynegi fy hun yn eglur.
translation.en: I can reflect critically on my language use and can make informed choices about vocabulary, idiomatic languageand syntaxin order to express myself with clarity.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 2
translation.en: Progression step 2

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu archwilio amrywiaeth eang o genres, gan arbrofi gyda dewisiadau iaith a thechnegau ar gyfer fy nibenion creadigol fy hun.
translation.en: I can explore a wide range of genres, experimenting with language choices and techniques for my own creative purposes.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi profi llenyddiaeth.
translation.en: I have experienced literature.

translation.cy: Rwyf wedi profi ystod o lenyddiaeth.
translation.en: I have experienced a range of literature.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwrando ar farddoniaeth, drama a rhyddiaith, a’u coﬁo.
translation.en: I can listen to and remember poetry, drama and prose.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymateb i’r hyn rwy’n ei glywed, ei ddarllen a’i weld, gan fynegi barn a dangos fy nealltwriaeth yn fy newis iaith.
translation.en: I can respond to what I hear, read and view expressing opinions and showing my understanding in my language of choice.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio’r hyn rwy’n ei wybod am arddulliau ysgrifennu a nodweddion gwahanol lenyddiaeth er mwyn creu fy ngwaith fy hun.
translation.en: I can use my knowledge of writing styles and the features of different literature to create my own work.

translation.cy: Ieithoedd rhyngwladol
translation.en: International languages

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio fy nychymyg ac arbrofi gydag iaith i greu fy llenyddiaeth fy hun yn yr iaith ryngwladol.
translation.en: I can use my imagination and experiment with language to create my own literature in the international language.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod nodweddion gwahanol genres gan ymateb yn fy newis iaith i’r hyn rwyf wedi’i glywed, ei ddarllen neu ei weld yn yr iaith ryngwladol, gan holi ac ateb cwestiynau er mwyn ennill dealltwriaeth.
translation.en: I can recognise the features of different genres responding in my language of choice to what I have heard, read, or viewed in the international language, asking and answering questions to gain an understanding.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu archwilio a dadansoddi’r hyn rwyf wedi’i glywed, ei ddarllen neu ei weld yn yr iaith ryngwladol, a chymharu hyn gyda fy niwylliant a’m profiadau fy hun, a mynegi hyn yn fy newis iaith.
translation.en: I can explore and analysewhat I have heard, read or viewed in the international language and compare it with my own culture and experiences, communicating this in my language of choice.

translation.cy: Dylai llythrennedd fod wrth wraidd y Maes hwn, ar draws pob datganiad o’r hyn sy’n bwysig.
translation.en: Literacyshould be at the heart of this Area, across all statements of what matters.

translation.cy: Mae cwmpas eang i ddisgrifiadau dysgu y Maes hwn ac maen nhw’n cynnig cyfeirbwyntiau ar gyfer cynnydd.
translation.en: The descriptions of learning for this Area are broad in scope and provide reference points for progression.

translation.cy: Cynllunio a threfnu
translation.en: Planning and organising

translation.cy: Mae pob datganiad yn cydnabod bod dysgu sgiliau a gwybodaeth mewn un iaith yn gallu cryfhau’r wybodaeth a’r dysgu am y sgiliau hynny ymhob iaith arall.
translation.en: Each statement recognises that learning skills and knowledge in one language can strengthen the knowledge and learning of those skills in all subsequent languages.

translation.cy: Mae’r disgrifiadau dysgu ar gyfer y tri datganiad arall o’r hyn sy’n bwysig yn y Maes hwn yn cael eu cyflwyno i adlewyrchu’r cyflymder a’r dyfnder mewn gwahanol gyd-destunau dysgu iaith.
translation.en: Descriptions of learning for the other three statements of what matters in this Area are presented to reflect the pace and depth in different language learning contexts.

translation.cy: Arolwg asesu anghenion ar gyfer Cymraeg fel iaith ychwanegol – Cynradd
translation.en: English as an additional language (EAL) - Primary

translation.cy: Sut y byddwch chi’n sicrhau awyrgylch ieithyddol gyfoethog ar gyfer yr holl ddysgwyr gan gynnwys awyrgylch amlieithog, wyneb yn wyneb, trwy iaith/ieithoedd digidol neu ysgrifenedig, a hyn fel model ar gyfer gwella eu sgiliau iaith eu hunain?
translation.en: How will you ensure rich language environments for all learners, including multilingual environments, face-to-face, via digital or written language(s), as a model for improving their own language skills?

translation.cy: Dylai dysgwyr gael mynediad at ystod amrywiol o brofiadau llenyddol y tu hwnt i’r ystafell ddosbarth.
translation.en: Learners should be exposed to a diverse range of literary experiences beyond the classroom.

translation.cy: Dylai ysgolion osod gweithdrefnau clir ar gyfer datblygu ymwybyddiaeth ffonolegol a ffonemig y dysgwyr yn systematig, gan roi pwyslais ar hyn.
translation.en: Schools should put in place a clear procedure for, and place emphasis on, the systematic development of learners’ phonological and phonemic awareness.

translation.cy: Gall disgyblaethau o fewn y Celfyddydau Mynegiannol gael eu defnyddio fel ffordd i ddysgwyr ddatblygu ieithoedd, llythrennedd a chyfathrebu gan gynnwys trwy lythrennedd gweledol, meddwl creadigol ac ysgrifennu creadigol, deall cynulleidfa a diben ac addasu iaith ar gyfer cynulleidfa, cyflwyno barddoniaeth, drama, ffilm, amlgyfryngau, chwarae rôl a chanu.
translation.en: Expressive Arts disciplines can be used as a vehicle for learners to develop languages, literacy and communication including through visual literacy, creative thinking and creative writing, understanding audience and purpose and adapting language for audience, performance poetry, drama, film, multimedia, role play and song.

translation.cy: cael sail gadarn yn Gymraeg a Saesneg i adeiladu arno wrth ddysgu ieithoedd eraill ac wrth ddyfnhau eu dealltwriaeth o gyd-destunau cenedlaethol a byd-eang
translation.en: have a firm foundation in Welsh and English to build on when learning other languages and when broadening their understanding of national and global contexts

translation.cy: ymdrochi eu hunain mewn diwylliannau ac ieithoedd lleol, cenedlaethol a rhyngwladol trwy ymweliadau, gan ymwneud â phobl yn lleol a byd-eang a chysylltu’n ddigidol
translation.en: immerse themselves in local, national and international cultures and languages through visits, engaging with people locally and globally and connecting digitally

translation.cy: datblygu iaith sy’n ymwneud â gwaith wrth ddysgu pob iaith
translation.en: develop language associated with work when learning all languages

translation.cy: Gall cefnogi datblygiad ieithoedd cartreffod o gymorth i hyrwyddo a datblygu ymddiriedaeth, gwerthfawrogiad a pharch ar draws ieithoedd a diwylliannau.
translation.en: Supporting the development of home languagescan help to promote and develop trust, appreciation and respect across languages and cultures.

translation.cy: Mae cynnydd ym Maes Dysgu a Phrofiad Mathemateg a Rhifedd (Maes) yn cynnwys datblygu pum hyfedredd cysylltiedig a rhyngddibynnol.
translation.en: Progression in the Mathematics and Numeracy Area of Learning and Experience (Area) involves the development of five connected and interdependent proficiencies which have no hierarchy.

translation.cy: Cymhwysedd strategol
translation.en: Fluency

translation.cy: Rhesymu rhesymegol
translation.en: Logical reasoning

translation.cy: O ganlyniad, mae gweithgareddau mathemategol yn dysgu’r dysgwyr i beidio â bod ag ofn problemau anghyfarwydd neu gymhleth. Mae hyn oherwydd y gellir eu crynhoi i gyfres o broblemau symlach ac, yn y pen draw, i gyfriﬁannau sylfaenol.
translation.en: Subsequently, mathematical activities teach learners not to be afraid of unfamiliar or complex problems, as they can be reduced to a succession of simpler problems and, eventually, to basic computations.

translation.cy: Mae dysgu a phrofiad yn y Maes hwn hefyd yn cyfrannu at ddatblygu cyfranwyr mentrus, creadigol sy’n barod i chwarae eu rhan yn llawn yn eu bywyd a’u gwaith.
translation.en: Experiences in this Area also contribute to developing enterprising, creative contributors, ready to play a full part in life and work.

translation.cy: Gall hyn annog dysgwyr i fod yn greadigol, gan fod gofyn iddyn nhw chwarae, arbroﬁ, cymryd risg a bod yn hyblyg wrth fynd i’r afael â phroblemau mathemategol.
translation.en: These can encourage learners to be creative because it asks them to play, experiment, take risks and be flexible in tackling mathematical problems.

translation.cy: Mae deall sut y mae cysyniadau mathemategol yn ategu'r dysgu yn helpu dysgwyr i greu cysylltiadau a throsglwyddo'r dysgu i gyd-destunau newydd.
translation.en: An understanding of how mathematical concepts underpin learning help learners make connections and transfer learning into new contexts.

translation.cy: Dylai'r cyfiawnhad a'rprawfddod yn gynyddol haniaethol, gan symud o esboniadau llafar a chynrychioliadau gweledol neu ddiriaethol i gynrychioliadau haniaethol sy'n ymwneud â symbolau a chonfensiynau.
translation.en: Justifications andproofshould become increasingly abstract, moving from verbal explanations, visual or concrete representations to abstract representations involving symbols and conventions.

translation.cy: Caiff y broses o fireinio sgiliau a soffistigeiddrwydd cynyddol wrth eu defnyddio a'u cymhwyso eu dangos drwy gymhwyso rhesymu rhesymegol cynyddol soffistigedig.
translation.en: Refinement and growing sophistication in the use and application of skills will be demonstrated through the application of increasingly sophisticated logical reasoning.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu mynegi sut mae setiau yn newid pan gaiff gwrthrychau eu hychwanegu atynt a’u tynnu oddi wrthynt.
translation.en: I can communicate how sets change when objects are added to and taken away from them.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio fy ngwybodaeth o luosi i gofio rhai ffeithiau ynghylch lluosi a thablau gan ddechrau gyda thablau 2, 3, 4, 5 a 10, ac rwy’n gallu defnyddio’r term ‘lluosrifau’.
translation.en: I can use my understanding of multiplication to recall some multiplication facts and tables starting with tables 2, 3, 4, 5 and 10 and I can use the term ‘multiples’.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dangos dealltwriaeth o incwm a gwariant, ac rwy’n gallu cymhwyso fy sgiliau cyfrifo i archwilio elw a cholled.
translation.en: I can demonstrate an understanding of income and expenditure, and I can apply calculations to explore profit and loss.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu archwilio a chreu patrymau rhifau a siapiau.
translation.en: I can explore and create patterns of numbers and shapes.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio cymudedd, dosbarthedd a chysylltiadedd er mwyn archwilio hafaledd ac anhafaledd mynegiadau.
translation.en: I can use commutativity, distributivity and associativity to explore equality and inequality of expressions.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu trin mynegiadau algebraidd yn rhugl drwy ymestyn cromfachau dwbl, ffactorio mynegiadau cwadratig a symleiddio ffracsiynau algebraidd.
translation.en: I can manipulate algebraic expressions fluently by expanding double brackets, factorising quadratic expressions and simplifying algebraic fractions.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu darganfod neu amcangyfrif cyfradd newid ar bwynt mewn graff, ac rwy’n gallu archwilio’r arwynebedd o dan graff, gan ddeall beth maen nhw’n ei gynrychioli yng nghyd-destun bywyd go iawn.
translation.en: I can determine or approximate the rate of change at a point on a graph and I can investigate the area under a graph, understanding what these represent in real-life contexts.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu deall a chymhwyso iaith amser mewn perthynas â’m bywyd bob-dydd.
translation.en: I can understand and apply the language of time in relation to my daily life.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cyfnewid rhwng unedau safonol, gan gynnwys cymhwyso fy nealltwriaeth o werth lle i gyfnewid rhwng unedau metrig.
translation.en: I can convert between standard units, including applying my understanding of place value to convert between metric units.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio dulliau effeithlon i ddarganfod perimedr ac arwynebedd siapiau dau ddimensiwn, gan ddeall sut mae hafaliadau sylfaenol yn deillio ohonynt.
translation.en: I can use efficient methods for finding the perimeter and area of two-dimensional shapes, understanding how basic formulae are derived.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 5
translation.en: Progression step 5

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu casglu gwahanol fathau o ddata er mwyn ateb amrywiaeth o gwestiynau a ofynnwyd, gan ddangos fy mod yn deall pwysigrwydd casglu data perthnasol.
translation.en: I can collect different types of data to answer a variety of questions that have been posed, demonstrating an understanding of the importance of collecting relevant data.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu defnyddio gwahanol raddfeydd i echdynnu a dehongli gwybodaeth allan o amrywiaeth o ddiagramau, tablau a grafﬁau, gan gynnwys siartiau cylch gyda ffracsiynau a chyfraneddau syml.
translation.en: I can use different scales to extract and interpret information from a range of diagrams, tables and graphs, including pie charts with simple fractions and proportions.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod sut mae anomaleddau yn effeithio ar y cymedr.
translation.en: I can recognise how anomalies affect the mean.

translation.cy: Llythrennedd
translation.en: Literacy

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr ddangos cynnydd bydd agweddau ar gasglu, cynrychioli a dadansoddi, er enghraifft, yn dod yn fwyfwy soffistigedig.
translation.en: Aspects of collection, representation and analysis, for example, will become more sophisticated as learners progress.

translation.cy: Meddwl yn feirniadol a datrys problemau
translation.en: Critical thinking and problem-solving

translation.cy: Dylai ymarferwyr ystyried y defnydd priodol o amrywiaeth o dechnolegau digidol, trinolion, gwrthrychau pob-dydd, a chynrychioliadau diriaethol a haniaethol o wrthrychau mathemategol i fod o gymorth i ddysgwyr ymwneud â chysyniadau mathemategol o fwy nag un persbectif.
translation.en: Practitioners should consider the appropriate use of a range of digital technologies, manipulatives, everyday objects, and concrete and abstractrepresentations of mathematical objects to help learners to engage with mathematical concepts from more than one perspective.

translation.cy: Deall bod hanner yn deillio o rannu rhywbeth yn ddwy ran hafal.
translation.en: Understanding that a half is a result of dividing something into two equal parts.

translation.cy: Rhesymu rhesymegol
translation.en: Logical reasoning

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn gofyn am feistrolaeth a chofio cysyniadau blaenorol; mannau cychwyn dealladwy; defnydd cyson o iaith, symbolau, delweddau a chynrychioliadau eraill; dewis goleuedig o enghreifftiau; defnydd perthnasol o offer digidol.
translation.en: This requires mastery and memory of earlier concepts; comprehensible starting points; consistent use of language, symbols, images and other representations; illuminating choice of examples; relevant use of digital tools.

translation.cy: O sylfaen gadarn o ddatrys problemau, rhesymu rhesymegol a deall data, mae Mathemateg a Rhifedd yn hanfodol i ddinasyddion gwybodus sy'n barod i chwarae rhan lawn mewn bywyd a gwaith.
translation.en: From a strong foundation of problem solving, logical reasoning and understanding data, Mathematics and Numeracy is critical for informed citizens who are ready to play a full part in life and work.

translation.cy: Mae rhai o’r cysylltiadau allweddol i ddysgu yn y Maes hwn yn cael eu hamlinellu isod.
translation.en: Some of the key links to learning in this Area are detailed below.

translation.cy: Mae Maes Dysgu a Phrofiad Iechyd a Lles hefyd yn darparu i’r dysgwyr yr wybodaeth a’r ddealltwriaeth o’r broses o wneud penderfyniadau, gan gynnwys goblygiadau penderfyniadau ac ystyriaethau risg.
translation.en: The Health and Well-being Area of Learning and Experience also provides learners with the knowledge and understanding of the process of decision-making, including the implications of decisions and consideration of risk.

translation.cy: Cyd-destunau lleol, cenedlaethol a rhyngwladol yn y Maes hwn
translation.en: Local, national and international contexts in this Area

translation.cy: Er mwyn gwneud synnwyr o’r iaith hon a deall cysyniadau mathemategol, mae dysgwyr angen enghreifftiau wedi’u gwreiddio mewn bywyd pob-dydd.
translation.en: To make sense of this language and to understand mathematical concepts, learners need examples rooted in everyday life.

translation.cy: Dylai athrawon wneud dysgwyr yn ymwybodol o’r amrywiaeth eang o yrfaoedd sydd ar gael trwy ymwneud â chyflogwyr megis sgyrsiau â chyflogwyr, ymweliadau â safleoedd gwaith, digwyddiadau neu weithgareddau ymarferol i ddangos sut mae mathemateg a rhifedd yn angenrheidiol i’r byd gwaith, wrth fod yn weithiwr neu’n entrepreneur.
translation.en: Teachers should make learners aware of the wide range of careers available through employer engagement such as employer talks, visits to workplaces, events or practical activities to show how mathematics and numeracy is essential in the world of work, whether in employment or as an entrepreneur.

translation.cy: Mae’n galluogi dysgwyr i ddeall a gwerthuso byd gwaith.
translation.en: It allows learners to understand and evaluate the world of work.

translation.cy: Mae’r Maes hwn yn tynnu ar ddisgyblaethau bioleg, cemeg, gwyddoniaeth gyfrifiadurol, dylunio a thechnoleg, a ffiseg er mwyn dyfnhau gwybodaeth a dealltwriaeth dysgwyr o’r byd.
translation.en: This Area draws on the disciplines of biology, chemistry, computer science, design and technology, and physics to enhance learners’ knowledge and understanding of the world.

translation.cy: Mae chwilfrydedd am wyddoniaeth a thechnoleg yn ein hannog i ofyn cwestiynau am y byd o’n cwmpas.
translation.en: Curiosity about science and technology leads us to ask questions about the world around us.

translation.cy: Bydd angen iddyn nhw hefyd ddeall fod yna ganlyniadau eang, yn gyfreithiol, cymdeithasol a moesol, i’r defnydd o dechnoleg.
translation.en: They also need to understand that there are broad legal, social and ethical consequences to the use of technology.

translation.cy: Dyfnhau'r ddealltwriaeth o'r syniadau a'r disgyblaethau yn y Meysydd
translation.en: Deepening understanding of the ideas and disciplines within areas of learning and experience

translation.cy: Mae coethder a chywirdeb cynyddol yn yr hyn y mae dysgwyr yn gallu ei wneud a'i gynhyrchu yn yr amgylcheddau ffisegol a digidol.
translation.en: There is a refinement and increasing accuracy in what learners are able to do and produce both in the physical and digital environments.

translation.cy: Wrth i ddysgwyr wneud cynnydd ar hyd y continwwm, byddan nhw’n gallu nodi cysylltiadau cynyddol rhwng dysgu presennol a phrofiadaueraill a gwybodaeth arall a gafwyd yn y Maes hwn a'r tu hwnt.
translation.en: As learners progress across the continuum they will increasingly be able to make links between current learning and other experiencesand knowledge developed within and beyond this Area.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 3
translation.en: Progression step 3

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu adnabod patrymau ar sail fy arsylwadau a’m hymchwiliadau, ac rwy’n gallu mynegi fy nghanfyddiadau.
translation.en: I can recognise patterns from my observations and investigations and can communicate my findings.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu archwilio’r berthynas rhwng pethau byw, eu cynefinoedd a’u cylchoedd bywyd.
translation.en: I can explore relationships between living things, their habitatsand their life cycles.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu gwerthuso ansawdd data yn feirniadol, a chyfiawnhau gwelliannau.
translation.en: I can critically evaluate the quality of data and justify improvements.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cymhwyso a gwneud cysylltiadau rhwng amrywiaeth o fodelaua’u defnyddio i gefnogi neu wrthbroﬁ damcaniaethau.
translation.en: I can apply and make links between a range of modelsand use them to support or challenge theories.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dwyn ysbrydoliaeth o ffynnonellau hanesyddol a diwylliannol ymhlith eraill er mwyn dylunio.
translation.en: I can draw inspiration to design from historical, cultural and other sources.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ymchwilio, dadansoddi a dwyn ysbrydoliaeth o ffynonellau hanesyddol a diwylliannol ymhlith eraill er mwyn dylunio cynigion newydd sy’n ychwanegu gwerth.
translation.en: I can investigate, analyse and draw inspiration from historical, cultural and other sources to design new proposals that add value.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cymhwyso fy ngwybodaetha’m sgiliau wrth wneud fy mhenderfyniadau dylunio er mwyn cynhyrchu canlyniadau penodol.
translation.en: I can apply my knowledgeand skills when making design decisions in order to produce specific outcomes.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu ystyried sut y bydd fy nghynigion dylunio yn datrys problemau a sut y gall hyn effeithio ar yr amgylchedd.
translation.en: I can consider how my design proposals will solve problems and how this may affect the environment.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu dewis a defnyddio offer, defnyddiau a chyfarpar addas yn ddiogel i sicrhau cynnyrch terfynol pwrpasol.
translation.en: I can use prototyping as a link between my designing and making.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu cymhwyso a chyﬁawnhau arferion gweithio cyfrifol sy’n ystyried effeithiau ar yr amgylchedd a chymdeithas.
translation.en: I can apply and justify responsible habits of working which take into account impacts on the environment and society.

translation.cy: Rwy’n gallu esbonio sut y gall ataliad haint a thriniaeth gefnogi systemau amddiffyn naturiol, a gwella iechyd organebau.
translation.en: I can explain how prevention and treatment can support natural defence systems and enhance the health of organisms.

translation.cy: Cam cynnydd 1
translation.en: Progression step 1

translation.cy: Mae grymoedd ac egni yn gosod sail i ddeall ein bydysawd.
translation.en: Forces and energy provide a foundation for understanding our universe.

translation.cy: Mae rhoi Fframwaith Anhwylderau Bwyta Cymru (2009) ar waith yn golygu buddsoddiad sylweddol lle caiff gwasanaethau eu had-drefnu’n helaeth er mwyn datblygu timau anhwylderau bwyta arbenigol ar draws Cymru ar gyfer oedolion ag anhwylderau bwyta.
translation.en: The implementation of the 2009 Welsh Framework for Eating Disorders represented a significant investment with major reconfiguration of services to develop specialist eating disorder teams across Wales for adults with eating disorders.

translation.cy: Ceir achos anorfod dros gyflwyno newid yng ngwasanaeth anhwylderau bwyta GIG Cymru.
translation.en: There is a compelling case for change in the Welsh NHS eating disorder service.

translation.cy: Egwyddorion Sylfaenol
translation.en: Underlying Principles

translation.cy: Canolbwyntio ar yr unigolyn:
translation.en: Person-Centred:

translation.cy: Bydd y meddygon teulu hyn yn cyfrannu at asesiadau meddygol ac yn monitro ac yn trin pobl ag anhwylderau bwyta, yn ogystal â chyfrannu at bolisi anhwylderau bwyta a gwella hyfforddiant, cymorth a mynediad ar gyfer meddygon teulu ac ymarferwyr gofal sylfaenol eraill a chanddyn nhw bryderon ynglŷn â’u cleifion.
translation.en: These general practitioners will contribute to the medical assessment, monitoring and treatment of people with eating disorders, as well as contributing to eating disorder policy and improve training, support and access for general practitioners and other primary care practitioners who have concerns about their patients.

translation.cy: Dylai’r gwasanaeth anhwylderau bwyta dderbyn atgyfeiriadau o bob ffynhonnell, yn cynnwys hunanatgyfeiriadau, heb gael gwared â’r cysylltiad gyda meddygon teulu.
translation.en: The eating disorder service should accept referrals from all sources, including selfreferral, without removing the involvement of general practitioners.

translation.cy: Ceir casgliad mawr o lenyddiaeth sy’n ategu’r manteision lu o ymyrryd yn gynnar mewn anhwylderau bwyta (gweler adran 7).
translation.en: There is a large amount of literature supporting the many benefits of early intervention for eating disorders (see section 7).

translation.cy: Dylid unioni’r anghydraddoldebau hyn, yn enwedig gan fod brys mawr i asesu a thrin pobl ag anhwylderau bwyta, yn y cyfnod byr cyn iddyn nhw fynd yn ddifrifol wael neu cyn i’r gafael sydd gan yr anhwylder ynddyn nhw gryfhau nes gwneud iddyn nhw golli eu cymhelliant i chwilio am help.
translation.en: These inequalities should be rectified, particularly because there is great urgency in assessing and treating people with eating disorders, in the small window of opportunity before they become severely ill or the grip of the disorders strengthens and they lose motivation to seek help.

translation.cy: Mae canllawiau newydd NICE yn mynnu y dylai staff y gwasanaeth anhwylderau bwyta gael hyfforddiant llawn, ac y dylen nhw allu canfod ac asesu anhwylderau bwyta yn ogystal â chyflwyno amrywiaeth o therapïau sy’n gyson â chanllawiau NICE i blant, pobl ifanc ac oedolion.
translation.en: The new NICE guidelines require that the eating disorder service staff are fully trained and able to identify and assess eating disorders as well as to deliver a range of NICE-concordant therapies to children, young people and adults.

translation.cy: Dylai sicrhau bod staff clinigol wedi’u hyfforddi’n llwyr yn y therapïau hyn, ac mewn therapïau eraill, fod yn flaenoriaeth i’r gwasanaeth anhwylderau bwyta, ac mae angen cael cyllideb hyfforddi gylchol er mwyn sicrhau bod modd cynnal rhaglen hyfforddi barhaus i ddatblygu a chynnal sgiliau’r holl staff sy’n gweithio yn y gwasanaeth anhwylderau bwyta.
translation.en: Ensuring clinical staff are fully trained in these and other therapies should be a priority for the eating disorder service, and a recurring training budget is required to ensure that ongoing training programme is supported to develop and maintain the skills of all staff working in the eating disorder service.

translation.cy: Dylid cael cyllid ar gyfer ‘ymgynghorydd gofalwyr’ hyfforddedig ar gyfer pob canolfan ranbarthol i weithio ochr yn ochr â’r teuluoedd, i’w hyfforddi.
translation.en: There should be funding for a trained 'carer consultant' for each regional centre to work alongside families to coach them.

translation.cy: Mae ymdrin â chydraddoldeb ac amrywiaeth a sicrhau parch cydradd yn hollbwysig.
translation.en: Addressing equality and diversity issues and ensuring parity of esteem is crucial.

translation.cy: Un o bryderon y cyhoedd yw hyn: ni waeth pa mor dda yw cynllun unrhyw wasanaeth anhwylderau bwyta, os caiff ei wanhau, ni fydd yn gweithio.
translation.en: The public fear that 'no matter how slick the design of an eating disorder service is', if it is watered down, it just won't work.

translation.cy: Os nad ydych yn dymuno i'ch enw a'ch cyfeiriad gael eu cyhoeddi, rhowch wybod inni yn ysgrifenedig wrth anfon eich ymateb.
translation.en: If you do not want your name or address published, please tell us this in writing when you send your response.

translation.cy: Os bydd rhywun wedi gofyn inni beidio â chyhoeddi ei enw a’i gyfeiriad, bydd hynny’n ffaith bwysig inni ei chadw mewn cof.
translation.en: If someone has asked for their name and address not to be published, that is an important fact we would take into account.

translation.cy: Llywodraeth y DU sy’n gyfrifol am bolisi lloches, sy’n cynnwys gwneud penderfyniadau ar geisiadau am loches, darparu cymorth a llety i geiswyr lloches, a gweithredu cynlluniau adsefydlu ffoaduriaid.
translation.en: The UK Government is responsible for asylum policy, which includes asylum application decision making, the provision of support and accommodation for asylum seekers, and the operation of refugee resettlement schemes.

translation.cy: Mae Cydraddoldeb a Hawliau Dynol yn ganolog i waith Llywodraeth Cymru a’n gweledigaeth i Gymru.
translation.en: Equality and Human Rights are central to the work of the Welsh Government and our vision for Wales.

translation.cy: Credwn y dylai pob person gael ei drin yn deg, yn enwedig y rhai sy’n cael eu gwthio i’r cyrion fwyaf gan systemau cymdeithasol sy’n atal pobl rhag diwallu eu hanghenion sylfaenol.
translation.en: We believe in fair treatment of every person, especially those who are most marginalised by social systems that prevent people from meeting their basic needs.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn golygu bod rhai o’r ysgogwyr allweddol i atal canlyniadau niweidiol, megis gwneud penderfyniadau amserol a da am achosion lloches, ansawdd llety lloches a darpariaeth cymorth cyfreithiol, y tu hwnt i’n rheolaeth ni.
translation.en: This means that some of the key levers to prevent harmful outcomes, such as timely and good asylum case decision-making, the quality of asylum accommodation and provision of legal aid, are out of our control.

translation.cy: Yn y cynllun hwn, mae’r term ‘ffoadur’ yn cyfeirio hefyd at y rhai nad ydynt wedi cael eu cydnabod fel ffoaduriaid, ond sydd wedi cael caniatâd amhenodol i aros, amddiffyniad dyngarol neu ganiatâd yn ôl disgresiwn yn dilyn eu cais am loches.
translation.en: Within this plan, the term ‘refugee’ also refers to those who have not been recognised as refugees, but have been granted indefinite leave to remain, humanitarian protection or discretionary leave following their asylum claim.

translation.cy: Rydym hefyd yn annog cymunedau a sefydliadau Cymru i gydnabod yr asedau sydd gan ffoaduriaid a cheiswyr lloches yn barod, gan mai nhw fydd yr arbenigwyr yn aml yn sgil profiad neu byddant yn cynnig sgiliau sydd eu hangen ar ein cymdeithas.
translation.en: We also encourage Welsh communities and organisations to recognise the assets which refugees and asylum seekers already possess, as they will often be the experts by experience or offer skills which our society needs.

translation.cy: Ceisio dylanwadu ar brosesau Contract Llety a Chymorth i Geiswyr Lloches (AASC) a phrosesau Cyngor, Hysbysu am Broblemau a Chymhwysedd (AIRE) Llywodraeth y DU i sicrhau bod y contractau newydd ar gyfer llety lloches (tu hwnt i 2019) yn cefnogi ffoaduriaid newydd yn y cyfnod ‘Symud Ymlaen’;
translation.en: Seek to influence the UK Government’s Asylum Accommodation and Support Services Contract (AASC) and Advice, Issue Reporting and Eligibility (AIRE) processes to ensure the new contracts for asylum accommodation (beyond 2019) support new refugees in the ‘Move On’ period;

translation.cy: Sicrhau bod hyfforddiant landlordiaid Rhentu Doeth Cymru yn cynnwys esboniad o’r gwiriadau Hawl i Rentu a sut i wirio statws ffoaduriaid yn hawdd er mwyn atal gwahaniaethu (unwaith y bydd y dyddiad cyflwyno’n hysbys);
translation.en: Ensure Rent Smart Wales landlords’ training includes an explanation of the Right to Rent checks and how to easily check the status of refugees to prevent discrimination (once the rollout date is known);

translation.cy: Mae’r hyfforddiant hwn yn cynnwys gwybodaeth am anawsterau a wynebir gan gymunedau phobl dduon a lleiafrifoedd ethnig, gan gynnwys ffoaduriaid a cheiswyr lloches;
translation.en: This training includes information on difficulties faced by BME communities, including refugees and asylum seekers;

translation.cy: Parhau i ddarparu hyfforddiant ledled Cymru gyda’r nod o wella ymwybyddiaeth o gaethwasiaeth fodern, gan gynnwys y rhai sy’n gweithio gyda cheiswyr lloches a ffoaduriaid.
translation.en: - 	Continue to deliver training across Wales with the aim of improving awareness of modern slavery, including those working with asylum seekers and refugees.

translation.cy: Ystyried amgylchiadau plant ffoaduriaid a cheiswyr lloches mewn perthynas â gwaith sy’n edrych ar brofiadau niweidiol yn ystod plentyndod;
translation.en: Consider the circumstances of refugee and asylum seeker children in relation to work looking at Adverse Childhood Experiences;

translation.cy: Adnabyddir y pecyn cymorth ychwanegol hwn bellach fel gofal parhaus.
translation.en: This package of additional support has come to be known as continuing care.

translation.cy: Mae’n bosibl y bydd angen pecyn gofal parhaus pan fydd gan blentyn neu berson ifanc anghenion iechyd hirdymor oherwydd, er enghraifft, anableddau corfforol ac anableddau dysgu, anhwylder ac ymddygiadau niwroddatblygiadol y gellir ystyried eu bod yn heriol ac nad oes modd eu diwallu ddim ond drwy wasanaethau  cyffredinol neu arbenigol sy’n bodoli’n barod.
translation.en: A continuing care package may be required when a child or a young person has long-term health needs arising from e.g. physical and learning disabilities, mental health needs, neurodevelopmental disorder and behaviours which may be considered challenging and cannot be met by existing universal or specialist services alone.

translation.cy: Ni ddylid ymgymryd ag asesiad o ofal parhaus a chytundeb cymhwysedd er mwyn cael gwared â phecyn cymorth presennol effeithiol neu i symud cyfrifoldeb dros gomisiynu rhwng gofal iechyd a gofal cymdeithasol.

translation.en: Where there are consistent or recurring identified gaps in universal and specialist services, LHBs may consider commissioning services to meet an identified population need rather than using an individual approach through continuing care.

translation.en: The Coughlan judgement also confirmed that a LA can commission nursing services, provided they are properly classified as part of social care and provided the NHS has not agreed to provide them (for example, if the care is very much incidental or ancillary to the provision of accommodation).

translation.en: It should be made clear to the child or young person and their parents that reviews are designed to ensure the child or young person’s continuing care needs are being met and are not financially motivated.

translation.cy: Mewn achosion lle mae rheoli angen gofal parhaus yn llwyddiannus wedi lleihau yn barhaol neu wedi cael gwared ag angen parhaus, bydd hyn yn cael effaith ar angen y plentyn neu’r person ifanc am ofal parhaus.
translation.en: In instances where the successful management of a continuing care need has permanently reduced or removed an ongoing need, this will have a bearing on the child or young person’s need for continuing care.

translation.en: When some children move from children services to adult services they experience an uncertainty about future care provision and support and also the loss of income due to changes in benefits.

translation.en: However, it should not change simply because of the move from children’s to adult services or because of a switch in the organisation with planning or funding responsibilities.

translation.cy: Lle mae newid yn angenrheidiol, dylid ei wneud fesul cam, mewn ymgynghoriad llawn â'r person ifanc.

translation.en: The Social Services and Well-being (Wales) Act (“SSWBA”) came into force on 6 April 2016.

translation.en: A director, administrator or liquidator of the company can also make a voluntary arrangement with the company's creditors under Part 1 of the Insolvency Act 1986.

translation.cy: • Nid oes angen i gwmni gael cydsyniad Gweinidogion Cymru i wneud cais am orchymyn llys o dan adran 899 o Ddeddf Cwmnïau 2006, ond rhaid iddo hysbysu Gweinidogion Cymru a chydymffurfio ag unrhyw gyfarwyddydau hysbysu a roddir ganddynt.
translation.en: • A company does not need to obtain the consent of the Welsh Ministers to apply for a court order under section 899 of the Companies Act 2006, but must notify the Welsh Ministers and comply with any notification directions given by them.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn cynnwys torri Deddfau’r DU, Deddfau neu Fesurau Cynulliad Cenedlaethol Cymru, rheoliadau ac is-ddeddfwriaeth arall, yn ogystal ag unrhyw gyfarwyddydau neu safonau a wneir o dan ddeddfiad, y mae’n ofynnol i landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig gydymffurfio â hwy.
translation.en: This will include breaches of UK Acts, Acts or Measures of the National Assembly for Wales, regulations and other secondary legislation, as well as any directions or standards made under an enactment with which an RSL is required to comply.

translation.cy: Mae paragraffau 6, 7 ac 8 o Atodlen 1 yn rhoi pwerau i Weinidogion Cymru benodi personau i fod yn swyddog landlordiaid cymdeithasol cofrestredig sy’n elusennau cofrestredig, yn gwmnïau, neu’n gymdeithasau cofrestredig, yn y drefn honno.
translation.en: Paragraphs 6, 7 and 8 of Schedule 1 give the Welsh Ministers powers to appoint persons to be an officer of RSLs which are registered charities, companies, or registered societies respectively.

translation.cy: O ganlyniad, y sefyllfa yw y gall Gweinidogion Cymru benodi person i fod yn swyddog landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig sy’n elusen gofrestredig, yn gwmni neu’n gymdeithas gofrestredig yn lle person y maent wedi ei ddiswyddo, neu pan na fo unrhyw swyddogion, neu pan fo Gweinidogion Cymru o’r farn bod y penodiad yn angenrheidiol er mwyn sicrhau bod y landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig yn cydymffurfio â gofyniad a osodir gan ddeddfiad, neu oddi tano.
translation.en: As a result, the position is that the Welsh Ministers can appoint a person to be an officer of an RSL which is a registered charity, a company or a registered society in place of a person whom they have removed or, where there are no officers, or where the Welsh Ministers are of the opinion that the appointment is necessary in order to ensure that the RSL complies with a requirement imposed by or under an enactment.

translation.cy: • Os yw Gweinidogion Cymru wedi eu bodloni, o ganlyniad i ymchwiliad neu archwiliad (o dan baragraff 20 neu 22 o Atodlen 1), bod landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig wedi methu â chydymffurfio â gofyniad a osodir gan ddeddfiad, neu oddi tano, gall Gweinidogion Cymru ei gwneud yn ofynnol i’r landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig drosglwyddo swyddogaethau rheoli i berson a bennir ganddynt.
translation.en: • If, as a result of an inquiry or an audit (under paragraph 20 or 22 of Schedule 1), the Welsh Ministers are satisfied that an RSL has failed to comply with a requirement imposed by or under an enactment, the Welsh Ministers can require the RSL to transfer management functions to a person specified by them.

translation.en: Amendments are made to the threshold at which the Welsh Ministers can direct an inquiry into the affairs of an RSL under paragraph 15H of Schedule 1.

translation.cy: Mae adran 7A yn diffinio’r termau allweddol at ddibenion Pennod 1A.
translation.en: Section 7A defines the key terms for the purposes of Chapter 1A.

translation.cy: O dan adran 7B, ni chaniateir gwneud unrhyw benodiad i fwrdd landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig a fyddai’n golygu bod dros 24% o aelodau bwrdd y landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig yn benodeion llywodraeth leol.
translation.en: Under section 7B, no appointment may be made to a board of an RSL which would result in local authority appointees amounting to more than 24% of the board members of the RSL.

translation.cy: Os nad yw awdurdod lleol yn enwebu unrhyw un i’w ddiswyddo cyn diwedd y cyfnod o ddau fis, bydd gan landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig ddau fis pellach i ddiswyddo penodeion o’r fath er mwyn cydymffurfio â’r terfyn o 24%.
translation.en: If a local authority does not nominate anyone for removal before the end of the two months, an RSL will have a further two months to remove such appointees to comply with the 24% limit.

translation.cy: O dan adran 7E, os yw cyfansoddiad neu reolau landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig yn datgan bod rhaid i o leiaf un penodai llywodraeth leol neu ragor fod yn bresennol er mwyn cael cworwm mewn cyfarfod, nid yw’r ddarpariaeth honno yn cael unrhyw effaith.
translation.en: Under section 7E, if an RSL’s constitution or rules state that there must be at least one or more local authority appointees present in order for a meeting to be quorate, that provision is of no effect.

translation.cy: Gweler hefyd adran 7I mewn cysylltiad â darpariaethau mewn cytundebau nad ydynt i gael unrhyw effaith.
translation.en: See also section 7I in respect of provisions in agreements which are to have no effect.

translation.cy: O dan adran 7H, os ceir darpariaeth yn rheolau neu gyfansoddiad landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig sy’n rhoi’r hawl i awdurdod lleol bleidleisio ar benderfyniadau’r landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig yn rhinwedd aelodaeth yr awdurdod lleol o’r landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig, nid yw’r ddarpariaeth honno yn cael unrhyw effaith.
translation.en: Under section 7H, if there is a provision in the rules or constitution of an RSL which gives a local authority the right to vote on resolutions of the RSL in the local authority’s capacity as member of the RSL, that provision is of no effect.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn cwmpasu, er enghraifft, unrhyw gytundebau contractiol yr ymrwymwyd iddynt rhwng awdurdod lleol a landlord cymdeithasol cofrestredig o ganlyniad i drosglwyddo stoc.
translation.en: This will capture, for example, any contractual agreements entered into between a local authority and an RSL as a result of stock transfer.

translation.en: The following table sets out the dates for each stage of the Act’s passage through the National Assembly for Wales.

translation.cy: RHAGARWEINIAD
translation.en: INTRODUCTION

translation.cy: Y bwriad yw diogelu’r model partneriaethau cymdeithasol o ddarparu gwasanaethau cyhoeddus rhag arferion a allai danseilio perthnasau diwydiannol.
translation.en: The intention is to protect the social partnership model of providing public services from practices that could undermine industrial relations.

translation.cy: CEFNDIR DEDDFWRIAETHOL
translation.en: LEGAL BACKGROUND

translation.cy: Mae’r brif ddeddfwriaeth ar undebau llafur a chymdeithasau cyflogwyr wedi ei chynnwys yn Neddf yr Undebau Llafur a Chysylltiadau Llafur (Cydgrynhoi) 1992 (Trade Union and Labour Relations (Consolidation) Act 1992 (c. 52)).
translation.en: The chief legislation on trade unions and employers’ association is in the Trade Union and Labour Relations (Consolidation) Act 1992 (c.52).

translation.cy: Mae adran 116B yn gosod cyfyngiadau fel na chaniateir didyniadau o’r fath oni bai bod gan weithwyr yr opsiwn i dalu eu taliadau tanysgrifio i undeb drwy gyfrwng arall, a bod trefniadau wedi eu gwneud i’r undeb wneud taliadau rhesymol i’r cyflogwr o ran gwneud y didyniadau.
translation.en: Section 116B imposes restrictions so that such deductions may not be made unless workers have the option to pay their union subscriptions by other means, and arrangements have been made for the union to make reasonable payments to the employer in respect of the making of the deductions.

translation.cy: Mae hynny’n cynnwys gofyniad bod yn rhaid cynnal pleidlais o aelodau’r undeb.
translation.en: This includes a requirement that there must be a ballot of the union’s members.

translation.cy: O ran yr enghraifft uchod, byddai angen i o leiaf 400 o aelodau bleidleisio o blaid gweithredu i’r imiwnedd statudol yn adran 219 fod yn gymwys.
translation.en: In the above example, at least 400 members would need to vote in support for the statutory immunity in section 219 to apply.

translation.cy: Mae’r tabl a ganlyn yn nodi’r dyddiadau ar gyfer pob cyfnod o hynt y Ddeddf drwy Gynulliad Cenedlaethol Cymru.
