translation.en: 1.17 The results of centuries of farming and woodland management in Wales are clearly visible.

translation.cy: Mewn llawer rhan o Gymru, mae’r defnydd di-dor o’r Gymraeg gan gymunedau ffermio wedi tynhau’r cwlwm hwnnw.
translation.en: In many parts of Wales, the continued use of the Welsh language by farming communities also adds to such cohesion.

translation.cy: Argyfwng yr Hinsawdd
translation.en: Climate Emergency

translation.cy: Rhaid wrth weithredu gan bawb ac mae gan y Llywodraeth ran ganolog i wneud hynny’n bosibl.
translation.en: It requires collective action and the Government has a central role in making collective action possible.

translation.cy: Dylai anifeiliaid cynhyrchu bwyd fyw mewn systemau cynhyrchu iach iawn sy’n bodloni’u gofynion lles fel bodau ymdeimladol ac sy’n cynhyrchu cynnyrch diogel ar gyfer eu bwyta gan bobl sy’n ennyn hyder y cyhoedd.
translation.en: 1.25 Food producing animals should live in high health production systems, which satisfy their welfare requirements as sentient beings and deliver safe products for human consumption that promote consumer confidence.

translation.cy: Yn nes at adref, mae fersiwn diweddaraf yr Adroddiad ar Sefyllfa Adnoddau Naturiol7 a gynhyrchwyd gan Cyfoeth Naturiol Cymru yn tynnu sylw at y parhad yn y dirywiad ym mioamrywiaeth Cymru, gan gynnwys rhywogaethau a chynefinoedd sy’n gysylltiedig â ffermdir wedi’i amgáu.
translation.en: Closer to home, the most recent State of Natural Resources Report produced by Natural Resources Wales has highlighted continued decline in biodiversity in Wales, including species and habitats associated with enclosed farmland.

translation.cy: Mae Fframwaith Iechyd a Lles Anifeiliaid Cymru8 yn disgrifio’n hymrwymiad i wella iechyd a lles anifeiliaid.
translation.en: 1.29 The Wales Animal Health and Welfare Framework sets out our commitment to improving animal health and welfare.

translation.cy: Byw bywyd o ansawdd da, gan fodloni disgwyliadau cymdeithas a’r farchnad o ran lles anifeiliaid;
translation.en: Having a good quality of life, to meet societal and market expectations for animal welfare;

translation.cy: Byddai hynny o fudd i’r cwsmer ac i’r ffermwr.
translation.en: This would benefit the consumer and farmer alike.

The Public Health Wales Supporting Farming Communities at Times of Uncertainty Report cites understanding and complying with regulation as a key challenge to maintaining good mental health and well-being of farmers and https://phw.nhs.wales/news/farmers-health-and-wellbeing-needs-to-be-at-the-centre-of-brexit-response-newreport/ recommends we revisit the progress made following the Working Smarter 2011Report;  https://gov.wales/written-statement-welsh-government-response-working-smarter-report-recommendationswelsh-government

translation.cy: Rhestrir y gofynion Trawsgydymffurfio yn Atodiad II Rheoliad 1306/2013 ac maen nhw’n cynnwys Gofynion Rheoli Statudol (SMR) a gofynion o ran cadwtir mewn Cyflwr Amgylcheddol ac Amaethyddol Da (GAEC).
translation.en: Cross Compliance requirements are listed at Annex II to Regulation 1306/2013 and consist of Statutory Management Requirements (SMRs) and Good Agricultural and Environmental Condition (GAECs).

translation.cy: Mae SMRs yn safonau deddfwriaethol yr UE o ran yr amgylchedd, diogelwch bwyd, iechyd anifeiliaid a phlanhigion a lles anifeiliaid.
translation.en: SMRs are EU legislative standards relating to the environment, food safety, animal and plant health, and animal welfare.

translation.cy:
Mae GAECS yn Safonau ar
gyfercadwtirmewncyflwramaethyddolacamgylcheddolda.https://llyw.cymru/sites/default/files/publications/2020-09/glastir-uwch-safonau-dilysadwy.pdf
translation.en: GAECs are standards consistent with keeping land in Good Agricultural and Environmental Condition.

translation.cy: Bydd angen i ni hefyd ystyried sut y bydd yr amserlen ar gyfer cyflwyno’r Safonau Gofynnol Cenedlaethol yn cyd-fynd â’r cofnod pontio i’r Cynllun newydd.
translation.en: We will also need to consider how the timescales https://gov.wales/sites/default/files/publications/2019-02/cross-compliance-verifiable-standards-2019.pdf listed in Annex II to Regulation 1306/2013  for the introduction of the National Minimum Standards fit alongside the transition period to the new Scheme.

translation.cy: Byddwn am i’r pwerau fod yn ddigon eang i sicrhau bod y Safonau Gofynnol Cenedlaethol yn addas at y dyfodol a bod digon o bwerau archwilio i reoleiddwyr allu monitro bod pawb yn cydymffurfio.
translation.en: We will ensure powers are broad enough to future-proof the National Minimum Standards and to ensure there are adequate powers of inspection for regulators to monitor compliance.

translation.cy: Yr Achos dros Newid
translation.en: Case for Change

translation.cy: Mae pob ffermwr felly yn gorfod cydymffurfio â nhw, p’un a ydynt yn hawlio taliadau’r PAC neu beidio.
translation.en: This means all farmers must comply with these standards, regardless of whether they are CAP claimants.

translation.cy: Ein Cynigion
translation.en: Our Proposals

translation.cy: Fel y dywedir uchod, mae’r SMR i gyd a’r rhan fwyaf o’r GAEC eisoes wedi’u hymgorffori mewn deddfwriaeth ddomestig.
translation.en: As mentioned above, all SMRs and most GAECs are already reflected in domestic legislation.

translation.cy: Felly, yn ein barn ni, y ffordd fwyaf priodol o sicrhau bod gennym yr 16 hyblygrwydd i wneud y newidiadau hyn yw trwy roi pwerau i Weinidogion Cymru greu’r safonau hyn trwy is-ddeddfwriaeth.
translation.en: Therefore, we believe the most appropriate way to ensure we have the flexibility to make these amendments is to give the Welsh Ministers powers to create these standards in secondary legislation.

translation.cy: Byddem yn cynnig crynhoi’r rheoliadau hyn yn y Safonau Gofynnol Cenedlaethol gan iddynt gael eu creu i daclo llygredd amaethyddol mewn ffordd a fyddai’n cyflawni hefyd ein hymrwymiadau o dan y Gyfarwyddeb Nitradau ac a fydd yn rhan o’r safonau Trawsgydymffurfio.
translation.en: We would propose that these regulations would be consolidated into the National Minimum Standards as these are designed to tackle agricultural pollution in a way which also fulfils our obligations under the Nitrates Directive, and will form part of the standards for Cross Compliance.

translation.cy: Ond bydd angen ystyried hyn yn fanwl ac ymgynghori arno, gan gynnwys ystyried faint o adnoddau fydd ei angen.
translation.en: However, further detailed consideration and consultation around this would be needed, including reviewing regulatory resource requirements.

translation.cy: Cyngor a Chanllawiau
translation.en: Advice and Guidance

translation.cy: Gall gwella’r ffordd y mae ffermwyr yn cael eu monitro newid y ffordd y byddant yn cyfathrebu ac yn ymwneud â rheoleiddwyr.
translation.en: Making improvements to the way farmers are monitored could change the way they communicate and engage with regulators.

translation.cy: Mae’n bwysig nodi’r gwelliannau hyn yn y canllaw er mwyn i ffermwyr wybod pa gwestiynau i’w disgwyl gan reoleiddwyr yn ystod y broses fonitro;
translation.en: It is important these are included in guidance to ensure farmers have a realistic expectation of what will be asked of them by regulators for monitoring purposes;

translation.cy: A oes angen ystyried unrhyw beth arall?
translation.en: Are there any further considerations which are needed?

translation.cy: 2 Beth yw’ch barn chi ynghylch:
translation.en: What are your views on:

translation.cy: Fel y disgrifir uchod, rydym yn cynnig bod pwerau sylfaenol i roi sancsiynau sifil ar gael yn y meysydd rheoleiddio amaethyddol canlynol a ddisgrifir yn y Papur Gwyn:
translation.en: 2.20 As described earlier, we propose primary powers for civil sanctions should be available to enforce the following areas of agricultural regulation described in this White Paper:

translation.cy: Rheoliadau iechyd a lles anifeiliaid;
translation.en: Animal health and welfare regulation;

translation.cy: Gwelwyd bod y cosbau ariannol hyn yn ffordd gymharol effeithiol o’u cael i gadw at y rheolau.
translation.en: These financial penalties have shown to be an effective way of deterring non-compliance.

translation.cy: Rydym yn cydnabod fodd bynnag nad yw cosbau BPS wastad yn cael eu hystyried yn gymesur â’r tramgwydd.
translation.en: We however recognise that BPS penalties are not always viewed as proportionate to the non-compliance.

translation.cy: Hefyd, ar gyfer ffermwyr nad ydynt yn derbyn taliadau PAC yr UE, er bod rheoleiddwyr yn cael rhoi rhybudd mewn rhai achosion, dibynnir yn llwyr ar sancsiynau troseddol i orfodi’r rhan fwyaf o reoliadau.
translation.en: Additionally, for farmers who are not EU CAP beneficiaries, regulators can issue cautions/warnings in some cases, but then rely solely on criminal sanctions to enforce most regulations.

translation.cy: Mae gwersi felly i’w dysgu o’r ffordd y mae cosbau a sancsiynau troseddol BPS yn cael eu rhoi i sicrhau bod y drefn orfodi newydd yn deg a chymesur.
translation.en: There are lessons that can be learnt therefore from the way BPS penalties and criminal sanctions are currently issued to ensure a new enforcement regime is fair and proportionate.

translation.cy: Ein Cynigion
translation.en: Our Proposals

translation.cy: Yn ein barn ni, mae sancsiynau sifil yn drefn orfodi effeithiol a chymesur ar gyfer tramgwyddau llai difrifol.
translation.en: 2.27 We believe civil sanctions offer effective and proportionate enforcement for less serious offences.

translation.cy: Yn y Bil, rydym yn cynnig cynnwys cyfres o sancsiynau sifil, yn amrywio o rybuddion i gosbau ariannol, y gellir eu defnyddio ar gyfer y Safonau Gofynnol Cenedlaethol ac mewn meysydd eraill fel lles anifeiliaid a thrwyddedau cwympo coed.
translation.en: 2.29 Within the Bill, we propose to include a suite of civil sanctions, ranging from notices to monetary penalties, which can be applied across the National Minimum Standards and in other areas such as animal welfare and the licensing of tree felling.

translation.cy: Bydd gwerth Cosb Newidiol yn cael ei bennu yn benodol i’r tramgwydd unigol, gyda’r nod o ddiddymu unrhyw fudd ariannol y gellid bod wedi’i gael trwy’r tramgwydd a digolledu difrifoldeb y niwed a achosir i’r amgylchedd/lles anifeiliaid/cymdeithas.
translation.en: The value of a VMP would be calculated specifically for an individual offence, with the aim of reversing any financial benefit gained through the offence and compensate for the severity of environmental/animal welfare/societal harm caused.

translation.cy: Bydd yn caniatáu i rheoleiddwyr osod cosbau ariannol gwahanol i dramgwyddau gwahanol, yn seiliedig ar ffactorau fel maint yr anghydymffurfio;
translation.en: This would allow regulators to attribute penalties of different monetary values for different offences, based on factors such the magnitude of the noncompliance;

translation.cy: Lle bo’n addas, caiff rheoleiddwyr roi rhybudd, hysbysiad neu gosb ariannol ar gyfer mân dramgwyddau, gyda’r nod o sicrhau bod ffermwr neu reolwr tir naill ai’n rhoi’r gorau i’r gweithgaredd gwaharddedig, a/neu’n adfer y niwed a achoswyd trwy anghydymffurfio.
translation.en: 2.32 Where appropriate, regulators could issue warnings, notices or monetary penalties for lower level offences, with the main aim of ensuring a farmer or land manager either stops undertaking a prohibited activity, and/or restores the damage caused through non-compliance.

translation.cy: Ambell waith fodd bynnag, gallai rhybudd cydymffurfio neu adfer fod yn fwy o gosb na chosb ariannol sefydlog, gan y gallai’r gost o gymryd camau i unioni’r difrod neu i sicrhau cydymffurfiaeth fod yn uwch na chost cosb ariannol, a gallai fod yn fwy o anogaeth felly i beidio â thorri rheol.
translation.en: In some cases, however, issuing a compliance or restoration notice could be seen as more severe than a fixed monetary penalty, as the cost of taking action to restore damage caused or to return to compliance could be higher than the cost of a monetary penalty, and could therefore act as a greater deterrent.

translation.cy: Opsiwn gwahanol i gosb ariannol neu erlyniad troseddol fyddai galluogi’r rheoleiddiwr i dderbyn EUT gan y ffermwr neu’r rheolwr tir.
translation.en: 2.34 An alternative approach to issuing a monetary penalty or criminal prosecution, would be for a regulator to be able to accept an EUT from a farmer or land manager.

translation.cy: Barn rheoleiddwyr a thramgwyddwyr yw bod EUT yn un o’r dulliau gorfodi mwyaf effeithiol.
translation.en: EUTs are widely regarded by regulators and offenders as one of the most effective enforcement mechanisms.

translation.cy: Byddai angen cefnogi trefn o’r fath trwy sicrhau bod ffermwyr yn deall beth sydd ei angen iddynt ei wneud i gydymffurfio, er enghraifft erbyn pryd y mae’n rhaid cynnal y prawf TB a beth fydd canlyniadau peidio â chydymffurfio.
translation.en: This approach would need to be supported by ensuring farmers are clear about what they need to do to comply, such as the dates TB testing must take place, and the consequence for non-compliance.

translation.cy: Os na fydd y ffermwr yn cydymffurfio, yn ein barn ni, byddai’n briodol rhoi cosb ariannol, fel cosb ariannol sefydlog neu newidiol.
translation.en: Where non-compliance does occur, we believe it would be proportionate to issue a monetary penalty, such as a fixed or variable monetary penalty.

translation.cy: Byddai angen arbenigwyr ar y broses apelio, gan ddibynnu ar y pwnc dan sylw;
translation.en: The appeals process would also require expertise based on the subject matter;

translation.cy: 3 Beth yw’ch barn am y cynigion ynghylch sancsiynau sifil er mwyn gallu gorfodi’r rheoliadau mewn ffordd gymesur?
translation.en: 3 	What are your views on the proposals for civil sanctions to enable proportionate enforcement of regulations?

translation.cy: Rydym yn cynnig dod â’r BPS a chynlluniau amaeth-amgylcheddol eraill yr UE i ben a rhoi yn eu lle un cynllun cymorth uniongyrchol (y Cynllun Ffermio Cynaliadwy) ar gyfer ffermio.
translation.en: We propose to replace the BPS and other EU agri-environment schemes with a single direct support scheme (the Sustainable Farming Scheme) for farming.

translation.cy: Dylai’r cynllun hwn wobrwyo ffermwyr yn briodol am gynhyrchu nwyddau nad oes marchnad iddynt (gwella pridd, aer glân, dŵr glân, cynyddu bioamrywiaeth, gweithredu i arafu twymo’r ddaear) ar lefelau uwch na’r hyn a bennir gan reoliadau, hynny trwy reoli tir mewn ffordd gynaliadwy.
translation.en: 2.50 This scheme should reward farmers appropriately for the production of nonmarket goods (improved soils, clean air, clean water, improved biodiversity, actions to reduce global warming)at levels above those set by regulation through the management of land in a sustainable way.

translation.cy: Ein pwrpas trwy ddarparu’r cymorth hwn fydd Rheoli Tir yn Gynaliadwy er mwyn creu sector ffermio cynaliadwy yng Nghymru er lles cenedlaethau’r dyfodol.
translation.en: 2.51 Our purpose in providing this future support is to implement SLM in order to create a sustainable agriculture sector in Wales for future generations.

translation.cy:
“Defnyddio adnoddau tir, gan gynnwys pridd, dŵr, anifeiliaid a phlanhigion, i gynhyrchu nwyddau i ddiwallu anghenion cyfnewidiol pobl gan ddiogelu yr un pryd botensial tymor hir yr adnoddau hyn a chynnal a gwella’u manteision
amgylcheddol”.
translation.en: “The use of land resources, including soils, water, animals and plants, for the production of goods to meet changing human needs, while simultaneously ensuring the long-term potential of these resources and the maintenance and enhancement of their environmental benefits”.

translation.cy: Er mwyn sicrhau’r manteision hyn, rydym yn cynnig cyfnewid BPS a chynlluniau amaeth-amgylcheddol eraill yr UE gyda Cynllun Ffermio Cynaliadwy (CFfC).
translation.en: 2.60 To realise these benefits, we propose replacing the BPS and EU agrienvironment support schemes with the Sustainable Farming Scheme (SFS).

translation.cy: Trwy Reoli Tir yn Gynaliadwy trwy’r CFfC, gellir cynhyrchu cynnyrch amaethyddol yn gynaliadwy mewn ffordd a fydd yr un pryd yn esgor ar y canlyniadau amgylcheddol sydd eu hangen arnom wrth reoli’r tir.
translation.en: 2.61 Implementation of SLM through the proposed SFS will enable sustainable agricultural production in a way that simultaneously generates the environmental outcomes we need from land management.

translation.cy: Trwy ddiogelu’r canlyniadau amgylcheddol ac eraill y mae ffermwyr a’r gymdeithas ehangach yn dibynnu arnyn nhw – pridd gwell, dŵr glân, aer glân ac amgylchedd cydnerth a chyfoethocach ei fioamrywiaeth, bydd y cenedlaethau nesaf o ffermwyr yn cael parhau i reoli’u tir.
translation.en: 2.64 Protecting the environmental, and other, outcomes that farmers and wider society depend upon - improved soils, clean water, clean air and a resilient environment with increasing biodiversity - will also enable future generations of farmers to continue managing their land.

translation.cy: Fel rhan o’r fframwaith polisi a’r cynllun a ddisgrifir uchod byddwn yn cynnig cyngor ac arweiniad hefyd ar sut i wella busnesau er mwyn i ffermwyr allu manteisio ar farchnadoedd newydd ac ar gyfleoedd i arallgyfeirio sy’n gyson ag SLM.
translation.en: Within the policy framework and proposed scheme described above we will also offer business improvement advice and support to enable farmers to take advantage of new markets and diversification opportunities consistent with SLM.

translation.cy: Trwy allu profi cynaliadwyedd tarddiad y bwyd a gynhyrchir yma yng Nghymru, byddwn yn gallu datblygu brand clir a marchnad ar gyfer cynnyrch o Gymru.
translation.en: Demonstrating the sustainable origins of food produced here in Wales will enable us to develop a clear brand and marketplace for Welsh produce.

translation.cy: Rydym yn cynnig datblygu prosesau i sicrhau bod asesiadau cychwynnol o gynaliadwyedd ffermydd a bod gwaith monitro ac adroddiadau ar y cynllun yn rhoi’r dystiolaeth sydd ei hangen i brofi bod cynnyrch y ffermydd yn y cynllun yn gynaliadwy.
translation.en: 2.67 We propose developing processes to ensure initial farm sustainability assessments, scheme monitoring and reporting provide the necessary evidence to demonstrate the sustainability of farm products from farms within the scheme.

translation.cy: Rhoi pwerau i Weinidogion Cymru ariannu’r canlynol i gefnogi egwyddorion Rheoli Tir yn Gynaliadwy:
translation.en: 2.74 To provide the Welsh Ministers with the powers to fund the following purposes in support of the delivery of SLM:

translation.cy: I roi’r cyngor, hyfforddiant a’r datblygiad proffesiynol parhaus angenrheidiol i ffermwyr gyda golwg ar roi egwyddorion Rheoli Tir yn Gynaliadwy ar waith;
translation.en: To provide necessary advice, training and continuing professional development to farmers in pursuit of the delivery of SLM;

translation.cy: Bydd hynny’n cynnwys mesurau i gefnogi gwaith addasu er mwyn gwneud ffermwyr a rheolwyr tir yn fwy abl i wrthsefyll hinsawdd sy’n newid;
translation.en: To include measures to support adaptive actions enabling farmers and land managers to improve climate change resilience;

translation.cy: I gynyddu bioamrywiaeth ar ffermydd a chynefinoedd eraill, a chryfhau ecosystemau sy’n gysylltiedig ag amaethyddiaeth ac arferion amaethyddol gan gynnwys gwella parhaol i iechyd y pridd;
translation.en: To increase levels of farm biodiversity and wider habitat and ecosystem resilience associated with agriculture and agricultural practice including through the sustained improvement of soil health;

translation.cy: Byddwn yn cefnogi ffermwyr i gyflwyno technolegau newydd mewn ffyrdd a fydd yn sicrhau’r canlyniadau rydym am i SLM eu darparu.
translation.en: 2.78 We will support farmers to introduce new technologies in ways which enable the delivery of our SLM outcomes.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn bwysig mewn meysydd fel rheoli data, ffermio manwl, datblygu ffyrdd mwy effeithiol o leihau allyriadau cig coch (gan gynnwys trwy ddefnyddio genomeg), rheoli maethynnau (gan gynnwys defnyddio llai o wrtaith artiffisial) a defnyddio llai o ynni.
translation.en: This will be important in areas such as data management, precision agriculture, the development of improved efficiency in reducing emissions from red meat production (including through the use of genomics), nutrient management (including reductions in artificial fertiliser use) and reductions in energy use.

translation.cy: Mae angen i ffermio manwl ddod yn rhan annatod o bob agwedd ar ffermio trwy ddefnyddio geneteg well, targedu mewnbynnau’n well a chasglu a defnyddio data i wneud y busnes yn fwy effeithiol.
translation.en: Precision agriculture needs to be embedded in every aspect of farming through use of better genetics, better targeting of inputs and gathering and utilising data to improve business efficiency.

translation.cy: Yn ein barn ni, trwy weithio fel hyn, yn ogystal â gwneud busnes y fferm yn fwy effeithiol, byddwn yn cyfrannu at sicrhau’r canlyniadau amgylcheddol ehangach y ceisir eu cael trwy Reoli Tir yn Gynaliadwy.
translation.en: We believe that working in this way will not only improve a farm’s business efficiency but will also begin to contribute to the delivery of the broader environmental outcomes sought as part of SLM.

translation.cy: Adran 4
translation.en: Section 4

translation.cy: Diwydiant a’r Gadwyn Gyflenwi:
translation.en: Industry & Supply Chain:

translation.cy: Sicrhau bod economïau a chymunedau gwledig tiriogaethau gwahanol yn cael eu datblygu’n gytbwys, gan gynnwys creu a chynnal swyddi.
translation.en: Achieving a balanced territorial development of rural economies and communities, including the creation and maintenance of employment.

translation.cy: O dan amodau’r Cytundeb Ymadael, cyfraith yr UE sy’n parhau i reoli’r rhaglenni tan y daw’r rhaglen neu’r ymrwymiad i ben.
translation.en: Under the terms of the Withdrawal Agreement, EU Law continues to govern those programmes until the programmes close or commitments end.

translation.cy: Er y bydd angen hyblygrwydd arnom i allu addasu’n cefnogaeth yn y dyfodol i adlewyrchu heriau newydd, tueddiadau cyfnewidiol a blaenoriaethau newydd i’r Llywodraeth, bydd ein blaenoriaeth ar gyfer cefnogi’r diwydiant a’r gadwyn gyflenwi’n cynnwys:
translation.en: Whilst we will need to retain flexibility to ensure future support can be adapted to reflect new challenges, changing trends and emerging government priorities, our priorities for industry and supply chain support include:

translation.cy: Darparu ar gyfer mesurau ymyrryd yn y farchnad i helpu busnesau ffermio i ddygymod ag anwadalwch eithriadol neu fethiant yn y farchnad pe bai hynny’n digwydd.
translation.en: Provision for market intervention measures to help farming businesses cope with exceptional market volatility or failure should it arise.

translation.cy: Wneud defnydd llawn o gyfraniad rhanddeiliaid wrth ddatblygu a llunio polisi gan hefyd ymgymryd â herio a chraffu allanol digonol ar gynigion;
translation.en: Make full use of stakeholder input into the policy development and design stages, whilst also bringing in adequate external challenge and scrutiny on proposals;

translation.cy: Ddysgu gwersi o brofiad a gwerthusiadau blaenorol;
translation.en: Apply learning from past evaluation and experience;

translation.cy: Ein Cynigion
translation.en: Our Proposals

translation.cy: Y Ddadl dros Newid
translation.en: Case for Change

translation.cy: Daw’r pŵer presennol i gasglu a phrosesu data amaethyddol o nifer o ddarnau gwahanol o ddeddfwriaeth ddomestig a’r UE.
translation.en: 2.95 The power to collect and process data on agriculture is currently scattered across numerous pieces of EU and domestic legislation.

translation.cy: Mae gennym lawer o wybodaeth eisoes am ffermydd a ffermwyr sy’n hawlio taliad y BPS;  sy’n rhan o gynllun amaeth-amgylcheddol; neu sy’n cadw da byw.
translation.en: 2.96 We hold a range of information about farms and farmers who currently claim BPS payments, are a part of an agri-environment scheme or have livestock.

translation.cy: Yn adroddiad Hwyluso’r Drefn 201113, ceir nifer o argymhellion ynghylch monitro a gwelwyd peth cynnydd ar hynny ers hynny.
translation.en: 2.99 The Working Smarter 2011 report made several recommendations regarding monitoring and some progress has been made as a result, for example, through aligning a number of Cross Compliance inspections and publishing When the Inspector Calls guidance.

translation.cy: Defnyddio technoleg yn well
translation.en: Better use of technology

translation.cy: Gwerthuso
translation.en: Evaluation

translation.cy: 6 Beth yw’ch barn chi am y dibenion a gynigir ar gyfer casglu, rhannu a chysylltu data?
translation.en: What are your views on the proposed purposes for collecting, sharing and linking data?

translation.cy: Er mwyn taclo argyfwng yr hinsawdd bydd angen creu mwy o goetir nag unrhyw bryd yn y 50 mlynedd diwethaf.
translation.en: Tackling the climate change emergency will require woodland creation on a greater scale than at any point in the past 50 years.

translation.cy: Nid oes digon o goetir yn cael ei blannu yng Nghymru ac mae cyfran rhy fach o’r coetir dan reolaeth.
translation.en: 2.124 Not enough woodland is currently planted in Wales, and too little existing woodland is managed.

translation.cy: Nid yw pawb yn deall manteision rheoli coetir bob amser;
translation.en: The benefits of woodland management are not always understood;

translation.cy: Paratowyd y llawlyfr hwn fel dogfen gynorthwyol, ond nid yw wedi’i gynllunio i fod yn ddatganiad awdurdodol na therfynol o weithdrefn ac arferion Llywodraeth a Chynulliad Cymru.
translation.en: This handbook is intended to be a helpful document, however, it is not intended to be an authoritative or definitive statement of Welsh Government and Assembly procedure and practice.

translation.cy: Ar ôl i Fil gael ei ystyried a’i basio gan y Cynulliad, a derbyn Cydsyniad Brenhinol, daw’n Ddeddf Cynulliad, ac yn gyfraith.
translation.en: Once a Bill has been considered and passed by the Assembly, and given Royal Assent, it becomes an Act of the Assembly, and law.

translation.cy: Gall y Ddeddf (neu ddarpariaethau ohoni) ddod i effaith (neu i rym) ar unwaith wrth gael Cydsyniad Brenhinol, neu gellid gadael i Weinidogion Cymru benderfynu drwy orchymyn pryd y dylai ddod i effaith.
translation.en: It (or provisions of it) may come into effect (or force) immediately on Royal Assent, or the time when it is to come into effect may be left to the Welsh Ministers to decide by order.

translation.cy: Ac mewn rhai amgylchiadau gall darpariaeth fod yn gysylltiedig, neu gyffwrdd ar fater a gedwir yn ôl heb 'ymwneud' â'r mater hwnnw.
translation.en: And there are circumstances in which a provision may engage, or touch on, a reserved matter without ‘relating to’ it.

translation.cy: Pennod 2 – Trosolwg o baratoi Bil
translation.en: Chapter 2 – Overview of preparing a Bill

translation.cy: Diben y Bennod hon yw cynnig cipolwg cryno ar y broses o baratoi Bil a dogfennau cysylltiedig yn Gymraeg ac yn Saesneg cyn cyflwyno’r Bil i’r Cynulliad.
translation.en: This Chapter is intended to provide an at-a-glance overview of preparing a Bill and accompanying documentation in Welsh and English before it is introduced into the Assembly.

translation.cy: Mae Pennod 3 y Llawlyfr hwn yn rhoi gwybodaeth am gyfansoddiad ac adnoddau tîm Bil, ynghyd ag esboniad o’r unigolion a’r timau eraill sy’n cyfrannu at ddatblygu, paratoi ac ystyried Bil Cynulliad.
translation.en: Chapter 3 of this Handbook provides advice on the composition and resourcing of a Bill team, together with an explanation of the other individuals and teams who contribute to the development, preparation and consideration of an Assembly Bill.

translation.cy: Mae rheoli a llywodraethu Bil yn elfen hanfodol o ddarparu Bil, a cheir rhagor o ganllawiau ar yr egwyddorion, y dull a’r dogfennau sy’n gysylltiedig â hyn ym Mhennod 4 y Llawlyfr hwn.
translation.en: Bill management and governance is an essential element to delivery of a Bill, and further guidance on the principles, approach and documentation associated with this is given in Chapter 4 of this Handbook.

translation.cy: Mae Pennod 5 yn cyfeirio at ganllawiau ar asesiadau effaith, a Phennod 6 yn cynnig canllaw ar baratoi’r Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol (RIA).
translation.en: Chapter 5 signposts to guidance on impact assessments, and Chapter 6 gives guidance on preparing the Regulatory Impact Assessment (RIA).

translation.cy: Mae Pennod 7 yn cynnig canllaw ar gyfarwyddo.
translation.en: Chapter 7 gives guidance on instructing.

translation.cy: Drafftio a chyfieithu’r Bil a’r Memorandwm Esboniadol
translation.en: Drafting and translation of the Bill and the Explanatory Memorandum

translation.cy: Pan fo pwerau yn y Bil i wneud is-ddeddfwriaeth, bydd angen fel arfer i dîm y Bil baratoi dogfen yn Gymraeg ac yn Saesneg i esbonio i’r Cynulliad sut y disgwylir i’r pwerau gael eu defnyddio – datganiad o fwriad y polisi.
translation.en: Where there are powers in the Bill to make subordinate legislation, the Bill team will usually need to prepare a document in Welsh and English to explain to the Assembly how the powers are expected to be used – a statement of policy intent (SoPI).

translation.cy: Anfonir y dogfennau at y Llywydd yn Gymraeg ac yn Saesneg wedyn er mwyn iddi benderfynu arnynt cyn eu cyflwyno.
translation.en: The documents are then sent to the Llywydd in Welsh and English for her determination prior to introduction.

translation.cy: Nid yw’n rhestr drwyadl a bydd angen i dimau Biliau ystyried pwy arall y bydd angen eu cynnwys.
translation.en: It is not an exhaustive list and Bill teams will need to consider who else will also need to be involved.

translation.cy: Y Cwnsler Cyffredinol
translation.en: Counsel General

translation.cy: Newidiadau i’r Aelod Cyfrifol
translation.en: Changes to the Member in charge

translation.cy: Gellir trosglwyddo Biliau’r Llywodraeth i unrhyw Aelod o’r Llywodraeth fel a awdurdodwyd gan y Prif Weinidog.
translation.en: Government Bills can be transferred to any Member of the Government as authorised by the First Minister.

translation.cy: Pan fydd trosglwyddiad o’r fath yn digwydd, ystyrir fod y Bil (o hynny ymlaen) yn Fil Llywodraeth.
translation.en: When such a transfer takes place, the Bill is regarded (from then on) as a Government Bill.

translation.cy: Gall yr Aelod Cyfrifol am Fil Aelod drosglwyddo’r Bil i Aelod arall, neu i aelod o’r Llywodraeth os caiff ei awdurdodi gan y Prif Weinidog.
translation.en: The Member in charge of a Member Bill can transfer the Bill to another Member, or to a member of the Government if authorised by the First Minister.

translation.cy: Yn unol ag arferion rheoli rhaglen a phrosiect safonol, y Prif Berchennog Cyfrifol yw’r unigolyn sy’n gyfrifol am sicrhau bod prosiect neu raglen o newid yn bodloni ei amcanion ac yn cyflawni’r manteision rhagamcanol.
translation.en: In line with standard programme and project management practice, the SRO is the individual responsible for ensuring that a project or programme of change meets its objectives and delivers the projected benefits.

translation.cy: Mae’n gweithredu fel y pwynt cyswllt canolog ar gyfer y Bil.
translation.en: They act as the central point of contact for the Bill.

translation.cy: Byddant yn gallu cynghori ar statws cyfreithiol cyfredol y maes polisi, cymhwysedd deddfwriaethol a hyfywedd yr opsiynau polisi a ddatblygwyd.
translation.en: They will be able to advise on the current legal status of the policy area, legislative competence and the viability of the policy options that have been developed.

translation.cy: Fel arfer, y swyddogion sy’n gweithio o’r cyfarwyddiadau polisi i ddatblygu cyfres o gyfarwyddiadau i’r drafftiwr – sy’n cael eu galw y ‘swyddogion sy’n llunio cyfarwyddiadau’ – fydd y rhain.
translation.en: They will normally be the official who works from the policy instructions to develop a set of instructions for the drafter – the person performing this role is known as the ‘instructing officer’.

translation.cy: Mae Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol yn swyddfa fach sy’n gyfrifol am ddrafftio’r holl Filiau’r Llywodraeth a gwelliannau yn y rhaglen ddeddfwriaethol.
translation.en: OLC is a small office and is tasked with drafting all Government Bills and amendments in the legislative programme.

translation.cy: Mae Rheolau Sefydlog y Cynulliad yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol i Filiau, a’r rhan fwyaf o’u dogfennau cysylltiedig, gael eu darparu yn Gymraeg.
translation.en: The Assembly’s Standing Orders require that Bills, and most of their accompanying documents, are provided in Welsh.

translation.cy: Dylid cofio’r pwyntiau canlynol wrth drefnu gwaith gyda’r Gwasanaeth Cyfieithu:
translation.en: When scheduling work with Translation Service the following points should be remembered:

translation.cy: bydd anfon testun gorffenedig i’r Gwasanaeth Cyfieithu, yn hytrach na drafftiau anghyflawn, yn gwneud defnydd mwy effeithlon o’r adnoddau sydd ar gael.
translation.en: sending finished text to Translation Service, rather than incomplete drafts, will make more efficient use of the resources available:

translation.cy: mae pob testun yn wahanol ac nid yw’n bosibl dweud ymlaen llaw yn union pa mor hir y bydd ei angen ar y Gwasanaeth Cyfieithu i wneud y gwaith, ond bydd yr ieithydd deddfwriaethol neu’r prif gyfieithydd yn gallu cynnig cyngor mwy manwl.
translation.en: every text is different and it is not possible to tell in advance exactly how long Translation Service will need to do the work, but the jurilinguist or lead translator will be able to give more detailed advice.

translation.cy: Y Prif Economegydd sy'n gyfrifol am awdurdodi'r Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol terfynol cyn cyflwyno Bil.
translation.en: The Chief Economist is responsible for clearing the final RIA prior to the introduction of a Bill.

translation.cy: Bydd angen i dimau Biliau weithio’n agos gyda’r Swyddfa Breifat, sy’n ymdrin â’r holl ohebiaeth i’r Gweinidog, yn trefnu cyfarfodydd gyda nhw, ac ar eu cyfer, ac yn trefnu eu hymddangosiadau gerbron Pwyllgorau.
translation.en: Bill teams will need to work closely with the Private Office, who deal with all correspondence to the Minister, arrange meetings with and for the them and organise their appearances before Committees.

translation.cy: Mae’n cynnwys uwch-swyddogion o bob rhan o Lywodraeth Cymru ac fe’i cefnogir gan weithgorau cysylltiedig.
translation.en: It is made up of the senior officials from across the Welsh Government and is supported by associated working groups.

translation.cy: Mae gan y tîm rwydwaith sylweddol o gysylltiadau uwch a lefel gweithio sydd â phrif gyfrifoldeb am ddatganoli ar draws adrannau Llywodraeth y DU;
translation.en: The team has a significant network of senior and working level contacts with lead responsibility for devolution across UK Government departments;

translation.cy: Gall yr Is-adran Materion Cyfansoddiadol a Chysylltiadau Rhynglywodraethol hefyd gynghori ar ddehongli’r Canllawiau ar Ddatganoli a’r Memorandwm Cyd-ddealltwriaeth rhwng Llywodraeth y DU a'r Gweinyddiaethau Datganoledig.
translation.en: CAIGR can also advise on interpretation of Devolution Guidance Notes and the ‘Memorandum of Understanding between the UK Government and Devolved Administrations’.

translation.cy: Mae rheoli’r Bil yn rhan annatod o’r broses.
translation.en: Bill management is an integral part of the process.

translation.cy: Mae gwaith rheoli Bil yn cefnogi’r gwaith o baratoi Bil.
translation.en: Bill management supports the work of preparing the Bill.

translation.cy: Fel a nodwyd yn y Bennod flaenorol yn y llawlyfr hwn, mae rheoli Bil yn rhan annatod a hanfodol o weithio ar Filiau’r Cynulliad – nid rhywbeth i beri anghyfleustra na gwaith ychwanegol diangen mohono.
translation.en: As noted in the previous Chapter of this handbook, Bill management is an integral and essential part of working on Assembly Bills – it is not an inconvenience or unnecessary overhead.

translation.cy: Yn yr un modd, dylai gwaith rheoli Bil fod yn gymesur â’r prosiect ei hun a dylai fod yn gyfrwng i gefnogi a llywio’r gwaith o sicrhau bod Bil yn cael ei gyflawni.
translation.en: Equally, Bill management should be proportionate to the actual project and should take the form of a supportive and guiding hand in the delivery of the Bill.

translation.cy: mae’n cydymffurfio â Chod y Gweinidogion a Chod y Gwasanaeth Sifil, a bwriedir iddo esbonio sut y bydd swyddogion yn cynorthwyo Gweinidogion i gyflawni deddfwriaeth.
translation.en: it is in line with the Ministerial Code and the Civil Service Code, and is intended to explain how officials will support Ministers in the delivery of legislation.

translation.cy: Nodir yn eglur unrhyw feysydd o risg neu ansicrwydd a, lle bo hynny’n bosibl, bydd y cyngor yn gwahaniaethu rhwng manteision ac anfanteision penderfyniadau posibl.
translation.en: Any areas of risk or uncertainty will be clearly indicated and the advice will, where possible, separate out the advantages and disadvantages of possible decisions.

translation.cy: Bydd pob cyngor yn cael ei gyflwyno i’r Gweinidog wedi iddo gael ei drafod a’i awdurdodi’n fewnol fel sy’n briodol.
translation.en: All advice will be submitted to the Minister after having had appropriate internal discussion and clearances.

translation.cy: Mae’r darlun cyflawn yn cynnwys y cyd-destun gwleidyddol a chyfansoddiadol; cysondeb â rhannau eraill o’r fframwaith deddfwriaethol presennol ac arfaethedig; a dulliau o weithredu deddfwriaeth.
translation.en: The big picture includes the political and constitutional context; the fit with other parts of the current and prospective legislative framework; and approaches to implementation of legislation.

translation.cy: Y posibilrwydd y gallai amserlen Bil lithro – sylweddoli pa effaith allai hyn ei chael ar eraill sy’n rhan o gynhyrchu’r Bil, yr effeithiau yn deillio o oedi wrth gyflawni’r polisi, ac unrhyw effaith bosibl ar y rhaglen ddeddfwriaethol ehangach;
translation.en: Potential slippage in the timetable of a Bill – recognising its potential knock-on effect on others involved in the production of the Bill, the effects of delaying the delivery of the policy, and any potential impact on the wider legislative programme;

translation.cy: Cydnabyddir y gallai fod angen i drefniadau llywodraethu o’r fath amrywio i gyd-fynd ag union natur Biliau unigol, ac mai diben llywodraethu da yw sicrhau bod Bil yn cael ei gyflawni’n effeithiol.
translation.en: It is recognised such governance arrangements may need to vary to suit the precise nature of individual Bills, and good governance is a means to enable effective delivery and not an end in itself.

translation.cy: Bwrdd prosiect yw hwn fel arfer.
translation.en: This is usually a project board.

translation.cy: Mae aelodaeth o fwrdd prosiect Bil yn gofyn am ymrwymiad amser gan bob aelod o’r bwrdd, yn ogystal ag ymrwymiad hefyd i’r prosiect sy’n cael ei ddarparu, a diddordeb ynddo.
translation.en: Membership of a Bill project board requires an investment of time by each board member, together with a commitment to, and interest in, the project being delivered.

translation.cy: Pan fydd tîm Bil o’r farn efallai fod angen newid y cerrig milltir allweddol, neu ddiwygio dyddiadau cyflwyno dangosol, dylid cysylltu ar unwaith â’r cyswllt perthnasol yn Uned y Rhaglen Ddeddfwriaethol a'i Llywodraethiant.
translation.en: Where a Bill team considers that the key milestones may need to be changed, or indicative introduction dates altered, contact should immediately be made with the relevant LPGU contact.

translation.cy: Pan fydd Bil wedi cael ei gyflwyno i’r Cynulliad, bydd Uned y Rhaglen Ddeddfwriaethol a'i Llywodraethiant yn gweithio gyda thîm y Bil i ddatblygu amserlen ar gyfer paratoi diwygiadau i’r Bil – gweler hefyd Bennod 15.
translation.en: When a Bill has been introduced into the Assembly, LPGU will work with the Bill team to develop a timetable for the preparation of amendments to the Bill – see also Chapter 15.

translation.cy: Mae rhan o’r cymesuredd hwn yn ymwneud â’r dogfennau prosiect a fydd yn cyd-fynd a gwaith y Bil.
translation.en: Part of this proportionality relates to the project documentation that will accompany the Bill work.

translation.cy: Nid oes unrhyw ofynion a bennwyd yn ganolog ar gyfer fformat dogfennau prosiect Bil (ceir gofynion penodol ar gyfer dogfennau Bil eraill, fel Memoranda Esboniadol er enghraifft).
translation.en: There are no centrally set requirements for the format of the Bill project documentation (there are set requirements for other Bill documents, for example Explanatory Memoranda).

translation.cy: Mae’n arferol i Reolwyr Biliau baratoi adroddiadau ar y prif bwyntiau yn rheolaidd i’r bwrdd prosiect.
translation.en: It is usual for Bill Managers to prepare regular highlight reports to the project board.

translation.cy: Dylai canllawiau rheoli prosiect y Llywodraeth fod o gymorth i Reolwyr Biliau wrth ddatblygu’r dogfennau prosiect ar gyfer y Bil.
translation.en: Bill Managers should find the Government’s project management guidance of assistance in developing the project documentation for the Bill.

translation.cy: Mae hyn er mwyn sicrhau nad yw’r problemau yn cael eu colli pan fo gwaith yn cael ei wneud yn gyflym, fel sy’n gallu digwydd o bryd i’w gilydd.
translation.en: This is so the issues are not lost in the fast pace of work which can sometimes take place.

translation.cy: strategaeth gyfathrebu;
translation.en: a communications strategy;

translation.cy: cysylltiadau â strategaethau cyfathrebu eraill (pa un a ydynt yn Filiau eraill, yn brosiectau Llywodraeth Cymru eraill, gwaith polisi arall, etc).
translation.en: linkages to other communication strategies (be this other Bills, other Welsh Government projects, other policy work, etc.).

translation.cy: Dylid rhoi cymorth cyfathrebu cryf trwy gydol y broses, pan fo hynny’n bosibl.
translation.en: Strong communications support should be maintained throughout the process, where possible.

translation.cy: Rhoddir canllawiau cynhwysfawr ar Asesiadau Effaith Rheoleiddiol ym Mhennod 6 y Llawlyfr hwn.
translation.en: Comprehensive guidance on RIAs is provided in Chapter 6 of this Handbook.

translation.cy: Gellir gweld y canllawiau yn llawn yn adran polisi a chyflawni y fewnrwyd.
translation.en: Full guidance can be found on the policy and delivery section of the intranet.

translation.cy: yr arbedion gweinyddol y byddai'r Bil yn arwain atynt;
translation.en: the administrative savings arising from the Bill;

translation.cy: Mae’n rhaid paratoi Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol ar gyfer deddfwriaeth arfaethedig a allai effeithio ar y sectorau cyhoeddus neu breifat (gyda phwyslais penodol ar yr effeithiau ar fusnesau bach), elusennau a’r sector gwirfoddol.
translation.en: RIAs must be completed for proposed legislation which could affect the public or private sectors (with a particular focus on the impacts on small business), charities and the voluntary sector.

translation.cy: Mae hyn yn cynnwys newidiadau a wneir gan ddefnyddio Biliau ac is-ddeddfwriaeth.
translation.en: This includes changes made using both Bills and subordinate legislation.

translation.cy: Mae’n debygol iawn y bydd rhanddeiliaid yn cynnig sylwadau ar yr Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol a’r costau yn rhan o’u tystiolaeth i’r Pwyllgor Cyfrifol yn ystod ystyriaeth y Cynulliad o’r Bil.
translation.en: It is very likely stakeholders will comment on the RIA and costings as part of their evidence to the responsible Committee during the Assembly’s consideration of the Bill.

translation.cy: yn rhoi manylion yr opsiynau a ystyriwyd i fodloni’r amcanion polisi, bydd hyn yn cynnwys yr opsiwn ‘Parhau fel Arfer’ a datblygu’r Bil.
translation.en: details the options considered to achieve the policy objectives, this will include the ‘Business as Usual’ (BAU) option and bringing forward the Bill.

translation.cy: Er mwyn sicrhau bod Asesiadau Effaith Rheoleiddiol yn fwy hygyrch ar gyfer y Pumed Cynulliad, datblygwyd Tabl Crynodeb dwy dudalen syml yn y templed i gynnig crynodeb byr o’r asesiad.
translation.en: To improve the accessibility of RIAs for the Fifth Assembly, a simple, two-page Summary Table has been developed within the template to provide a short summary of the assessment.

translation.cy: Mae crynodeb isod o esblygiad Asesiadau Effaith Rheoleiddiol a’r prif gyfnodau pan ddylid gweithio ar Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol:
translation.en: The following is a summary of the evolution of an RIA and the main stages at which work on an RIA should be undertaken:

translation.cy: Datblygu – Mae cam cyntaf y broses yn canolbwyntio ar ddiffinio’r broblem polisi, penderfynu ar y sail resymegol sy’n sylfaen ar gyfer ymyrraeth y Llywodraeth, nodi opsiynau eraill i fynd i’r afael â’r broblem polisi a datblygu’r sail dystiolaeth.
translation.en: Development – The first stage of the process is focussed on defining the policy problem, establishing the rationale for Government intervention, identifying alternative options to address the policy problem and developing the evidence base.

translation.cy: Dylid cyhoeddi’r Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol drafft hwn wedyn yn rhan o unrhyw ymarfer ymgynghori i gynnig cyfle i randdeiliaid adolygu’r dadansoddiad a darparu data a thystiolaeth ychwanegol/eraill.
translation.en: This draft RIA should then be published as part of any consultation exercise to provide stakeholders with the opportunity to review the analysis and to provide additional/alternative data and evidence.

translation.cy: Dylid diweddaru’r dadansoddiad cost a budd i adlewyrchu manylion polisi terfynol ac unrhyw dystiolaeth/adborth a dderbyniwyd gan randdeiliaid yn ystod yr ymgynghoriad cyhoeddus.
translation.en: The cost-benefit analysis should be updated to reflect final policy details and any evidence/feedback received from stakeholders during the public consultation.

translation.cy: Diwygiadau Dilynol – Mae Rheol Sefydlog 26.27 yn ei gwneud yn ofynnol, pan fydd Bil yn cael ei ddiwygio yn ystod trafodion Cyfnod 2, fod Memorandwm Esboniadol diwygiedig yn cael ei baratoi oni bai bod y Pwyllgor Cyfrifol yn penderfynu nad yw’n ofynnol.
translation.en: Following Amendments – Standing Order 26.27 requires that where a Bill is amended at Stage 2 proceedings, a revised Explanatory Memorandum must be prepared unless the Committee in charge resolves that it is not required.

translation.cy: Mae hefyd yn ymarfer gorau i gyhoeddi Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol ar ôl deddfu i adlewyrchu’r Ddeddf derfynol.
translation.en: It is also best practice to publish an RIA after enactment to reflect the final Act.

translation.cy: Gall Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol cadarn ac ystyrlon gymryd sawl mis i’w gyflawni.
translation.en: A robust and meaningful RIA can take several months to complete.

translation.cy: Dylai hyn adeiladu ar yr asesiadau effaith cychwynnol a gynhelir yn rhan o’r broses o geisio cynnwys y Bil yn y rhaglen ddeddfwriaethol.
translation.en: This should build upon the initial impact assessments undertaken as part of the process of seeking inclusion within the legislative programme.

translation.cy: Pan fydd Bil yn cynnwys amryw o wahanol newidiadau i bolisi, argymhellir bod yr Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol yn ystyried opsiynau ar wahân ar gyfer pob newid i bolisi yn hytrach na chyflwyno opsiynau ar gyfer y Bil yn ei gyfanrwydd.
translation.en: Where a Bill contains a number of distinct policy changes, it is recommended that the RIA considers separate options for each policy change rather than presenting options for the Bill as a whole.

translation.cy: Cydnabyddir bod gwrthdaro posibl yma gyda chymesuredd a gallai weithiau fod yn dderbyniol mynegi bod cost yn un y gellir ei diystyru pan ddiffinnir yn eglur ei bod yn llai na throthwy penodol;
translation.en: It is recognised there is a potential conflict here with proportionality and it may sometimes be acceptable to express a cost as negligible where this is clearly defined as being less than a certain threshold;

translation.cy: Os nad yw’r dystiolaeth ofynnol ar gael, yna efallai y bydd angen comisiynu gwaith ymchwil newydd.
translation.en: If the required evidence is not available then it may be necessary to commission new research.

translation.cy: Mae cysylltiad â rhanddeiliaid yn hanfodol ar gyfer datblygu Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol cadarn ac, i fod yn effeithiol, rhaid i'r cysylltiad hwnnw ddechrau yn gynnar yn ystod y cyfnod dadansoddi.
translation.en: Stakeholder engagement is essential for the development of a robust RIA and, to be effective, that engagement needs to start at an early stage of the analysis.

translation.cy: Yn ogystal â defnyddio rhanddeiliaid fel ffynhonnell o ddata a thystiolaeth wrth lunio Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol, mae'n arfer da i randdeiliaid gael cyfle i adolygu a rhoi sylwadau ar adrannau perthnasol yr Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol terfynol cyn ei gyhoeddi.
translation.en: In addition to using stakeholders as a source of data and evidence to inform an RIA, it is good practice for stakeholders to be given an opportunity to review and comment on the relevant sections of the final RIA before publication.

translation.cy: Hyd yn oed pan nad yw union fanylion is-ddeddfwriaeth wedi cael eu pennu’n derfynol, mae angen amcangyfrif gorau o’r costau a’r manteision tebygol i alluogi’r Cynulliad i graffu’n llawn ar y ddeddfwriaeth.
translation.en: Even where the precise detail of subordinate legislation has not been finalised, a best estimate of the likely costs and benefits is required to enable the Assembly to fully scrutinise the legislation.

translation.cy: Er mwyn asesu costau (ac i fodloni gofynion Rheolau Sefydlog), bydd angen rhoi ystyriaeth i bwy fydd yn cael eu heffeithio gan y cynigion polisi.
translation.en: In order to assess costs (and to satisfy the requirements of Standing Orders), consideration will need to be given as to who will be affected by the policy proposals.

translation.cy: Dylid gwahaniaethu'n glir hefyd yn yr Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol rhwng costau arian parod (pan fo disgwyl gwariant ariannol gwirioneddol, er enghraifft bod rhaid i awdurdodau lleol gyflogi aelod ychwanegol o staff) a chostau nad yw'n arian parod sydd â gwerth ariannol (er enghraifft gwerth yr amser y mae'n ei gymryd i fusnes ymgeisio am drwydded neu werth allyriadau carbon ychwanegol).
translation.en: A clear distinction should also be made in the RIA between cash costs (those where there is expected to be an actual financial outlay, for example, local authorities having to employ an additional member of staff) and non-cash costs which have been monetised (for example, the value of the time it takes for a business to apply for a license or the value of additional carbon emissions).

translation.cy: Dylid uwchraddio costau hanesyddol (y rhai sy’n dyddio o’r cyfnod cyn y flwyddyn sail brisiau) i adlewyrchu newidiadau yn y lefelau prisiau cyffredinol.
translation.en: Historic costs (those pre-dating the price base year) should be uprated to reflect changes in general price levels.

translation.cy: Cydymffurfio – y gost o fodloni gofynion polisi (e.e. awdurdodau lleol yn darparu gwasanaethau digartrefedd)
translation.en: Compliance – the cost of meeting the requirements of a policy (e.g. local authorities providing homelessness services)

translation.cy: Dan rai amodau, gall fod yn briodol rhoi mwy o bwysoliad ar y manteision i’r grŵp sy’n elwa nag ar y costau i’r grŵp sydd ar ei golled, er enghraifft pan fo polisi wedi'i anelu'n benodol at helpu aelwydydd incwm is neu ardaloedd daearyddol difreintiedig.
translation.en: In certain circumstances, it may be appropriate for benefits to the gaining group to be given a higher weight than the costs to the losing group, for example where a policy is specifically aimed at aiding lower income households or disadvantaged geographic areas.

translation.cy: Ceir canllawiau pellach ar hyn yn y Llyfr Gwyrdd neu gan economegwyr Llywodraeth Cymru.
translation.en: Further guidance on this is available from the Green Book or from Welsh Government economists.

translation.cy: Dylai'r rhain gael eu nodi fel rhan o'r broses asesu effaith.
translation.en: These should be identified as part of the process of impact assessment.

translation.cy: Os bydd y cynigion polisi yn cynnwys costau cylchol, yna bydd angen gostwng y costau hyn (neu eu haddasu i’r Gwerth Presennol) i adlewyrchu’r gyfradd gymdeithasol dewis adeg defnyddio.
translation.en: If the policy proposals will involve recurring costs then these costs will need to be discounted (or adjusted to the Present Value) to reflect the social rate of time preference.

translation.cy: Fel y cyfryw, dyluniwyd Tabl Crynodeb yr Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol i gyflwyno ffigurau cost a budd ar wahân ac fel ffigur net.
translation.en: As such, the RIA Summary Table has been designed to present cost and benefit figures both separately and as a net figure.

translation.cy: Paratoi Pennod 10 yr Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol – Adolygiad ar ôl gweithredu
translation.en: Preparing Chapter 10 of the RIA – Post implementation review

translation.cy: Dylai pennod olaf yr Asesiad Effaith Rheoleiddiol nodi’r dull arfaethedig ar gyfer monitro, adolygu a gwerthuso’r polisi.
translation.en: The final chapter of the RIA should set out the planned approach for monitoring, reviewing and evaluating the policy.

translation.cy: caniatáu ar gyfer y cyfnod hir o amser y gall elfennau o’r broses eu cymryd, e.e. cynhyrchu data newydd, comisiynu gwaith ymchwil a dadansoddi costau;
translation.en: allow for the significant time that elements of the process can take, e.g. generating new data, commissioning research and analysis of costs;

translation.cy: Hefyd, mae canllawiau ar adolygu a gwerthuso polisi ar gael o Lyfr Magenta Trysorlys EM.
translation.en: In addition, guidance on reviewing and evaluating policy is available from HM Treasury’s Magenta Book.

translation.cy: Rhan o swyddogaeth y cyfreithwyr pwnc a Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol yw herio a helpu i fireinio’r polisi, trwy brofi pa mor resymegol yw’r cynigion a chynghori ar faterion sy’n codi yn ymwneud â’r broses ddeddfwriaethol, cyfraith a pholisi.
translation.en: Part of the role of the subject lawyers and OLC is to challenge and help refine the policy, by testing the coherence of the proposals and advising on matters of legislative process, law and policy which arise.

translation.cy: trafod unrhyw bryderon neu anawsterau y gwyddys amdanynt mewn perthynas â’r cynlluniau ac ystyried dulliau cyffredinol amgen.
translation.en: to discuss any concerns or known difficulties about the plans and consider alternative general approaches.

translation.cy: Wrth ddatblygu deddfwriaeth, bydd angen i swyddogion ystyried a fydd y ddeddfwriaeth arfaethedig yn helpu i gyflawni. Rhaid iddynt hefyd ystyried sut y bydd y ddeddfwriaeth arfaethedig yn galluogi eraill i wneud cymaint â phosibl i helpu i gyflawni’r saith nod llesiant, neu i’w hymwreiddio ymhellach yn y pum ffordd o weithio.
translation.en: When developing legislation, officials will need to consider whether the proposed legislation will help to contribute to delivery and how the proposed legislation will enable others to maximise their contribution to the seven well-being goals or support them to further embed the five ways of working.

translation.cy: Mae profiad wedi dangos bod angen bod yn hynod gywir a manwl wrth ddatblygu polisi ar gyfer drafftio deddfwriaeth.
translation.en: Experience has demonstrated that policy development for drafting legislation requires a high level of precision and detail.

translation.cy: pwy y mae’n rhaid eu heffeithio a phwy allai gael eu heffeithio, a phwy mae’n rhaid peidio â’u heffeithio;
translation.en: who must and who might be affected, and who must not;

translation.cy: sut y mae’n rhaid eu heffeithio a sut y gallent gael eu heffeithio, a sut y mae’n rhaid peidio â’u heffeithio;
translation.en: how must and how might they be affected, and how not;

translation.cy: Mae Adran 108A(1) o Ddeddf Llywodraeth Cymru 2006 yn nodi “An Act of the Assembly is not law so far as any provision of the Act is outside the Assembly’s legislative competence.”
translation.en: Section 108A(1) of the Government of Wales Act 2006 (GoWA 2006) provides that “An Act of the Assembly is not law so far as any provision of the Act is outside the Assembly’s legislative competence.”

translation.cy: Er mwyn gwneud hyn yn drylwyr ac yn amserol, bydd angen cyfarwyddiadau polisi manwl cyn gynted â phosibl.
translation.en: To do this thoroughly and in a timely manner, detailed policy instructions will be required as soon as possible.

translation.cy: Gallai ychwanegu polisi newydd sylweddol at y Bil effeithio ar gwmpas a maint y Bil, a fydd yn effeithio yn ei dro ar yr amserlennu ar gyfer y rhaglen ddeddfwriaethol yn ei chyfanrwydd.
translation.en: Adding significant new policy to the Bill may affect the scope and size of the Bill, which in turn will affect timetabling for the legislative programme as a whole.

translation.cy: Diben y cyfarwyddiadau yw esbonio’r holl agweddau perthnasol ar y polisi i’r drafftiwr fel y gellir:
translation.en: The purpose of the instructions is to explain all relevant aspects of the policy to the drafter so that:

translation.cy: nodi a datrys problemau;
translation.en: problems can be identified and resolved; and

translation.cy: A oes angen unrhyw ddarpariaethau trosiannol neu arbed?
translation.en: Are any transitional or saving provisions needed?

translation.cy: polisi deddfwriaethol - pa gydbwysedd ddylai fod rhwng deddfwriaeth sylfaenol ac is-ddeddfwriaeth?
translation.en: legislative policy – what balance should there be between primary and secondary legislation?

translation.cy: Fel arfer, cyfreithiwr fydd yn gyfrifol am gyfarwyddo Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol.
translation.en: The usual practice is for a lawyer to be responsible for instructing OLC.

translation.cy: Mae’n syniad da penodi swyddog polisi arweiniol a swyddog sy’n llunio cyfarwyddiadau arweiniol i hwyluso ymatebion cydgysylltiedig ac awdurdodol ar gyfer materion a godir gan Gwnsleriaid (daw hyn yn arbennig o bwysig wrth i’r terfynau amser ar gyfer llunio’r Bil a diwygiadau i Filiau agosáu).
translation.en: It is a good idea to appoint a lead policy official and a lead instructing officer to facilitate co-ordinated and authoritative responses to issues raised by Counsel (this becomes particularly important close to the deadlines for the production of the Bill and amendments to Bills).

translation.cy: Prif ddiben y cyfarwyddiadau hyn yw esbonio’r polisi, nodi sefyllfa bresennol y gyfraith ac esbonio pa newidiadau i’r gyfraith sydd eu hangen i roi effaith i’r polisi.
translation.en: The main purpose of these instructions is to explain the policy, set out the existing state of the law and explain what changes to the law are needed to give effect to the policy.

translation.cy: Yn aml, nid y Grŵp polisi â chyfrifoldeb cyffredinol am Fil fydd yr unig Grŵp â buddiant yn y polisi.
translation.en: Often the policy Group with overall responsibility for a Bill will not be the only Group with an interest in the policy.

translation.cy: Dylai timau Biliau sicrhau eu bod yn gyfarwydd â chanllawiau Llywodraeth Cymru, ‘Liaison with the UK Government on Assembly Bills, Parliamentary Bills, Orders modifying the Assembly’s legislative competence and changes to the Welsh Ministers’ executive functions’.
translation.en: Bill teams should ensure they are familiar with the Welsh Government’s reciprocal guidance on ‘Liaison with the UK Government on Assembly Bills, Parliamentary Bills, Orders modifying the Assembly’s legislative competence and changes to the Welsh Ministers’ executive functions’.

translation.cy: Os na chaniateir digon o amser ar gyfer hyn yna gallai nifer o anawsterau godi:
translation.en: If insufficient time is allowed for this a number of difficulties may arise:

translation.cy: Bydd ffactorau i’w cadw mewn cof wrth ystyried dull o’r fath yn cynnwys:
translation.en: Factors to bear in mind when considering such an approach will include:

translation.cy: a fyddai blaenoriaethau eraill y drafftiwr yn caniatáu i waith ddechrau ar un set o gyfarwyddiadau pe bai’n cael ei hanfon cyn y cyfarwyddiadau eraill.
translation.en: whether the drafter’s other priorities would enable work to start on the instalment if it was sent in advance of the other instructions.

translation.cy: Os caiff polisi ei newid ar ôl i gyfarwyddiadau gael eu hanfon, mae’n hanfodol bod y drafftiwr yn cael gwybod cyn gynted â phosibl er mwyn osgoi gwaith diangen.
translation.en: If policy is changed after instructions have been sent, it is essential that the drafter is informed as soon as possible to avoid wasted work.

translation.cy: y cynnwys, nid y ffurf, sy’n bwysig.
translation.en: the important thing is the content not the form.

translation.cy: Wrth ysgrifennu cyfarwyddiadau i’r Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol, mae’n help i gymryd cam yn ôl a cheisio dychmygu sut y bydd hi i’r drafftiwr sy’n dechrau o’r dechrau ar y pwnc.
translation.en: It helps when it comes to writing instructions to OLC to stand back and try to imagine what it will be like for the drafter starting on the subject from scratch.

translation.cy: At y diben hwn, mae’r Llywodraeth yn dymuno atal unrhyw un rhag gwerthu tân gwyllt heb drwydded a gyhoeddwyd gan Weinidogion Cymru.
translation.en: For this purpose, the Government wishes to prevent anyone selling fireworks without a licence issued by the Welsh Ministers.

translation.cy: Hefyd, dylai’r rhan hon o’r cyfarwyddiadau:
translation.en: In addition, this part of the instructions should:

translation.cy: I barhau â’r enghraifft uchod, efallai y bydd y cyfarwyddiadau yn crybwyll y problemau diweddar sydd wedi codi yng nghyswllt gwerthu tân gwyllt.
translation.en: To continue the example above, the instructions might mention the recent problems that have arisen in connection with the sale of fireworks.

translation.cy: ceisio esbonio’r gyfraith bresennol yn hytrach na dim ond copïo neu aralleirio pob darpariaeth statudol yr ystyrir sy’n berthnasol.
translation.en: seek to explain the existing law rather than simply copy out or paraphrase every statutory provision that is thought to be relevant.

translation.cy: Er ei bod yn bwysig bod y drafftiwr yn cael digon o gefndir y maes y mae’n mynd i fod yn gweithredu ynddo, nid oes angen darparu traethawd ar y gyfraith bresennol.
translation.en: While it is important the drafter is given a good grounding in the area he or she is going to be operating in, it is not necessary to provide a treatise on the existing law.

translation.cy: Mae’n wastraff amser yr awdur i lunio disgrifiad hirfaith o ddeddfwriaeth neu gyfraith achosion os na fydd yn cael unrhyw effaith ar y gwaith drafftio yn y pen draw.
translation.en: It is a waste of the author’s time to produce a lengthy description of legislation or case law if it will ultimately have no effect on the drafting.

translation.cy: Os yw awdur y cyfarwyddiadau yn dewis gwneud awgrymiadau drafftio o’r fath, bydd y drafftiwr yn fwy na bodlon i’w hystyried.
translation.en: The drafter will be more than happy to consider these types of drafting suggestions, if the author of the instructions chooses to make them.

translation.cy: Bydd hefyd yn angenrheidiol i’r cyfarwyddiadau nodi manylion unrhyw fecanwaith apelio neu adolygu y mae angen darparu ar ei gyfer yn y Bil.
translation.en: It will also be necessary for the instructions to set out the details of any appeal or review mechanism that needs to be provided for in the Bill.

translation.cy: Ond dim ond yn achlysurol y bydd angen rhoi sylw i rai o’r materion hyn.
translation.en: But some of the matters will only occasionally need to be addressed.

translation.cy: materion cymhwysedd deddfwriaethol;
translation.en: legislative competence issues;

translation.cy: Cyfarwyddeb arall y gallai fod angen ei hystyried yw’r Gyfarwyddeb Safonau Technegol (Cyfarwyddeb 98/34/EC, fel y’i diwygiwyd gan Gyfarwyddeb 98/48/EC).
translation.en: Another Directive that may need to be considered is the Technical Standards Directive (Directive 98/34/EC, as amended by Directive 98/48/EC).

translation.cy: Efallai y bydd yr opsiwn hwn yn ymddangos yn ddeniadol i gychwyn pan fo amser yn brin ar gyfer paratoi cyfarwyddiadau.
translation.en: This option may initially seem attractive where there is a limited amount of time for instructions to be prepared.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, os mai’r cynnig yw diddymu corff statudol presennol a throsglwyddo ei swyddogaethau i gorff newydd efallai y bydd yn ddigonol i’r cyfarwyddiadau ddarparu rhestr syml o’r holl ddarpariaethau presennol sy’n cyfeirio at yr hen gorff ar y sail y bydd yn amlwg i’r drafftiwr bod angen diwygio’r darpariaethau rhestredig i gyfeirio at y corff newydd.
translation.en: For example, if the proposal is to abolish an existing statutory body and transfer its functions to a new body it may be sufficient for the instructions to simply provide a list of all the existing statutory provisions which refer to the old body on the basis it will be obvious to the drafter the listed provisions need to be amended to refer to the new body.

translation.cy: Fel posibilrwydd arall, gallai’r Bil roi pŵer yn galluogi i ddarpariaethau o’r fath gael eu gwneud yn ddiweddarach trwy reoliadau.
translation.en: The other possibility is for the Bill to confer a power enabling all such provisions to be made later by regulations.

translation.cy: Dylai’r cyfarwyddiadau ddweud wrth y drafftiwr pa opsiwn y dylid ei ddilyn.
translation.en: The instructions should tell the drafter which option is to be pursued.

translation.cy: Ceir amrywiaeth o opsiynau yma ond mae’n arferol i ddarpariaethau gael eu cychwyn ar ddiwrnod a nodwyd trwy orchymyn a wnaed gan Weinidogion Cymru; ar ddyddiad calendr a nodir yn y Bil; ar y diwrnod ar ôl i'r Bil gael Cydsyniad Brenhinol; ar ddiwedd cyfnod penodedig yn cychwyn gyda Chydsyniad Brenhinol.
translation.en: There are a range of options here but it is usual that provisions are commenced on a day appointed by order made by the Welsh Ministers; on a calendar date specified in the Bill; on the day after the day on which the Bill receives Royal Assent; at the end of a specified period beginning with Royal Assent.

translation.cy: Pan fo’n bosibl, dylai’r diwrnod pan fydd y darpariaethau y gofynnwyd amdanynt yn dod i rym gael ei bennu gan y Bil ei hun (yn hytrach na chan orchmynion a wneir o dan y Bil) – mae hyn yn rhoi mwy sicrwydd i’r rheini sy’n mynd i gael eu heffeithio gan y darpariaethau ac mae hefyd yn arbed trafferth i’r darllenwr o orfod chwilio am orchmynion.
translation.en: Where possible, the day when the requested provisions come into force should be determined by the Bill itself (rather than by orders made under the Bill) – this provides greater certainty to those who are going to be affected by the provisions and also saves putting the reader to the trouble of looking up orders.

translation.cy: Er enghraifft, dylai nodi (i’r graddau eu bod yn hysbys i’r swyddog sy’n llunio cyfarwyddiadau):
translation.en: For example, it should set out (in so far as they are known to the instructing officer):

translation.cy: Gweler paragraff 3.5 am enghreifftiau o achosion o’r fath.
translation.en: For examples of such occasions see paragraph 3.5.

translation.cy: Ymateb i’r cyfarwyddiadau
translation.en: Responding to the instructions

translation.cy: Gwneud sylwadau ar ddarpariaethau drafft ac ymateb i’r memo cysylltiedig
translation.en: Commenting on draft provisions and replying to the accompanying memo

translation.cy: Bydd angen i swyddogion polisi a chyfreithwyr pwnc feddwl yn ofalus am ddrafftiau yng nghyd-destun eu harbenigedd pwnc, gyda’r bwriad o nodi canlyniadau na fwriadwyd na all y drafftwyr eu darganfod yn rhesymol ar eu pen eu hunain.
translation.en: Policy officials and subject lawyers will need to think carefully about drafts in the context of their subject expertise, with a view to identifying unintended consequences that the drafters cannot reasonably discover by themselves.

translation.cy: Gellir gwneud mwy na dim ond rhoi sylwadau ar ba un a yw’r darpariaethau drafft yn cyflawni’r polisi yn yr ymateb i’r drafftiwr.
translation.en: The response to the drafter need not be confined to commenting on whether the draft provisions achieve the policy.

translation.cy: Dylai timau Biliau sicrhau bod gan y Gweinidog ddigon o amser a gwybodaeth i ymgyfarwyddo â darpariaethau’r Bil.
translation.en: Bill teams should ensure that the Minister has sufficient time and information to become familiar with the provisions of the Bill.

translation.cy: Mae’n demtasiwn i lynu at yr enw gweithredol, gan ei ddefnyddio wrth gyfathrebu â rhanddeiliaid allanol, ac mewn gohebiaeth Weinidogol.
translation.en: There is a temptation to become very wedded to the working title, using it in communications with external stakeholders, and Ministerial correspondence.

translation.cy: Yn ôl confensiwn, Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol sy’n penderfynu ar enwau’r Biliau yn ystod y broses ddrafftio, yn amodol ar unrhyw safbwyntiau diweddarach a fynegir gan Weinidogion.
translation.en: By convention it is OLC who decide on the name of the Bills during the drafting process, subject to any later views expressed by Ministers.

translation.cy: Mae’n rhaid i’r enw hefyd gydymffurfio â rheolau’r Llywydd ar ‘ffurf briodol’ Biliau (rhywbeth sydd hefyd yn rhan o gyfrifoldeb y drafftiwr).
translation.en: The title must also conform to the Llywydd’s rules on the ‘proper form’ of Bills (something which also falls within the drafter’s responsibility).

translation.cy: cwmpasu popeth sy’n digwydd yn y Bil (ac a allai fod yn digwydd yn y Bil pan nad yw’r polisi wedi ei bennu’n derfynol);
translation.en: encompass all that is going on in the Bill (and where the policy is not settled might be going on in the Bill); and

translation.cy: is-adran
translation.en: subsection

translation.cy: Ar ôl i benderfyniad gael ei wneud ar sut y bydd y testun Cymraeg yn cael ei ysgrifennu, mae angen i dîm y Bil drafod gyda Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol a’r Uned Cyfieithu Deddfwriaethol (os mai’r Uned Cyfieithu Deddfwriaethol sydd i ddarparu’r testun Cymraeg) faint o amser sydd ei angen i wneud hyn a chytuno ar amserlen a fydd yn cael ei chymeradwyo gan Uned y Rhaglen Ddeddfwriaethol a'i Llywodraethiant i ganiatáu i’r broses a ddisgrifir yn yr adran hon gael ei chyflawni.
translation.en: Once a decision has been taken on how the Welsh text will be produced, the Bill team needs to discuss with OLC and the Legislative Translation Unit (if the Legislative Translation Unit are to provide the Welsh language text) the time needed to do this and agree on a timetable signed off by LPGU to allow the process described in this section to be carried out.

translation.cy: Bydd angen i’r Uned Cyfieithu Deddfwriaethol gael diweddariad rheolaidd gyda’r wybodaeth ganlynol:
translation.en: The Legislative Translation Unit will need to be updated regularly with the following information:

translation.cy: faint ohono fydd yna (mewn geiriau, nid tudalennau);
translation.en: how much of it there will be (in words, not pages);

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn galluogi’r Terminolegydd i fod yn gydgysylltydd ar gyfer y gwaith paratoadol ar safoni’r termau allweddol ar gyfer testun Cymraeg y Bil.
translation.en: This will enable the Terminologist to co-ordinate the preparatory work on standardizing the key terms for the Welsh language text of the Bill.

translation.cy: Mae Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol yn anfon y cais cyfieithu i’r Gwasanaeth Cyfieithu drwy’r ffurflen gais ar y Fewnrwyd.
translation.en: OLC sends the translation request to Translation Service via the request form on the Intranet.

translation.cy: Am nifer o resymau, gall testun Saesneg Bil newid wedi iddo gael ei anfon i gael ei gyfieithu a chyn iddo gael ei wirio.
translation.en: For a number of reasons, the English text of a Bill may change once it has been sent for translation, translated and checked.

translation.cy: Os na roddir amser i’r Uned Cyfieithu Deddfwriaethol gynnal gwiriad terfynol o’r testun Cymraeg wedi i’r gwaith arno gael ei gwblhau, byddai’n ofynnol i Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol ddefnyddio’r amser a neilltuwyd ar gyfer y broses gyfwerthedd i olygu’r testun Cymraeg yn ogystal â chynnal y broses – dylid osgoi hyn gan fod perygl y gallai gwallau ymddangos yn y Bil.
translation.en: If the Legislative Translation Unit is not afforded time to complete the final check of the completed Welsh text, OLC would be required to use the time allocated for legal equivalence to edit the Welsh language text as well as conduct the legal equivalence process – this should be avoided as it risks inaccuracies in the Bill.

translation.cy: Mae neilltuo uniongyrchol yn peri’r risg o gymhlethu cyllideb y Llywodraeth, lleihau hyblygrwydd a chlymu’r Llywodraeth bresennol a Llywodraethau’r dyfodol yn ddiangen.
translation.en: Direct hypothecation risks complicating the Government’s budget, reducing flexibility and tying the current and future Governments’ hands unnecessarily.

translation.cy: Gweithio gydag Arolygiaethau wrth i’r Bil ddatblygu
translation.en: Working with Inspectorates during the development of the Bill

translation.cy: Gwneud darpariaeth mewn deddfwriaeth sylfaenol neu is-ddeddfwriaeth
translation.en: Making provision in primary or secondary legislation

translation.cy: a yw’r materion, er mor fanwl ydynt, yn gymaint o hanfod y Bil, fel y dylai’r Cynulliad eu hystyried ochr yn ochr â gweddill y Bil;
translation.en: the matters, although detailed, are so much of the essence of the Bill that the Assembly ought to consider them along with the rest of the Bill;

translation.cy: Y ‘weithdrefn penderfyniad negyddol’ yw’r math mwyaf cyffredin o weithdrefn.
translation.en: The most common form of procedure is the ‘negative resolution procedure’.

translation.cy: Gall Swyddfa’r Cwnsleriaid Deddfwriaethol hefyd gynghori ar bwerau i gynnwys darpariaethau ategol mewn gorchmynion cychwyn.
translation.en: OLC will also be able to advise on powers to include ancillary provisions in commencement orders.

translation.cy: y person neu’r corff y rhoddir y pwer [sic] iddo ac ym mha fodd y mae’r pŵer i gael ei arfer;
translation.en: the person upon whom, or the body upon which, the power is conferred and the form in which the power is to be exercised;

translation.cy: Dylai’r datganiad o fwriad y polisi fod ar gael yn Gymraeg ac yn Saesneg a dylid caniatáu digon o amser ar gyfer hynny yn amserlen y prosiect.
translation.en: The SoPI should be made available in both English and Welsh and sufficient time should be allowed within the project timetable for this to take place.

translation.cy: Gweler baragraffau 9 a 10(2) o Atodlen 7B.
translation.en: See paragraphs 9 and 10(2) of Schedule 7B.

translation.cy: Dylid caniatáu digon o amser ar gyfer y broses hon.
translation.en: Sufficient time should be allowed for this process.

translation.cy: Gweinidog y Goron; neu
translation.en: a Minister of the Crown; or

translation.cy: awdurdod sydd wedi'i restru yn Atodlen 9A i Ddeddf Llywodraeth Cymru 2006;
translation.en: an authority which is listed in Schedule 9A to GOWA 2006;

translation.cy: Dileu neu addasu swyddogaethau penodol Gweinidogion y DU - gofynion am gydsyniad Gweinidog y DU
translation.en: Removing or modifying certain UK Ministerial functions – requirements for UK Ministerial consent

translation.cy: Rhaid cael cydsyniad Gweinidog priodol y DU er mwyn i Ddeddf Cynulliad wneud y canlynol:
translation.en: An Act of the Assembly can do the following only with the consent of the appropriate UK Minister:

translation.cy: Y Gweinidog priodol yw'r Ysgrifennydd Gwladol (yn ymarferol, mae'n debygol mai Ysgrifennydd Gwladol Cymru fydd hwn), oni bai bod y swyddogaethau perthnasol yn ymwneud â Chyllid a Thollau Ei Mawrhydi, ac os felly y Trysorlys fydd dan sylw.
translation.en: The appropriate Minister is the Secretary of State (in practice this is likely to be the Secretary of State for Wales), unless the relevant functions relate to HM Revenue and Customs, in which case it will be the Treasury.

translation.cy: dileu neu addasu unrhyw swyddogaethau Gweinidog y Goron dan Bennod 1 o Ran 3, neu adran 58, o Ddeddf y Môr a Mynediad i'r Arfordir 2009, neu roi pŵer i wneud hynny;
translation.en: remove or modify any function of a Minster of the crown under Chapter 1 of Part 3, or section 58, of the Marine and Coastal Access Act 2009, or confer power to do so;

translation.cy: Mae enghreifftiau o’r pŵer hwn yn cynnwys yr hawl i wneud rhai penodiadau (gan gynnwys comisiynau brenhinol) neu i arfer y frenhinfraint drugaredd (er enghraifft rhoi pardwn i droseddwyr a euogfarnwyd).
translation.en: Examples of the power include the making of certain appointments (including royal commissions) or the exercise of the prerogative of mercy (for example to pardon convicted offenders).

translation.cy: Ystyriaeth o’r Bil gan Bwyllgor Cynulliad
translation.en: Consideration of the Bill by a Committee of the Assembly

translation.cy: Cyfnod 2
translation.en: Stage 2

translation.cy: Cyfnod 4
translation.en: Stage 4

translation.cy: Nid yw datganiad o’r fath yn ofynnol o dan y Rheolau Sefydlog, ond mae’n gyfle i roi gwybodaeth am y Bil i’r Cynulliad.
translation.en: It is not required by Standing Orders, but represents an opportunity for the Assembly to be informed of the Bill.

translation.cy: Caiff unrhyw Aelod Cynulliad gyflwyno gwelliannau i’r Bil, ond y Llywydd a fydd yn penderfynu pa welliannau y bydd y Cynulliad yn eu hystyried.
translation.en: Any Member may table amendments to the Bill, but the Llywydd will decide which amendments the Assembly will consider.

translation.cy: Y Cyfnod Adrodd
translation.en: Report Stage

translation.cy: Gall fod yn ofynnol bod rhai Biliau yn cael rhagor o ystyriaeth fanwl gan y Cynulliad. Y Cyfnod Adrodd yw’r enw am gyfnod o’r fath, ac mae’n debyg i Gyfnod 3.
translation.en: Some Bills may require a further detailed consideration of the Bill by the Assembly, known as Report Stage, which is similar to Stage 3.

translation.cy: Bydd hyn yn cadarnhau bod y Teyrn yn cytuno i wneud y Bil yn Ddeddf Cynulliad.
translation.en: This is the Monarch’s agreement to make a Bill into an Act of the Assembly.

translation.cy: Rhoddir y Cydsyniad Brenhinol pan fydd y Breinlythyrau o dan y Sêl Gymreig yn cael eu llofnodi gan y Teyrn a Chlerc y Cynulliad yn cael ei hysbysu am hyn.
translation.en: Royal Assent is conferred by the Monarch signing the Letters Patent under the Welsh Seal and is received when the Clerk to the Assembly is notified of this.

translation.cy: Mae’r Bennod hon yn ymdrin â’r gwaith sy’n cael ei wneud yn union cyn i’r Bil fod yn destun ystyriaeth gan y Cynulliad a chyn hysbysu’r ddeddfwrfa o’r Bil (sy’n cael ei alw yn cyflwyno).
translation.en: This Chapter covers the phase of work immediately prior to Assembly consideration of the Bill and the announcement of the Bill to the legislature (known as introduction).

translation.cy: Bydd amser yn cael ei neilltuo ar gyfer hyn yn yr amserlen a ddarperir i dîm y Bil gan Uned y Rhaglen Ddeddfwriaethol a'i Llywodraethiant.
translation.en: This time will be planned on the timetable provided to the Bill team by the Legislative Programme and Governance Unit (LPGU).
